Review: Standard rooms not great at all, poor really, but upgrade to delux room was only £7 per night approx to a lovely room with balcony and pool view. Cleaned daily. Staff very good. Not sure if Michael (tour guy) comes with the hotel (😂) but he sits just at reception - book Michael to drive you about in your personal tour or even just to drive you to Kuta town centre, lovely genuine guy, very very reasonable cost - he even helped us cross the busy road one night !

Review_Bahasa: Kamar standar tidak bagus sama sekali, benar -benar buruk, tetapi meningkatkan ke kamar mewah hanya £ 7 per malam sekitar ke kamar yang indah dengan balkon dan pemandangan kolam renang. Dibersihkan setiap hari. Staf sangat bagus. Tidak yakin apakah Michael (Tour Guy) dilengkapi dengan hotel (😂) tetapi dia duduk hanya di resepsi - pesan Michael untuk mengantar Anda dalam tur pribadi Anda atau bahkan hanya untuk mengantarkan Anda ke pusat kota Kuta, pria asli yang cantik, biaya yang sangat masuk akal - ia bahkan membantu kami menyeberang jalan yang sibuk suatu malam!

Subjeck: 最初閉まってると勘違いした宿
Review: ホテル予約サイトで前の方のページで掲載され、その写真も魅力的でおまけに4星クラスでで値段は超お手頃。 立地はクタということで躊躇なく決めてしまって大失敗。 まず行ってびっくりしたのは、場所がクタではなく、レギャン地区の裏手で周りは閑散としてる地区の巨大な廃墟群の中にあった。一見モールに見えるが9割以上が空き店舗で気味が悪いだけ。 実際泊まってみて思ったが、客室、設備、朝食内容は4星レベルではなく2星。取り柄はプールだけ。やはり一泊3千円台という金額がすべてを語ってる気がした。 バリ初心者には、こんなものかと他と比較しようがないから満足してる向きは多いようだが、リピーターは絶対選ばないと思う。
Review_English: It was featured on the hotel reservation site on the previous page, and the photos are attractive, and it is also of 4 star class and is extremely affordable. Since the location was in the middle of the day, I decided without hesitation and failed. The first thing I was surprised to see was that the location was not Kuta, but in a huge group of ruins in the area behind the Legian area, which is quiet around it. At first glance, it looks like a mall, but more than 90% of the stores are vacant and just creepy. I actually stayed there and thought that the rooms, facilities and breakfast were 2 stars rather than 4 stars. The only thing that matters is the pool. I felt that the amount of around 3,000 yen per night was all about it. Many Bali beginners seem to be satisfied because there is no way to compare this to others, but I don't think they'll ever choose repeat customers.

Review_Bahasa: Itu ditampilkan di situs reservasi hotel di halaman sebelumnya, dan foto -fotonya menarik, dan juga kelas bintang 4 dan sangat terjangkau. Karena lokasi itu di tengah hari, saya memutuskan tanpa ragu -ragu dan gagal. Hal pertama yang saya terkejut melihat adalah bahwa lokasi itu bukan Kuta, tetapi dalam sekelompok besar reruntuhan di daerah di belakang daerah Legian, yang tenang di sekitarnya. Sekilas, itu terlihat seperti mal, tetapi lebih dari 90% toko kosong dan hanya menyeramkan. Saya benar -benar tinggal di sana dan berpikir bahwa kamar, fasilitas, dan sarapan adalah 2 bintang daripada 4 bintang. Satu -satunya hal yang penting adalah kolam renang. Saya merasa bahwa jumlah sekitar 3.000 yen per malam adalah semua tentang hal itu. Banyak pemula Bali tampaknya puas karena tidak ada cara untuk membandingkan ini dengan orang lain, tetapi saya tidak berpikir mereka akan pernah memilih pelanggan tetap.

Subjeck: After 10 years we will not be back!
Review: We first stayed here in 2014 and it was great. Nothing to fault and value for money. Unfortunately over the years it has deteriorated so much that I believe the place needs to be completely renovated. Rooms are average, interior filthy - walls and curtains stained, mold in bathroom. Noisy aircons. This last stay we asked to not be by the pool as we have stayed there previously and it was quite noisy as to be expected. So they put us right beside the stair case and elevator - the second most noisiest place! We also didn’t know but there were many students staying at the hotel who acted like they were the only ones there - running up and down the halls and yelling at each other. We lasted 2 nights before we asked to be moved to a quieter area, which they did. We were told the students were leaving the next day and that night was the only night out of 6 nights that we were able to sleep as the next day, a new lot of students arrived!! We were fairly annoyed at this point and complained multiple times. I then looked up recent reviews to find that someone had recently also had a similar experience with the students. The last few times we have stayed here, we opted to eat breakfast elsewhere as the quality like everything else has been going downhill. Unfortunately we will not be back again. The location is the only thing going for it at the moment. Staff cannot be blamed for this as this is a management issue that needs to be addressed.

Review_Bahasa: Kami pertama kali tinggal di sini pada tahun 2014 dan itu bagus. Tidak ada kesalahan dan nilai uang. Sayangnya selama bertahun -tahun telah memburuk begitu banyak sehingga saya percaya tempat itu perlu direnovasi sepenuhnya. Kamar rata -rata, interior kotor - dinding dan tirai bernoda, jamur di kamar mandi. Aircons yang bising. Kunjungan terakhir ini kami minta untuk tidak berada di kolam renang karena kami telah tinggal di sana sebelumnya dan itu cukup berisik yang diharapkan. Jadi mereka menempatkan kami tepat di samping kasus tangga dan lift - tempat paling berisik kedua! Kami juga tidak tahu tetapi ada banyak siswa yang tinggal di hotel yang bertindak seolah -olah mereka adalah satu -satunya di sana - berlari ke atas dan ke bawah lorong dan saling berteriak. Kami bertahan 2 malam sebelum kami meminta untuk dipindahkan ke daerah yang lebih tenang, yang mereka lakukan. Kami diberitahu bahwa para siswa akan pergi keesokan harinya dan malam itu adalah satu -satunya malam dari 6 malam bahwa kami bisa tidur sebagai hari berikutnya, banyak siswa baru tiba !! Kami cukup kesal pada saat ini dan mengeluh beberapa kali. Saya kemudian mencari ulasan baru -baru ini untuk menemukan bahwa seseorang baru -baru ini juga memiliki pengalaman serupa dengan para siswa. Beberapa kali terakhir kami tinggal di sini, kami memilih untuk sarapan di tempat lain karena kualitas seperti yang lainnya telah menurun. Sayangnya kami tidak akan kembali lagi. Lokasi adalah satu -satunya hal yang terjadi saat ini. Staf tidak dapat disalahkan karena ini adalah masalah manajemen yang perlu ditangani.

Subjeck: spacious room, delicious breakfast, nice location
Review: nice hotel with spacious and comfortable room, excellent breakfast in many choice of dishes whether for Indonesian, continental and western food are available. Friendly helpful staff and will always smiling greet in every corner. Located in the middle of business spot of Kuta.
Review_English: nice hotel with spacious and comfortable room, excellent breakfast in many choice of dishes whether for Indonesian, continental and western food are available. Friendly helpful staff and will always smiling greet in every corner. Located in the middle of business spot of Kuta.
Review_Summary: nice hotel with spacious and comfortable room, excellent breakfast in many choice of dishes whether for Indonesian, continental and western food are available. Friendly helpful staff and will always smiling greet in every corner. Located in the middle of business spot of Kuta.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus dengan kamar yang luas dan nyaman, sarapan yang sangat baik dalam banyak pilihan hidangan baik untuk makanan Indonesia, benua dan barat tersedia. Staf yang ramah dan ramah dan akan selalu tersenyum menyapa di setiap sudut. Terletak di tengah tempat bisnis Kuta.
Review_Clean: Hotel yang bagus dengan kamar yang luas dan nyaman, sarapan yang sangat baik dalam banyak pilihan hidangan baik untuk makanan Indonesia, benua dan barat tersedia. Staf yang ramah dan ramah dan akan selalu tersenyum menyapa di setiap sudut. Terletak di tengah tempat bisnis Kuta.

Subjeck: The photos are edited and condition of hotel is totally different!!!
Review: The building and services of this hotel is most similar to a 2 star motel not as a 4 star hotel. Photos has been edited and the condition of hotel is totally different!!! Breakfast quality and quantity was the worst. It doesn't look like a 4 stars hotel for it's breakfast as they serve minimum variety of foods and most of the time the supplied dishes were empty Stained sheets and pillows, even though we asked them to change them, they still weren't as clean as they should be.. During our one week stay, two groups of about 300 high school students stayed in the hotel, causing noise early in the morning and until midnight, they would disturb other guests and there were about 6 to 8 students staying in each two or four-bedrooms, and during breakfast, we had to wait until 8:30 for the students to leave the breakfast area, so that the table would be available for other guests, and after that, usually the food containers were empty or half. I give them one star just because of their staff as they tried their best efforts to service the guest.

I give them one star just because of their staff as they tried their best efforts to service the guest.
Review_Bahasa: Bangunan dan layanan hotel ini paling mirip dengan motel bintang 2 bukan sebagai hotel bintang 4. Foto telah diedit dan kondisi hotel sangat berbeda !!! Kualitas dan kuantitas sarapan adalah yang terburuk. Itu tidak terlihat seperti hotel bintang 4 untuk sarapan karena mereka menyajikan berbagai minimum makanan dan sebagian besar waktu hidangan yang disediakan adalah lembaran dan bantal bernoda kosong, meskipun kami meminta mereka untuk mengganti mereka, mereka masih tidak sebersih yang seharusnya. Selama setiap minggu, dua minggu, dua kelompok yang akan ada di sana, para siswa di sana, di sana, di awal minggu, di sana, di awal malam dan di mana -mana di sana, ada di sana, di sana, sekitar 300 kelompok di sana. Empat kamar tidur, dan saat sarapan, kami harus menunggu sampai 8:30 bagi para siswa untuk meninggalkan area sarapan, sehingga meja akan tersedia untuk tamu lain, dan setelah itu, biasanya wadah makanan kosong atau setengah. Saya memberi mereka satu bintang hanya karena staf mereka saat mereka mencoba upaya terbaik mereka untuk melayani tamu.

Review: Kecewa, Petugas restaurant bagian pelayanan catat untuk catat tamu yang akan breakfast kurang ramah dalam melayani tamu, nada bicara ketus! Tidak cocok untuk bagian pelayanan hotel, yang seharusnya pelayanan hotel harus ramah dengan tamu! Pertama masuk room, AC panas lalu hari kedua AC kamar bocor. Sabun dan sampo tidak di refil setiap hari, menginap 5 hari tapi sabun hanya sekali di refil.

Not suitable for the hotel service department, which should be friendly hotel services with guests! First entered the room, the AC was hot then the second day the AC was leaked. Soap and shampoo are not refined every day, staying 5 days but soap is only refined once.

Review: Realita tidak sesuai ekspetasi, pengalaman wedding anniversary yang tidak berkesan. Sepanjang Lobby dan parkiran bau kencing, menginap di suite room saat masuk lantai baru dipel dan lengket, kamar mandi bau pesing sampai ke kamar setelah telfon ke hk langsung di follow up. Air bathub warna coklat, sudah dinyalakan lama masih tetap kotor. Slipper harus request dulu. Makanan dominan masakan India dan pedas merica. Masakan indianya rasanya masih ok, eh masakan Indonesia nya yg malah kurang jelas lebih ke bumbu seperti masakan India. Kelebihan hotel ini hanya pada pelayanan karyawan yang ramah selain itu jangan berharap lebih😁. Mau makan diluar atau ke pantai juga harus naik kendaraan. Cukup sekali saja menginap disana.

Along the lobby and parking lots of urinating, staying in the suite room when entering the new floor is mopped and sticky, the bathroom smells of pesing to the room after calling to HK directly followed up. Brown water bath water, it has been turned on for a long time still still dirty. Slipper must request first. Dominant food of Indian cuisine and spicy pepper. The Indian cuisine is still ok, eh, the Indonesian cuisine is even more clearly more to the spices like Indian cuisine. The advantages of this hotel are only on friendly employee services besides that, don't expect more. Want to eat outside or to the beach also have to ride a vehicle. Just stay there once.

Di sepanjang lobi dan tempat parkir buang air kecil, tinggal di ruang suite saat memasuki lantai baru dibakar dan lengket, kamar mandi berbau pesing ke kamar setelah menelepon ke HK secara langsung menindaklanjuti. Review: It's a good and decent hotel in Kuta Bali area. Good location, there are good reataurants nearby. The staff are nice and very hospitable. They will assist you well. Food is good in the hotel. The hotel is a bit old but it is okay. Price is reasonable.
Review_English: It's a good and decent hotel in Kuta Bali area. Good location, there are good reataurants nearby. The staff are nice and very hospitable. They will assist you well. Food is good in the hotel. The hotel is a bit old but it is okay. Price is reasonable.
Review_Summary: It's a good and decent hotel in Kuta Bali area. Good location, there are good reataurants nearby. The staff are nice and very hospitable. They will assist you well. Food is good in the hotel. The hotel is a bit old but it is okay. Price is reasonable.
Review_Bahasa: Ini adalah hotel yang bagus dan layak di daerah Kuta Bali. Lokasi bagus, ada pemasangan kembali yang baik di dekatnya. Stafnya baik dan sangat ramah. Mereka akan membantu Anda dengan baik. Makanan enak di hotel. Hotel ini agak tua tapi tidak apa -apa. Harga masuk akal.
Review_Clean: Ini adalah hotel yang bagus dan layak di daerah Kuta Bali. Lokasi bagus, ada pemasangan kembali yang baik di dekatnya. Stafnya baik dan sangat ramah. Mereka akan membantu Anda dengan baik. Makanan enak di hotel. Hotel ini agak tua tapi tidak apa -apa. Harga masuk akal.

Subjeck: Horrible Place, Always Avoid...it's not even a One Star
Review: By far the worst hotel i have ever stayed in my entire life. We were booked by our travel agent to stay here for 4 days, but we are leaving after 2 days, and if it was feasible we would have left immediately. This place is not a hotel anymore, it's just a cheap run down hostel. The entire facade has a seedy run down look. The hotel is located in a block which is closed down and dark. There are no street lights. We had booked a room with a balcony but the reception fellow gave us the worst room possible. This is inspite of us paying much more than the rack rates. We were shocked on seeing the room with Dirty white walls and a dark and dingy feel. They had dirty balcony with the balcony looking into the backside of the next building (with pipes). The electric plugs don't work. Lamp sheds were cracked. There was just one chair in the room. The The corridors are white tiled like that in a hospital. We immediately complained but the reception person didn't respond. We then told our travel agent who spoke to someone and the manager Ms Lita came to resolve our issues. She was very positive and then got us shifted to a better Studio room. It was bigger and better lit. Howeve, by the time all this was done, our half a day was spoilt. This new room had no balcony but a common verandah running near the poolside. However, next day morning we found two bare-bodied men sleeping in the verandah corridor next to our room. That was it, and we decided to move out. A word about their amenities. They have a pool but it's narrow and the entire area is humid stuffy hot because it's in the short area between two buildings. That can't be used. They serve buffet breakfast but the fans are either dirty or they don't work. The food is tasteless and insipid. All in all, this hotel spoiled the first day of our stay at Bali completely. The reception people were negative in their approach and provided no help at all. This place must be avoided.

Review_Bahasa: Sejauh ini hotel terburuk yang pernah saya tinggali sepanjang hidup saya. Kami dipesan oleh agen perjalanan kami untuk tinggal di sini selama 4 hari, tetapi kami pergi setelah 2 hari, dan jika itu layak kami akan segera pergi. Tempat ini bukan hotel lagi, itu hanya hostel yang murah. Seluruh fasad memiliki tampilan run down yang kumuh. Hotel ini terletak di blok yang ditutup dan gelap. Tidak ada lampu jalan. Kami telah memesan kamar dengan balkon tetapi rekan resepsi memberi kami kamar terburuk. Ini terlepas dari kami membayar lebih dari tarif rak. Kami terkejut melihat ruangan dengan dinding putih kotor dan nuansa gelap dan suram. Mereka memiliki balkon kotor dengan balkon yang melihat ke bagian belakang gedung berikutnya (dengan pipa). Colokan listrik tidak berfungsi. Gudang lampu retak. Hanya ada satu kursi di kamar. Koridornya adalah ubin putih seperti itu di rumah sakit. Kami segera mengeluh tetapi penerima tamu tidak menanggapi. Kami kemudian memberi tahu agen perjalanan kami yang berbicara dengan seseorang dan manajer Ms Lita datang untuk menyelesaikan masalah kami. Dia sangat positif dan kemudian membuat kami pindah ke ruang studio yang lebih baik. Itu lebih besar dan lebih baik menyala. Bagaimanapun, pada saat semua ini dilakukan, setengah hari kami rusak. Kamar baru ini tidak memiliki balkon tetapi beranda umum berlari di dekat kolam renang. Namun, keesokan harinya pagi kami menemukan dua pria bertubuh telanjang tidur di koridor beranda di sebelah kamar kami. Itu saja, dan kami memutuskan untuk pindah. Sepatah kata pun tentang fasilitas mereka. Mereka memiliki kolam renang tetapi sempit dan seluruh area lembab panas karena berada di area pendek antara dua bangunan. Itu tidak bisa digunakan. Mereka menyajikan sarapan prasmanan tetapi para penggemar kotor atau tidak berhasil. Makanannya hambar dan hambar. Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini merusak hari pertama kami menginap di Bali sepenuhnya. Orang -orang resepsi negatif dalam pendekatan mereka dan tidak memberikan bantuan sama sekali. Tempat ini harus dihindari.

Review: This was horrible hoter for stay. My friends and I made a booking for 3nights but we checked out only 1night later. Because, we saw cockroaches in our 1st room and paid more to upgrade our room. Unfortunately, situation did not get better, we have found several cockroaches from our 2nd room and did not sleep at all. It’s worst experience we’ve ever had.

Review_Bahasa: Ini sangat panas untuk menginap. Teman -teman saya dan saya melakukan pemesanan selama 3 minggu tetapi kami memeriksa hanya 1 malam kemudian. Karena, kami melihat kecoak di kamar pertama kami dan membayar lebih untuk meningkatkan kamar kami. Sayangnya, situasi tidak menjadi lebih baik, kami telah menemukan beberapa kecoak dari kamar ke -2 kami dan tidak tidur sama sekali. Ini adalah pengalaman terburuk yang pernah kami miliki.

Review: My original bookings at Superior Rooms. But Dede FO didn't inform me upon process check -in time if my rooms has upgraded to Studio due to overbooking in inventory system hotels. Once I arrived at Studio room it's look spooky, and i am make sure and told him if i wanna stay based on my original bookings in Superior and actually isn't available. And he prefer to provide me triple bed in lower stair and the rooms is very smelly, sink stuck, dirty floor.

Review_Bahasa: Pemesanan asli saya di kamar superior. Tapi Dede Fo tidak memberi tahu saya pada saat pemeriksaan proses -dalam waktu jika kamar saya telah ditingkatkan ke Studio karena overbooking di hotel -hotel sistem inventaris. Begitu saya tiba di ruang studio, itu terlihat menyeramkan, dan saya memastikan dan mengatakan kepadanya jika saya ingin tetap berdasarkan pemesanan asli saya di Superior dan sebenarnya tidak tersedia. Dan dia lebih suka memberi saya tiga tempat tidur di tangga bawah dan kamar -kamarnya sangat bau, wastafel yang macet, lantai kotor.

Subjeck: Prison cell would be better than staying here
Review: If I could give zero stars for this place I would! Room had the worst stench of mold, so bad I was coughing through the night. All the wallpaper was peeling off the wall and I’m not even sure when it last had a full clean as there was dirt in every corner of the room, there was also multiple stains on the bed sheets. Mold on shower curtains and found cockroach on the bedside table when I turned the lamp on in the morning so who knows where else it was on during the night (probably me). When we turned the lights off they were flickering so we had to get the on-site maintenance man at 3:30am to change electrics with no apologies. We were meant to stay 2 nights but checked out early and only stayed 1, when we informed the staff why the customer service was non existent and told us we were checked out, no offer of refund. The whole place is dirty and hands down worst coffee I’ve ever had.

The whole place is dirty and hands down worst coffee I’ve ever had.
Review_Bahasa: Jika saya bisa memberikan bintang nol untuk tempat ini saya akan! Kamar memiliki bau cetakan terburuk, sangat buruk aku batuk sepanjang malam. Semua wallpaper mengelupas dari dinding dan saya bahkan tidak yakin kapan terakhir kali memiliki bersih penuh karena ada kotoran di setiap sudut ruangan, ada juga beberapa noda di seprai. Cetakan pada tirai kamar mandi dan menemukan kecoak di meja samping tempat tidur ketika saya menyalakan lampu di pagi hari jadi siapa yang tahu di mana lagi di malam hari (mungkin saya). Ketika kami mematikan lampu, mereka berkedip-kedip sehingga kami harus mendapatkan pemeliharaan di tempat pada pukul 3:30 pagi untuk mengganti listrik tanpa permintaan maaf. Kami seharusnya tinggal 2 malam tetapi check out lebih awal dan hanya tinggal 1, ketika kami memberi tahu staf mengapa layanan pelanggan tidak ada dan memberi tahu kami bahwa kami akan check out, tidak ada tawaran pengembalian dana. Seluruh tempat kotor dan tangan ke bawah kopi terburuk yang pernah saya miliki.

Seluruh tempat kotor dan tangan ke bawah kopi terburuk yang pernah saya miliki.

Review: Location wise I would say it's very good, within walking distance u can find everything. Good food at the food court Dwi Corner. Reasonable price. Walk some down can get some local items to purchase among them is the famous kek legit. Krishna stores is also around the corner. The room is simple enough no frills hotel. Stayed at the suite. The air conditioning was leaking, lucky we didn't slip! It's exactly at the door way. But they did come and try to repair but it's still was the same for 3nights. Why we didn't change room is beyond me. The breakfast is nothing to shout about, sufficient to fill your tummy. The egg station could improve though! I saw them able to prepare pack food for those going on tour. That's nice of them. You can book texsi with the hotel

Review_Bahasa: Lokasi bijaksana saya akan mengatakan itu sangat bagus, dalam jarak berjalan kaki Anda dapat menemukan semuanya. Makanan enak di pojok DWI food court. Harga yang wajar. Berjalanlah beberapa barang bisa mendapatkan beberapa barang lokal untuk dibeli di antara mereka adalah Kek Legit yang terkenal. Toko Krishna juga dekat. Kamarnya cukup sederhana tanpa hotel embel -embel. Tinggal di suite. AC bocor, beruntung kami tidak tergelincir! Tepat di pintu. Tetapi mereka memang datang dan mencoba untuk memperbaiki tetapi masih sama untuk 3 minggu. Mengapa kami tidak berganti ruang melampaui saya. Sarapan tidak ada yang perlu diteriaki, cukup untuk mengisi perut Anda. Stasiun telur bisa membaik! Saya melihat mereka bisa menyiapkan makanan paket untuk mereka yang melakukan tur. Itu bagus dari mereka. Anda dapat memesan Texsi dengan hotel

Review: Very good hotel to stay in Bali, hotel staff is very helping. You can ask for any help. Food was good, good to stay with family as well. Hotel location is not far from Kuta night club and beach.
Review_English: Very good hotel to stay in Bali, hotel staff is very helping. You can ask for any help. Food was good, good to stay with family as well. Hotel location is not far from Kuta night club and beach.
Review_Summary: Very good hotel to stay in Bali, hotel staff is very helping. You can ask for any help. Food was good, good to stay with family as well. Hotel location is not far from Kuta night club and beach.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bagus untuk menginap di Bali, staf hotel sangat membantu. Anda dapat meminta bantuan apa pun. Makanannya enak, senang tinggal bersama keluarga juga. Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari Kuta Night Club dan Beach.

Review: Rooms are comfortable and clean, the food was just exceptable, the actual premises needs a refurb, looking old. However I found the staff were excellent, very friendly and obliging We had to request for a fresh towel daily as they don't change it unless you ask. Towels and bedsheets were not clean.

However I found the staff were excellent, very friendly and obliging We had to request for a fresh towel daily as they don't change it unless you ask. Towels and bedsheets were not clean.
Review_Bahasa: Kamar -kamar nyaman dan bersih, makanannya tidak lagi, tempat yang sebenarnya membutuhkan perbaikan, terlihat tua. Namun saya menemukan stafnya sangat baik, sangat ramah dan berkewajiban kami harus meminta handuk segar setiap hari karena mereka tidak mengubahnya kecuali Anda bertanya. Handuk dan tempat tidur tidak bersih.

Handuk dan tempat tidur tidak bersih.

Review: Every member of staff was friendly and wanted to help. We ate here a few times, the food was good and reasonably priced. The bar men are lovely and have a laugh with you. The hotel is about a 25 min walk from the beach area but there is a shuttle or a taxi was 30k each way. We upgraded our room on arrival as I wasn't aware that our original room didn't have a balcony or window! The shower was powerful and we never had a problem with water pressure. The rooms and surroundings were clean but do need an upgrade. Would I stay here again......yes, it was quiet, comfortable and clean. The staff were lovely.

The hotel is about a 25 min walk from the beach area but there is a shuttle or a taxi was 30k each way. The rooms and surroundings were clean but do need an upgrade. Would I stay here again......yes, it was quiet, comfortable and clean. The staff were lovely.
Review_Bahasa: Setiap anggota staf ramah dan ingin membantu. Kami makan di sini beberapa kali, makanannya enak dan terjangkau. Pria bar itu cantik dan tertawa bersamamu. Hotel ini berjarak sekitar 25 menit berjalan kaki dari area pantai tetapi ada pesawat ulang -alik atau taksi adalah 30rb setiap jalan. Kami meningkatkan kamar kami pada saat kedatangan karena saya tidak menyadari bahwa kamar asli kami tidak memiliki balkon atau jendela! Mandi sangat kuat dan kami tidak pernah memiliki masalah dengan tekanan air. Kamar dan sekitarnya bersih tetapi memang perlu peningkatan. Apakah saya akan tinggal di sini lagi ...... ya, itu tenang, nyaman dan bersih. Stafnya cantik.

Review: Positive: 1. Affordable rates. I booked for a one bedroom suite. 2. Good facilities and inclusions for the price paid. My hotel package includes pick-up and drop-off to and from the airport. 3. Daily breakfast is good. 4. Location is near many good restaurants (i.e. Bali Bakery and Gourmet Sate House among a few) 5. Free shuttle to Discovery Mall and Beachwalk Mall 6. Friendly and hospitable staff Negative experience: 1. I was not picked-up at the airport. I was at the immigration for more than one hour. I also got delayed on the luggage retrieval because somebody took my luggage out of the carousel. But this was compensated by the hotel. 2. When I went back to my room after taking breakfast, the room attendant was cleaning the room. He let somebody from another room inside our room. Nothing was lost in our room and this did not happen again.

Free shuttle to Discovery Mall and Beachwalk Mall 6. Friendly and hospitable staff Negative experience: 1. I was not picked-up at the airport. I was at the immigration for more than one hour. I also got delayed on the luggage retrieval because somebody took my luggage out of the carousel. But this was compensated by the hotel. 2. When I went back to my room after taking breakfast, the room attendant was cleaning the room. He let somebody from another room inside our room. Nothing was lost in our room and this did not happen again.

Nothing was lost in our room and this did not happen again.
Review_Bahasa: Positif: 1. Tarif terjangkau. Saya memesan untuk suite satu kamar tidur. 2. Fasilitas dan inklusi yang baik untuk harga yang dibayarkan. Paket hotel saya termasuk pick-up dan drop-off ke dan dari bandara. 3. Sarapan harian itu enak. 4. Lokasi dekat banyak restoran yang bagus (mis. Bali Bakery dan Gourmet Sate House di antara beberapa) 5. Antar-jemput gratis ke Discovery Mall dan Beachwalk Mall 6. Staf yang ramah dan ramah Pengalaman negatif: 1. Saya tidak dijemput di bandara. Saya berada di imigrasi selama lebih dari satu jam. Saya juga tertunda pada pengambilan bagasi karena seseorang mengeluarkan barang -barang saya dari korsel. Tapi ini dikompensasi oleh hotel. 2. Ketika saya kembali ke kamar saya setelah sarapan, petugas kamar sedang membersihkan kamar. Dia membiarkan seseorang dari kamar lain di dalam kamar kami. Tidak ada yang hilang di kamar kami dan ini tidak terjadi lagi.

Tidak ada yang hilang di kamar kami dan ini tidak terjadi lagi.

Review: We were there for a whole week during the month of March 2019. We had a room near to the swimming pool and booked the same on B/B basis. Rooms was spacious and equipped with all the modern equipment. It was perfectly arranged. Food was delicious and had a buffet for the whole week with so many varieties of food. Complimentary Airport pick-up & drop given. Staff was very attentive and supportive. Highly recommended.

Review_Bahasa: Kami berada di sana selama seminggu penuh selama bulan Maret 2019. Kami memiliki kamar di dekat kolam renang dan memesan hal yang sama berdasarkan B/B. Kamar luas dan dilengkapi dengan semua peralatan modern. Itu diatur dengan sempurna. Makanan lezat dan memiliki prasmanan selama seminggu penuh dengan begitu banyak varietas makanan. Penjemputan & Penurunan Bandara gratis diberikan. Staf sangat penuh perhatian dan mendukung. Sangat disarankan.

Review: harga memang dapat nya murah, tapi kamar nya bau apek, tidak di bersihkan dengan alasan check in nya mendadak (padahal saya pesan jam 13.30 dan check in pukul 15.00).. ok lah... saya maklumin karena pegawai nya kurang, setelah itu AC kamar tidak dingin malah banyak nyamuk nya, sudah disampaikan dan diperbaiki tapi tidak berubah juga. Mungkin next sebelum kasi kamar ke tamu, di check dulu dan dibersihkan. Terima kasih
Review_English: The price can indeed be cheap, but the room smells musty, not cleaning with the reason for the sudden check -in (even though I ordered at 13.30 and check in at 15.00) ... Ok ... I understand because the employees are lacking, after that the air conditioner is not cold, but there are many mosquitoes, it has been delivered and repaired but it hasn't changed. Maybe next before the room to the guest, check first and cleaned. Thank You

Review: Good hotel, clean and comfortable. Good price in Kuta area and near lots of restaurants. However, I think that they need to put some bellboy/porter service to escort every guest to the room. I was have no idea where my room is and just following the sign and it was bit difficult. Also, they charge for the motorbike park as their location is in Kuta central area, it's weird but oke.

Also, they charge for the motorbike park as their location is in Kuta central area, it's weird but oke.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus, bersih dan nyaman. Harga bagus di daerah Kuta dan dekat banyak restoran. Namun, saya pikir mereka perlu menempatkan beberapa layanan Bellboy/Porter untuk mengawal setiap tamu ke kamar. Saya tidak tahu di mana kamar saya berada dan hanya mengikuti tanda dan itu agak sulit. Juga, mereka mengenakan biaya untuk Taman Sepeda Motor karena lokasi mereka berada di Kuta Central Area, itu aneh tapi Oke.

Review: My thirda stay here now and not my last. Always well looked after. Great housekeeping, location and excellent service staff especially Andi and the bar team. Very good breakfast selection to start your day. Great job to all.
Review_English: My thirda stay here now and not my last. Always well looked after. Great housekeeping, location and excellent service staff especially Andi and the bar team. Very good breakfast selection to start your day. Great job to all.

Review_Bahasa: Ketiga saya tinggal di sini sekarang dan bukan yang terakhir. Selalu dijaga dengan baik. Rumah tangga yang bagus, lokasi dan staf layanan yang sangat baik terutama Andi dan tim bar. Pilihan sarapan yang sangat baik untuk memulai hari Anda. Kerja bagus untuk semua.

Review: Bit of a hike to the central part of Kuta & the beach but taxis are cheap if you can get one to use the meter. 4* is probably pushing it but staff were very friendly & helpful. Building is a bit of a maze but at least I had a window in my room! Noisy guests and a lot of tobacco smokers which was very off-putting. One was even smoking in the pool.

Review_Bahasa: Sedikit kenaikan ke bagian tengah Kuta & pantai tetapi taksi murah jika Anda bisa mendapatkannya untuk menggunakan meteran. 4* mungkin mendorongnya tetapi staf sangat ramah & membantu. Bangunan sedikit labirin tapi setidaknya saya punya jendela di kamar saya! Para tamu yang bising dan banyak perokok tembakau yang sangat tidak menyenangkan. Salah satunya bahkan merokok di kolam renang.

Review: Just spent 8days/7nights at the Kuta central park hotel.. Massage girls were absolutely fantastic do amazing job and are also happy to watch kids in kids club (for free) while gettin treatments The rest was disappointing had to move room 3 times First room... we asked to move to ground floor as we were put on the 3rd floor and the very end of long coridoor plus our kingsize bed was technical 2 king singles pushed together 😣(hard work with young children) hotel moved us when ground-floor room was available which was awesome BUT ground floor room air con did not work and our 2 yr old son pull a half smashed glass bottle from under the bed and daughter step on and found lil shards of glass😡😠😡😠 On the 2nd last day of stay they moved us yet again to different room (upgraded) We had amazing bar attender the first day...then rest of the time not so great...waited at swim up bar for 5-10mins(not busy only customers there) with staffs backs turnt to you unable to get their attention then would disappear then finally would take order BUT when we would take a bottle of coke to pool with us they would be tell you No No within 30secs or beening there and would be funny/unwilling to give us plastic cup so our 2 kids could share a can of drink between them 😡 Also very highly priced at bar $7 for bingtang after ++tax and services Pool towels are very hard to get ahold of...also pool.open til 10pm but towels only available til 7pm Even tho we had 4 ppl booked in (2yr old stay free) they only ever left 3 towels in room Kids club (mis understanding ) was under impression it was supervised unfortunately was not 😓 ***Advertise...pool toys...welcome drink on arrival...family activties but non were available or offered Tv reciption was absolutelyterrible Rooms where cleanish but bathroom/showers definatly need a good bleach and scrub All in all was ok but won't stay again

Review_Summary: The Kuta central park hotel is located in Kuta, a city in the north-east of the country. The hotel is one of the most expensive in the city, with rooms costing up to $10,000 per night. The pool is open until 10pm but towels are only available until 7pm.
Review_Bahasa: Baru saja menghabiskan 8 hari/7 malam di Kuta Central Park Hotel .. Pijat Gadis benar -benar fantastis melakukan pekerjaan yang luar biasa dan juga senang menonton anak -anak di Kids Club (gratis) sementara perawatan gettin sisanya mengecewakan harus memindahkan kamar 3 kali kamar pertama ... kami meminta untuk pindah ke lantai dasar saat kami diterapkan di lantai 2 dan king. Kamar lantai dasar tersedia yang luar biasa tetapi ruang lantai dasar udara tidak berfungsi dan putra kami yang berusia 2 tahun menarik setengah botol kaca yang hancur dari bawah tempat tidur dan anak perempuannya melangkah dan menemukan pecahan kaca lil pada hari terakhir masa tinggal mereka memindahkan kami lagi ke punggung yang berbeda (ditingkatkan). Kami memiliki pelawak yang luar biasa 10 waktu pertama ... saat itu tidak ada di sana 10 waktu yang tidak ada di sana 10 waktu yang lebih baik. Bagi Anda, tidak dapat mendapatkan perhatian mereka maka akan hilang maka akhirnya akan memesan tetapi ketika kami akan mengambil sebotol Coke untuk menyatu dengan kami, mereka akan memberi tahu Anda tidak dalam waktu 30 detik atau berada di sana dan tidak akan lucu/tidak mau memberi kami gelas plastik sehingga 2 anak kami dapat berbagi 10 tower di antara mereka. Tersedia sampai jam 7 malam bahkan kami memiliki 4 ppl yang dipesan di (2 tahun tinggal gratis) Mereka hanya pernah meninggalkan 3 handuk di kamar anak -anak klub (salah pengertian) berada di bawah kesan itu diawasi sayangnya bukan 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 😓 ia

Review: During shcool holiday , we booked 2 rooms one is standar room and the other one is tripple room for staying 1 Night. Awesome rooms that are bigger than i had ever, hot water running well and there is bathub very confortable. Kids are happy can played in the room, swam after having breakfast, enjoyed our favorit food " pizza " at pool Bar. Breakfast buffet was great, staff are friendly. Hope we can stay here for another time. Thank KCP

Review_Bahasa: Selama liburan shcool, kami memesan 2 kamar satu adalah ruang standar dan yang lainnya adalah kamar tripple untuk menginap 1 malam. Kamar -kamar mengagumkan yang lebih besar dari sebelumnya, air panas mengalir dengan baik dan ada bathub yang sangat nyaman. Anak -anak senang bisa dimainkan di kamar, berenang setelah sarapan, menikmati makanan favorit kami "pizza" di biliar bar. Sarapan prasmanan luar biasa, staf ramah. Semoga kita bisa tinggal di sini untuk lain waktu. Terima kasih KCP

Review: We booked the "Studio king Queen room inclusive breakfast" for a family of four. Very spacious - probably the biggest hotel room we've ever had. Service was excellent, from the driver who picked us up at the airport (free return airport shuttle for stays over 5 nights) to the reception staff, to the driver who operate the shuttle bus from the hotel to the Kuta attractions. Breakfast is a buffet breakfast - delicious and great value. The aircon seemed to struggle a little against the sweltering Bali heat. The shower doesnt drain that well but we managed ok with a towel on the floor to stop the water flowing out. Overall, enjoyed our stay :) Thank you!
Review_English: We booked the "Studio king Queen room inclusive breakfast" for a family of four. Very spacious - probably the biggest hotel room we've ever had. Service was excellent, from the driver who picked us up at the airport (free return airport shuttle for stays over 5 nights) to the reception staff, to the driver who operate the shuttle bus from the hotel to the Kuta attractions. Breakfast is a buffet breakfast - delicious and great value. The aircon seemed to struggle a little against the sweltering Bali heat. The shower doesnt drain that well but we managed ok with a towel on the floor to stop the water flowing out. Overall, enjoyed our stay :) Thank you!
Review_Summary: We booked the "Studio king Queen room inclusive breakfast" for a family of four. Very spacious - probably the biggest hotel room we've ever had. Service was excellent, from the driver who picked us up at the airport (free return airport shuttle for stays over 5 nights) to the reception staff, to the driver who operate the shuttle bus from the hotel to the Kuta attractions. Breakfast is a buffet breakfast - delicious and great value. The aircon seemed to struggle a little against the sweltering Bali heat. The shower doesnt drain that well but we managed ok with a towel on the floor to stop the water flowing out. Overall, enjoyed our stay :) Thank you!
Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan "Studio King Queen Room Inclusive Breakfast" untuk keluarga berempat. Sangat luas - mungkin kamar hotel terbesar yang pernah kami miliki. Layanan sangat baik, dari pengemudi yang menjemput kami di bandara (antar -jemput bandara bebas untuk menginap lebih dari 5 malam) ke staf resepsi, ke pengemudi yang mengoperasikan bus antar -jemput dari hotel ke tempat wisata Kuta. Sarapan adalah sarapan prasmanan - nilainya lezat dan luar biasa. ACANCOUS tampaknya sedikit berjuang melawan panas Bali yang terik. Mandi tidak mengalir dengan baik tetapi kami berhasil dengan baik dengan handuk di lantai untuk menghentikan air mengalir keluar. Secara keseluruhan, menikmati kami tinggal :) Terima kasih!

Review: It was our very first destination for the year 2019. Actually we select Bali, Indonesia as our 1st Anniversary gateway. We booked this hotel for 06 nights on BB basis. It is a nice hotel and located in a very convenient place. Rooms are spacious and also the other amenities were also perfect. breakfast was fine and they had a good variety and they were delicious and mouthwatering. Staff were really helpful and nice. Superb service given. Recommended.

Ini adalah hotel yang bagus dan terletak di tempat yang sangat nyaman. Kamar luas dan juga fasilitas lainnya juga sempurna. Sarapan baik -baik saja dan mereka memiliki variasi yang baik dan mereka lezat dan menggiurkan. Staf sangat membantu dan baik. Layanan luar biasa diberikan. Direkomendasikan.

Review: Llegamos a kuta y fuimos a parar a un hotel de mala muerte, por suerte pasamos la noche y al día siguiente me puse en busca y captura de un hotel nuevo, facilísimo, encontré este, alquile una moto y es perfecto, tenia piscina, desayunos y restaurante las instalaciones muy bien, los alrededores de la piscina un peligro, resbala muchísimo, pero por todo lo demás, perfecto! aparcamos el coche en el mismo hotel.
Review_English: We arrived in Kuta and went to a hotel of bad death, luckily we spent the night and the next day I got in search and capture of a new, very easy hotel, I found this, rent a motorcycle and it is perfect, I had a swimming pool, breakfast and restaurant the facilities very well, the surroundings of the pool a danger, it slips a lot, but for everything else, perfect! We parked the car at the same hotel.
Review_Summary: We arrived in Kuta and went to a hotel of bad death, luckily we spent the night and the next day I got in search and capture of a new, very easy hotel, I found this, rent a motorcycle and it is perfect, I had a swimming pool, breakfast and restaurant the facilities very well, the surroundings of the pool a danger, it slips a lot, but for everything else, perfect! We parked the car at the same hotel.
Review_Bahasa: Kami tiba di Kuta dan pergi ke hotel kematian yang buruk, untungnya kami menghabiskan malam dan hari berikutnya saya mencari dan menangkap hotel baru yang sangat mudah, saya menemukan ini, menyewa sepeda motor dan itu sempurna, saya memiliki kolam renang, sarapan dan restoran dengan sangat baik, sekitarnya kolam renang sangat berbahaya, itu tergelincir, tetapi untuk semua yang lain, tetapi sempurna! Kami memarkir mobil di hotel yang sama.

Kami memarkir mobil di hotel yang sama.

Review: We stayed at kuta central park hotel for 6 days. When we booked our stay they had a promo which is book 5 days + 1 night free stay. With the inclusion of two way airport transfer and 10% discount on food and beverages. The location is good as well as the food and and room amenities.
Review_English: We stayed at kuta central park hotel for 6 days. When we booked our stay they had a promo which is book 5 days + 1 night free stay. With the inclusion of two way airport transfer and 10% discount on food and beverages. The location is good as well as the food and and room amenities.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di Kuta Central Park Hotel selama 6 hari. Ketika kami memesan kami tinggal, mereka memiliki promo yaitu buku 5 hari + 1 malam menginap gratis. Dengan dimasukkannya transfer bandara dua arah dan diskon 10% untuk makanan dan minuman. Lokasi baik serta fasilitas makanan dan kamar.

Dengan dimasukkannya transfer bandara dua arah dan diskon 10 untuk makanan dan minuman. Lokasi baik serta fasilitas makanan dan kamar.

Review: Really nice hotel but be mindful with the booking I booked a studio room for 3 people but they only had 1 king size bed and told me to pay additionally in order to get another bed. Other than that, the breakfast was nice and so was the hotel and staff.
Review_English: Really nice hotel but be mindful with the booking I booked a studio room for 3 people but they only had 1 king size bed and told me to pay additionally in order to get another bed. Other than that, the breakfast was nice and so was the hotel and staff.
Review_Summary: Really nice hotel but be mindful with the booking I booked a studio room for 3 people but they only had 1 king size bed and told me to pay additionally in order to get another bed. Other than that, the breakfast was nice and so was the hotel and staff.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bagus tetapi berhati -hatilah dengan pemesanan saya memesan ruang studio untuk 3 orang tetapi mereka hanya memiliki 1 tempat tidur king dan menyuruh saya membayar tambahan untuk mendapatkan tempat tidur lain. Selain itu, sarapannya enak dan begitu pula hotel dan stafnya.

Review: We have booked Studio tripple room for 5nights directly from the website. Room was clean and bigger. Service is excellent. Hygeine is properly maintained. Suggestions- Breakfast has less options for Indian food.

Review: Baru saja mampir ke sini untuk membeli Cappuccino. Lingkungan tampak indah. Bagus restoran besar dan area selasar. Staf sangat baik dan menemukan saya meja yang bagus untuk minum kopi. Ketika Cappuccino datang itu sangat bagus dan harga terjangkau. Menikmatinya.
Review_English: Just stopped by here to buy Cappuccino. The environment looks beautiful. Good Large Restaurant and Selasar Area. The staff were very good and found me a good table for drinking coffee. When Cappuccino came was very good and affordable prices. Enjoy it.
Review_Summary: Just stopped by here to buy Cappuccino. The environment looks beautiful. Good Large Restaurant and Selasar Area. The staff were very good and found me a good table for drinking coffee. When Cappuccino came was very good and affordable prices. Enjoy it.

Review: Sangat bagus untuk kami karena dokter gigi saya pusat Peremajaan berjalan kaki. Memiliki makanan yang enak dan kamar yang bagus dipesan yang merupakan akses kolam renang. Mereka memiliki antar-jemput gratis yang menuju ke area utama.
Review_English: Very good for us because my dentist is the center of walking. Having good food and a good room ordered which is a swimming pool access. They have a free shuttle that goes to the main area.
Review_Summary: Very good for us because my dentist is the center of walking. Having good food and a good room ordered which is a swimming pool access. They have a free shuttle that goes to the main area.
Review_Bahasa: Sangat bagus untuk kami karena dokter gigi saya adalah pusat berjalan. Memiliki makanan yang enak dan kamar yang baik dipesan yang merupakan akses kolam renang. Mereka memiliki pesawat ulang -alik gratis yang menuju ke area utama.

Review: We stayed at Kuta Central Park for 8 days, did the research and paid the little bit extra money to get a bigger room for the three of us. Room was very clean no issues and right near pool. The rate was great and we found it fine for down time. Special rate at time so only paid 700,000 rupiah per night with breakfast included, so cannot go wrong. Breakfast was great, if was not available on buffet or egg station you could order at no cost like bacon, poached eggs etc. I did not even know renovations going on where we were staying there was no noise in our room which was ground floor near the pool Staff were very friendly and helpful. Rate included pick and drop off to airport due to amount of days, we were even paged at airport as they were worried where we were. Would definitely stay again

Rate included pick and drop off to airport due to amount of days, we were even paged at airport as they were worried where we were. Would definitely stay again
Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di Kuta Central Park selama 8 hari, melakukan penelitian dan membayar sedikit uang tambahan untuk mendapatkan ruang yang lebih besar untuk kami bertiga. Kamar sangat bersih tanpa masalah dan tepat di dekat kolam renang. Tarifnya bagus dan kami merasa baik untuk waktu henti. Tarif khusus pada waktu jadi hanya membayar 700.000 rupiah per malam dengan sarapan termasuk, jadi tidak bisa salah. Sarapan luar biasa, jika tidak tersedia di prasmanan atau stasiun telur yang dapat Anda pesan tanpa biaya seperti bacon, telur rebus dll. Saya bahkan tidak tahu renovasi yang terjadi di tempat kami tinggal, tidak ada suara di kamar kami yang merupakan lantai dasar di dekat staf kolam renang sangat ramah dan membantu. Tarif termasuk pick dan drop off ke bandara karena jumlah hari, kami bahkan di Paged di bandara karena mereka khawatir di mana kami berada. Pasti akan tinggal lagi

Review: Tempat ramah yang bagus jika Anda ingin liburan hemat. Saya sangat beruntung memiliki udara - con dan balkon. Makanan pada dasarnya sama setiap hari, bukan pilihan nasi mie dan telur dadar. Bangunan sedang melalui perbaikan dan mungkin ada suara pengeboran di pagi hari. Bangunan ini sangat ketinggalan jaman dan bisa dilakukan dengan beberapa TLC tetapi staf sangat membantu dan ramah dan mencoba memenuhi kebutuhan Anda. Perjalanan pertama saya ke Bali saya akan memilih hotel lain dengan standar yang lebih tinggi.
Review_English: A good friendly place if you want a frugal vacation. I am very fortunate to have air - con and balcony. Food is basically the same every day, not the choice of rice noodles and omelette. The building is going through repairs and there may be drilling sounds in the morning. This building is very outdated and can be done with several TLCs but staff are very helpful and friendly and try to meet your needs. My first trip to Bali I will choose another hotel with higher standards.
Review_Summary: A good friendly place if you want a frugal vacation. I am very fortunate to have air - con and balcony. Food is basically the same every day, not the choice of rice noodles and omelette. The building is going through repairs and there may be drilling sounds in the morning. This building is very outdated and can be done with several TLCs but staff are very helpful and friendly and try to meet your needs. My first trip to Bali I will choose another hotel with higher standards.

Review: We stayed there for a couple of nights. The first room, dark, barely without light, quite dark, the television was watched bad, the shower with cold water! There are no hand towels / dressing table (in any room type). The kettle has to be plugged it in the bathroom or on your bedside table because there is no plug where they have placed it The noise at night is unbearable. You hear everything! They are under construction, they always say sorry, but you can´t sleep. At 7am they start with the hammering. The place, I imagine that because of the vegetation, it is full of mosquitoes. And if they are not careful when cleaning the rooms, they enter. First, you call the reception to ask for an insecticide (a couple of calls always, it doesn't work with the first call). And then, you have to almost implore them to leave the insecticide with you and not take it away. We changed the room for the 2nd night (without offering this option at reception when we first checked in, even paying more). The girl at the reception was quite unpleasant. The next day, we had to check out and check in, they told us that we should leave the room at 12h, but that the new one would be available at 3 pm! Very bad organization. If you force me to leave at 12, I WANT my room at 14 o'clock! More being already a guest, being in the hotel since last night and with a bandaged foot as I had it. No, I do not consider that neither the hotel nor the staff is for a 4-star hotel.

You hear everything! They are under construction, they always say sorry, but you can´t sleep.
Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di sana selama beberapa malam. Kamar pertama, gelap, nyaris tanpa terang, cukup gelap, televisi ditonton buruk, kamar mandi dengan air dingin! Tidak ada handuk tangan / meja rias (dalam jenis kamar apa pun). Ketel harus dicolokkan di kamar mandi atau di meja samping tempat tidur Anda karena tidak ada steker di mana mereka meletakkannya kebisingan di malam hari tidak tertahankan. Anda mendengar semuanya! Mereka sedang dibangun, mereka selalu meminta maaf, tetapi Anda tidak bisa tidur. Pada jam 7 pagi mereka mulai dengan memalu. Tempat itu, saya membayangkan bahwa karena vegetasi, itu penuh dengan nyamuk. Dan jika mereka tidak hati -hati saat membersihkan kamar, mereka masuk. Pertama, Anda menelepon resepsi untuk meminta insektisida (beberapa panggilan selalu, itu tidak berfungsi dengan panggilan pertama). Dan kemudian, Anda harus hampir mohon mereka untuk meninggalkan insektisida bersama Anda dan tidak mengambilnya. Kami mengganti kamar untuk malam ke -2 (tanpa menawarkan opsi ini di resepsi ketika kami pertama kali check -in, bahkan membayar lebih). Gadis di resepsi itu sangat tidak menyenangkan. Keesokan harinya, kami harus check out dan check -in, mereka memberi tahu kami bahwa kami harus meninggalkan ruangan pada pukul 12 jam, tetapi yang baru akan tersedia pada jam 3 sore! Organisasi yang sangat buruk. Jika Anda memaksa saya untuk pergi jam 12, saya ingin kamar saya jam 14! Lebih banyak menjadi tamu, berada di hotel sejak tadi malam dan dengan kaki yang dibalut seperti yang saya miliki. Tidak, saya tidak menganggap bahwa hotel maupun staf tidak untuk hotel bintang 4.

Review: I stayed for 10 days with 3 other people, the room was massive and the staff was amazing, always left our room spotless and always helpful, the pool was very nice and overall a great spot to visit. I would go back again anytime.
Review_English: I stayed for 10 days with 3 other people, the room was massive and the staff was amazing, always left our room spotless and always helpful, the pool was very nice and overall a great spot to visit. I would go back again anytime.

Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal selama 10 hari dengan 3 orang lain, ruangan itu sangat besar dan stafnya luar biasa, selalu meninggalkan kamar kami bersih dan selalu membantu, kolam renang sangat bagus dan secara keseluruhan tempat yang bagus untuk dikunjungi. Saya akan kembali lagi kapan saja.

Review: I take one room, no windows, dark, and lot of humidity. Woman on the check in desk was unfriendly. If you want to bring one plate to your room, you have to sign, if you want ice you have to pay 10.000 rp. We have booked two days (two differents bookings), and it looks like the first day is standard room, and second superior room, i have to change the room the day after, the same woman on the check in desk never offer me to upgrade, neither if i pay the difference (i asked for).

Review_Bahasa: Saya mengambil satu kamar, tidak ada jendela, gelap, dan banyak kelembaban. Wanita di meja check in tidak ramah. Jika Anda ingin membawa satu piring ke kamar Anda, Anda harus menandatangani, jika Anda ingin es, Anda harus membayar 10.000 RP. Kami telah memesan dua hari (dua pemesanan yang berbeda), dan sepertinya hari pertama adalah kamar standar, dan kamar superior kedua, saya harus mengganti ruangan sehari setelahnya, wanita yang sama di meja check in tidak pernah menawarkan saya untuk meningkatkan, tidak juga jika saya membayar perbedaan (saya meminta).

Review: Buon hotel, pulito, camere abbastanza spaziose, personale gentile, disponibile ed educato.buona la colazione con vari piatti salati, dolci, frutta.piccola la piscina.unica.pecca la zona, un po' fuori mano e spoglia di locali..
Review_English: Good hotel, clean, quite spacious rooms, kind staff, helpful and polite. Break the breakfast with various savory dishes, sweets, fruit. Pypose the swimming pool. A one pipes the area, a little out of the way and bare of rooms ..
Review_Summary: Good hotel, clean, quite spacious rooms, kind staff, helpful and polite. Break the breakfast with various savory dishes, sweets, fruit. Pypose the swimming pool. A one pipes the area, a little out of the way and bare of rooms ..
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus, kamar yang bersih, cukup luas, staf yang baik, bermanfaat dan sopan. Hancurkan sarapan dengan berbagai hidangan gurih, permen, buah. Pypose kolam renang. Satu menyalakan area, sedikit keluar dari jalan dan telanjang kamar ..

Review: It was our first trip to Bali and we booked this hotel. We had a great time at this place. Breakfast was awesome. If you stay in this hotel, avail spa here. The staffs in spa are very professionals. Overall staffs are very decent and polite. Dinner was nice. Gym machinery wasn't fully working. I have enjoyed staying in this hotel. I would highly recommend Kuta Central Park Hotel to other visitors as well.

Review_Bahasa: Itu adalah perjalanan pertama kami ke Bali dan kami memesan hotel ini. Kami bersenang -senang di tempat ini. Sarapan itu luar biasa. Jika Anda tinggal di hotel ini, silakan spa di sini. Staf di Spa sangat profesional. Staf keseluruhan sangat baik dan sopan. Makan malam enak. Mesin olahraga tidak sepenuhnya berfungsi. Saya menikmati tinggal di hotel ini. Saya akan sangat merekomendasikan Kuta Central Park Hotel kepada pengunjung lain juga.

Review: Stayed here with my family for 2 nights. Really good friendly staff. Good rooms. 1 had the musty smell but since we werent staying longer was bariable. The room has no windows so when you wake from sleep hard to determine what time it is. The corridors echo so through the night hear quite a bit from other guests. Breakfast was nice offering the usual omelette, pancake, crepes, indo food, sweet buns and fruit as well as tea coffee and juice. Pool was nice size and pool bar was a bonus with really nice barman. Has a small childrens play ground as well. Ate dinner at lotus pond restaurant for 1 of the nights and was pretty good. All in all was a good stay for a short time :)

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di sini bersama keluarga saya selama 2 malam. Staf yang sangat ramah. Kamar yang bagus. Saya memiliki bau apak tetapi karena kami tidak tinggal lebih lama adalah dapat dibenci. Kamar tidak memiliki jendela sehingga saat Anda bangun dari tidur keras untuk menentukan jam berapa sekarang. Koridor bergema sehingga sepanjang malam mendengar sedikit dari tamu lain. Sarapan sangat enak menawarkan telur dadar, pancake, crepes, makanan indo, roti manis dan buah serta kopi dan jus teh. Kolam renang adalah ukuran yang bagus dan bar biliar adalah bonus dengan Barman yang sangat bagus. Memiliki tempat bermain anak kecil juga. Makan malam di Lotus Pond Restaurant selama 1 malam dan cukup bagus. Semua dalam semua adalah masa tinggal yang baik untuk waktu yang singkat :)

Review: Located on the main road in Kuta, this hotel looks very tired. I was not feeling well when I reach the hotel and have no opportunity to look around properly. However the room I booked is full so the hotel upgraded it to a deluxe with pool view. The room is quite spacious, big TV with varieties of channel, empty mini bar which is quite a disappointment, a sofa with low table. Toiletries are very standard, no hand towel or face towel. I got high fever and find nothing to use to compress myself. In room dining close at 10pm and was serving quite a good food, I think I consider myself lucky for that so I don’t have to leave room for meal. It is a good place to crash for a night or two but it’s not what I expected. The staff performance is very average and although the price is good, other hotel can offer better.

Review_Bahasa: Terletak di jalan utama di Kuta, hotel ini terlihat sangat lelah. Saya tidak enak badan ketika saya mencapai hotel dan tidak memiliki kesempatan untuk melihat -lihat dengan benar. Namun kamar yang saya pesan penuh sehingga hotel meningkatkannya ke mewah dengan pemandangan biliar. Ruangan ini cukup luas, TV besar dengan varietas saluran, mini bar kosong yang cukup mengecewakan, sofa dengan meja rendah. Perlengkapan mandi sangat standar, tidak ada handuk tangan atau handuk wajah. Saya mengalami demam tinggi dan tidak menemukan apa pun untuk digunakan untuk memampatkan diri. Di kamar makan dekat jam 10 malam dan menyajikan makanan yang cukup enak, saya pikir saya menganggap diri saya beruntung untuk itu sehingga saya tidak harus meninggalkan ruang untuk makan. Ini adalah tempat yang baik untuk jatuh selama satu atau dua malam, tetapi bukan yang saya harapkan. Kinerja staf sangat rata -rata dan meskipun harganya bagus, hotel lain dapat menawarkan lebih baik.

Review: A horrible hotel. I felt embarrassed to be there, very disappointed that our travel agent who decided to put us there for four nights. When we got to the hotel, I was shocked to find out that there was only one double despite the booking saying 3 guests. They wouldn't offer us a room with two beds. When we got to the room, we were a bit distressed to find out that the only window opened on a hallway with access to anyone. I didn't feel it safe to leave the window opened, so had to leave the air con on all night. It was simply the worse hotel ever. I feel sorry for the staff who work there. There was a leak and they finally moved us to a slightly better room, with two beds but no windows still. I would go to this hotel only if it was £10/night. It is seriously bad.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang mengerikan. Saya merasa malu berada di sana, sangat kecewa karena agen perjalanan kami yang memutuskan untuk menempatkan kami di sana selama empat malam. Ketika kami sampai di hotel, saya terkejut mengetahui bahwa hanya ada satu ganda meskipun pemesanan mengatakan 3 tamu. Mereka tidak akan menawarkan kami kamar dengan dua tempat tidur. Ketika kami sampai di kamar, kami agak tertekan untuk mengetahui bahwa satu -satunya jendela yang dibuka di lorong dengan akses ke siapa pun. Saya tidak merasa aman untuk membiarkan jendela terbuka, jadi harus meninggalkan AC con sepanjang malam. Itu hanyalah hotel yang lebih buruk. Saya merasa kasihan pada staf yang bekerja di sana. Ada kebocoran dan mereka akhirnya memindahkan kami ke kamar yang sedikit lebih baik, dengan dua tempat tidur tetapi tidak ada jendela. Saya akan pergi ke hotel ini hanya jika £ 10/malam. Itu benar -benar buruk.

Review: Booked this hotel for 3 days through a travel agent. Price is reasonable with descent ambiance. Very good collection of buffet breakfast. Didnt except to get Mendu vada in breakfast and was really tasty. pool area was really cool and well maintained.

Review: We stayed over two nights, Overall good and budget hotel, food and room service was good, Specially, verity in breakfast for non veg lovers. Pool was good but small. Value for money if you are budget traveller

Review: Ho soggiornato in questo hotel per tre notti nel mese di agosto, la posizione è abbastanza buona ma ci sono taxi ovunque. L’hotel è carino e pulito, le camere sono un po’ piccole e senza finestre. Colazione sia dolce che salata molto buona.
Review_English: I stayed in this hotel for three nights in August, the location is quite good but there are taxis everywhere. The hotel is nice and clean, the rooms are a little small and windowless. Breakfast both sweet and savory very good.
Review_Summary: I stayed in this hotel for three nights in August, the location is quite good but there are taxis everywhere. The hotel is nice and clean, the rooms are a little small and windowless. Breakfast both sweet and savory very good.
Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal di hotel ini selama tiga malam di bulan Agustus, lokasinya cukup bagus tetapi ada taksi di mana -mana. Hotel ini bagus dan bersih, kamarnya sedikit kecil dan tanpa jendela. Sarapan manis dan gurih sangat enak.
Review_Clean: Saya tinggal di hotel ini selama tiga malam di bulan Agustus, lokasinya cukup bagus tetapi ada taksi di mana -mana. Hotel ini bagus dan bersih, kamarnya sedikit kecil dan tanpa jendela. Sarapan manis dan gurih sangat enak.

Subjeck: Hotel discreto, ma niente di eccezionale
Review: La struttura è abbastanza pulita e il personale molto gentile e disponibile. La posizione non è molto lontana dalla zona più frequentata di Kuta (circa 1.5km) e da Kuta Beach (2km), ma la strada per raggiungere tali luoghi non è molto praticabile, soprattutto la sera: lo stesso personale dell'albergo infatti sconsiglia di muoversi a piedi. La piscina è troppo piccola per servire un hotel così grande e pertanto è sempre affollata. La Spa è ben tenuta e le ragazze che ci lavorano fanno ottimi massaggi. Il buffet della colazione è molto vario e il cibo di buona qualità. N.B. La mattina era impossibile dormire dopo le 8 causa schiamazzi nel corridoio.
Review_English: The structure is quite clean and the staff very kind and helpful. The location is not very far from the most popular area of ​​Kuta (about 1.5km) and by Kuta Beach (2km), but the road to reach these places is not very practicable, especially in the evening: the same staff of the hotel in fact advise against moving on foot. The swimming pool is too small to serve such a large hotel and therefore is always crowded. The spa is well maintained and the girls who work there make excellent massages. The breakfast buffet is very varied and the food of good quality. N.B. In the morning it was impossible to sleep after the 8 due to cackles in the corridor.
Review_Summary: The structure is quite clean and the staff very kind and helpful. The location is not very far from the most popular area of ​​Kuta (about 1.5km) and by Kuta Beach (2km), but the road to reach these places is not very practicable, especially in the evening: the same staff of the hotel in fact advise against moving on foot. The swimming pool is too small to serve such a large hotel and therefore is always crowded. The spa is well maintained and the girls who work there make excellent massages. The breakfast buffet is very varied and the food of good quality. N.B. In the morning it was impossible to sleep after the 8 due to cackles in the corridor.
Review_Bahasa: Strukturnya cukup bersih dan staf sangat baik dan bermanfaat. Lokasi tidak jauh dari daerah paling populer di Kuta (sekitar 1,5 km) dan oleh Kuta Beach (2 km), tetapi jalan menuju tempat -tempat ini tidak terlalu praktis, terutama di malam hari: staf hotel yang sama sebenarnya menyarankan agar tidak berjalan kaki. Kolam renang terlalu kecil untuk melayani hotel sebesar itu dan karenanya selalu ramai. Spa ini terawat dengan baik dan gadis -gadis yang bekerja di sana membuat pijatan yang sangat baik. Sarapan prasmanan sangat bervariasi dan makanan berkualitas baik. N.B. Di pagi hari tidak mungkin untuk tidur setelah 8 karena tali di koridor.

Sarapan prasmanan sangat bervariasi dan makanan berkualitas baik. N.B. Di pagi hari tidak mungkin untuk tidur setelah 8 karena tali di koridor.

Review: The overall ratings for the hotel is an average, Money/ Location/ Quality and Service-wise. Stayed in the hotel with my family for 6 nights. - Very little verity in breakfast for a vegetarian - Almost the same breakfast every single day - Spa closes at 10 pm, I believe it's too early. - As a hospitality and tourism academicians, I really encourage that housekeeping staff should go for proper training for sharpening their skills as for a number of days room amenities and toiletries were not refilled. - No one pickups the housekeeping extension - Called twice to reception for one laundry bag and took exactly 40 min for them to bring just one bag. - Hotel taxi cheated us for the fares on the very first day.

Review_Bahasa: Peringkat keseluruhan untuk hotel adalah rata-rata, uang/ lokasi/ kualitas dan layanan. Tinggal di hotel bersama keluarga saya selama 6 malam. - Verity yang sangat sedikit dalam sarapan untuk seorang vegetarian - sarapan yang hampir sama setiap hari - Spa ditutup pukul 10 malam, saya percaya ini terlalu dini. - Sebagai akademisi perhotelan dan pariwisata, saya benar -benar mendorong bahwa staf rumah tangga harus melakukan pelatihan yang tepat untuk mempertajam keterampilan mereka karena beberapa hari fasilitas kamar dan perlengkapan mandi tidak diisi ulang. - Tidak ada yang mengambil ekstensi rumah tangga - dipanggil dua kali untuk resepsi untuk satu tas binatu dan membutuhkan waktu tepat 40 menit untuk mereka membawa hanya satu tas. - Taksi hotel menipu kami dengan tarif pada hari pertama.

Review: saya menginap tanggal 16-19. saya sedang holidays bersama keluarga, ketika sore kita mau check in hotel katanya penuh oleh group jad kita ngalah tapi d upgrade kamar eh sudah sampai kamar acnya bocor. lalu d pindah lagi ke kamar lantai 3, ac nya ga dinging ternyata ada yang besar nya justru ga dingin kita udah kecapain jadi maes komplain lagi, pas mau mandi sabun cair tidk d isi mesti minta dulu, u/ breakfast so far ok, hanya nasgornya sedikit oily jadi anak kecil susah makanya. saya juga harusnya dapat voucher kafe free, di janjikan nanti d kasih sesudah d kamar tidak d kasih juga.

I was having a holiday with my family, when in the afternoon we wanted to check in the hotel, he said it was full by the JAD group, we were defeated but the room upgraded eh until the air conditioner leaked. Then D moved again to the 3rd floor room, the air conditioner did not dinging it turned out that there was a big one, instead it wasn't cold, we were already disappeared, so maes complained again, when I wanted to take a liquid soap, I didn't fill it, I had to ask first, for the breakfast so far ok, only the nasgor was a little oily so it was difficult. I should also get a free cafe voucher, promised later and give it after the room is not giving too.

Saya sedang berlibur bersama keluarga saya, ketika pada sore hari kami ingin memeriksa di hotel, dia mengatakan itu penuh oleh kelompok JAD, kami dikalahkan tetapi ruangan itu ditingkatkan eh sampai AC bocor. Kemudian D pindah lagi ke ruang lantai ke -3, AC tidak mengisapnya ternyata ada yang besar, sebaliknya itu tidak dingin, kami sudah menghilang, jadi Maes mengeluh lagi, ketika saya ingin mengambil sabun cair, saya tidak mengisinya, saya harus bertanya terlebih dahulu, untuk sarapan sejauh ini, hanya Nasgor yang sedikit oily sehingga sedikit sulit. Saya juga harus mendapatkan voucher kafe gratis, dijanjikan kemudian dan memberikannya setelah ruangan tidak memberi juga.

Review: Otel temiz olup güzel konumdaydı. Kuta için bir harika. Tavsiye edilebilir bir yer. Yolunuz kuta ya düşerse. Hiç düşünmeden kalmanızı tavsiye edebilirim.söyleyeceklerim bu kadar umarım kutaya yolunuz düşer
Review_English: The hotel was clean and was in a nice position. It's great for Kuta. A recommended place. If your path falls to Kuta. I can recommend you to stay without thinking.
Review_Summary: The hotel was clean and was in a nice position. It's great for Kuta. A recommended place. If your path falls to Kuta. I can recommend you to stay without thinking.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel itu bersih dan berada dalam posisi yang bagus. Ini bagus untuk Kuta. Tempat yang disarankan. Jika jalan Anda jatuh ke Kuta. Saya dapat merekomendasikan Anda untuk tinggal tanpa berpikir.

Review: Overall we had a positive experience here. There were some really good features and then some not so great parts. Positives: - Free transfer to and from airport due to the number of days we booked at the hotel - Free shuttle to some of the beaches and malls (although we didn't actually end up using it as we were happy to walk) - Location - 20-25 minute walk to Legian and Kuta beaches and beachwalk mall; lots of market stalls for clothes and souvenirs around here, as well as lots of eateries with both western and local options with good prices compared to what we have experienced on a previous trip to Bali. - A decent enough breakfast with many options at the buffet. Negatives - we booked a superior room and the room we ended up in was great, however, the first room we were given was on the ground floor where the 'balcony' was just opening the door onto the walkway past the pool where they had put two chairs and a table, so the re was no privacy and everyone could see into our room from the pool . It was also really noisy! We asked to move after 2 nights because they were doing maintenance outside our room with scaffolding and drilling, and the hotel complied immediately. The room we ended up in was worth what we paid - it was much quieter as it wasn't directly next to the pool and we were on the second floor with an actual balcony. - We ate dinner from their restaurant twice - the pasta was not great (way overpiced and poor quality) but the pizza was surprisingly good.
Review_English: Overall we had a positive experience here. There were some really good features and then some not so great parts. Positives: - Free transfer to and from airport due to the number of days we booked at the hotel - Free shuttle to some of the beaches and malls (although we didn't actually end up using it as we were happy to walk) - Location - 20-25 minute walk to Legian and Kuta beaches and beachwalk mall; lots of market stalls for clothes and souvenirs around here, as well as lots of eateries with both western and local options with good prices compared to what we have experienced on a previous trip to Bali. - A decent enough breakfast with many options at the buffet. It was also really noisy! We asked to move after 2 nights because they were doing maintenance outside our room with scaffolding and drilling, and the hotel complied immediately. The room we ended up in was worth what we paid - it was much quieter as it wasn't directly next to the pool and we were on the second floor with an actual balcony. - We ate dinner from their restaurant twice - the pasta was not great (way overpiced and poor quality) but the pizza was surprisingly good.
Review_Summary: Free transfer to and from airport due to the number of days we booked at the hotel. Free shuttle to some of the beaches and malls. 20-25 minute walk to Legian and Kuta beaches and beachwalk mall. Lots of market stalls for clothes and souvenirs.
Review_Bahasa: Secara keseluruhan kami memiliki pengalaman positif di sini. Ada beberapa fitur yang sangat bagus dan kemudian beberapa bagian yang tidak begitu hebat. Positif: - Transfer bebas ke dan dari bandara karena jumlah hari kami memesan di hotel - antar -jemput gratis ke beberapa pantai dan mal (meskipun kami tidak benar -benar akhirnya menggunakannya karena kami senang berjalan) - Lokasi - 20-25 menit berjalan kaki ke pantai Legian dan Kuta dan mal Beachwalk; Banyak kios pasar untuk pakaian dan suvenir di sekitar sini, serta banyak restoran dengan pilihan Barat dan lokal dengan harga bagus dibandingkan dengan apa yang telah kami alami pada perjalanan sebelumnya ke Bali. - Sarapan yang cukup layak dengan banyak pilihan di prasmanan. Negatif - Kami memesan kamar superior dan kamar yang akhirnya kami lakukan sangat bagus, namun, kamar pertama yang kami berikan adalah di lantai dasar di mana 'balkon' baru saja membuka pintu ke jalan setapak melewati kolam di mana mereka meletakkan dua kursi dan meja, sehingga tidak ada privasi dan semua orang bisa melihat ke kamar kami dari kolam renang. Itu juga sangat berisik! Kami meminta untuk pindah setelah 2 malam karena mereka melakukan perawatan di luar kamar kami dengan perancah dan pengeboran, dan hotel segera dipatuhi. Kamar yang akhirnya kami bayar sepadan dengan apa yang kami bayar - itu jauh lebih tenang karena tidak langsung di sebelah kolam renang dan kami berada di lantai dua dengan balkon yang sebenarnya. - Kami makan malam dari restoran mereka dua kali - pasta tidak bagus (jauh lebih banyak dan kualitas buruk) tetapi pizza itu ternyata bagus.

Review: Sto alloggiando da un paio di giorni in questo hotel e posso ritenermi molto soddisfatta. Camere abbastanza ampie, bagno dotato di ogni comfort, giusto l assenza di finestra giusto nella mia Camera. Le altre ne sono dotate. Personale gentile e disponibile. Posizione centrale alle attività ludiche serali e vicino al mare per cui tra l'altro offrono una navetta. La colazione è discreta... certo un po' troppa cucina tipica. La piscina è un canale interno che attraversa le camere, molto suggestivo ma forse troppo piccola per pensare di passarvi una giornata in tranquillità.
Review_English: I have been staying for a couple of days in this hotel and I can be very satisfied. Large rooms, bathroom with every comfort, just the absence of the right window in my room. The others are equipped with it. Kind and helpful staff. Central location to the evening play activities and close to the sea for which, among other things, they offer a shuttle. The breakfast is discreet ... certainly a little too much typical cuisine. The swimming pool is an internal channel that crosses the rooms, very suggestive but perhaps too small to think of spending a day in peace.
Review_Summary: I have been staying for a couple of days in this hotel and I can be very satisfied. Large rooms, bathroom with every comfort, just the absence of the right window in my room. The others are equipped with it. Kind and helpful staff. Central location to the evening play activities and close to the sea for which, among other things, they offer a shuttle. The breakfast is discreet ... certainly a little too much typical cuisine. The swimming pool is an internal channel that crosses the rooms, very suggestive but perhaps too small to think of spending a day in peace.
Review_Bahasa: Saya telah tinggal selama beberapa hari di hotel ini dan saya bisa sangat puas. Kamar besar, kamar mandi dengan setiap kenyamanan, hanya tidak adanya jendela kanan di kamar saya. Yang lain dilengkapi dengan itu. Staf yang baik dan membantu. Lokasi sentral untuk kegiatan bermain malam dan dekat dengan laut yang, antara lain, mereka menawarkan pesawat ulang -alik. Sarapan itu bijaksana ... tentu saja sedikit terlalu banyak masakan yang khas. Kolam renang adalah saluran internal yang melintasi kamar, sangat sugestif tetapi mungkin terlalu kecil untuk dipikirkan menghabiskan satu hari dengan tenang.
