Review: Hotel pulito ed ordinato a pochi minuti dal centro di kuta. Camera ampia con finestra (ci hanno fatto un upgrade, perché la standard non prevede la finestra). Colazione buona, ma non prevede un ottimo assortimento dolce (per noi italiani). Personale cordiale e super disponibile.
Review_English: Pulito and ordered hotel a few minutes from the center of Kuta. Large room with window (they made us a upgrade, because the standard does not include the window). Good breakfast, but does not include an excellent sweet assortment (for us Italians). Friendly and super helpful staff.
Review_Summary: Pulito and ordered hotel a few minutes from the center of Kuta. Large room with window (they made us a upgrade, because the standard does not include the window). Good breakfast, but does not include an excellent sweet assortment (for us Italians). Friendly and super helpful staff.
Review_Bahasa: Pulito dan memesan hotel beberapa menit dari pusat Kuta. Kamar besar dengan jendela (mereka membuat kami upgrade, karena standar tidak termasuk jendela). Sarapan yang enak, tetapi tidak termasuk bermacam -macam manis yang sangat baik (bagi kami Italia). Staf yang ramah dan sangat membantu.
Review_Clean: Pulito dan memesan hotel beberapa menit dari pusat Kuta. Kamar besar dengan jendela mereka membuat kami upgrade, karena standar tidak termasuk jendela. Sarapan yang enak, tetapi tidak termasuk bermacam -macam manis yang sangat baik bagi kami Italia. Staf yang ramah dan sangat membantu.

Review: Tinggal di sini selama satu malam dan menemukan itu menjadi nilai yang baik. Mereka menyediakan transfer dengan biaya dari bandara dan transfer gratis lainnya ke lokasi-lokasi utama di daerah tersebut. Kamarnya cukup berisik. Area kolam bagus meskipun agak tertutup. Staf sangat baik dan bermanfaat. Mungkin bukan tempat yang lebih lama untuk keluarga, tetapi nilai uang jika Anda memiliki anggaran terbatas.
Review_English: Living here for one night and find it into a good value. They provide transfer at fees from the airport and other free transfer to the main locations in the area. The room is quite noisy. The pool area is good even though it is somewhat closed. Very good and useful staff. Maybe it's not a longer place for the family, but the value of money if you have a limited budget.
Review_Summary: Living here for one night and find it into a good value. They provide transfer at fees from the airport and other free transfer to the main locations in the area. The room is quite noisy. The pool area is good even though it is somewhat closed. Very good and useful staff. Maybe it's not a longer place for the family, but the value of money if you have a limited budget.

Review: As a solo traveller who has stayed at a private apartment within the grounds of Kuta Central Park Hotel, I can only tell of my experiences at the hotel restaurant and my observations of the guests who stay at the hotel. I have stayed at this private apartment for 8 months of the last year. Lotus Pond Cafe is the restaurant at the hotel and I have been there for breakfast every day during my stay in Bali and I have often gone to the restaurant for lunch and dinner. I cannot speak highly enough of the staff and the food. I have travelled the world over many years and this restaurant is definitely a highlight. The staff are very friendly, efficient and attentive. The Executive Chef, Sumatra, has been in the hotal industry for many years and is very caring about the quality, presentation and taste of the food. I have a few food allergies and intolerances which are catered for without any bother or complaints and Sumatra ensures that the staff adhere to my needs. He is also very personal with the guests, taking the time to talk about the food. The bread is homemade and the spices are fresh, grown within the restaurant complex. I have inspected the rooms and they all look very good value and are a very good size. Again all the reception and room staff are friendly, efficient and welcoming. The whole hotel complex is very quiet, so a good night's sleep in assured. It also has excellent amenities and is very safe and secure. There are many restaurants nearby and a Giant Supermarket just a minutes' walk away or a Circle K minimart at the side of the hotel. I fully recommend the Lotus Pond Cafe to all, whether guest of the hotel, travellers or just locals. I also recommend to stay at the hotel, it is a gem.

The Executive Chef, Sumatra, has been in the hotal industry for many years and is very caring about the quality, presentation and taste of the food.
Review_Bahasa: Sebagai seorang pelancong solo yang telah tinggal di sebuah apartemen pribadi di dalam halaman Kuta Central Park Hotel, saya hanya dapat menceritakan pengalaman saya di restoran hotel dan pengamatan saya terhadap para tamu yang menginap di hotel. Saya telah tinggal di apartemen pribadi ini selama 8 bulan tahun lalu. Lotus Pond Cafe adalah restoran di hotel dan saya telah berada di sana untuk sarapan setiap hari selama saya tinggal di Bali dan saya sering pergi ke restoran untuk makan siang dan makan malam. Saya tidak bisa berbicara cukup banyak tentang staf dan makanan. Saya telah berkeliling dunia selama bertahun -tahun dan restoran ini jelas merupakan sorotan. Stafnya sangat ramah, efisien, dan penuh perhatian. Koki eksekutif, Sumatra, telah berkecimpung di industri panas selama bertahun -tahun dan sangat peduli dengan kualitas, presentasi, dan rasa makanan. Saya memiliki beberapa alergi makanan dan intoleransi yang dilayani tanpa gangguan atau keluhan dan Sumatra memastikan bahwa staf mematuhi kebutuhan saya. Dia juga sangat pribadi dengan para tamu, meluangkan waktu untuk berbicara tentang makanan. Roti buatan sendiri dan rempah -rempahnya segar, tumbuh di dalam kompleks restoran. Saya telah memeriksa kamar dan semuanya terlihat sangat bagus dan ukurannya sangat baik. Sekali lagi semua staf resepsi dan kamar ramah, efisien dan ramah. Seluruh kompleks hotel sangat sepi, jadi tidur nyenyak di meyakinkan. Ini juga memiliki fasilitas yang sangat baik dan sangat aman dan aman. Ada banyak restoran di dekatnya dan supermarket raksasa hanya berjarak satu menit berjalan kaki atau minimart lingkaran di sisi hotel. Saya sepenuhnya merekomendasikan Lotus Pond Cafe kepada semua, baik tamu hotel, pelancong atau hanya penduduk setempat. Saya juga merekomendasikan untuk menginap di hotel, itu adalah permata.

Saya telah tinggal di apartemen pribadi ini selama 8 bulan tahun lalu. Lotus Pond Cafe adalah restoran di hotel dan saya telah berada di sana untuk sarapan setiap hari selama saya tinggal di Bali dan saya sering pergi ke restoran untuk makan siang dan makan malam. Saya tidak bisa berbicara cukup banyak tentang staf dan makanan. Saya telah berkeliling dunia selama bertahun -tahun dan restoran ini jelas merupakan sorotan. Stafnya sangat ramah, efisien, dan penuh perhatian. Koki eksekutif, Sumatra, telah berkecimpung di industri panas selama bertahun -tahun dan sangat peduli dengan kualitas, presentasi, dan rasa makanan. Saya memiliki beberapa alergi makanan dan intoleransi yang dilayani tanpa gangguan atau keluhan dan Sumatra memastikan bahwa staf mematuhi kebutuhan saya. Dia juga sangat pribadi dengan para tamu, meluangkan waktu untuk berbicara tentang makanan. Roti buatan sendiri dan rempah -rempahnya segar, tumbuh di dalam kompleks restoran. Saya telah memeriksa kamar dan semuanya terlihat sangat bagus dan ukurannya sangat baik. Sekali lagi semua staf resepsi dan kamar ramah, efisien dan ramah. Seluruh kompleks hotel sangat sepi, jadi tidur nyenyak di meyakinkan. Ini juga memiliki fasilitas yang sangat baik dan sangat aman dan aman. Ada banyak restoran di dekatnya dan supermarket raksasa hanya berjarak satu menit berjalan kaki atau minimart lingkaran di sisi hotel. Saya sepenuhnya merekomendasikan Lotus Pond Cafe kepada semua, baik tamu hotel, pelancong atau hanya penduduk setempat. Saya juga merekomendasikan untuk menginap di hotel, itu adalah permata.

Review: Tout avait bien commencé à notre arrivée avec un accueil chaleureux, un verre de bienvenue et la vue d’une chambre spacieuse ainsi que d’une belle piscine. Mais nous avons déchanté quand nous avons senti l’odeur d’humidité et d’égouts. De plus vers 22h ainsi qu’aux environs de 2h du matin, le personnel de l’hôtel s’est mis à claquer les portes, à courir, à crier et mettre la musique très forte à notre étage. Quand nous nous sommes plains le lendemain matin, une des réceptionnistes a fait comme si elle ne comprenait pas ce qu’on lui disait en anglais. Eh bref déçus car c’était notre première nuit après 15h d’avion.
Review_English: It all started when we arrived with a warm welcome, a welcome glass and the view of a spacious room as well as a beautiful swimming pool. But we disillusioned when we smell the smell of moisture and sewers. In addition around 10 p.m. as well as around 2 a.m., the hotel staff started to slam the doors, run, scream and put the music very strong on our floor. When we complained the next morning, one of the receptionists pretended to be what was told in English. Hey disappointed because it was our first night after 3 p.m. by plane.
Review_Summary: It all started when we arrived with a warm welcome, a welcome glass and the view of a spacious room as well as a beautiful swimming pool. But we disillusioned when we smell the smell of moisture and sewers. In addition around 10 p.m. as well as around 2 a.m., the hotel staff started to slam the doors, run, scream and put the music very strong on our floor. When we complained the next morning, one of the receptionists pretended to be what was told in English. Hey disappointed because it was our first night after 3 p.m. by plane.
Review_Bahasa: Semuanya dimulai ketika kami tiba dengan sambutan hangat, gelas selamat datang dan pemandangan ruangan yang luas serta kolam renang yang indah. Tapi kami kecewa ketika kami mencium aroma kelembaban dan selokan. Selain itu sekitar pukul 10 malam Serta sekitar jam 2 pagi, staf hotel mulai membanting pintu, berlari, menjerit dan meletakkan musiknya sangat kuat di lantai kami. Ketika kami mengeluh keesokan paginya, salah satu resepsionis berpura -pura menjadi apa yang diceritakan dalam bahasa Inggris. Hei kecewa karena itu adalah malam pertama kami setelah pukul 3 sore. dengan pesawat.

Review: It was a nice Hotel within City with Shopping Mart across the road. Local market and Restaurants at walking distance. Decent Property with 2 not so big pools. Play area for Kids. Hotel Staff was courteous. Breakfast buffet was good if you are a non-vegetarian. Cab facility and Bike on rent available from Hotel itself.

Review_Bahasa: Itu adalah hotel yang bagus di dalam kota dengan perbelanjaan mart di seberang jalan. Pasar dan restoran lokal dalam jarak berjalan kaki. Properti yang layak dengan 2 kolam renang yang tidak begitu besar. Area bermain untuk anak -anak. Staf hotel sopan. Sarapan prasmanan bagus jika Anda seorang non-vegetarian. Fasilitas taksi dan sepeda yang disewakan tersedia dari hotel itu sendiri.

Review: Arrived at hotel almost midnight n the room is not ready yet, after complaining we’ve been upgraded to family room (original booking was junior triple suite). But the family room was so awful, no window, not enough lights the bed n towels are not clean. My kids were tired so we cannot wait for other room. Thankfully the hotel downgraded us for the second nite (stay for 2 nights), and the triple room was so comfortable, clean, and bright. The service was good enough, the hotel even provides shuttle to some places.

Review_Bahasa: Tiba di hotel hampir tengah malam dan kamar belum siap, setelah mengeluh kami telah ditingkatkan ke ruang keluarga (pemesanan asli adalah junior triple suite). Tapi ruang keluarga begitu mengerikan, tidak ada jendela, tidak cukup lampu tempat tidur dan handuk tidak bersih. Anak -anak saya lelah sehingga kami tidak sabar menunggu kamar lain. Untungnya hotel menurunkan kami untuk malam kedua (menginap selama 2 malam), dan kamar triple sangat nyaman, bersih, dan cerah. Layanan ini cukup baik, hotel ini bahkan menyediakan antar -jemput ke beberapa tempat.

Review: Awesome rooms and amenities. Courteous and friendly staff. Great food and good location. If you want your hotel near food courts and market place, then this is the best option. Overall a very good stay and well maintained place. Worth for every penny you pay.

Secara keseluruhan, tempat tinggal yang sangat baik dan tempat yang terawat dengan baik. Layak untuk setiap sen yang Anda bayar.

Review: Value for money. Friendly, loving, caring, helpful staff. Delicious food with a lot of variety and flavors that linger in ur heart even after u u leave the country .very beautiful, neat,peaceful, green and well connected property. Loved staying here.

Review_Bahasa: Nilai uang. Staf yang ramah, penuh kasih, peduli, dan membantu. Makanan lezat dengan banyak variasi dan rasa yang berlama -lama di hati Anda bahkan setelah Anda meninggalkan negara itu. Properti yang sangat indah, rapi, damai, hijau dan terhubung dengan baik. Senang tinggal di sini.

Review: I feel that this hotel gives good value for the price, spacious room, quiet, clean, have good amenities. Only thing is we didn't realise that 'room with no view' means room without a window! But we were able to upgrade to a better room with small fee. Staff are friendly and we felt safe staying there. This is a good hotel if you don't intend to walk around much outside of the hotel as there aren't many shops around except for some corner shops and restaurants, it is suitable for families and is child friendly. We hired taxi + a driver everyday so it wasn't an issue.

Review_Bahasa: Saya merasa bahwa hotel ini memberikan nilai bagus untuk harga, kamar yang luas, tenang, bersih, memiliki fasilitas yang baik. Satu -satunya hal adalah kami tidak menyadari bahwa 'kamar tanpa pemandangan' berarti ruang tanpa jendela! Tapi kami dapat meningkatkan ke kamar yang lebih baik dengan biaya kecil. Staf ramah dan kami merasa aman tinggal di sana. Ini adalah hotel yang bagus jika Anda tidak bermaksud berjalan -jalan di luar hotel karena tidak ada banyak toko di sekitar kecuali untuk beberapa toko sudut dan restoran, cocok untuk keluarga dan ramah anak. Kami menyewa taksi + pengemudi setiap hari jadi itu bukan masalah.

Review: Me and a friend stayed at the Kuta Central Park Motel in Bali. This was a lovely Motel, quiet central to places. It was very clean, well presented, great price, butt the best thing by far that made my trip do good was the staff here, I have never met such friendly people, they could not do enough for us. A great place to keep in mind.

Itu sangat bersih, disajikan dengan baik, harga yang bagus, hal yang terbaik sejauh ini yang membuat perjalanan saya baik -baik saja adalah staf di sini, saya belum pernah bertemu orang -orang yang ramah, mereka tidak bisa melakukan cukup untuk kami. Tempat yang bagus untuk diingat.

Review: Very clean and friendly staff. Stayed for 9 days in a triple pool access room - very spacious! Breakfast was very varied and I loved the crepes! Courtesy bus into Kuta was easy to catch, as was a BlueBird. Close to mini marts, an outdoor food hall, Bali Bakery and Alta Moda.

Review_Bahasa: Staf yang sangat bersih dan ramah. Tinggal selama 9 hari di ruang akses triple pool - sangat luas! Sarapan sangat bervariasi dan saya menyukai crepes! Bus -bus milik Kuta mudah ditangkap, seperti burung bluebird. Dekat dengan Mini Marts, ruang makanan luar ruangan, Bali Bakery dan Alta Moda.

Review: We stayed here for 7 nights. Right from the time of our arrival, the staff at the Reception, Concierge and House keeping were all very courteous and helpful. We were given an upgrade to a large room with sofa and chairs. However, the aircon was not going well and we had a miserable night with a lot of sweating. When we contacted the Reception, they advised that they will help us move to another room but only the next day. We were not happy with that. Thankfully, they moved us a room on the ground floor which was not as big as the upgraded room but the aircon was good. But we had problems with the TV. The mechanic came and did his best but it was blurry and not very kind to the eyes. They again offered to move to another room and showed us 3 other rooms but the TV was hopeless everywhere as they have not upgraded to LED TV. So we stayed put in the same room for next 6 days which was not great. The breakfast was good with a lot of varieties of food, drinks and fruits. The place gets crowded by 7:30am. The pool and the garden area are well maintained and beautiful. Their free shuttle trips to Discovery Mall, Kuta Beach and Legian Beach were all well timed and punctual. However, the prices for sight seeing tours were a bit high priced and we managed to book our own tours with Blue Bird Taxis and other private taxis. The place is quite far away from Kuta Central where all the activities take place.

Review_Summary: The pool and the garden area are well maintained and beautiful. Their free shuttle trips to Discovery Mall, Kuta Beach and Legian Beach were all well timed and punctual. However, the prices for sight seeing tours were a bit high priced and we managed to book our own tours with Blue Bird Taxis and other private taxis.
Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di sini selama 7 malam. Sejak saat kedatangan kami, staf di resepsi, petugas dan pemeliharaan rumah semuanya sangat sopan dan membantu. Kami diberi upgrade ke kamar besar dengan sofa dan kursi. Namun, AC tidak berjalan dengan baik dan kami mengalami malam yang menyedihkan dengan banyak berkeringat. Ketika kami menghubungi resepsi, mereka menyarankan bahwa mereka akan membantu kami pindah ke ruangan lain tetapi hanya hari berikutnya. Kami tidak senang dengan itu. Untungnya, mereka memindahkan kami sebuah kamar di lantai dasar yang tidak sebesar kamar yang ditingkatkan tetapi AC bagus. Tapi kami memiliki masalah dengan TV. Mekanik itu datang dan melakukan yang terbaik tetapi itu buram dan tidak terlalu baik pada mata. Mereka kembali menawarkan untuk pindah ke kamar lain dan menunjukkan kepada kami 3 kamar lain tetapi TV tidak ada harapan di mana -mana karena mereka belum ditingkatkan ke TV LED. Jadi kami tinggal di kamar yang sama selama 6 hari ke depan yang tidak bagus. Sarapan baik dengan banyak varietas makanan, minuman, dan buah -buahan. Tempat itu ramai pada jam 7:30 pagi. Kolam renang dan area taman terawat dengan baik dan indah. Perjalanan antar -jemput gratis mereka ke Discovery Mall, Kuta Beach dan Legian Beach sudah tepat waktu dan tepat waktu. Namun, harga untuk penglihatan melihat tur agak mahal dan kami berhasil memesan tur kami sendiri dengan taksi burung biru dan taksi pribadi lainnya. Tempat ini cukup jauh dari Kuta Central di mana semua kegiatan terjadi.

Subjeck: Great value for money, comfortable, friendly resort
Review: Enjoyed our recent 8 night stay in a triple pool access room. Very spacious and comfortable beds, good variety at breakfast served by attentive, friendly staff, they even sang Happy Birthday and presented a cute cake complete with candles to my husband. Never actually got a chance to use the courtesy bus but easy to grab a cab or driver out the front, only cost $1-3 to the beach/shops. Music was a bit loud near the pool till 10pm so if you want an early night was a bit hard to nod off. Apart from that an enjoyable stay at a very reasonable rate thanks to Jetstar holiday packaging deals!

Review_Bahasa: Menikmati 8 malam kami menginap di ruang akses triple pool. Tempat tidur yang sangat luas dan nyaman, variasi yang baik saat sarapan yang dilayani oleh staf yang penuh perhatian dan ramah, mereka bahkan menyanyikan selamat ulang tahun dan memberikan kue lucu lengkap dengan lilin kepada suami saya. Tidak pernah benar-benar mendapat kesempatan untuk menggunakan bus Courtesy tetapi mudah untuk mengambil taksi atau pengemudi di depan, hanya biaya $ 1-3 untuk pantai/toko. Musik agak keras di dekat kolam renang sampai jam 10 malam jadi jika Anda ingin malam lebih awal agak sulit untuk diusir. Selain itu, masa menginap yang menyenangkan dengan harga yang sangat masuk akal berkat penawaran kemasan liburan Jetstar!

Review: Good location - near airport and Kuta beach. Free shuttle (to beach) and free activities (like visiting temples). Nice and clean. Excellent breakfast. Very nice hotel but maybe too expensive - unless you get a good offer.
Review_English: Good location - near airport and Kuta beach. Free shuttle (to beach) and free activities (like visiting temples). Nice and clean. Excellent breakfast. Very nice hotel but maybe too expensive - unless you get a good offer.
Review_Summary: Good location - near airport and Kuta beach. Free shuttle (to beach) and free activities (like visiting temples). Nice and clean. Excellent breakfast. Very nice hotel but maybe too expensive - unless you get a good offer.
Review_Bahasa: Lokasi bagus - dekat Bandara dan Pantai Kuta. Antar -jemput gratis (ke pantai) dan kegiatan gratis (seperti mengunjungi kuil). Bagus dan bersih. Sarapan yang sangat baik. Hotel yang sangat bagus tapi mungkin terlalu mahal - kecuali Anda mendapatkan penawaran yang bagus.
Review_Clean: Lokasi bagus - dekat Bandara dan Pantai Kuta. Antar -jemput gratis ke pantai dan kegiatan gratis seperti mengunjungi kuil. Bagus dan bersih. Sarapan yang sangat baik. Hotel yang sangat bagus tapi mungkin terlalu mahal - kecuali Anda mendapatkan penawaran yang bagus.

Subjeck: Good Hotel With Poor Customer Service
Review: Sufficient for a budget conscious traveler. The location and the facilities were sufficient for what we paid for and what we were looking for. However, the customer service really sucks. I would have rated it 5 star if we were not disappointed with the following items related to customer service: 1. We booked our accommodation few months in advance and we exchanged 12 emails (back and forth) to organise airport transport and booked tour packages. We were given the clear instructions on where to wait in the airport. Once we came out of the custom area, we started looking for our driver. Looked everywhere and waited for about an hour thinking that the driver might have caught in the traffic. But there was no luck at all. We rang the hotel just to find out that the staff member did not updated the system and the driver was not sent to the airport. It gave us a bid disappointment and ruined our day. 2. We caught the taxi and when we got to the hotel, we wanted to talk to the manager on duty. The receptionist who went inside the office area and came back in about 5 minutes and told us that the manager was not on-site. We had a feeling that the manager was trying to avoid us after realizing the blunder. 3. We stayed there for 10 days and tried to talk to the manager and left the request in the reception few time without any luck. There was a desk just next to the reception labelled "Manager on Duty". We tried few times but never saw a manager on the desk. It was pathetic not to see a manager on "Manager on Duty" desk in our 10 days stay even though we walk passed that desk 100s of time while getting in and out of the hotel. 4. In some days the main breakfast area was very crowded and we had to seat in smoking area with 3 children. People smoke madly in Bali and they are not aware of people around them. We requested the staff member to reserve the table in non-smoking area for rest of our stay. The staff member said it was done. The next morning we were disappointed again. We had to tell them four days in a row then they started reserving the table for us. What was really crazy was we told them that it didn't happen the other day and they would say that it would be definitely done next morning. But the story would be same again. 5. One day we saw two little scorpion in the bedroom next to the fridge. I managed to kill one of them and the other one disappeared under the bed. They were kind enough to relocate us to other rooms when I reported this to the reception

Review_Bahasa: Cukup untuk pelancong yang sadar anggaran. Lokasi dan fasilitasnya cukup untuk apa yang kami bayar dan apa yang kami cari. Namun, layanan pelanggan sangat menyebalkan. Saya akan memberi peringkat 5 bintang jika kami tidak kecewa dengan barang -barang berikut yang terkait dengan layanan pelanggan: 1. Kami memesan akomodasi kami beberapa bulan sebelumnya dan kami menukar 12 email (bolak -balik) untuk mengatur transportasi bandara dan memesan paket tur. Kami diberi instruksi yang jelas tentang di mana harus menunggu di bandara. Setelah kami keluar dari area khusus, kami mulai mencari sopir kami. Terlihat ke mana -mana dan menunggu sekitar satu jam berpikir bahwa pengemudi mungkin terjebak dalam lalu lintas. Tapi tidak ada keberuntungan sama sekali. Kami menelepon hotel hanya untuk mengetahui bahwa anggota staf tidak memperbarui sistem dan pengemudi tidak dikirim ke bandara. Itu memberi kami tawaran kekecewaan dan menghancurkan hari kami. 2. Kami naik taksi dan ketika kami sampai di hotel, kami ingin berbicara dengan manajer yang bertugas. Resepsionis yang masuk ke dalam area kantor dan kembali dalam waktu sekitar 5 menit dan memberi tahu kami bahwa manajer tidak ada di tempat. Kami memiliki perasaan bahwa manajer berusaha menghindari kami setelah menyadari kesalahan. 3. Kami tinggal di sana selama 10 hari dan mencoba berbicara dengan manajer dan meninggalkan permintaan di resepsi beberapa waktu tanpa keberuntungan. Ada meja tepat di sebelah resepsi berlabel "Manajer Bertugas". Kami mencoba beberapa kali tetapi tidak pernah melihat seorang manajer di meja. Sangat menyedihkan untuk tidak melihat manajer di meja "Manager on Duty" dalam 10 hari kami tinggal meskipun kami berjalan melewati meja 100 -an saat masuk dan keluar dari hotel. 4. Dalam beberapa hari area sarapan utama sangat ramai dan kami harus duduk di area merokok dengan 3 anak. Orang -orang merokok di Bali dan mereka tidak menyadari orang -orang di sekitar mereka. Kami meminta anggota staf untuk memesan meja di area yang tidak merokok untuk sisa kami tinggal. Anggota staf mengatakan itu dilakukan. Pagi berikutnya kami kecewa lagi. Kami harus memberi tahu mereka empat hari berturut -turut kemudian mereka mulai memesan meja untuk kami. Apa yang benar -benar gila adalah kami memberi tahu mereka bahwa itu tidak terjadi tempo hari dan mereka akan mengatakan bahwa itu pasti akan dilakukan keesokan paginya. Tapi ceritanya akan sama lagi. 5. Suatu hari kami melihat dua kalajengking kecil di kamar tidur di sebelah lemari es. Saya berhasil membunuh salah satu dari mereka dan yang lain menghilang di bawah tempat tidur. Mereka cukup baik untuk memindahkan kami ke kamar lain ketika saya melaporkan ini ke resepsi

Review: This place is so good. Near from Legian, Kuta, and Dewi Sri. I went to Holiday with husband dan little boy. They have many menu for breakfast. Good service. They're deluxe room is so big. I will be back again someday

Review_Bahasa: Tempat ini sangat bagus. Dekat dari Legian, Kuta, dan Dewi Sri. Saya pergi berlibur dengan suaminya Dan Little Boy. Mereka memiliki banyak menu untuk sarapan. Pelayanan yang baik. Kamar mewah sangat besar. Saya akan kembali lagi suatu hari nanti

Subjeck: 必ずまた泊まりたいステキなホテルでした！
Review: スタッフの皆さん本当に感じがよく、ニコニコ接してくれます。朝食ビュッフェの場所は夜にはレストランになりますが、美味しいし、落ち着いているし夜遅くまでやっていて何度も食べに行きました。 実は現地の人からストーカーにあい、ホテルの部屋までこられるという恐怖体験をしました。スタッフさんに助けを求めたところ、24時間体制で警備員をつけてくれて複数の男性スタッフが常に周りを警戒してくれました。警備員さんもスタッフさんも「あなたたちを必ず守ります。」と翻訳を使いながら一生懸命伝えてくれたおかげで安心して眠れました。 部屋も綺麗で広く、プールもありとても快適でステキなホテルでした。ぜひ次も利用したいと思います。
Review_English: All the staff are really nice and treating me with a smile. The breakfast buffet is located in a restaurant in the evening, but it is tasty and calm, and we have been eating it late until the night. In fact, I was terrified of being stalked by local people and even coming to my hotel room. When I asked the staff for help, they kept security guards around the clock and several male staff members were always on guard. The security guards and staff were able to sleep with peace of mind by using the translation, "I will definitely protect you." The rooms are spacious and spacious, with a pool and a very comfortable and wonderful hotel. I would definitely like to use it again next time.
Review_Summary: All the staff are really nice and treating me with a smile. In fact, I was terrified of being stalked by local people and even coming to my hotel room. When I asked the staff for help, they kept security guards around the clock and several male staff members were always on guard. The security guards and staff were able to sleep with peace of mind by using the translation, "I will definitely protect you." The rooms are spacious and spacious, with a pool and a very comfortable and wonderful hotel. I would definitely like to use it again next time.
Review_Bahasa: Semua staf sangat baik dan memperlakukan saya sambil tersenyum. Sarapan prasmanan terletak di sebuah restoran di malam hari, tetapi enak dan tenang, dan kami telah memakannya hingga malam. Bahkan, saya takut dikuntit oleh penduduk setempat dan bahkan datang ke kamar hotel saya. Ketika saya meminta bantuan staf, mereka menjaga penjaga keamanan sepanjang waktu dan beberapa anggota staf pria selalu berjaga -jaga. Para penjaga keamanan dan staf dapat tidur dengan ketenangan pikiran dengan menggunakan terjemahan, "Saya pasti akan melindungi Anda." Kamar -kamarnya luas dan luas, dengan kolam renang dan hotel yang sangat nyaman dan indah. Saya pasti ingin menggunakannya lagi lain kali.

Review: 6 of us stayed here for 17 days, staff very friendly, rooms quite mouldy in bathroom and on walls next to beds, and smells like mauls. When changed rooms it was the same and all they do is paint over the mauled on walls.

Review_Bahasa: 6 dari kami tinggal di sini selama 17 hari, staf sangat ramah, kamar yang cukup berjamur di kamar mandi dan di dinding di sebelah tempat tidur, dan berbau seperti maul. Ketika kamar yang diganti itu sama dan yang mereka lakukan hanyalah melukis di atas dinding yang dianiaya.

Review: Our room triple room had 3 single beds, and was big enough for 3 of us- the price was cheap and included buffet breakfast. We stayed for 2 nights, and had a comfortable stay. The floor however felt sticky...with the room slippers provided, it was bearable. Towels and toiletries were provided, but the shampoo, soap and conditioner were an all-in-one which I didn't quite like. The hotel is well-known to taxi drivers, and its location made it easy to grab a taxi out as well.

Review_Bahasa: Kamar triple kamar kami memiliki 3 tempat tidur tunggal, dan cukup besar untuk 3 dari kami- harganya murah dan termasuk sarapan prasmanan. Kami tinggal selama 2 malam, dan menginap dengan nyaman. Namun lantai terasa lengket ... dengan sandal ruangan disediakan, itu bisa ditanggung. Handuk dan perlengkapan mandi disediakan, tetapi sampo, sabun, dan kondisioner adalah all-in-one yang tidak saya sukai. Hotel ini terkenal dengan pengemudi taksi, dan lokasinya membuatnya mudah untuk mengambil taksi juga.

Subjeck: big, clean room with accommodating staff
Review: We love our stay in the hotel. Our room is with balcony in front of the swimming pool. It's clean and big enough for a family of four. Staff are very accommodating and friendly. Since it's holiday season, there are a lot of guests and we can hear the laughter and noise in our room. Overall, we have an amazing stay.

Secara keseluruhan, kami memiliki masa menginap yang luar biasa.

Review: Lokasi sangat strategis. Tepat di daerah kuta. Ruang Kamar bersih dan sangat luas. Cocok untuk liburan keluarga. Harga cukup terjangkau untuk ukuran family rooom. Fasilitas lengkap, seperti gym, spa/massage, kids room, dan kolam renang. Sangat direkomendasikan jika berpergian ke bali dengan keluarga
Review_English: Very strategic location. Right in the Kuta area. The room is clean and very spacious. Suitable for family holidays. The price is quite affordable for the size of the Rooom family. Complete facilities, such as gym, spa/massage, kids room, and swimming pool. Highly recommended when traveling to Bali with family

Subjeck: STAFF AMAZING NOT SO GOOD OTHERWISE NOT QUITE LIKE PHOTOS BIT TIRED
Review: Had a 6 night stay and was very noisy in our hallways, with 500 students booked in for two nights, yelling, slamming doors etc. they just leave and we get a group booking of Indians doing the same, no thought or other guests. reported it and they said just call security and they will come up. not really followed up on. Air con was good in room, booked a balcony, no view and could not go out there as no roof over, and rained most of the evenings. Pool ladder very unsafe, getting out of pool. floors very slippery with the rain in all areas.

Mereka hanya pergi dan kami mendapatkan pemesanan kelompok orang India yang melakukan hal yang sama, tidak ada pemikiran atau tamu lain. melaporkannya dan mereka mengatakan hanya menelepon keamanan dan mereka akan muncul. tidak benar -benar menindaklanjuti. Air Con bagus di kamar, memesan balkon, tidak ada pemandangan dan tidak bisa pergi ke sana karena tidak ada atap, dan menghujani sebagian besar malam hari. Tangga kolam sangat tidak aman, keluar dari kolam renang. Lantai sangat licin dengan hujan di semua area.

Review: Loving my stay. Amazing staff, food,spa,pool and still 3 days togo. Room is great size, and cleaned each day. Pool swim up bar, great fun. Amazing breakfast selection . Lunch and dinner menu wonderful. Will suggest to family and friends to visit. 10 minutes to kuta beach.

Review_Bahasa: Mencintai masa tinggal saya. Staf yang luar biasa, makanan, spa, kolam renang, dan masih 3 hari togo. Kamar berukuran besar, dan dibersihkan setiap hari. Kolam renang berenang di bar, sangat menyenangkan. Pilihan sarapan yang luar biasa. Menu makan siang dan makan malam indah. Akan menyarankan untuk keluarga dan teman untuk dikunjungi. 10 menit ke Pantai Kuta.

Subjeck: Staf yang membantu, hotel dalam kondisi buruk
Review: Kami tinggal selama 5 hari, check in langsung, kami diberi kamar di lantai 3 tanpa jendela, bau berjamur, karpet robek di koridor, suasana padat. Saya meminta kamar dengan jendela setelah pemesanan tidak ditindaklanjuti. Saya dipindahkan ke sebuah kamar di lantai dasar dengan seluruh panel kaca menghadap ke jalan yang tidak nyaman karena di malam hari Anda tidak bisa memindahkan tirai di malam hari. AC mogok pada hari 01 ketika kami kembali untuk kembali ke kamar di malam hari, itu diperbaiki hari berikutnya dengan diisi bensin baru. Ruangan itu dalam kondisi buruk, kamar mandi lebih buruk, jamur di ubin, bau lembab di sekitar. AC mogok lagi hari 04. diperbaiki di malam hari. Sarapan sangat baik dengan beberapa pilihan dari pilihan Asia, India, Eropa, pancake counter, omelet counter. tetapi merupakan tempat yang sibuk dengan ratusan anak sekolah setempat menghadiri sarapan pada 2 hari berturut-turut. Lokasi baik, 10 + 12 menit ke Pantai Kuta dengan taksi, antar-jemput hotel gratis ke pantai Kuta, pantai legian, mal penemuan setiap hari sekitar 4 kali, pemesanan harus dilakukan karena mereka memiliki sekitar 17 tempat. Beberapa toko makanan lokal juga kompleks makanan Devi Sri di 2 Sen. berjalan. , McDonalds, burger king sekitar 15 menit. berjalan. Aging Bali, Kuta adalah sekitar 15 menit. berjalan untuk suvenir dan gaun murah di Bali. Secara keseluruhan pengalaman buruk, hotel perlu meningkatkan kamar, kamar mandi, barang-barang listrik termasuk AC di kamar. Poin bagus - staf yang membantu, lokasi bagus, sarapan memiliki banyak pilihan, antar-jemput gratis ke pantai lokal.
Review_English: We stayed for 5 days, check in directly, we were given a room on the 3rd floor without windows, moldy smell, torn carpet in the corridor, a busy atmosphere. I asked the room with the window after the order was not followed up. I was moved to a room on the ground floor with all glass panels facing an uncomfortable road because at night you cannot move the curtain at night. AC broke down on 01 when we returned to return to the room at night, it was repaired the next day filled with new gasoline. The room was in a bad condition, the bathroom was worse, the mushrooms in the tile, the moist smell around. AC broke down again 04. Repaired at night. Breakfast is very good with several choices of choices of Asia, India, Europe, Pancake Counter, Omelette Counter. But it is a busy place with hundreds of local school children attending breakfast in 2 consecutive days. Good location, 10 + 12 minutes to Kuta Beach by taxi, free hotel shuttle to Kuta Beach, Legian Beach, discovery malls every day about 4 times, reservations must be made because they have around 17 places. Some local food stores are also the food complex of Devi Sri in 2 cenies. walk. , McDonalds, Burger King for about 15 minutes. walk. Aging Bali, Kuta is about 15 minutes. Walk for souvenirs and cheap dresses in Bali. Overall bad experience, the hotel needs to increase rooms, bathrooms, electric items including air conditioning in the room. Good Points - Staff who help, good location, breakfast has many choices, free shuttle to the local beach.
Review_Summary: Hotel needs to increase rooms, bathrooms, electric items including air conditioning in the room. Breakfast is very good with several choices of choices of Asia, India, Europe, Pancake Counter, Omelette Counter. Good location, free hotel shuttle to Kuta Beach, Legian Beach, discovery malls every day about 4 times.

Review: ept pada menerima panggilan telepon ke kamar kami setelah kami meminta berulang kali bahwa tidak ada panggilan telepon yang ditransfer. Scam berulang untuk membeli liburan, sangat mirip dengan penjualan time share. Sarapan sangat membosankan. Bacon hanya diterima jika Anda memintanya. Tidak banyak variasi makanan untuk orang-orang yang datang dari budaya barat. Staf dan layanan kamar sangat bagus. Pembersih kamar / rumah sangat bagus. Sangat ramah dan membantu
Review_English: EPT received a phone call to our room after we asked repeatedly that no telephone call was transferred. Repeated scams to buy a vacation, very similar to Time Share sales. Breakfast is very boring. Bacon is only accepted if you ask for it. There are not many variations of food for people who come from Western culture. Staff and room services are very good. Room / house cleaning is very good. Very friendly and helpful

Review: Kami tinggal di sini selama 4 hari 3 malam. Kami benar-benar menikmati kolam renang dan staf penuh perhatian dan ramah. Penyebaran sarapan hanya rata-rata dan tidak banyak pilihan. Kamar sangat besar, luas dan sangat nyaman. Layanan kamar sangat efisien. Lokasi sangat bagus dan mereka menyediakan layanan antar-jemput gratis ke pantai! Secara keseluruhan kami bersenang-senang di sini.
Review_English: We stayed here for 4 days 3 nights. We really enjoyed the pool and staff at caring and friendly. The spread of breakfast is only an average and not much choices. The room is very large, spacious and very comfortable. Room service is very efficient. The location is very good and they provide free shuttle services to the beach! Overall we have fun here.

The room is very large, spacious and very comfortable. Room service is very efficient. The location is very good and they provide free shuttle services to the beach! Overall we have fun here.

Subjeck: Nilai Baik Untuk Uang | Staf yang ramah
Review: Tinggal di sini selama lima malam yang baik dan benar-benar cukup (3 sudah cukup) sebelum pindah ke Seminyak. Anda tidak dapat mengalahkan nilai uang di tempat ini, mereka memiliki restoran dengan pilihan yang cukup untuk menyenangkan semua orang dan sarapan prasmanan yang mereka pakai setiap pagi mungkin salah satu yang terbaik yang pernah saya kunjungi. Staf ramah dan menyenangkan setiap saat, kami dijemput dari bandara tepat waktu dan diantar ke hotel pada saat kedatangan. Apa yang mengecewakan tempat itu adalah setiap hari staf akan datang untuk membersihkan kamar produk yang digunakan untuk membersihkan lantai akan membuat mereka sangat lengket, juga selama kami tinggal kelompok yang sangat besar (tur) tinggal di sini juga dan membuat suara konyol awal jam pagi dan tampaknya tidak ada upaya untuk meminta kelompok ini untuk menenangkan diri sehubungan dengan tamu lain yang menginap. Pijat di lokasi MAHAL! Jika ini adalah pertama kalinya Anda mengunjungi Bali, Anda mungkin tertipu untuk berpikir bahwa harganya murah tetapi hanya menyusuri jalanan selama satu sore dan Anda bisa mendapatkan layanan yang sama (jika tidak lebih baik) dengan harga kurang dari seperempat dari harga. Saya akan tinggal di sini lagi berdasarkan nilai untuk uang jika saya pernah menemukan diri saya di Kuta lagi sebentar tetapi jika Anda mengunjungi lebih dari tiga hari, menghabiskan uang ekstra untuk tempat yang lebih baik, lokasi umum hotel juga tidak terbaik.
Review_English: Living here for five nights is good and really enough (3 is enough) before moving to Seminyak. You cannot beat the value of money in this place, they have a restaurant with enough choices to please everyone and the buffet breakfast they use every morning maybe one of the best I have ever visited. Staff are friendly and fun all the time, we are picked up from the airport on time and delivered to the hotel at the time of arrival. What disappoints the place is that every day the staff will come to clean the product room used to clean the floor will make them very sticky, also as long as we live a very large group (tour) stay here too and make silly sounds early in the morning and apparently there is no attempt to ask this group to calm down in connection with other guests who stay. Massage in an expensive location! If this is your first time visiting Bali, you might be fooled to think that the price is cheap but only down the streets for one afternoon and you can get the same service (if not better) at a price of less than a quarter of the price. I will stay here again based on the value of money if I have ever found myself in Kuta again for a while but if you visit more than three days, spend extra money for a better place, the hotel's public location is also not the best.

Review: Bukan tempat yang buruk untuk menginap. Tenang dari jalan tapi tamu lain berisik dan suara bergema ke kamar. Sangat keras. Tidak baik jika Anda mencari kedamaian tetapi ok jika Anda hanya mencari tempat tidur sambil menjelajahi kuta. Makanannya enak.
Review_English: Not a bad place to stay. Calm down from the road but other guests are noisy and the sound echoes to the room. Very hard. It's not good if you are looking for peace but ok if you only look for a bed while exploring Kuta. The food is delicious.

Review: This hotel exceeded my expectations. The staff were friendly and helpful. The accommodation was basic, but comfortable. The breakfast options were a bit limited. The location was fairly central. The free shuttle service was amazing. Overall, a great time here.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini melebihi harapan saya. Staf ramah dan membantu. Akomodasi itu mendasar, tetapi nyaman. Pilihan sarapan agak terbatas. Lokasi itu cukup sentral. Layanan antar -jemput gratis luar biasa. Secara keseluruhan, waktu yang tepat di sini.

Review: 部屋がプールの前だったので気軽にプールで泳げたので良かった。 ただ、部屋の中に玄関と反対側にプールへの出入り口があったので少し落ち着かない気もした。
Review_English: The room was in front of the pool so I was able to easily swim in the pool, which was great. However, there was an entrance to the pool on the other side of the entrance, so I felt a little uneasy.
Review_Summary: The room was in front of the pool so I was able to easily swim in the pool, which was great. However, there was an entrance to the pool on the other side of the entrance, so I felt a little uneasy.
Review_Bahasa: Ruangan itu ada di depan kolam sehingga saya bisa dengan mudah berenang di kolam renang, yang bagus. Namun, ada pintu masuk ke kolam di sisi lain pintu masuk, jadi saya merasa sedikit gelisah.

Review: Stay here last feb 2 tp 5...we got the family package with so many freebies, free rt shuttle bus to and from airport, free welcome drink, free daily breakfast, free one night steam boat dinner, free one day car service for 8 hours, free use of pool and gym, 25 discount on spa. what can you ask for...and the pillow so soft , bed so comfortable. Though on our first night aircon power not strong, it was addressed immediately when i requested to clean the aircon for better cooling condition...i am satisfied with the service, staff so helpful and friendly. Plus factor - near Giant supermarket, convenient store and some local food restaurant. I would definetly recommend this hotel.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di sini terakhir 2 Februari TP 5 ... Kami mendapatkan paket keluarga dengan begitu banyak gratis, bus antar -jemput RT gratis ke dan dari bandara, minuman selamat datang gratis, sarapan harian gratis, makan malam perahu uap satu malam, layanan mobil satu hari gratis selama 8 jam, penggunaan kolam renang dan gym gratis, 25 diskon untuk spa. Apa yang bisa Anda minta ... dan bantal begitu lembut, tempat tidur begitu nyaman. Meskipun pada malam pertama kami, kekuatan AC tidak kuat, itu ditangani segera ketika saya meminta untuk membersihkan AC untuk kondisi pendinginan yang lebih baik ... Saya puas dengan layanan, staf sangat membantu dan ramah. Plus Factor - dekat supermarket raksasa, toko yang nyaman dan beberapa restoran makanan lokal. Saya pasti akan merekomendasikan hotel ini.

Review: The people could not be more helpful and friendly. The hotel is well situated within a few minutes taxi ride from all night life and some fantastic beaches. Surf on the beaches close by or travel 20 minutes (£10) to some of the best beaches in Bali. One draw back is the pool and that’s not a complaint as we new this before booking. This however made us get out during the day and see some fantastic places. Pay a bit extra and get a room with a balcony as some rooms don’t even have windows. If you do your research the hotel is a good find. Breakfast has lots of choice and things that are not on the buffet can be requested. Anyway we loved our stay here and thanks to all the staff for being so pleasant.

Review_Bahasa: Orang -orang tidak bisa lebih membantu dan ramah. Hotel ini terletak dengan baik dalam beberapa menit perjalanan taksi dari sepanjang malam dan beberapa pantai yang fantastis. Berselancar di pantai dekat atau bepergian 20 menit (£ 10) ke beberapa pantai terbaik di Bali. Satu menarik kembali adalah kolam renang dan itu bukan keluhan karena kami baru sebelum pemesanan. Namun ini membuat kami keluar di siang hari dan melihat beberapa tempat yang fantastis. Bayar sedikit ekstra dan dapatkan kamar dengan balkon karena beberapa kamar bahkan tidak memiliki jendela. Jika Anda melakukan riset, hotel adalah penemuan yang baik. Sarapan memiliki banyak pilihan dan hal -hal yang tidak ada di prasmanan dapat diminta. Pokoknya kami menyukai kami tinggal di sini dan terima kasih kepada semua staf karena telah begitu menyenangkan.

Subjeck: Lo mejor de la zona a buen precio
Review: Llegamos a kuta despues de vivir 7 dias en las profundidades de bali, fuimos a un hotel caro cual no quiero mencionar, tras una noche alli me dispuse a buscar hoteles, encontre este a primera hora y no necesite ver mas, las habitaciones estan bien, tiene piscina y parking, dispone de motos y comida rica, estubimos estupendamente yo y mis padres. Abria ke mejorar las instalaciones de la piscina ya que el suelo parece una pista de hielo, resbala muchisimo.
Review_English: We arrived in Kuta after living 7 days in the depths of Bali, we went to a expensive hotel which I do not want to mention, after a night I prepared to look for hotels, I found this in the first hour and I do not need to see more, the rooms are fine, it has a swimming pool and parking, it has motorcycles and rich food, we are great I and my parents. He opened to improve the pool facilities since the ground looks like an ice rink, slips a lot.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tiba di Kuta setelah hidup 7 hari di kedalaman Bali, kami pergi ke sebuah hotel mahal yang tidak ingin saya sebutkan, setelah malam saya bersiap untuk mencari hotel, saya menemukan ini pada jam pertama dan saya tidak perlu melihat lebih banyak, kamarnya baik -baik saja, memiliki kolam renang dan parkir, memiliki motor dan makanan yang kaya, kami dan orang tua saya dan orang tua saya. Dia membuka untuk meningkatkan fasilitas kolam karena tanah terlihat seperti gelanggang es, banyak tergelincir.

Review: Kuta Central Park Hotel located in Bali is an Excellent Hotel. For the first time I have seen a hotel with so many services with a great prices.Starting from my first day 30th June 2018, we had already booked our rooms before (4 Rooms), that too very early but after that also I didn't got any consecutive room, though I got on the same floor. I didn't bothered me as rooms were on the same floor. Cons: * For Indians, less items to eat in Breakfast * Small Bathing Area * No Hindi Channel on Television Pros: * Wi-Fi in the rooms (As the Bali government doesn't provide tourist sim cards, Wi-Fi becomes important) * Complementary Water Bottles * Kettle Available in the rooms * Hair Dryer available * Washing System in Toilets * Gym facility available * Pool Available * Room View (Lovely) * Close to Krishna Hypermarket Overall, I will give 4 Stars to such a nice Hotel.

Review_Bahasa: Kuta Central Park Hotel yang terletak di Bali adalah hotel yang sangat baik. Untuk pertama kalinya saya melihat sebuah hotel dengan begitu banyak layanan dengan harga yang bagus. Mulailah dari hari pertama saya 30 Juni 2018, kami sudah memesan kamar kami sebelumnya (4 kamar), itu terlalu awal tetapi setelah itu juga saya tidak mendapatkan kamar berturut -turut, meskipun saya naik ke lantai yang sama. Saya tidak mengganggu saya karena kamar berada di lantai yang sama. Review: tayed here whilst travelling with 2 friends in September 2018. The staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was not ready when we arrived so they offered us drinks whilst we waited. The hotel room itself was absolutely beautiful for the price we paid. It was very spacious for 3 people and very clean. The bathroom was beautiful with a really good shower. ( A good bathroom is every time to me when travelling). We did have a problem with the keycard at the hotel room as this would often not work however I doubt this is down to the hotel as this has happened in a number of hotels. The pool area was lovely only one problem if you are a sun worshiper like myself the pool area is covered with trees and shadows from the hotel buildings so tanning isn't ideal. Location isn't to bad however you would need to get a taxi to the central bars and beach area or it could be a long walk. Overall great stay would stay here again if I came back to Kuta!

Review_Summary: tayed here whilst travelling with 2 friends in September 2018. The staff were friendly and helpful. Our room was not ready when we arrived so they offered us drinks whilst we waited. The hotel room itself was absolutely beautiful for the price we paid. It was very spacious for 3 people and very clean. The bathroom was beautiful with a really good shower. ( A good bathroom is every time to me when travelling). We did have a problem with the keycard at the hotel room as this would often not work however I doubt this is down to the hotel as this has happened in a number of hotels. The pool area was lovely only one problem if you are a sun worshiper like myself the pool area is covered with trees and shadows from the hotel buildings so tanning isn't ideal. Location isn't to bad however you would need to get a taxi to the central bars and beach area or it could be a long walk. Overall great stay would stay here again if I came back to Kuta!
Review_Bahasa: Tayed di sini saat bepergian dengan 2 teman pada bulan September 2018. Stafnya ramah dan membantu. Kamar kami belum siap ketika kami tiba sehingga mereka menawarkan minuman sementara kami menunggu. Kamar hotel itu sendiri benar -benar indah untuk harga yang kami bayar. Itu sangat luas untuk 3 orang dan sangat bersih. Kamar mandinya indah dengan mandi yang sangat bagus. (Kamar mandi yang bagus setiap saat bagi saya saat bepergian). Kami memang memiliki masalah dengan kartu kunci di kamar hotel karena ini sering tidak berfungsi, tetapi saya ragu ini turun ke hotel karena ini telah terjadi di sejumlah hotel. Area kolam renang hanya satu masalah jika Anda seorang penyembah matahari seperti saya di kolam renang ditutupi dengan pohon dan bayangan dari bangunan hotel sehingga penyamakan tidak ideal. Lokasi tidak buruk namun Anda perlu mendapatkan taksi ke bar pusat dan area pantai atau bisa berjalan jauh. Secara keseluruhan senang tinggal di sini lagi jika saya kembali ke Kuta!

Review: Very good value for money. The rooms were spacious and very comfortable. The beds were great. Breakfast was ok not a huge variety but sufficient. The staff were all fantastic. Especially Andi at the pool bar The Tangung Spa was incredible. We visited almost daily. Very professional and excellent massages, reflexology, manicures and pedicures. The only down side was the location wasn’t ideal and there wasn’t a lot around walking distance so had to catch the free shuttle which was great or taxis. Also it was very slippery at all the main walking areas. Very very dangerous. My mum fell and broke her wrist. We had to go to hospital. We had to ask them to put extra mats down for safety. I would recommend this hotel as great value for money.

Subjeck: Good location and friendly staff but poor service (house keeping), poor internet, AC properly not working.
Review: Stay was good but definitely not a 4 star hotel. I think the only reason it is 4 stars is because of the swimming pool. Pros Good location Many things close by such as massages and shops Friendly and smiling staff Cons Slow internet, specially at the level 3 rooms I have stayed for 20 days, it was a deal I had to take with jet star airlines but the air conditioning isn't cold enough. (probably doesn't work) they came to fix it but no improvement. Room service stopped coming to clean the rooms. I had to call multiple times for a couple of days and they came to clean with half arse quick job. One day I didn't call to see if they would come to clean but no one showed up. Note: when I used to call, they used to say the house keeping was busy and they will send someone asap. Overall, the hotel itself doesn't feel like a 4 star hotel. They should change it to a 3 *** hotel.

Review_Bahasa: Menginap itu bagus tapi jelas bukan hotel bintang 4. Saya pikir satu -satunya alasannya adalah 4 bintang adalah karena kolam renang. Pro Lokasi Baik Banyak hal yang dekat dengan pijat dan toko -toko staf yang ramah dan tersenyum dan internet lambat, khususnya di kamar level 3 yang telah saya tinggali selama 20 hari, itu adalah kesepakatan yang harus saya ambil dengan jet star maskapai tetapi pendingin udara tidak cukup dingin. (Mungkin tidak berhasil) Mereka datang untuk memperbaikinya tetapi tidak ada perbaikan. Layanan kamar berhenti datang untuk membersihkan kamar. Saya harus menelepon beberapa kali selama beberapa hari dan mereka datang untuk membersihkan dengan pekerjaan cepat. Suatu hari saya tidak menelepon untuk melihat apakah mereka akan datang untuk membersihkan tetapi tidak ada yang muncul. Catatan: Ketika saya biasa menelepon, mereka biasa mengatakan bahwa rumah itu sibuk dan mereka akan mengirim seseorang ASAP. Secara keseluruhan, hotel itu sendiri tidak terasa seperti hotel bintang 4. Mereka harus mengubahnya menjadi hotel 3 ***.

Subjeck: Decent Hotel located far off the main area
Review: Kuta Central Park is a decent hotel located in Kuta but little far off the main area of Kuta. It has got a huge parking area & the area of the Hotel is also big. It is little dated although the room size is decent has got good facilities. The wifi works well in the Hotel & it has got all amenities required. The breakfast spread is OK but repeatation is a challenge which needs to be worked. There is a Veg corner with 3-4 items which Indians can have. Although the food quality is good but you have wait for some time for getting an egg prepared. The Hotel provides free shuttle to the main areas frequently during the course of the day (one way though). Good option for budget traveler who can stay here & avail the shuttle facilities to go to various places.

Review_Bahasa: Kuta Central Park adalah hotel yang layak yang terletak di Kuta tetapi sedikit dari area utama Kuta. Ini memiliki area parkir yang besar & area hotel juga besar. Ini sedikit tanggal meskipun ukuran kamarnya layak memiliki fasilitas yang baik. WiFi bekerja dengan baik di hotel & memiliki semua fasilitas yang diperlukan. Penyebaran sarapan baik -baik saja tetapi pengulangan adalah tantangan yang perlu dikerjakan. Ada sudut sayuran dengan 3-4 item yang dapat dimiliki orang India. Meskipun kualitas makanannya bagus tetapi Anda harus menunggu beberapa waktu untuk menyiapkan telur. Hotel ini sering memberikan antar -jemput gratis ke area utama selama hari itu (meskipun satu arah). Pilihan yang baik untuk pelancong anggaran yang dapat tinggal di sini & memanfaatkan fasilitas antar -jemput untuk pergi ke berbagai tempat.

Review: While I liked this hotel and its facilities including the breakfast, swimming pool, shuttle service and excellent customer service, I did not like its location, which is quite far from beaches and happening places like shopping malls and tourist spots. Anyway, there is a food center near the hotel. I like the Indian food at the restaurant of the hotel, which is tasty and reasonably priced. I would recommend this hotel if you rent a full-day car (which I did) or bike.

I would recommend this hotel if you rent a full-day car (which I did) or bike.

Review: I love this hotel. They have everything I want and at a very affordable price. The only irritation was caused from the occasional night noise, of some less considerate guests forgetting their manners in the wee small hours, causing undue noise. Maybe the night security staff could work harder to keep such patrons quiet? Apart from that, I loved my stay at the Kuta Central Park Hotel. The staff are all polite, appear happy and always give a warm greeting. Including the cleaning staff, who work diligently all day, keeping the entire place spic and span. The hotel has a restaurant, which serves a variety of foods at breakfast, which was included in our deal. Also serving lunch and dinner. I love the pool, with dissected sections, one side for the young children, complete also with a little play ground, the other side separated by a bridge and fully divided wall, has a swim up bar, where you can order drinks/food, chat with the friendly bar staff, or bask on the lounge chairs beside the pool. On the other side of the bar is an entertainment area, where music is playing. You can request music that you enjoy if you wish. The pool table and table soccer are free and occasionally the friendly barman might join you in a game if you are happy to allow him to. The rooms are spacious, air conditioned and have a fridge and tea/coffee facilities. There is a Giant supermarket within waking distance, where we bought fresh milk and fruit and snacks. There is cable TV and free wifi and room service (not 24hr) The final greatest MUST HAVE for me, is the gym. Theirs is well equipped with a multiple use exercise machine, two track machines, a cross trainer, a stationary bike, a sit up bench and free weights, up to 10kg. Two of each of size weight of course. I found this very adequate for my daily workouts, although I would have liked an additional flat bench and also a step, but I improvised quite adequately. The gym's aircon could be better, but I managed ok. Apart from all this, the hotel offers free activities, a kids club, massage services and transport if required. Also free parking, for our hire scooters. I don't know what anyone could greater expect for such a totally affordable price? The hotel restaurant meals are also well priced. When we stay here we are made to feel like part of a big, happy family. Anyone who has a different experience I don't understand? I can only suggest that if you treat people with respect and you will be more likely to receive that respect in return. Thank you to all staff at Kuta Central Park Hotel. We will see you next time we visit Bali. : )

On the other side of the bar is an entertainment area, where music is playing. You can request music that you enjoy if you wish. The pool table and table soccer are free and occasionally the friendly barman might join you in a game if you are happy to allow him to. The rooms are spacious, air conditioned and have a fridge and tea/coffee facilities. There is a Giant supermarket within waking distance, where we bought fresh milk and fruit and snacks. There is cable TV and free wifi and room service (not 24hr) The final greatest MUST HAVE for me, is the gym. Theirs is well equipped with a multiple use exercise machine, two track machines, a cross trainer, a stationary bike, a sit up bench and free weights, up to 10kg. Two of each of size weight of course. I found this very adequate for my daily workouts, although I would have liked an additional flat bench and also a step, but I improvised quite adequately. The gym's aircon could be better, but I managed ok. Apart from all this, the hotel offers free activities, a kids club, massage services and transport if required. Also free parking, for our hire scooters. I don't know what anyone could greater expect for such a totally affordable price? The hotel restaurant meals are also well priced. When we stay here we are made to feel like part of a big, happy family. Anyone who has a different experience I don't understand? I can only suggest that if you treat people with respect and you will be more likely to receive that respect in return. Thank you to all staff at Kuta Central Park Hotel. We will see you next time we visit Bali. : )
Review_Summary: Kuta Central Park Hotel has everything I want and at a very affordable price. The staff are all polite, appear happy and always give a warm greeting. The hotel has a restaurant, which serves a variety of foods at breakfast, which was included in our deal. I love the pool, with dissected sections, one side for the young children, complete also with a little play ground.
Review_Bahasa: Saya suka hotel ini. Mereka memiliki semua yang saya inginkan dan dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Satu -satunya iritasi disebabkan oleh kebisingan malam sesekali, dari beberapa tamu yang kurang mempertimbangkan lupa sopan santun mereka di wee jam -jam kecil, menyebabkan kebisingan yang tidak semestinya. Mungkin staf keamanan malam bisa bekerja lebih keras untuk menjaga pelanggan seperti itu tetap diam? Selain itu, saya suka tinggal di Kuta Central Park Hotel. Semua stafnya sopan, tampak bahagia dan selalu memberikan salam hangat. Termasuk staf pembersih, yang bekerja dengan rajin sepanjang hari, menjaga seluruh tempat spic dan rentang. Hotel ini memiliki restoran, yang menyajikan berbagai makanan saat sarapan, yang termasuk dalam kesepakatan kami. Juga menyajikan makan siang dan makan malam. Saya suka kolam renang, dengan bagian yang dibedah, satu sisi untuk anak -anak muda, lengkap juga dengan sedikit tempat bermain, sisi lain dipisahkan oleh jembatan dan dinding yang terbagi penuh, memiliki bar berenang di atas bar, di mana Anda dapat memesan minuman/makanan, mengobrol dengan staf bar yang ramah, atau berjemur di kursi santai di samping kolam. Di sisi lain bar adalah area hiburan, tempat musik diputar. Anda dapat meminta musik yang Anda nikmati jika Anda mau. Meja biliar dan sepak bola meja gratis dan kadang -kadang bartender yang ramah mungkin bergabung dengan Anda dalam permainan jika Anda senang mengizinkannya. Kamar -kamarnya luas, ber -AC dan memiliki lemari es dan fasilitas teh/kopi. Ada supermarket raksasa dalam jarak bangun, di mana kami membeli susu segar dan buah dan makanan ringan. Ada TV kabel dan WiFi gratis dan layanan kamar (bukan 24 jam) yang paling besar harus dimiliki untuk saya, adalah gym. Mereka dilengkapi dengan mesin latihan ganda, dua mesin trek, pelatih silang, sepeda stasioner, bangku duduk dan bobot gratis, hingga 10kg. Dua dari masing -masing ukuran ukuran tentu saja. Saya menemukan ini sangat memadai untuk latihan harian saya, meskipun saya akan menyukai bangku datar tambahan dan juga langkah, tetapi saya berimprovisasi dengan cukup memadai. AC gym bisa lebih baik, tetapi saya berhasil ok. Terlepas dari semua ini, hotel ini menawarkan kegiatan gratis, klub anak -anak, layanan pijat dan transportasi jika diperlukan. Juga parkir gratis, untuk skuter sewa kami. Saya tidak tahu apa yang bisa diharapkan orang lebih besar dengan harga yang benar -benar terjangkau? Makanan hotel juga harganya harganya. Ketika kami tinggal di sini, kami dibuat merasa seperti bagian dari keluarga yang besar dan bahagia. Adakah yang memiliki pengalaman berbeda yang tidak saya mengerti? Saya hanya dapat menyarankan bahwa jika Anda memperlakukan orang dengan hormat dan Anda akan lebih cenderung menerima rasa hormat itu sebagai imbalan. Terima kasih untuk semua staf di Kuta Central Park Hotel. Kami akan melihat Anda lain kali kami mengunjungi Bali. : "

Review: The hotel is close to the shops, markets and the hotel provides a shuttle to the beach. You have to find your own way back to the hotel. The breakfast was varied and tasty. The rooms were air-conditioned, neat and clean. The hotel does not provide hand towels in the bathroom. The spa staff gave lovely massages. There is a lovely pool near the bar area. The staff were friendly and helpful. I would stay there again.

Review: Generally hotel was nice,clean,friendly reception staff,housekeeping staff was slack and not quick/prompt.standard rooms does not have windows which is not nice,to upgrade room a cost was involved,not much staff was visible during breakfast so there was a queue to get your omelette daily. I would stay in this hotel again but not on the 3rd floor as it rained at night & water puddles could be seen on floor & not mopped up as this created a slippery hazard.room and bed was nice & spacious & was bedding/ towels was done/replaced daily.

Review_Bahasa: Umumnya hotel adalah staf resepsi yang baik, bersih, ramah, staf rumah tangga kelonggaran dan tidak cepat/cepat. Kamar standar tidak memiliki jendela yang tidak bagus, untuk meningkatkan ruang yang terlibat, tidak banyak staf yang terlihat saat sarapan sehingga ada antrian untuk mendapatkan omelet Anda setiap hari. Saya akan tinggal di hotel ini lagi tetapi tidak di lantai 3 saat hujan di malam hari & genangan air dapat dilihat di lantai & tidak dibatasi karena ini menciptakan bahaya yang licin. Kamar dan tempat tidurnya bagus & luas & tempat tidur/ handuk dilakukan/ diganti setiap hari.

Kindly search for some better place

Review: Recently got married in bali and had a big family group with a lot of kids. Booked 12 rooms for my family and it was the first trip to bali for most of them. It was a bit of a gamble just going off reviews but ended up being a great decision. Staff went above and beyond everyones expectations. Rooms were great. Had everything you need and loved the location. Cheap food market across the road and the lotus cafe served great food. Good to have a nice greasy burger every now and then and breakfast was delicious. Has a great swim up bar and a cool little shop next to the lotus cafe full of food drinks a lollies for the kids. Thankyou to everyone at the hotel for taking care of all of us. Awesome place will always go back whenever head to Bali. Thankyou guys

Review_Bahasa: Baru -baru ini menikah di Bali dan memiliki kelompok keluarga besar dengan banyak anak. Memesan 12 kamar untuk keluarga saya dan itu adalah perjalanan pertama ke Bali untuk sebagian besar dari mereka. Itu sedikit pertaruhan yang hanya keluar dari ulasan tetapi akhirnya menjadi keputusan yang hebat. Staf melampaui harapan setiap orang. Kamar -kamarnya bagus. Memiliki semua yang Anda butuhkan dan menyukai lokasi. Pasar Makanan Murah di seberang jalan dan Lotus Cafe menyajikan makanan lezat. Senang memiliki burger berminyak yang bagus sesekali dan sarapan lezat. Memiliki bar berenang yang bagus dan toko kecil yang keren di sebelah kafe Lotus yang penuh dengan minuman makanan untuk anak -anak. Terima kasih kepada semua orang di hotel karena telah merawat kita semua. Tempat yang luar biasa akan selalu kembali setiap kali menuju ke Bali. Terima kasih teman -teman

Review: We booked last minute since our last hotel was fully booked and we cannot extend our stay. We were hesitant at first due to mixed reviews out there but the time pressure and good room deal made us decide to take it. And here it is. Reception: Great. We checked-in late since we came from our Ubud trip but the check-in itself was hassle free. The bellboy is courteous and helpful as well. Room: We got deluxe room, and it was huge. everything is working fine, the AC, TV, mini fridge, lamps, faucets, etc. And the hot shower, it was working too good, i mean, it is harder to make the water cold than keeping it hot, lol. The room also have two balconies overseeing the road, not a good view though, but nice place to sit and chat. Wifi is a bit unstable, i can watch videos but rendering is expected. i can't play ML consistently. but it's ok. The room is quiet at night but a construction nice can be bothersome in the morning; good thing we were always out. Amenities: The free water is not in a plastic bottle, but in a glass bottle. Great for the environment, but only 300mL instead of the usual 500mL. Coffee and tea as usual. We also got free congratulatory cake for our honeymoon (sweet). The toiletries were also replaced daily. They also have a decent size pool, mini gym, a bar, prayer room, and spa. Restaurant: The breakfast is good but i think, Swiss-Belinn's brekafast is better (check my other review on that). Good options, they actually have few vegetarian options, but overall, not much variety for me. The egg station needs help to avoid long lines. We had dinner there once, and it was great. The food serving size is huge for one person and tastes actually amazing. Reasonably priced too for a hotel restau. Location: Near all other great places in Kuta. A bit far from the beach but there is a free transpo to the beach and other major sites nearby. Be early though, it is a first come first serve. Staff/Service: Superb, always smiling and helpful. Our request to leave our baggage after check-out really helped; they even weigh our baggage when we requested it. After being ripped-off by a taxi the night before (after a great dinner at Sushi Tei), we do not want to ride any taxi anymore, be it Bluebird or not. Good thing the hotel have their own airport transpo service, a bit expensive than usual but better than risking another rip-off. The driver is friendly and careful in driving, thumbs up.

Review_Summary: Swiss-Belinn is a luxury hotel in Kuta, Indonesia. The hotel has a pool, mini gym, a bar, prayer room, and spa. The food serving size is huge for one person and tastes actually amazing. The free water is not in a plastic bottle, but in a glass bottle.
Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan menit terakhir karena hotel terakhir kami dipesan penuh dan kami tidak dapat memperpanjang masa tinggal kami. Kami ragu -ragu pada awalnya karena ulasan campuran di luar sana tetapi tekanan waktu dan kesepakatan kamar yang baik membuat kami memutuskan untuk mengambilnya. Dan ini dia. Penerimaan: Hebat. Kami check-in terlambat sejak kami datang dari perjalanan Ubud kami tetapi check-in itu sendiri bebas repot. Bellboy juga sopan dan membantu. Kamar: Kami mendapat ruang mewah, dan itu sangat besar. Semuanya bekerja dengan baik, AC, TV, kulkas mini, lampu, faucet, dll. Dan mandi air panas, itu bekerja terlalu bagus, maksud saya, lebih sulit untuk membuat air dingin daripada tetap panas, lol. Kamar ini juga memiliki dua balkon yang mengawasi jalan, bukan pemandangan yang bagus, tapi tempat yang bagus untuk duduk dan mengobrol. WiFi agak tidak stabil, saya bisa menonton video tetapi rendering diharapkan. Saya tidak bisa bermain ML secara konsisten. Tapi tidak apa -apa. Kamar tenang di malam hari tetapi konstruksi bagus bisa menyusahkan di pagi hari; Untung kami selalu keluar. Fasilitas: Air bebas tidak ada dalam botol plastik, tetapi dalam botol kaca. Bagus untuk lingkungan, tetapi hanya 300ml, bukan 500ml yang biasa. Kopi dan teh seperti biasa. Kami juga mendapat kue ucapan selamat gratis untuk bulan madu kami (manis). Perlengkapan mandi juga diganti setiap hari. Mereka juga memiliki kolam renang ukuran yang layak, gym mini, bar, ruang doa, dan spa. Restoran: Sarapannya enak tapi saya pikir, Brekafast Swiss-Belinn lebih baik (periksa ulasan saya yang lain tentang itu). Pilihan yang baik, mereka sebenarnya memiliki sedikit pilihan vegetarian, tetapi secara keseluruhan, tidak banyak variasi bagi saya. Stasiun telur membutuhkan bantuan untuk menghindari antrean panjang. Kami pernah makan malam di sana, dan itu luar biasa. Ukuran penyajian makanan sangat besar untuk satu orang dan rasanya benar -benar luar biasa. Harga terjangkau juga untuk restau hotel. Lokasi: Dekat semua tempat bagus lainnya di Kuta. Agak jauh dari pantai tetapi ada transpo gratis ke pantai dan situs besar lainnya di dekatnya. Dulu, ini adalah servis pertama yang datang pertama. Staf/Layanan: Luar biasa, selalu tersenyum dan bermanfaat. Permintaan kami untuk meninggalkan bagasi kami setelah check-out benar-benar membantu; Mereka bahkan menimbang bagasi kami saat kami memintanya. Setelah ditipu oleh taksi malam sebelumnya (setelah makan malam yang enak di Sushi Tei), kami tidak ingin naik taksi lagi, baik itu Bluebird atau tidak. Untung hotel memiliki layanan transpo bandara sendiri, sedikit mahal dari biasanya tetapi lebih baik daripada mempertaruhkan rip-off lain. Pengemudi ramah dan berhati -hati dalam mengemudi, jempol ke atas.

Review: This is a very affordable hotel. It exceeded my expectations. The variety of food in the breakfast buffet menu is good as well. Spacious rooms with big toilet. The swimming pool is also good. Location is also great. It is just a few minutes away from malls or from the awesome beaches of Bali.

Review: he hotel is very near to the airport, about 20-minute drive. So convenient. It seemed it's right smack in the middle of the Central Business District. The International SIM card, tours, van for hire, driver service are all available at the hotel at very affordable prices. The staff were more than accommodating. Welcomed us despite the very late check in at 12midnight and allowed us an hour of late check out. We were upgraded to a Studio Room without an additional cost because the Superior Rooms were all booked. Bigger and i bet not less nicer than the others. Beautiful and hip interiors, all lighting and in-room facilities working and not outdated. The hotel was very clean and we were very comfortable wherever we went in the hotel. Fresh towels and coffee and water were replenished every day. We were not able to take the free shuttle to Legian beach but it was a convenience on hand. We enjoyed the breakfast selections at the open-air restaurant. Anywhere we went in the hotel we were treated to relaxing Bali vibe and music. The place is perfect to rest in after a long day of going around the temples in Bali. It was very relaxing to relax by the pool and so convenient to have the bar to be very close by. Every staff member I passed by greeted me with a heartwarming smile and eagerness to assist. It's impossible to not like the place. I would love to stay in this hotel again when I come back to Bali for a holiday in 2019.

Review_Bahasa: Hotelnya sangat dekat dengan bandara, sekitar 20 menit berkendara. Sangat nyaman. Tampaknya itu tepat di tengah -tengah kawasan pusat bisnis. Kartu SIM Internasional, Tur, Van untuk Dipekerjakan, Layanan Pengemudi semuanya tersedia di hotel dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Staf lebih dari akomodatif. Menyambut kami meskipun sudah terlambat check -in di 12 Malam dan memberi kami satu jam terlambat check out. Kami ditingkatkan ke ruang studio tanpa biaya tambahan karena semua kamar superior dipesan. Lebih besar dan saya bertaruh tidak kurang lebih bagus dari yang lain. Interior yang indah dan keren, semua fasilitas pencahayaan dan di dalam kamar bekerja dan tidak ketinggalan zaman. Hotel ini sangat bersih dan kami sangat nyaman ke mana pun kami pergi ke hotel. Handuk segar dan kopi dan air diisi ulang setiap hari. Kami tidak dapat membawa antar -jemput gratis ke Legian Beach tetapi itu adalah kenyamanan. Kami menikmati pilihan sarapan di restoran terbuka. Di mana saja kami pergi ke hotel, kami disuguhi suasana dan musik Bali yang menenangkan. Tempat ini sempurna untuk beristirahat setelah seharian berkeliling kuil -kuil di Bali. Sangat santai untuk bersantai di tepi kolam renang dan sangat nyaman untuk memiliki bar untuk menjadi sangat dekat. Setiap anggota staf yang saya lewati menyambut saya dengan senyum yang mengharukan dan keinginan untuk membantu. Tidak mungkin untuk tidak menyukai tempat itu. Saya ingin tinggal di hotel ini lagi ketika saya kembali ke Bali untuk liburan di tahun 2019.

Review: Sering banget ke hotel ini karna bawa tour dari jakarta. Tapi untuk solo traveling jg sering. Kamarnya luas, lengkap dan Kolam renang nya chill gitu. Deket ketempat makan. Cuma hotelnya sejajar sama ruko ruko jadi suka bingung gitu kalo awal2 kesini. Tapi untuk semuanya oke banget
Review_English: Very often to this hotel because you bring a tour from Jakarta. But for solo traveling too often. The room is spacious, complete and the pool is chill like that. Close to the place to eat. Only the hotel is parallel to the shophouse shop so he likes to be confused when I first came here. But for everything it's really okay

Dekat dengan tempat makan. Hanya hotel yang sejajar dengan toko shophouse sehingga dia suka bingung ketika saya pertama kali datang ke sini. Tapi untuk semuanya itu benar -benar baik -baik saja

Review: The photos of this hotel are completely false! We arrived late at night.The front of the hotel and surrounds were so rundown. My daughters bed when she pulled the cover back had mould on the sheets. I checked our sheets and they were mouldy too! We booked a room with a view and the view was of a vacant shopping centre which was derelict . The curtains were mouldy too. It was hideous. The hotel layout was like a maze as you tried to find your room. I was so glad to be staying only one night. There are no restaurants anywhere near this hotel within walking distance. You would need a taxi to go anywhere. The vinyl chairs in the room were so uncomfortable. The hotel was very noisy as people moved about the corridors. The air conditioning was not cold enough either. The pool was tiny. This is not a 4 star hotel. The best part was departure.
