Very nice spa wid modest rates... Pool bar was just great experience.... Good food and nice staff except one day when room service was not prompt...
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bagus wid tarif yang masuk akal ... kami tinggal 3 hari di kamar mewah yang baik -baik saja tetapi kemudian bergeser ke ruang keluarga wid bunk bed yang luar biasa ... sangat bagus wid wid tarif sederhana ... biliar bar hanyalah pengalaman hebat .... makanan enak dan staf yang baik kecuali suatu hari ketika layanan kamar tidak cepat ...
Review_Clean: Hotel yang sangat bagus wid tarif yang masuk akal ... kami tinggal 3 hari di kamar mewah yang baik -baik saja tetapi kemudian bergeser ke ruang keluarga wid bunk bed yang luar biasa ... sangat bagus wid wid tarif sederhana ... biliar bar hanyalah pengalaman hebat .... makanan enak dan staf yang baik kecuali suatu hari ketika layanan kamar tidak cepat ...

Review:
Had stay in the month of March. Very pleasant stay and cool ambiance.Booked via the website and got the return airport transfer facility.

Coming to the rooms, we got beside the pool room. Really good room and nice pool view with the nice aroma. Requested for honeymoon surprise and they arranged a small cake with our names on it. They have frequent shuttle service to Kuta beach and it's one of their best services to provide.

Breakfast was good, we from India, struggled a bit to get adjusted for the Balinese food. We're not sure that there was a separate Indian dish on the menu but later came to know that there is one separate dish (paratha with curry / Pancakes (kind of Dosa) for Indians. Really surprised to have such an item on their menu.

As our plan is to roam the Bali city, we didn't get a chance to taste their restaurant recipes. Would like to taste them in future and like to visit as well.

As our plan is to roam the Bali city, we didn't get a chance to taste their restaurant recipes. Would like to taste them in future and like to visit as well.
Review_Bahasa:
Telah tinggal di bulan Maret. Menginaplah yang sangat menyenangkan dan suasana keren. Dipesan melalui situs web dan mendapatkan fasilitas transfer bandara kembali.

Datang ke kamar, kami berada di samping ruang kolam renang. Kamar yang sangat bagus dan pemandangan kolam renang yang bagus dengan aroma yang bagus. Diminta untuk kejutan bulan madu dan mereka mengatur kue kecil dengan nama kami di atasnya. Mereka memiliki layanan antar -jemput yang sering ke Pantai Kuta dan itu adalah salah satu layanan terbaik mereka untuk disediakan.

Sarapan itu enak, kami dari India, berjuang sedikit untuk menyesuaikan diri dengan makanan Bali. Kami tidak yakin ada hidangan India yang terpisah di menu tetapi kemudian mengetahui bahwa ada satu hidangan terpisah (paratha dengan kari / pancake (jenis dosa) untuk orang India. Benar -benar terkejut memiliki barang seperti itu di menu mereka.

Karena rencana kami adalah berkeliaran di Kota Bali, kami tidak mendapatkan kesempatan untuk mencicipi resep restoran mereka. Ingin mencicipinya di masa depan dan juga ingin berkunjung.

Review:
Located at the heart of Kuta its neither too far from the Kuta beach neither too close. However location issues can be given a miss considering they offer free shuttle to Kuta beach & Discovery shopping mall.
Upon arrival initially we were being offered a twin bed room, however upon refusal to take the same they offered a king bed room. Hotel ambience was great though the rooms were a bit on the smaller sized (though not cramped). Pools were also not that big but the highlight was the pool bar with sitting available even inside the pool. Restaurant was big enough with huge sitting area and well spreadout buffet breakfast.
Staff hospitality was awesome.

Review_Bahasa:
Terletak di jantung Kuta tidak terlalu jauh dari pantai Kuta tidak terlalu dekat. Namun masalah lokasi dapat dilewatkan mengingat mereka menawarkan antar -jemput gratis ke Kuta Beach & Discovery Shopping Mall.
Setibanya pada awalnya kami ditawari kamar tidur kembar, namun setelah menolak untuk mengambil hal yang sama, mereka menawarkan kamar tidur king. Suasana hotel sangat bagus meskipun kamar -kamarnya sedikit pada ukuran yang lebih kecil (meskipun tidak sempit). Kolam renang juga tidak sebesar itu, tetapi sorotannya adalah bar kolam renang dengan duduk yang tersedia bahkan di dalam kolam renang. Restoran cukup besar dengan area duduk besar dan sarapan prasmanan yang disuguhi dengan baik.
Keramahtamahan staf itu luar biasa.

Review: I visited the central park hotel in November and first of all it like to thank the staff from the reception to the lads that go about there work maintaing the place everyone always had a smile and had time for you a rare quality the lads at the pool bar were brilliant in the restraunt same in fact 5 stars for all the staff it was a holiday that if you need to relax and just chill and enjoy go there my room was number 143 ideally situated the hotel itself very clean and tidy rooms cleaned every day food really good I could go on and on but i would be hear all night I'll not be able to go back this year but one thing i will be there next year so a real big thank you for everyone there

Review:
We booked 2 rooms for 3 nights on their website with a request of transportation from the hotel to the airport as it was mentioned there were free return airport transfers for 3-nights stay. One of the staff tried to add me on facebook as he went to the airport to pick us up but didn't find us (cos we didn't ask for the pick-up!). He sent me a photo of a paper with my name on it.

Before our last day, we confirmed one man at the front about the free transfer service but when we check-out, the lady told us that we had to pay for the transfer. We had to show them our reservation and talked to them for about 10 minutes. Finally, one of the front staff drove us to the airport. His driving was so fast and scary. He shouted at a couple driving a scooter.

However, the rooms were spacious and clean. The staff at the pool bar and restaurant were helpful and friendly. Breakfast was great and various. We loved fresh pancakes and crepes.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami memesan 2 kamar selama 3 malam di situs web mereka dengan permintaan transportasi dari hotel ke bandara karena disebutkan ada transfer bandara pengembalian gratis untuk menginap 3 malam. Salah satu staf mencoba menambahkan saya di Facebook ketika dia pergi ke bandara untuk menjemput kami tetapi tidak menemukan kami (karena kami tidak meminta pick-up!). Dia mengirimi saya foto kertas dengan nama saya di atasnya.

Sebelum hari terakhir kami, kami mengkonfirmasi satu orang di depan tentang layanan transfer bebas tetapi ketika kami check-out, wanita itu memberi tahu kami bahwa kami harus membayar transfer. Kami harus menunjukkan kepada mereka reservasi kami dan berbicara dengan mereka selama sekitar 10 menit. Akhirnya, salah satu staf depan mengantar kami ke bandara. Mengemudi sangat cepat dan menakutkan. Dia berteriak pada pasangan yang mengendarai skuter.

Namun, kamarnya luas dan bersih. Staf di bar dan restoran biliar sangat membantu dan ramah. Sarapan luar biasa dan beragam. Kami menyukai pancake dan crepes segar.

Review:
I booked a suite room and at first I was angry because they put us in the very end of the corner which is like 200m away from the reception and feels like a great labyrinth (I overreacted but somehow true). The thing is, after a long flight, being asked to walk far away just to find your room is just too much. And the room was too gloomy, so I call the front desk and asked if I can change the room.
So, why did I gave this hotel a 5 star? Because what came after that:
1. the response after my call was fast, the new room was ready in 10mnts.
2. The new room have amaaziiing view to the pool, got a balcony, and much closer to the parking lot.
3. The staffs were very friendly and helpful.
4. I loove their spicy fishball (breakfast)
5. Parking is free (ask the receptionist to stamp your parking ticket)
6. Close to Kuta beach
7. Located in the main road
8. They have children center, and playground.
9. There's a pool for child, but I didn't use it because it's raining all day
10. They have baby cot available by request

So, the conclusion is, ask for a room with close access to the restaurant/pool.

Have a nice holiday :)
Review_English:
I booked a suite room and at first I was angry because they put us in the very end of the corner which is like 200m away from the reception and feels like a great labyrinth (I overreacted but somehow true). The thing is, after a long flight, being asked to walk far away just to find your room is just too much. And the room was too gloomy, so I call the front desk and asked if I can change the room.
So, why did I gave this hotel a 5 star? Because what came after that:
1. the response after my call was fast, the new room was ready in 10mnts.
2. The new room have amaaziiing view to the pool, got a balcony, and much closer to the parking lot.
3. The staffs were very friendly and helpful.
4. I loove their spicy fishball (breakfast)
5. Parking is free (ask the receptionist to stamp your parking ticket)
6. Close to Kuta beach
7. Located in the main road
8. They have children center, and playground.
9. There's a pool for child, but I didn't use it because it's raining all day
10. They have baby cot available by request

So, the conclusion is, ask for a room with close access to the restaurant/pool.

Have a nice holiday :)

Review_Bahasa:
Saya memesan ruang suite dan pada awalnya saya marah karena mereka menempatkan kami di ujung sudut yang berjarak 200 m dari resepsi dan terasa seperti labirin yang hebat (saya bereaksi berlebihan tetapi entah bagaimana benar). Masalahnya, setelah penerbangan yang panjang, diminta berjalan jauh hanya untuk menemukan kamar Anda terlalu banyak. Dan ruangan itu terlalu suram, jadi saya menelepon meja depan dan bertanya apakah saya bisa mengganti ruangan.
Jadi, mengapa saya memberi hotel ini bintang 5? Karena apa yang terjadi setelah itu:
1. Respons setelah panggilan saya cepat, kamar baru sudah siap dalam 10 juta.
2. Kamar baru memiliki pemandangan amaaziiing ke kolam renang, mendapat balkon, dan lebih dekat ke tempat parkir.
3. Para staf sangat ramah dan membantu.
4. Saya menyerang bola ikan pedas mereka (sarapan)
5. Parkir gratis (minta resepsionis untuk mencap tiket parkir Anda)
6. Dekat dengan Pantai Kuta
7. Terletak di jalan utama
8. Mereka memiliki pusat anak, dan taman bermain.
9. Ada kolam untuk anak, tapi saya tidak menggunakannya karena hujan sepanjang hari
10. Mereka memiliki Baby Cot tersedia berdasarkan permintaan

Jadi, kesimpulannya adalah, mintalah kamar dengan akses dekat ke restoran/kolam renang.

Selamat berlibur :)

Review: Got to admit when we first saw the entrance to the hotel we were a bit disappointed as it is located in a row of dilapidated buildings however once into reception we were greeted by the friendliest staff, and the cleanest hotel we have been in for a while, the food in the lotus pond restaurant and the service we received was excellent, all the staff we encountered were very friendly and took time out from their work to talk to us, the only negative is the shuttle bus will take you to the beach or shopping mall but will not come to pick you up which seems strange, occasionally during our 7 night stay we did sometimes hear some guests in the corridors in the early hours shouting but it usually didn't last very long. We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

Review: Just back from 8 days at this hotel which we got amazingly cheap! Hotel is spread over quite an area and rooms are across from reception - ours didn't have a balcony but you can have a room with one if you want to pay slightly more. For us it was a base to explore so not really needed. Nice spacious room, great shower, fridge and 2 bottles of water supplied daily - cleaned daily and generally great. Comfy bed too. The hotel itself is very clean with a lovely restaurant for breakfast which was varied (ask for cereal or bacon) and you can get an evening meal there also. Taxi's always outside (barter!!) and free shuttle to the beach so all transport covered. Pool area lovely - not much room for beds but we never had a problem, I would say this hotel best for a base to explore from but lovely to come back to the bar or have a dip when you want to. I have to mention Silva, Andy, Hendra and Deni who were so lovely!! Friendly, happy to advise on what we should be paying for things/ where is worth going etc. Great members of staff we loved them. Spa lovely and treatments very cheap and worth having.. All in all a great little hotel in lively Kuta - if you are expecting 4/5 star luxury not for you but for the cost to be able to visit the lovely island of Bali definitely worth it.

Review_Bahasa: Baru saja kembali dari 8 hari di hotel ini yang sangat murah! Hotel tersebar di area yang cukup dan kamar berada di seberang resepsi - kami tidak memiliki balkon tetapi Anda dapat memiliki kamar dengan satu jika Anda ingin membayar sedikit lebih banyak. Bagi kami itu adalah basis untuk dijelajahi sehingga tidak benar -benar dibutuhkan. Kamar luas yang bagus, pancuran besar, lemari es, dan 2 botol air yang disediakan setiap hari - dibersihkan setiap hari dan umumnya hebat. Tempat tidur yang nyaman juga. Hotel itu sendiri sangat bersih dengan restoran yang indah untuk sarapan yang bervariasi (minta sereal atau bacon) dan Anda bisa makan malam di sana juga. Taksi selalu di luar (barter !!) dan antar -jemput gratis ke pantai sehingga semua transportasi tertutup. Area kolam renang yang indah - tidak banyak ruang untuk tempat tidur tetapi kami tidak pernah memiliki masalah, saya akan mengatakan hotel ini yang terbaik untuk dijelajahi pangkalan tetapi menyenangkan untuk kembali ke bar atau berenang saat Anda mau. Saya harus menyebutkan Silva, Andy, Hendra dan Deni yang sangat cantik !! Ramah, dengan senang hati memberi tahu apa yang harus kita bayar untuk barang -barang/ di mana layak pergi dll. Anggota staf hebat yang kami cintai. Spa yang indah dan perawatan sangat murah dan layak dimiliki .. Semua dalam semua hotel kecil yang hebat di Lively Kuta - jika Anda mengharapkan kemewahan bintang 4/5 bukan untuk Anda tetapi untuk biaya untuk dapat mengunjungi pulau Bali yang indah pasti sepadan.

Review:
We stayed at Kuta Central Park 13th November - 20th November. When checking in the staff were very helpful and accommodating. We were advised that our room did not have a balcony which we were disappointed about at first but it wasn't an issue as the week went on. We were bed and breakfast and there was a decent selection including toast, omelettes as well as traditional Indonesian food. Our room was at the back of the hotel backing on to a street, which was noisy at times but it didn't disrupt us at night.

We hired a driver through the hotel reception to take us to some trips on our final day, and Tony our driver was great. This service only cost £30 for 6 hours and we were taken wherever we wanted. Our driver spoke excellent English and gave us a lot of useful information. The hotel was located around a 30 minute walk from the beach which we preferred as it was nice and quiet, whereas the beach seemed quite loud at night. Getting a taxi from the hotel was never an issue and cost roughly £3 to the beach. There are also restaurants and bars also a 2 minute walk over the road if you didn't want to venture far. Would definitely return if visiting Kuta again.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami tinggal di Kuta Central Park 13 November - 20 November. Saat memeriksa staf sangat membantu dan akomodatif. Kami disarankan agar kamar kami tidak memiliki balkon yang kami kecewa pada awalnya tetapi itu bukan masalah seiring berjalannya waktu. Kami tidur dan sarapan dan ada pilihan yang layak termasuk roti panggang, omelet serta makanan tradisional Indonesia. Kamar kami berada di belakang hotel yang mendukung jalanan, yang kadang -kadang berisik tetapi tidak mengganggu kami di malam hari.

Kami menyewa pengemudi melalui resepsi hotel untuk membawa kami ke beberapa perjalanan di hari terakhir kami, dan Tony sopir kami hebat. Layanan ini hanya berharga £ 30 selama 6 jam dan kami dibawa ke mana pun kami inginkan. Sopir kami berbicara bahasa Inggris yang sangat baik dan memberi kami banyak informasi yang berguna. Hotel ini terletak sekitar 30 menit berjalan kaki dari pantai yang kami sukai karena bagus dan tenang, sedangkan pantai tampak cukup keras di malam hari. Mendapatkan taksi dari hotel tidak pernah menjadi masalah dan biaya sekitar £ 3 ke pantai. Ada juga restoran dan bar juga 2 menit berjalan kaki di jalan jika Anda tidak ingin menjelajah jauh. Pasti akan kembali jika mengunjungi Kuta lagi.

Review:
Hotel ini letaknya ditengah kota, Sangat mudah menemukan makanan di sekitar hotel. Jarak ke pantai kuta pun tidak jauh.
Exteriornya memang tidak menarik, terlebih ketika saya berjalan menuju kamar hotel dari bagian frontliner, agak aneh karena melewati jalanan ruko.
Tapi begitu sampai dikamar, semua yang kami butuhkan telah disediakan. Walaupun hotel ini terlihat agak tua dan membingungkan tapi kamarnya rapih, bersih dan memberikan kami cukup ruang.
AC bekerja dengan baik, tidak ada kendala pada kamar mandi.
Peralatan dikamar mandi disediakan lengkap dan dalam keadaan baik.
Sayangnya walaupun hotel ini menyediakan banyak pilihan untuk breakfast dengan model buffet, rasa makanannya tidak cocok dengan kami. Untungnya ada roti & omelette yang disediakan :) cukup untuk mengganjal perut hingga kami melahap brunch di luar hotel.
Oh ya, mereka juga menyediakan kolam renang di area outdoor.
Review_English:
This hotel is located in the middle of the city, it is very easy to find food around the hotel. The distance to Kuta Beach is not far.
The exterior is indeed not interesting, especially when I walked to the hotel room from the frontliner, a bit strange because it passed the streets of the shop.
But once in the room, everything we need has been provided. Although this hotel looks rather old and confusing, but the room is neat, clean and gives us enough space.
AC works well, there are no obstacles in the bathroom.
The bathroom equipment is provided complete and in good condition.
Unfortunately, although this hotel provides many choices for breakfast with a buffet model, the taste of the food is not suitable for us. Fortunately there is bread & omelette provided :) Enough to prop up the stomach until we devour the brunch outside the hotel.
Oh yes, they also provide a swimming pool in the outdoor area.
Review_Summary:
This hotel is located in the middle of the city, it is very easy to find food around the hotel. The distance to Kuta Beach is not far.
The exterior is indeed not interesting, especially when I walked to the hotel room from the frontliner, a bit strange because it passed the streets of the shop.
But once in the room, everything we need has been provided. Although this hotel looks rather old and confusing, but the room is neat, clean and gives us enough space.
AC works well, there are no obstacles in the bathroom.
The bathroom equipment is provided complete and in good condition.
Unfortunately, although this hotel provides many choices for breakfast with a buffet model, the taste of the food is not suitable for us. Fortunately there is bread & omelette provided :) Enough to prop up the stomach until we devour the brunch outside the hotel.
Oh yes, they also provide a swimming pool in the outdoor area.
Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini terletak di tengah kota, sangat mudah untuk menemukan makanan di sekitar hotel. Jarak ke Pantai Kuta tidak jauh.
Eksteriornya memang tidak menarik, terutama ketika saya berjalan ke kamar hotel dari frontliner, agak aneh karena melewati jalanan toko.
Tapi sekali di ruangan, semua yang kita butuhkan telah disediakan. Meskipun hotel ini terlihat agak tua dan membingungkan, tetapi kamarnya rapi, bersih dan memberi kita ruang yang cukup.
AC bekerja dengan baik, tidak ada hambatan di kamar mandi.
Peralatan kamar mandi disediakan lengkap dan dalam kondisi baik.
Sayangnya, meskipun hotel ini menyediakan banyak pilihan untuk sarapan dengan model prasmanan, rasa makanan tidak cocok untuk kita. Untungnya ada roti & omelet yang disediakan :) Cukup untuk menopang perut sampai kita melahap makan siang di luar hotel.
Oh ya, mereka juga menyediakan kolam renang di area luar ruangan.

Lovely hotel and great value for money, only observation was restaurant staff not very attentive in the evening waiting almost 45mins for ice cream, however apart from that and WiFi didn’t work much in the room

Facilities were also brilliant!
Really enjoyed my stay and will 100% be back next year for longer!

Until next time bali ✌🏼❤️

Review:
Stayed here from 6th-13th November.
When we checked in was advised there was a problem with our room and it would not be available until the next day.
Given another room the following day at other end of second floor with pool view.
We enjoyed our stay, staff go out of their way to make you feel welcome. Good air con and choice of channels on t.v.
Room service menu had good choices. BBQ night was good as well.
Have to say a very big thank you to Adam in the restaurant who helped my other half plan a surprise birthday dinner ☺️
Overall a good stay and we hope to return.

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di sini dari 6-13 November.
Ketika kami check -in disarankan ada masalah dengan kamar kami dan itu tidak akan tersedia sampai hari berikutnya.
Diberi kamar lain pada hari berikutnya di ujung lain lantai dua dengan pemandangan kolam renang.
Kami menikmati masa tinggal kami, staf berusaha keras untuk membuat Anda merasa diterima. Good Air Con dan Pilihan Saluran di T.V.
Menu layanan kamar memiliki pilihan yang bagus. BBQ Night juga bagus.
Harus mengucapkan terima kasih yang sangat besar kepada Adam di restoran yang membantu setengah merencanakan makan malam ulang tahun kejutan ☺️
Secara keseluruhan tinggal yang baik dan kami berharap untuk kembali.

Review:
Booked 2 Deluxe rooms for 10 nights and was very happy.
Staff very friendly & helpful - room cleaned every day with fresh towels etc.
Breakfast good with plenty of choice.
Bar staff at the pool bar are very good.
Would stay here again if lucky enough to get the opportunity to visit Bali again.

Review_Bahasa:
Memesan 2 kamar mewah selama 10 malam dan sangat senang.
Staf sangat ramah & membantu - kamar dibersihkan setiap hari dengan handuk segar dll.
Sarapan enak dengan banyak pilihan.
Staf bar di bon bar sangat bagus.
Akan tinggal di sini lagi jika cukup beruntung untuk mendapatkan kesempatan untuk mengunjungi Bali lagi.

Subjeck: Worse trip to Bali on the 7th times..
Review:
I have been to bali a couple of times and this time i booked 4 rooms for my family in this hotel from 11-15 Sept and sadly there are a few bad reviews i need to bring up during my stay.
1.We made advance booking an indicated that we need an early check in for one of the room which we don’t mind paying extra as it is for my father in law who is 76 years old we did not received any reply from the hotel and upon arriving was told there was no room available well that is still ok but we finally checked into our rooms at 3.30pm???!!!shouldnt we be checking in at 2pm??
2.And on the second last day there were renovation works beside our room and the front office guys did not even have the courtesy to inform us of the matter in advance and my wife have to call them up telling them about the noise only than they start sending flyers to all the rooms to inform of the inconvenienced and only after an hour we were then changed to another room.
3.My wife paid and attended the cooking class on the final day and upon completion she was supposed to get her completion certificate and was told it will be ready at 5pm and when we checked out at 6pm my wife asked for her cert and was told to wait for another 10mins by the FO and after 20mins still no sign of her getting her cert and we decided to just forget it.
4.Last and not least we called the FO to send a porter to our room as we were checking out and we waited for 30mins and i called again and spoke in bahasa Indonesia as i am able to converse in it and guess what!!Finally a room boy came up and brought us a bottle of water!!!!porter water get it..I don’t know wether to bang my head on the wall or stand there laughing myself out..so Kuta Central Park Management buck the hell up!!! or you are gonna lose alot of guests patronising your hotel just as u lose one regular bali guy in me..
Review_English:
I have been to bali a couple of times and this time i booked 4 rooms for my family in this hotel from 11-15 Sept and sadly there are a few bad reviews i need to bring up during my stay.
1.We made advance booking an indicated that we need an early check in for one of the room which we don’t mind paying extra as it is for my father in law who is 76 years old we did not received any reply from the hotel and upon arriving was told there was no room available well that is still ok but we finally checked into our rooms at 3.30pm???!!!shouldnt we be checking in at 2pm??

4.Last and not least we called the FO to send a porter to our room as we were checking out and we waited for 30mins and i called again and spoke in bahasa Indonesia as i am able to converse in it and guess what!!Finally a room boy came up and brought us a bottle of water!!!!porter water get it..I don’t know wether to bang my head on the wall or stand there laughing myself out..so Kuta Central Park Management buck the hell up!!! or you are gonna lose alot of guests patronising your hotel just as u lose one regular bali guy in me..
Review_Summary: Kuta Central Park Management buck the hell up!!! or you are gonna lose alot of guests patronising your hotel just as u lose one regular bali guy in me. I don't know wether to bang my head on the wall or stand there laughing myself out.
Review_Bahasa:
Saya telah ke Bali beberapa kali dan kali ini saya memesan 4 kamar untuk keluarga saya di hotel ini dari 11-15 September dan sayangnya ada beberapa ulasan buruk yang perlu saya kemukakan selama saya tinggal.
1.kami membuat pemesanan di muka menunjukkan bahwa kami memerlukan check -in lebih awal untuk salah satu ruangan yang kami tidak keberatan membayar ekstra seperti halnya ayah mertua saya yang berusia 76 tahun kami tidak menerima balasan dari hotel dan setelah tiba, tidak ada ruang yang tersedia dengan baik yang masih baik -baik saja tetapi kami akhirnya check -in ke kamar kami pada pukul 3.30 sore ???
2.dan pada hari kedua terakhir ada pekerjaan renovasi di samping kamar kami dan orang -orang depan bahkan tidak memiliki kesopanan untuk memberi tahu kami tentang masalah ini sebelumnya dan istri saya harus memanggil mereka untuk memberi tahu mereka tentang kebisingan hanya daripada mereka mulai mengirim selebaran ke semua kamar untuk menginformasikan tentang yang tidak nyaman dan hanya setelah satu jam kami kemudian diubah ke ruangan lain.
3. Istri saya membayar dan menghadiri kelas memasak pada hari terakhir dan setelah selesai dia seharusnya mendapatkan sertifikat penyelesaiannya dan diberitahu itu akan siap pada jam 5 sore dan ketika kami check out jam 6 sore, istri saya meminta sertifikatnya dan diberitahu untuk menunggu 10 menit lagi oleh FO dan setelah 20 menit masih belum ada tanda -tanda dia mendapatkan sertifikat dan kami memutuskan untuk melupakannya.
4. Terkecam dan paling tidak kami memanggil FO untuk mengirim porter ke kamar kami saat kami check out dan kami menunggu selama 30 menit dan saya menelepon lagi dan berbicara di Bahasa Indonesia karena saya bisa berkomunikasi di dalamnya dan menebak apa !! Akhirnya seorang anak laki -laki datang dan membawa sebotol air !!! Atau Anda akan kehilangan banyak tamu yang melindungi hotel Anda sama seperti Anda kehilangan satu pria Bali biasa dalam diri saya ..

Review:
BBQ DINNER @ LOTUS POND Cafe with my WIFE.. The food was delicious Of High quality, well presented. The staff were attentive especially ADAM. HE was super friendly, and attentive to all our needs. Nothing was too much trouble for him and he had time to check upon us at spaced intervals and had a small chat and made sure we had everything we needed.
The overall product and experience was to a very high standard. Definetly A Star experience. Kudos To WINA, LUCKY,HENRY, HENDRA & SILVER they are assets of this Hotel
They Have not much selection but The EXPERIENCE AND THE QUALITY of the food is the BEST part 🤙🤙🤙

Breakfast is basic and suited to asian guests. Mainly indian and asian guests. Pool is small. Hotel has Nothing for kids over 5yrs old.

Review:
The Kuta central park is situated 3kms from kuta beach and 30 mins drive from international airport.
The rooms are good but all the rooms dont have a balcony which is not good for people with suffocation problem.
Pool was great with a pool bar. But it was open only till 10 pm
The hotel cafeteria and restaurant closes at 10 which isn't good.
The breakfast buffet was great with variety of cuisines and the best part it had a seperate section for vegetarian food with indian options.
The location is good nearby many food streets and mini mart stores which are open 24 hours.
The hotel staff was good and helpful.
It was a decent stay.

The hotel cafeteria and restaurant closes at 10 which isn't good.
The breakfast buffet was great with variety of cuisines and the best part it had a seperate section for vegetarian food with indian options.
The location is good nearby many food streets and mini mart stores which are open 24 hours.
The hotel staff was good and helpful.
It was a decent stay.
Review_Summary:
The Kuta central park is situated 3kms from kuta beach and 30 mins drive from international airport.
The rooms are good but all the rooms dont have a balcony which is not good for people with suffocation problem.
Pool was great with a pool bar. But it was open only till 10 pm
The hotel cafeteria and restaurant closes at 10 which isn't good.
The breakfast buffet was great with variety of cuisines and the best part it had a seperate section for vegetarian food with indian options.
The location is good nearby many food streets and mini mart stores which are open 24 hours.
The hotel staff was good and helpful.
It was a decent stay.
Review_Bahasa:
Kuta Central Park terletak 3 km dari Kuta Beach dan 30 menit berkendara dari Bandara Internasional.
Kamar -kamarnya bagus tetapi semua kamar tidak memiliki balkon yang tidak baik untuk orang dengan masalah mati lemas.
Kolam renang sangat bagus dengan bar kolam renang. Tapi itu hanya terbuka sampai jam 10 malam
Kafetaria dan restoran hotel ditutup pada 10 yang tidak bagus.
Sarapan prasmanan sangat enak dengan berbagai masakan dan bagian terbaiknya memiliki bagian terpisah untuk makanan vegetarian dengan pilihan India.
Lokasi baik di dekatnya banyak jalan makanan dan toko mini mart yang buka 24 jam.
Staf hotel baik dan membantu.
Itu adalah masa tinggal yang layak.

Review: Stayed here in June 2017 and we booked the Standard Triple Room. The rooms were nice and clean too. They have a nice pool with a poolside bar as well. We took the option with buffet breakfast and they offer a good variety. Overall a good stay at Kuta Central Park!

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di sini pada Juni 2017 dan kami memesan Ruang Tiga Standar. Kamar -kamarnya bagus dan bersih juga. Mereka memiliki kolam renang yang bagus dengan bar di tepi kolam renang juga. Kami mengambil pilihan dengan sarapan prasmanan dan mereka menawarkan variasi yang baik. Secara keseluruhan tinggal yang baik di Kuta Central Park!

Review: Staff very friendly. But if you value privacy and sleep forget it. Pictures are deceiving and there is a reason places say non-refundable 9 times out of 10 its guaranteed to be a disappointment. we spent $100 per night for 3 nights and although staff were attempting to be accommodating towards us we decided to leave a day early without a refund people partying outside our room and sitting on our outdoor chairs untill early hours of the morning the place is alive with noise yelling and screaming kids and adults. A very sad end to our 2 week holiday in Bali. This end of town is not much of a holiday destination.

Review_Bahasa: Staf sangat ramah. Tetapi jika Anda menghargai privasi dan tidur, lupakan saja. Gambar menipu dan ada alasan tempat mengatakan tidak dapat dikembalikan 9 kali dari 10 dijamin akan mengecewakan. Kami menghabiskan $ 100 per malam selama 3 malam dan meskipun staf berusaha untuk mengakomodasi kami, kami memutuskan untuk pergi sehari lebih awal tanpa pengembalian dana orang berpesta di luar kamar kami dan duduk di kursi luar kami sampai dini hari, tempat itu masih hidup dengan suara berteriak dan berteriak anak -anak dan orang dewasa. Akhir yang sangat menyedihkan untuk liburan 2 minggu kami di Bali. Akhir kota ini bukan tujuan liburan.

Review: Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per 10 giorni la nostra stanza era ampia e abbastanza pulita, gli asciugamani venivano cambiati tutti i giorni. La colazione a buffet molto abbondante. Attenzione però nel locale piscina si avvistano blatte giganti!Personale gentilissimo come tutti i balinesi. Hotel a 10 minuti dal mare e dalla zona dei locali. Consigliamo di affittare lo scooter dai ragazzi al parcheggio dell'hotel.
Review_English: We stayed in this hotel for 10 days our room was large and clean enough, the towels were changed every day. Very abundant buffet breakfast. But be careful in the local swimming pool, giants blitks are warned! Very kind staff like all the Balinese. Hotel 10 minutes from the sea and the area of ​​the premises. We recommend renting the scooter from the boys to the hotel parking.

But be careful in the local swimming pool, giants blitks are warned! Very kind staff like all the Balinese. Hotel 10 minutes from the sea and the area of ​​the premises. We recommend renting the scooter from the boys to the hotel parking.
Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di hotel ini selama 10 hari kamar kami besar dan cukup bersih, handuk diubah setiap hari. Sarapan prasmanan yang sangat berlimpah. Tapi hati -hati di kolam renang setempat, raksasa blitks diperingatkan! Staf yang sangat baik menyukai semua orang Bali. Hotel 10 menit dari laut dan area tempat. Kami merekomendasikan menyewa skuter dari anak laki -laki ke parkir hotel.

Review: Room feels old especially the shower. There's nothing really special about this hotel. It doesn't have any character or in other word not charming at all. Staff is great. The breakfast buffet is good. Location is far from the beach and you need transportation to go anywhere. Unless you want to walk for 45 minutes to get to the beach.

Sarapan prasmanan bagus. Lokasi jauh dari pantai dan Anda perlu transportasi untuk pergi ke mana pun. Kecuali jika Anda ingin berjalan selama 45 menit untuk sampai ke pantai.

Review: Very clean and pleasant place. Wonderful breakfast, restaurant on site, family friendly and wonderful staff who is always willing to help. Great value for money and central location. Overall, excellent service ❤️.
Review_English: Very clean and pleasant place. Wonderful breakfast, restaurant on site, family friendly and wonderful staff who is always willing to help. Great value for money and central location. Overall, excellent service ❤️.

Review_Bahasa: Tempat yang sangat bersih dan menyenangkan. Sarapan yang luar biasa, restoran di lokasi, staf yang ramah keluarga dan luar biasa yang selalu bersedia membantu. Nilai besar untuk uang dan lokasi pusat. Secara keseluruhan, layanan yang sangat baik ❤️.

Review: I booked a last-minute surf trip to Bali and as it was only two days thought I would stay at a resort closer to the airport. Kuta it was and this hotel caught my eye...sure the reviews are mixed so when booking took some of the bad ones into consideration...made sure I booked a room with windows and that I sussed out the path to the beach before-hand. On approach I was a bit wary as it looked small...but this place is like the Tardis...you go inside and it get's bigger and bigger. Everything was very clean and the staff made the visit...all were ultra polite and friendly. I managed to get some amazing spa treatments in and the breakfast was substantial and really good. A few down sides, I like walking through city streets so didn't mind the 1.7 km walk to the beach and back (Kuta beach is beautiful)...but if you don't like tropical walking I suggest you hire a bike or get a taxi. There is only one shuttle per day to the beach and to the mall so if you don't want to walk you will need to consider this. The food was good, but the restaurant food was not as good as breakfast. I was there from a Sunday to Wednesday so there really wasn't much of a party atmosphere which is nice if you are with the family...as noted the staff totally made the experience and just for that I would give it an excellent. Worth a stay :)

Review_Bahasa: Saya memesan perjalanan selancar menit terakhir ke Bali dan karena hanya dua hari yang mengira saya akan tinggal di resor yang lebih dekat ke bandara. Kuta Itu dan hotel ini menarik perhatian saya ... yakin ulasannya dicampur sehingga ketika pemesanan mempertimbangkan beberapa yang buruk ... pastikan saya memesan kamar dengan jendela dan bahwa saya menyingkirkan jalan menuju pantai sebelumnya. Pada pendekatan saya agak waspada karena terlihat kecil ... tapi tempat ini seperti tardis ... Anda masuk ke dalam dan menjadi lebih besar dan lebih besar. Semuanya sangat bersih dan staf melakukan kunjungan ... semuanya sangat sopan dan ramah. Saya berhasil mendapatkan beberapa perawatan spa yang luar biasa dan sarapan sangat besar dan sangat bagus. Beberapa sisi, saya suka berjalan melalui jalan -jalan kota jadi tidak keberatan dengan 1,7 km berjalan ke pantai dan kembali (pantai Kuta itu indah) ... tetapi jika Anda tidak suka berjalan tropis, saya sarankan Anda menyewa sepeda atau mendapatkan taksi. Hanya ada satu antar -jemput per hari ke pantai dan ke mal jadi jika Anda tidak ingin berjalan, Anda perlu mempertimbangkan ini. Makanannya enak, tetapi makanan restoran tidak sebagus sarapan. Saya ada di sana dari hari Minggu hingga Rabu sehingga benar -benar tidak ada banyak suasana pesta yang menyenangkan jika Anda bersama keluarga ... seperti yang dicatat staf benar -benar membuat pengalaman dan hanya untuk itu saya akan memberikannya yang luar biasa. Layak tinggal :)

Layak tinggal

Review: We had 5 night stay at this hotel during our visit to Bali. Our check in was very smooth booked through Booking.com. We never had a problem during check-in even though our flight to Bali was been delay. The hotel staff was very friendly and we can get pleasant smile from each and everyone of them. That is very good. The hotel and the room is clean. The breakfast and the food was good. We had a happy and pleasant holiday at Bali. Thanks to the hotel staffs which makes our holiday more better.

Review: Stayed in this hotel for a week.service good food better than most places .rooms were clean and comfortable.very centrally located hotel.would recommend anyone for a pleasant and enjoyable stay.only breakfast was basic and no changes.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di hotel ini selama seminggu. Layanan makanan enak lebih baik daripada kebanyakan tempat. Kamar bersih dan nyaman.
Review_Clean: Tinggal di hotel ini selama seminggu. Layanan makanan enak lebih baik daripada kebanyakan tempat. Kamar bersih dan nyaman.

Review:
As we checked in to Kuta Central Park Hotel we were surprised by all the cockroach running over our feeds at the Check inn area and staff just kicked them by the feet away. Even though we got a upgrade because the standard rooms have been full, the upgrade room didn't had a window and it felt like staying in the cellar . The restaurant for dinner is average and the breakfast buffet serves big range of food. I would prefer to see buffets with a protection glass for sneezing Chinese guest.
The only reason i choose this hotel was about the Gym. On the pictures the gym looked amazing, but after finding out, the gym is a glass box with full attention of all eating customers in the restaurant.... helloooo? Stupid idea of the architect.
All in one it is not more then a 3 Star Hotel with handling of large groups

Review_Bahasa:
Ketika kami check -in ke Kuta Central Park Hotel, kami terkejut dengan semua kecoa yang menabrak feed kami di area Check Inn dan staf hanya menendang mereka dengan kaki. Meskipun kami mendapat peningkatan karena kamar standar sudah penuh, ruang peningkatan tidak memiliki jendela dan rasanya seperti tinggal di ruang bawah tanah. Restoran untuk makan malam rata -rata dan sarapan prasmanan menyajikan berbagai macam makanan. Saya lebih suka melihat prasmanan dengan gelas perlindungan untuk tamu Cina bersin.
Satu -satunya alasan saya memilih hotel ini adalah tentang gym. Pada gambar gym tampak luar biasa, tetapi setelah mengetahuinya, gym adalah kotak kaca dengan perhatian penuh semua pelanggan makan di restoran .... Helloooo? Ide bodoh tentang arsitek.
Semua dalam satu itu tidak lebih dari hotel bintang 3 dengan penanganan kelompok besar

Review:
Stayed for 1 night as our flight came in very late ; hotal was o.k but needs an update and so do the rooms, the gym is limited and not maintained. The breakfast was tasty with a alot of varity. staff could of been more helpful as they watched me carry 2 large luggage cases, and did not offer to help or get trolley.

Located 5 min drive from the main strip; so you still have the party people partying till late at the hotel..... we were woken buy a large group of girls running around in the hallways and slaming doors for 2 hours at 5am.. not the best if your looking for a good nights kip after a long flight....

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal selama 1 malam saat penerbangan kami datang sangat terlambat; Hotal adalah O.K tetapi membutuhkan pembaruan dan begitu juga kamar, gym terbatas dan tidak terawat. Sarapan itu enak dengan banyak varitas. Staf bisa lebih membantu karena mereka menyaksikan saya membawa 2 wadah bagasi besar, dan tidak menawarkan untuk membantu atau mendapatkan troli.

Terletak 5 menit berkendara dari strip utama; Jadi Anda masih memiliki orang -orang pesta yang berpesta sampai larut malam di hotel ..... kami terbangun membeli sekelompok besar gadis yang berlarian di lorong -lorong dan membanting pintu selama 2 jam jam 5 pagi .. bukan yang terbaik jika Anda mencari kip malam yang baik setelah penerbangan panjang ....

Subjeck: Suitable for group travelers looking for cheap and good hotel
Review:
One of our reason to choose this hotel is the price which is very reasonable (or cheap) comparing with the hotel quality. So it is no wonder we find many group travelers stay there. Their bus and cars are parked in the large parking lot near to the hotel.
The cleanliness, food and services are good.
Our most favorite place is the swimming pool. Although it is not large but It has beautiful design. We recommend you to stay in rooms that has direct access to the pool.

The cleanliness, food and services are good.
Our most favorite place is the swimming pool. Although it is not large but It has beautiful design. We recommend you to stay in rooms that has direct access to the pool.

The cleanliness, food and services are good.
Our most favorite place is the swimming pool. Although it is not large but It has beautiful design. We recommend you to stay in rooms that has direct access to the pool.
Review_Bahasa:
Salah satu alasan kami untuk memilih hotel ini adalah harga yang sangat masuk akal (atau murah) dibandingkan dengan kualitas hotel. Jadi tidak heran kami menemukan banyak pelancong kelompok tinggal di sana. Bus dan mobil mereka diparkir di tempat parkir besar dekat hotel.
Kebersihan, makanan, dan layanannya baik.
Tempat paling favorit kami adalah kolam renang. Meskipun tidak besar tetapi memiliki desain yang indah. Kami menyarankan Anda untuk tinggal di kamar yang memiliki akses langsung ke kolam renang.

Review: Although our room (family room) doesn't have window but still okay since most of the day we are outside busy roaming around bali, what i like the most was that they really had a good customer service we checked in very early since we arrived early too, we need to wake up and go out 1:30am for the trekking so we requested packed food for breakfast and so they made it for us, anyway i will stay again next time i'll visit Bali.

Review_Bahasa: Meskipun kamar kami (ruang keluarga) tidak memiliki jendela tetapi masih baik -baik saja karena sebagian besar hari kami berada di luar sibuk berkeliaran di sekitar Bali, yang paling saya sukai adalah bahwa mereka benar -benar memiliki layanan pelanggan yang baik yang kami periksa lebih awal sejak kami tiba lebih awal juga, kami harus bangun dan pergi keluar 1:30 untuk tinggal di waktu berikutnya.

Review:
I was staying for 2 nights at Kuta Central Park Hotel during.for a business meeting at the hotel. It was actually an abandoned shopping arcade turned into a hotel.

🌟🌟🌟 Location
Although the name conveys the famous beach, it's actually a bit off from anywhere. The beach is a 1.5 km away from the hotel, and Legian night spots is about 1 km.

🌟🌟 Room
The room looks more like a hostel rather than a 4-star hotel. The tiles, walls, and furniture looks cheap. Although considerably big, my room has no window at all. The room smells moldy. I've seen many budget hotels of better quality.

🌟🌟 Food
Breakfast, lunch, and dinner buffet consist of a varieties of local and western food, but they are all of a low quality. I actually preferred the hotel provide fewer options but of better quality.

🌟🌟🌟Cleanliness
Cleanliness can be a lot improved. The bedsheet is spotless but looks worn out. I am not sure if my bed was clean enough since I got ithches when I woke up.

🌟🌟🌟🌟 Amenities
The room is provided with generous quantity of amenities: water, tea, coffee, kettle, fridge. Bathroom amenities include shower gel, shampoo, soap, toothbrush. They are yet of subpar quality.

🌟🌟🌟🌟 Service
Hotel staff are generally friendly and responsive.

🌟🌟🌟🌟Price
If you book directly to the hotel website it will cost a decent price of USD30 a night. If you book thru other sites, then you will be sorry for having spending your dollars.

Conclusion:
With the budget, a solo traveller may consider other premises closer to the hotspots.
A family with tight budget might like this place considering the size of the room.

Review_Summary: Kuta Central Park Hotel was actually an abandoned shopping arcade turned into a hotel. The room looks more like a hostel rather than a 4-star hotel. Although considerably big, my room has no window at all. The beach is a 1.5 km away from the hotel.
Review_Bahasa:
Saya menginap selama 2 malam di Kuta Central Park Hotel selama pertemuan bisnis di hotel. Sebenarnya itu adalah arcade perbelanjaan yang ditinggalkan berubah menjadi hotel.

🌟🌟🌟 Lokasi
Meskipun namanya menyampaikan pantai yang terkenal, itu sebenarnya sedikit dari mana saja. Pantai berjarak 1,5 km dari hotel, dan bintik -bintik malam Legian berjarak sekitar 1 km.

🌟🌟 Kamar
Kamar lebih mirip asrama daripada hotel bintang 4. Ubin, dinding, dan furnitur terlihat murah. Meskipun sangat besar, kamar saya tidak memiliki jendela sama sekali. Kamar berbau berjamur. Saya telah melihat banyak hotel anggaran dengan kualitas yang lebih baik.

🌟🌟 Makanan
Prasmanan sarapan, makan siang, dan makan malam terdiri dari berbagai makanan lokal dan barat, tetapi semuanya berkualitas rendah. Saya sebenarnya lebih suka hotel memberikan lebih sedikit pilihan tetapi berkualitas lebih baik.

🌟🌟🌟 Kecepatan
Kebersihan bisa sangat ditingkatkan. Lembar tidur bersih tapi terlihat usang. Saya tidak yakin apakah tempat tidur saya cukup bersih karena saya mendapatkan ithch ketika saya bangun.

🌟🌟🌟🌟 Fasilitas
Kamar ini dilengkapi dengan fasilitas dalam jumlah besar: air, teh, kopi, ketel, lemari es. Fasilitas kamar mandi termasuk gel shower, sampo, sabun, sikat gigi. Mereka belum memiliki kualitas di bawah standar.

🌟🌟🌟🌟 Layanan
Staf hotel umumnya ramah dan responsif.

🌟🌟🌟🌟 harga
Jika Anda memesan langsung ke situs web hotel, harganya harganya sebesar USD30 per malam. Jika Anda memesan melalui situs lain, maka Anda akan minta maaf karena telah menghabiskan dolar.

Kesimpulan:
Dengan anggaran, seorang pelancong solo dapat mempertimbangkan tempat lain yang lebih dekat ke hotspot.
Keluarga dengan anggaran yang ketat mungkin menyukai tempat ini mengingat ukuran ruangan.

Review:
We booked this hotel based on the wonderful pictures on the website and recommended by our travel company and also because it had 4 stars.
We arrived to find our rooms were like dungeons, no windows and no balcony, very dark and smelling of stale air.
We upgraded to a balcony room even though we were told that the hotel was full and no spare rooms available when we said that we wasn't paying. Amazing what happens when you offer to pay as your so tired that you just want to sleep!
This is not a 4 star hotel, more a 3 star and that's only because the staff are friendly apart from reception who want to charge you for everything, even a mug that broke when putting hot water into it!
The breakfast is very strange for Europeans as it's rice, noodles etc based on their Asian customers. We found out 3 days later that you can have cereal, eggs, butter pats etc by asking, but this is not known as there are no details on the tables to let you know.
Very central for the beach and other shops etc.
Ideal if you are in a budget and want a place to sleep and as a base.
Not ideal if you are expecting a 4 star hotel.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami memesan hotel ini berdasarkan foto -foto indah di situs web dan direkomendasikan oleh perusahaan perjalanan kami dan juga karena memiliki 4 bintang.
Kami tiba untuk menemukan kamar kami seperti ruang bawah tanah, tidak ada jendela dan tidak ada balkon, sangat gelap dan berbau udara basi.
Kami meningkatkan ke kamar balkon meskipun kami diberitahu bahwa hotel itu penuh dan tidak ada kamar cadangan yang tersedia ketika kami mengatakan bahwa kami tidak membayar. Luar biasa apa yang terjadi ketika Anda menawarkan untuk membayar karena Anda sangat lelah sehingga Anda hanya ingin tidur!
Ini bukan hotel bintang 4, lebih merupakan bintang 3 dan itu hanya karena staf ramah selain dari resepsi yang ingin menagih Anda untuk semuanya, bahkan cangkir yang pecah saat memasukkan air panas ke dalamnya!
Sarapan sangat aneh bagi orang Eropa karena nasi, mie dll berdasarkan pelanggan Asia mereka. Kami menemukan 3 hari kemudian bahwa Anda dapat memiliki sereal, telur, tepukan mentega dll dengan bertanya, tetapi ini tidak dikenal karena tidak ada detail di meja untuk memberi tahu Anda.
Sangat sentral untuk pantai dan toko -toko lain dll.
Ideal jika Anda dalam anggaran dan ingin tempat tidur dan sebagai basis.
Tidak ideal jika Anda mengharapkan hotel bintang 4.

Review: Neat n clean,gives a luxurious feeling to the middle income group.Amazing pool ambience.fantastic spread of breakfast,though it might get boring if u are there for more than 3 days.nice staff n service.we were a family of 4 and enjoyed our stay

Review_Bahasa: Rapi dan bersih, memberikan perasaan mewah kepada kelompok berpenghasilan menengah. Suasana kolam renang.
Review_Clean: Rapi dan bersih, memberikan perasaan mewah kepada kelompok berpenghasilan menengah. Suasana kolam renang.

Review:
Tempat yang cukup bagus, meskipun saya dan keluarga yang terpisah, tetapi kami masih di lantai yang sama.

Ruangan itu cukup bagus, sangat luas. Segala sesuatu yang sangat baik, seperti yang Anda harapkan di sebuah hotel akan seperti.

Ada satu hal walaupun, kami meminta kasur tambahan setelah check-in kami. Saat staf datang mengetuk saya pergi untuk membuka pintu dan ternyata ia datang hanya dengan bantal dan handuk. Saya mengatakan kepadanya bahwa tempat tidur tidak tiba, dan ia tampak keluar dari tempat. Mungkin ada Miss Komunikasi atau sesuatu tetapi kamar sangat bagus.

Spa juga indah, staf yang sangat ramah dan pengertian. Sarapan yang baik, itu adalah sebagian besar makanan Asia.
Review_English:
A pretty good place, even though my family and I were separated, but we were still on the same floor.

The room was pretty good, very spacious. Everything that is very good, as you expect in a hotel will be like.

There is one thing though, we ask for additional mattresses after our check-in. When the staff came to knock me away to open the door and it turned out he came only with a pillow and towel. I told him that the bed did not arrive, and he seemed out of the place. Maybe there is a miss communication or something but the room is very good.

Spa is also beautiful, very friendly staff and understanding. Good breakfast, it is most of the Asian food.
Review_Summary:
A pretty good place, even though my family and I were separated, but we were still on the same floor.

The room was pretty good, very spacious. Everything that is very good, as you expect in a hotel will be like.

There is one thing though, we ask for additional mattresses after our check-in. When the staff came to knock me away to open the door and it turned out he came only with a pillow and towel. I told him that the bed did not arrive, and he seemed out of the place. Maybe there is a miss communication or something but the room is very good.

Spa is also beautiful, very friendly staff and understanding. Good breakfast, it is most of the Asian food.

Tempat yang cukup bagus, meskipun keluarga saya dan saya terpisah, tetapi kami masih berada di lantai yang sama.

Saya mengatakan kepadanya bahwa tempat tidur tidak tiba, dan dia tampak keluar dari tempat itu. Mungkin ada komunikasi yang hilang atau sesuatu tetapi ruangan itu sangat bagus.

Spa juga staf yang cantik, sangat ramah dan pengertian. Sarapan yang enak, ini sebagian besar makanan Asia.

Tempat yang cukup bagus, meskipun keluarga saya dan saya terpisah, tetapi kami masih berada di lantai yang sama.

Ruangan itu cukup bagus, sangat luas. Segala sesuatu yang sangat bagus, seperti yang Anda harapkan di hotel.

Ada satu hal, kami meminta kasur tambahan setelah check-in kami. Ketika staf datang untuk menjatuhkan saya untuk membuka pintu dan ternyata dia datang hanya dengan bantal dan handuk. Saya mengatakan kepadanya bahwa tempat tidur tidak tiba, dan dia tampak keluar dari tempat itu. Mungkin ada komunikasi yang hilang atau sesuatu tetapi ruangan itu sangat bagus.

Spa juga staf yang cantik, sangat ramah dan pengertian. Sarapan yang enak, ini sebagian besar makanan Asia.

Subjeck: Hindari tempat ini, berpikir banyak kali sebelum Anda memesan
Review: Keramahan terburuk Hotel yang pernah saya lihat dalam hidup saya. Operator/meja tidak mengerti bahasa Inggris/tidak mau membantu Anda. Kami harus tidur tanpa 1 Jalan makanan di malam hari. Anda harus menjaga barang-barang Anda di pipi. Bukan tempat yang aman

Review: Pada tgl 11-15 Juli 2017 lalu, kami sekeluarga 5 orang menginap di hotel ini, kami mengambil kamar family dengan 3 single bed dan 1 double bed besar, kamar cukup luas dan bersih, pelayanan cukup ramah dan sopan, Fasilitas hotel cukup komplit, ada kolam renang, billiard, lounge, resto dlsbnya, untuk menu makanan kurang bervariasi, selama 4 hari kami menginap menu makanannya tidak banyak variasi, ada nasi goreng, sosis, roti, bubur dan masih banyak yang lainnya. Lokasi hotel sangat strategis dekat ke pantai Kuta, Legian, seminyak. Untuk nilai keseluruhan hotel ini sangat cocok untuk keluarga.
Review_English: On July 11-15, 2017, we and 5 family stayed at this hotel, we took the family room with 3 single beds and 1 big double bed, the rooms were quite spacious and clean, the service was quite friendly and polite, the hotel facilities were quite complete, there were swimming pools, billiards, lounges, restaurants, etc. other. The location of the hotel is very strategic close to Kuta Beach, Legian, Seminyak. For the whole value of this hotel is very suitable for family.
Review_Summary: On July 11-15, 2017, we and 5 family stayed at this hotel, we took the family room with 3 single beds and 1 big double bed, the rooms were quite spacious and clean, the service was quite friendly and polite, the hotel facilities were quite complete, there were swimming pools, billiards, lounges, restaurants, etc. other. The location of the hotel is very strategic close to Kuta Beach, Legian, Seminyak. For the whole value of this hotel is very suitable for family.

Lokasi hotel sangat strategis dekat dengan Kuta Beach, Legian, Seminyak. Untuk seluruh nilai hotel ini sangat cocok untuk keluarga.

Review:
Avant de reprendre l'avion nous avons séjourné 2 nuits à l'hôtel Central Park. La chambre est propre, la salle de bain également. Le petit déjeuner est copieux et plutôt bon.
Mais c'est un peu bruyant.
L'hôtel propose de nous amener gratuitement a la plage mais ne vient pas nous rechercher, il faut prendre un taxi pour le retour... on a préféré marcher du coup. Et le transport pour l'aéroport est payant... dommage.
Mais globalement cet hôtel est bien.
Review_English:
Before returning to the plane we stayed 2 nights at the Central Park hotel. The bedroom is clean, the bathroom too. Breakfast is generous and rather good.
But it's a bit noisy.
The hotel offers to bring us for free to the beach but does not come to look for us, we have to take a taxi for the return ... We preferred to walk suddenly. And transport for the airport is paying ... too bad.
But overall this hotel is good.
Review_Summary:
Before returning to the plane we stayed 2 nights at the Central Park hotel. The bedroom is clean, the bathroom too. Breakfast is generous and rather good.
But it's a bit noisy.
The hotel offers to bring us for free to the beach but does not come to look for us, we have to take a taxi for the return ... We preferred to walk suddenly. And transport for the airport is paying ... too bad.
But overall this hotel is good.
Review_Bahasa:
Sebelum kembali ke pesawat, kami menginap 2 malam di Central Park Hotel. Kamar tidurnya bersih, kamar mandi juga. Sarapan murah hati dan agak baik.
Tapi agak berisik.
Hotel ini menawarkan untuk membawa kami secara gratis ke pantai tetapi tidak datang untuk mencari kami, kami harus naik taksi untuk pengembalian ... kami lebih suka berjalan tiba -tiba. Dan transportasi untuk bandara membayar ... Sayang sekali.
Tapi secara keseluruhan hotel ini bagus.

Tapi secara keseluruhan hotel ini bagus.

Review:
HINDARI SEBISA MUNGKIN!
Kami tinggal di sini selama empat minggu perjalanan sepanjang Thailand dan Bali ini adalah oleh jauh yang terburuk hotel kami tinggal di, dalam pikiran kami tinggal di hotel dan Guesthouse yang terjangkau hanya 17 Malam. Kuta Central Park dan masih unggul Hotel. Kami seharusnya untuk tinggal selama empat malam tapi harus check out setelah dua. Kamarnya sangat kotor dan lama kami tidak memiliki jendela sehingga tidak ada ventilasi yang berarti Kamar berbau dan tidak ada tempat untuk pakaian yang basah dan AC! Koridor merasa seperti sebuah rumah sakit dan untuk fasilitas lainnya seperti kolam renang dan bar kami tidak berani untuk pergi dekat, seluruh tempat terasa sangat menyedihkan! Saya telah tinggal di banyak hotel bintang 4/5 dan ini jelas tidak! Ketika staf ditanya mengapa kami check out lebih awal mereka hanya mengangkat bahu lagi seperti yang mereka digunakan untuk orang-orang yang keluar lebih awal, jika Anda berencana untuk tinggal di sini di hotel ini tidak seperti gambar dan lokasi buruk anda tidak bisa mendapatkan di mana saja tanpa harus menggunakan taksi atau bentuk transportasi.
Review_English:
Avoid as much as possible!
We lived here for four weeks of travel throughout Thailand and Bali this is the worst of the hotel we live in, in our minds we live in affordable hotels and guesthouses only 17 nights. Kuta Central Park and still superior to the hotel. We should stay for four nights but have to check out after two. The room is very dirty and a long time we don't have a window so there is no ventilation which means the room smells and there is no place for wet clothes and air conditioning! The corridor felt like a hospital and for other facilities such as a swimming pool and bar we did not dare to go near, the whole place felt very sad! I have lived in many 4/5 star hotels and this is clearly not! When the staff were asked why we checked out earlier they only shrugged their shoulders as they were used for people who came out earlier, if you plan to stay here in this hotel, unlike pictures and bad locations you cannot get anywhere without having to use a taxi or form of transportation.

Review: Nous avons séjourné 4 nuits à cet Hotel dans une chambre avec 3 lits simples. Chambre propre, lit confortable accueil chaleureux. Chambre prête des notre arrivée à 11h sans préavis. Nous avons été agréablement surprise du buffet déjeuner inclus. Très bon buffet. Dépanneur juste à côté très pratique. Facile de trouver un chauffeur et de le négocier. Personnel souriant et aimable. Emplacement au cœur du centre ville, très bruyant dans la rue, mais aucun son dans l'hôtel. Facile de trouver des taxis. Cours intérieure très belle. Nous recommandons à tous pour le rapport qualité prix !
Review_English: We stayed 4 nights at this hotel in a room with 3 single beds. Clean room, comfortable bed, warm welcome. Room is ready to arrive at 11 a.m. without notice. We were pleasantly surprised by the lunch buffet included. Very good buffet. Convenience store just next door. Easy to find a driver and negotiate it. Smiling and kind staff. Location in the heart of the city center, very noisy in the street, but no sound in the hotel. Easy to find taxis. Very beautiful interior lessons. We recommend everyone for value for money!
Review_Summary: We stayed 4 nights at this hotel in a room with 3 single beds. Clean room, comfortable bed, warm welcome. Room is ready to arrive at 11 a.m. without notice. We were pleasantly surprised by the lunch buffet included. Very good buffet. Convenience store just next door. Easy to find a driver and negotiate it. Smiling and kind staff. Location in the heart of the city center, very noisy in the street, but no sound in the hotel. Easy to find taxis. Very beautiful interior lessons. We recommend everyone for value for money!
Review_Bahasa: Kami menginap 4 malam di hotel ini di kamar dengan 3 tempat tidur tunggal. Kamar bersih, tempat tidur yang nyaman, sambutan hangat. Kamar siap tiba pukul 11 ​​pagi tanpa pemberitahuan. Kami sangat terkejut dengan prasmanan makan siang. Prasmanan yang sangat bagus. Toko serba ada tepat di sebelah. Mudah menemukan pengemudi dan menegosiasikannya. Staf yang tersenyum dan baik. Lokasi di jantung pusat kota, sangat bising di jalan, tetapi tidak ada suara di hotel. Mudah ditemukan taksi. Pelajaran interior yang sangat indah. Kami merekomendasikan semua orang untuk nilai uang!

Kami sangat terkejut dengan prasmanan makan siang. Prasmanan yang sangat bagus. Toko serba ada tepat di sebelah. Mudah menemukan pengemudi dan menegosiasikannya. Staf yang tersenyum dan baik. Lokasi di jantung pusat kota, sangat bising di jalan, tetapi tidak ada suara di hotel. Mudah ditemukan taksi. Pelajaran interior yang sangat indah. Kami merekomendasikan semua orang untuk nilai uang!

Subjeck: Cukup bagus tapi jelas bukan bintang 4!
Review:
Kami tinggal di sini untuk liburan keluarga besar dengan 4 keluarga. Di dalam fotografi di situs sangat selektif, dan ini adalah pasti tidak hotel bintang 4! Di 2 kamar tidur suite kami mengatakan itu cukup bagus dengan tempat tidur yang nyaman dan linen, tapi kamar mandi kami membanjiri kamar mandi setiap kali itu tidak digunakan. 2 kamar tidur suite kakak perempuan saya di bawah ini dan itu sangat tua, suram dan kotor. Kamar mandi kami atas mereka dan pendingin udara bocor tanpa henti ke kamar mereka, membuat keramik yg mematikan saat basah! Di kamar lain di pesta kami dan semua terletak di lantai dasar dan kamar berada dalam kondisi baik. Permintaan kami untuk menjadi dekat dengan semua bersama-sama sangat baik ditampung.
Makanan yang sangat baik rasa dan berbagai, tapi sebagian besar daging sangat diproses dan tidak menyenangkan dalam tekstur (sangat luar biasa). Ada pilihan makanan barat untuk sarapan jika Anda meminta mereka. Restoran toilet menjijikkan, meskipun ini adalah karena untuk pelanggan yang meninggalkan mereka di Amerika Serikat tidak buruk karena kelalaian oleh hotel, tapi itu terjadi begitu sering bahwa kita menolak untuk menggunakan mereka di akhir.
Staf yang sangat membantu karena kami memiliki anak-anak anak-anak dengan kami, dan mereka sangat bersemangat untuk membantu di mana mungkin. Satu-satunya keluhan yang saya miliki tentang staf, adalah bahwa mereka memberi kami bercampur dengan tamu lain dan kami menerima tagihan untuk makanan mereka! Ini tidak bisa diselesaikan karena orang lain telah meninggalkan dan kami akhirnya harus membayar untuk itu yang saya tidak senang! Tapi sebelum ini mereka sangat membantu.
Lokasi adalah baik, tetapi jika Anda pergi ke Kuta saya akan tinggal lebih dekat ke Poppies atau waterbomb, daripada tinggal di sini lagi. Meskipun berada di pusat Kuta yang kami tidak bisa mendengar lalu lintas sama sekali di hotel. Saya tidak akan tinggal di sini lagi dengan keluarga, tapi dapat memenuhi selera para pelancong muda. Meskipun OK hotel ini pasti tidak 4 bintang.
Review_English:
We live here for a large family vacation with 4 families. In photography on the site is very selective, and this is definitely not a 4 star hotel! In 2 bedrooms Suite we said it was pretty good with a comfortable bed and linen, but our bathroom flooded the bathroom every time it was not used. 2 bedrooms suite my sister below and it is very old, gloomy and dirty. Our bathroom over them and air cooler leaked nonstop to their room, making dead ceramics when wet! In another room at our party and all are located on the ground floor and the room is in good condition. Our request to be close to all together is very well accommodated.
Foods that are very good taste and various, but most of the meat is very processed and unpleasant in the texture (very extraordinary). There is a choice of western food for breakfast if you ask them. The toilet restaurant is disgusting, although this is because customers who leave them in the United States are not bad because of negligence by hotels, but that happens so often that we refuse to use them at the end.
Staff are very helpful because we have children with us, and they are very eager to help where possible. The only complaint I have about staff, is that they give us mixed with other guests and we receive bills for their food! This cannot be resolved because other people have left and we finally have to pay for that I am not happy! But before this they were very helpful.
The location is good, but if you go to Kuta I will stay closer to Poppies or Waterbomb, rather than staying here again. Even though we are in the Kuta center that we cannot hear traffic at all at the hotel. I will not live here again with my family, but can meet the tastes of young travelers. Even though this Ok Hotel is definitely not 4 stars.
Review_Summary: Staff are very helpful because we have children with us. The only complaint I have is that they give us mixed with other guests and we receive bills for their food. The location is good, but if you go to Kuta I will stay closer to Poppies.

Review:
Ini benar-benar NIC hotel dengan harga yang sangat murah. Pertama-tama mereka menjawab semua pertanyaan saya sebelum mencapai sana di setiap hari.
Hotel ini besar sekali. Kamar sangat bersih dan besar. NIC dan bervariasi dan staf yang ramah dan kolam renang.
banyak variasi dalam sarapan memiliki beberapa pilihan bagi mereka yang bahkan orang India yang cukup. Bagian yang terbaik adalah mereka tidak pernah ditolak setiap permintaan. Wi - Wifi juga OK. Satu hal yang kurang adalah cahaya rendah di kamar tapi itu tidak masalah.
Secara keseluruhan hotel yang bagus dengan harga yang murah. Merekomendasikan untuk orang-orang India karena begitu banyak restoran India di 2 - 3 km dekat dengan fasilitas pengiriman.
Review_English:
This is really a NIC Hotel at a very cheap price. First of all they answer all my questions before reaching there every day.
This hotel is huge. The room is very clean and big. Nic and varied and friendly staff and swimming pool.
Many variations in breakfast have several choices for those who are even enough Indians. The best part is that they have never been rejected every request. Wi -Wifi is also ok. One thing that is lacking is low light in the room but it doesn't matter.
Overall a good hotel at a low price. Recommend to Indians because there are so many Indian restaurants in 2-3 km close to shipping facilities.
Review_Summary:
This is really a NIC Hotel at a very cheap price. First of all they answer all my questions before reaching there every day.
This hotel is huge. The room is very clean and big. Nic and varied and friendly staff and swimming pool.
Many variations in breakfast have several choices for those who are even enough Indians. The best part is that they have never been rejected every request. Wi -Wifi is also ok. One thing that is lacking is low light in the room but it doesn't matter.
Overall a good hotel at a low price. Recommend to Indians because there are so many Indian restaurants in 2-3 km close to shipping facilities.
Review_Bahasa:
Ini benar -benar hotel NIC dengan harga yang sangat murah. Pertama -tama mereka menjawab semua pertanyaan saya sebelum mencapai di sana setiap hari.
Hotel ini sangat besar. Kamarnya sangat bersih dan besar. Nic dan staf yang beragam dan ramah serta kolam renang.
Banyak variasi dalam sarapan memiliki beberapa pilihan untuk mereka yang bahkan cukup India. Bagian terbaiknya adalah mereka tidak pernah ditolak setiap permintaan. Wi -wifi juga baik -baik saja. Satu hal yang kurang adalah cahaya rendah di dalam ruangan tetapi tidak masalah.
Secara keseluruhan hotel yang bagus dengan harga murah. Rekomendasikan kepada orang India karena ada begitu banyak restoran India dalam 2-3 km dekat dengan fasilitas pengiriman.

Subjeck: Hotel yang Nyaman namun Exterior Kurang Menarik
Review:
Kamar yang bagus & besar, saya memesan studio untuk 3 orang, saya berada di lantai 2 & tidak memiliki balkon. Tempat tidur yang nyaman & performa bagus dari AC.
Cukup fasilitas, dengan ukuran kolam renang yang tdk besar. Tapi saat kita berenang dan melihat ke bangunan hotel paling atas, agak aneh, mengapa eksterior gedung nampaknya kurang perawatan, perlu diperbaiki sehingga bisa sedikit cantik. Saran saya di gang kamar butuh lebih banyak dekorasi agar lebih menarik.
Variasi makanan saat sarapan tidak banyak, ada yang enak dan ada pula yang biasa saja. Mudah untuk menemukan makanan lain di sekitar hotel ini. Kami menikmati tinggal di kamar, meskipun tidak memiliki balkon.
Terdapat area bermain untuk anak-anak dengan jumlah permainan yang terbatas, beberapa sudah hilang.
Saya tidak punya masalah saat check in & check out, semuanya baik-baik saja, berkat Agoda.
Review_English:
Good & big room, I ordered a studio for 3 people, I was on the 2nd floor & did not have a balcony. Comfortable beds & good performance from AC.
Enough facilities, with a swimming pool size that is not large. But when we swim and look at the top hotel building, rather strange, why the exterior of the building seems to be lacking treatment, it needs to be improved so it can be a little beautiful. My advice in the alley of the room needs more decoration to make it more interesting.
Variations in food at breakfast are not much, some are delicious and some are ordinary. It's easy to find other foods around this hotel. We enjoy living in the room, even though we don't have a balcony.
There is a play area for children with a limited number of games, some have been lost.
I have no problem when checking in & checking out, everything is fine, thanks to Agoda.
Review_Summary:
Good & big room, I ordered a studio for 3 people, I was on the 2nd floor & did not have a balcony. Comfortable beds & good performance from AC.
Enough facilities, with a swimming pool size that is not large. But when we swim and look at the top hotel building, rather strange, why the exterior of the building seems to be lacking treatment, it needs to be improved so it can be a little beautiful. My advice in the alley of the room needs more decoration to make it more interesting.
Variations in food at breakfast are not much, some are delicious and some are ordinary. It's easy to find other foods around this hotel. We enjoy living in the room, even though we don't have a balcony.
There is a play area for children with a limited number of games, some have been lost.
I have no problem when checking in & checking out, everything is fine, thanks to Agoda.

Saran saya di gang ruangan membutuhkan lebih banyak dekorasi untuk membuatnya lebih menarik.
Variasi makanan saat sarapan tidak banyak, ada yang lezat dan ada yang biasa. Sangat mudah untuk menemukan makanan lain di sekitar hotel ini. Kami menikmati tinggal di kamar, meskipun kami tidak memiliki balkon.

Saya tidak punya masalah saat memeriksa & memeriksa, semuanya baik -baik saja, terima kasih kepada Agoda.

Review:
Seperti namanya, hotel ini terletak di pusat Kuta. Hotel ini sangat bersih. Pelayanannya juga baik dan ramah, staf cukup membantu.
Kamar mandinya bersih dan mereka menyediakan pengering rambut di setiap kamar. hihihhi,,,
Saya menginap di hotel ini karena itu adalah mudah bagi saya untuk menemukan makanan atau bahan makanan. Beberapa makanan terkenal di Bali cukup dekat dari hotel ini (Nasi Pedas Bu Andika, nasi tempong Bu Indra, sate bawah pohon, Bali Bakery), tidak perlu khawatir bahwa Anda tidak dapat menemukan makanan untuk mengisi perut Anda jika Anda tinggal di hotel ini hi hi hi.
anda dapat menikmati sarapan, mereka menyajikan masakan Barat dan Cina makanan dengan selera yang baik. Mereka juga menyediakan menu khusus yang berbeda setiap hari seperti nasi uduk, India, dll.
satu hal yang saya tidak suka selalu ada kemacetan di depan hotel ini.
Oh Ya. ada juga kolam renang untuk anak dan orang dewasa dan kolam renangnya bersih: D

secara keseluruhan saya menikmati menginap di hotel ini.
Review_English:
As the name suggests, this hotel is located at the Kuta center. This hotel is very clean. The service is also good and friendly, the staff is quite helpful.
The bathroom is clean and they provide a hair dryer in each room. hihihhi ,,,
I stayed at this hotel because it was easy for me to find food or food. Some famous foods in Bali are quite close to this hotel (Mrs. Andika's spicy rice, Tempong Mrs. Indra rice, Sate under the tree, Bali Bakery), no need to worry that you cannot find food to fill your stomach if you live in this hotel Hi Hi Hi.
You can enjoy breakfast, they serve Western cuisine and Chinese food with good taste. They also provide different special menus every day such as uduk rice, India, etc.
One thing that I don't like is always a traffic jam in front of this hotel.
Oh yes. There is also a swimming pool for children and adults and the swimming pool is clean: D

Overall I enjoyed staying at this hotel.

Review:
Kamar sangat tua dan kotor. Seperti di tua sandal, pembungkus manis di bawah tempat tidur kami dan tumpukan debu yang harus dipindahkan di sekitar untuk menambahkan tempat tidur yang lain - ketika menambahkan tempat tidur kotor tidak dibersihkan tapi hanya ditutupi oleh tempat tidur tambahan. Kami tumpah kopi pada selimut dan kasurnya diganti. Ketika kami kembali ke hotel dan saya mendapatkan ke tempat tidur saya dan ternyata mereka hanya menempatkan selimut di tempat tidur yang lain dan kotor sekitar turnt untuk menyamarkan noda kopi, karena jika kita tidak akan melihat.

Layanan yang buruk dan tidak ada yang pasti kecuali kami bertanya dua kali. Sarapan hanya diperuntukkan untuk rasa Asia. Staf yang semua sangat ramah dan bersedia membantu, terutama pada penerimaan di mana seorang wanita yang membantu kami memilah kami dengan kartu SIM dan handphone. Lokasi ini tidak ideal dan saya akan merekomendasikan tinggal di Seminyak atau Ubud Jika anda wisatawan muda karena kurang dibangun dan lebih dikomersialisasikan dan trendi dan menyenangkan.
Review_English:
Very old and dirty room. Like in old sandals, sweet wrapper under our bed and piles of dust that must be moved around to add other beds - when adding dirty beds is not cleaned but only covered by additional beds. We spilled coffee on the blanket and the mattress was replaced. When we returned to the hotel and I got to my bed and it turned out that they only put the blanket in the other bed and was dirty around the turn to disguise coffee stains, because if we wouldn't see.

Bad service and nothing is certain except we ask twice. Breakfast is only intended for the taste of Asia. Staff who are all very friendly and are willing to help, especially on acceptance where a woman who helps us sort us with a SIM and Mobile cards. This location is not ideal and I will recommend living in Seminyak or Ubud if you are a young tourist because it is less built and more commercialized and trendy and fun.
