Review: tempat yang nyaman seperti tempat yang baru di surga yang terdapat pemandangan terbaik di semua tempat, dan juga menawarkan kolam renang anak anak dan tempat duduk santai agar bisa mengawasi anak anak
Review_English: A comfortable place like a new place in heaven that has the best views in all places, and also offers children's swimming pools and relaxed seats in order to be able to watch out children
Review_Summary: A comfortable place like a new place in heaven that has the best views in all places, and also offers children's swimming pools and relaxed seats in order to be able to watch out children
Review_Bahasa: Tempat yang nyaman seperti tempat baru di surga yang memiliki pemandangan terbaik di semua tempat, dan juga menawarkan kolam renang anak -anak dan kursi santai agar dapat mengawasi anak -anak

Review: Stayed at this hotel for 3 days with family. Supposed to be a budget hotel, I was a little skeptical while booking the rooms but was pleasantly surprised by everything that the hotel had to offer : spacious clean rooms, comfortable beds, nice pool, friendly staff, nice ambiance. Being vegetarian, food was also an issue but their huge breakfast spread is no less than any five star hotel. The menu takes special care that the vegetarians get equally fare deal. The hotel is about 5 Kms from the airport and 3 Kms from Kuta beach. They provide a shuttle service every two hours to nearby places of interest. Best value for money. Overall an excellent experience.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di hotel ini selama 3 hari bersama keluarga. Seharusnya hotel anggaran, saya sedikit skeptis saat memesan kamar tetapi terkejut dengan segala sesuatu yang ditawarkan hotel: kamar bersih yang luas, tempat tidur yang nyaman, kolam renang yang bagus, staf yang ramah, suasana yang bagus. Menjadi vegetarian, makanan juga menjadi masalah tetapi penyebaran sarapan besar mereka tidak kurang dari hotel bintang lima. Menu ini berhati -hati secara khusus bahwa vegetarian mendapatkan kesepakatan tarif yang sama. Hotel ini berjarak sekitar 5 km dari bandara dan 3 km dari Pantai Kuta. Mereka menyediakan layanan antar -jemput setiap dua jam ke tempat menarik di dekatnya. Nilai terbaik untuk uang. Secara keseluruhan pengalaman yang sangat baik.

Subjeck: Value for money but few drawbacks
Review: As far as location is concerned it is very near by to airport ( took us less than 15 mins to reach airport from here) but little far away from the kuta beach ( 3. 8 kms to be precise ). Everything inside the hotel from renting a bike/cab to SPA is costlier when compared to other near by places. The staff is decent enough but not that friendly or efficient as per Bali standards. Faced problems with WiFi and room key but nothing much to complaint about. Breakfast was good ( only if you are not a vegetarian). In short this is a good value for money hotel as far as accommodation is concerned.

Review_Bahasa: Sejauh menyangkut lokasi, ia sangat dekat ke bandara (membutuhkan waktu kurang dari 15 menit untuk mencapai bandara dari sini) tetapi sedikit jauh dari Pantai Kuta (lebih tepatnya 8. 8 km). Segala sesuatu di dalam hotel mulai dari menyewa sepeda/taksi ke spa lebih mahal jika dibandingkan dengan tempat lain di dekat tempat. Staf cukup baik tetapi tidak ramah atau efisien sesuai standar Bali. Menghadapi masalah dengan wifi dan kunci kamar tetapi tidak banyak keluhan tentang. Sarapan baik (hanya jika Anda bukan vegetarian). Singkatnya ini adalah nilai yang baik untuk hotel uang sejauh menyangkut akomodasi.

Singkatnya ini adalah nilai yang baik untuk hotel uang sejauh menyangkut akomodasi.

Review: Has been my 3rd stay at this hotel since they were with the old management. Spacey (even for their std) and clean room, comfy bed, great staff service, good breakfast, fair price compared to other hotels with around the same price but have smaller room. The location is far from the beach or any tourist places but I find it convenient and legian-kuta is still within walking distance. Yeah its like a 15 minutes walk to the beach but hey, I don't mind to take a look around on my way there. There are 24 hours mini market (CircleK) right in front of their door and if you walk like 3 minutes to the left side of the road you will found local foods and another mini market. If you want to go far, just rent a motorbike/car (lots and safe parking space) or took a taxi, plenty of them and the front desk staff can help you with this. Keep up the good work and thank you for making my stay pleasant every time I was there :)

Review_Bahasa: Telah menjadi yang ke -3 saya tinggal di hotel ini sejak mereka bersama manajemen lama. Spacey (bahkan untuk PMS mereka) dan kamar bersih, tempat tidur yang nyaman, layanan staf yang bagus, sarapan yang baik, harga wajar dibandingkan dengan hotel lain dengan harga sekitar yang sama tetapi memiliki kamar yang lebih kecil. Lokasi jauh dari pantai atau tempat wisata tetapi saya merasa nyaman dan Legian-Kuta masih dalam jarak berjalan kaki. Ya itu seperti 15 menit berjalan kaki ke pantai tapi hei, saya tidak keberatan untuk melihat -lihat di sana. Ada 24 jam Mini Market (CircleK) tepat di depan pintu mereka dan jika Anda berjalan seperti 3 menit ke sisi kiri jalan Anda akan menemukan makanan lokal dan pasar mini lainnya. Jika Anda ingin melangkah jauh, cukup sewa sepeda motor/mobil (banyak dan tempat parkir yang aman) atau naik taksi, banyak dari mereka dan staf meja depan dapat membantu Anda dengan ini. Pertahankan kerja bagus dan terima kasih telah membuat saya tetap menyenangkan setiap kali saya di sana :)

Review: hotel ramai,strategis dekat kmana mana,harga pun cukup murah. kamar nyaman bersih,staff ramah dan sangat membantu. dekat minimarket,atm jika berlibur ke bali saya akan kembali lagi di hotel ini karena sangat menyenangkan!
Review_English: Hotel is crowded, strategic near where, the price is quite cheap. The room is comfortable clean, the staff is friendly and very helpful. Near the minimarket, ATM when on vacation to Bali I will return to this hotel because it is very fun!
Review_Summary: Hotel is crowded, strategic near where, the price is quite cheap. The room is comfortable clean, the staff is friendly and very helpful. Near the minimarket, ATM when on vacation to Bali I will return to this hotel because it is very fun!
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ramai, strategis di dekat tempat, harganya cukup murah. Kamar nyaman bersih, stafnya ramah dan sangat membantu. Di dekat minimarket, ATM saat berlibur ke Bali, saya akan kembali ke hotel ini karena sangat menyenangkan!
Review_Clean: Hotel ramai, strategis di dekat tempat, harganya cukup murah. Kamar nyaman bersih, stafnya ramah dan sangat membantu. Di dekat minimarket, ATM saat berlibur ke Bali, saya akan kembali ke hotel ini karena sangat menyenangkan!

Review: Absolutely lover everything about this hotel. The location was perfect, quick walk to Legian street or quick taxi ride to Kuta night market 26,000 idr each way. Except you can get a free shuttle there through the hotel! The staff is amazing, so much so that we are still friends with our driver Gede! We even cancelled out plans to go to another hotel to stay here an additional 5 nights. Everything was great and I can't wait to come back next May!

Review_Bahasa: Benar -benar pecinta segalanya tentang hotel ini. Lokasi sempurna, berjalan cepat ke Legian Street atau naik taksi cepat ke Kuta Night Market 26.000 IDR setiap jalan. Kecuali Anda bisa mendapatkan antar -jemput gratis di sana melalui hotel! Stafnya luar biasa, sedemikian rupa sehingga kami masih berteman dengan sopir kami Gede! Kami bahkan membatalkan rencana untuk pergi ke hotel lain untuk tinggal di sini tambahan 5 malam. Semuanya hebat dan saya tidak sabar untuk kembali Mei mendatang!

Review: Hotel nothing at all like the photos. We were in a tiny room with no windows. Flooring in the hotel and tiling around the pool area is veryy, very slippery, my daughter slipped on her back, hitting her head. Pool is tiny, nothing like the photographs, Miles from anywhere, in a really dangerous, run-down area, We were warned by hotel staff on arrival not to use 3 of the hotel exits, as it was dangerous, especially at night time. Hotel miles from anywhere, no shops or restaurants around. A terribly frightening 7 days for my children and myself.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel tidak ada sama sekali seperti foto. Kami berada di ruangan kecil tanpa jendela. Lantai di hotel dan ubin di sekitar area kolam renang sangat, sangat licin, putri saya menyelinap di punggungnya, memukul kepalanya. Kolam renang kecil, tidak seperti foto-foto, bermil-mil dari mana saja, di daerah yang benar-benar berbahaya dan rusak, kami diperingatkan oleh staf hotel pada saat kedatangan untuk tidak menggunakan 3 pintu keluar hotel, karena berbahaya, terutama di malam hari. Hotel bermil -mil dari mana saja, tidak ada toko atau restoran di sekitarnya. 7 hari yang sangat menakutkan untuk anak -anak saya dan saya sendiri.

Review: The hotels was in the middle commercials areas with many empty spaces. Conditions of the surrounding area is not so pleasantly clean and way out from Kuta Beach and Jalan Legian where you can find many restaurants and cafes. So better look somewhere else for your comfort and time saving. I would definitely not recommended this hotel. The plus point is, the staffs are really helpful.

Jadi lebih baik lihat di tempat lain untuk kenyamanan dan penghematan waktu Anda. Saya pasti tidak akan merekomendasikan hotel ini. Poin plus adalah, staf sangat membantu.

Review: First and foremost, thank you to all the staff for making my stay a memorable one. Had a great time staying here. Staff extended greetings without fail and room was clean and spacious. Only funny thing that i noticed was the elevator emitting coffee aroma whenever i used it. Coffee air freshener maybe?

Staf salam yang diperluas tanpa gagal dan kamarnya bersih dan luas. Satu -satunya hal lucu yang saya perhatikan adalah lift yang memancarkan aroma kopi setiap kali saya menggunakannya. Mungkin penyegar udara kopi?

Review: Very nice place to stay in. The room is clean and spacious. We took a room next to the pool. Its kind a noisy at times but its fine. The pool is clean and not like some other hotels i've stayed. The coffee house seeves some really good food and the staffs ate very good .

Review_Bahasa: Tempat yang sangat bagus untuk tinggal di. Kamar bersih dan luas. Kami mengambil kamar di sebelah kolam renang. Kadang -kadang baik berisik tapi baik -baik saja. Kolam renang bersih dan tidak seperti hotel lain yang pernah saya tinggali. Coffee House melihat beberapa makanan yang sangat enak dan staf makan dengan sangat enak.

Review: Hotel ini agaknye merupakan bangunan ruko yang disulap menjadi sebuah hotel bintang 4. Meskipun bertitel bintang 4, sangat disayangkan beberapa fasilitas kurang memuaskan. Misalnya saja, hotel ini tidak dapat dibilang sound proof. Kadang masih terdengar suara dari kamar sebelh meskipun samar-samar. Positifnya, wifi di hotel ini sangat stabil dan kencang.
Review_English: The hotel is a bit of a shophouse that was transformed into a 4 -star hotel. Although a 4 -star titled, it is unfortunate that some of the facilities are not satisfactory. For example, this hotel cannot be called a sound proof. Sometimes there are still sounds from the Seba Sebat room even though vague. The positive, wifi at this hotel is very stable and fast.

Review: I had seen a lot of mixed reviews about this hotel but I booked it anyway and believe me, I am very happy that I did! I would suggest the deluxe room instead of the standard room. Deluxe rooms have very spacious rooms and a nice bathroom! big balcony as well where you can spend hours without doing anything. Very clean swimming pool with a pool bar facility open till 10 pm! Their breakfast buffet was delightful and so was the colorful look of the hotel. For those who feel that it is not very near to Kuta beach, they provide a shuttle drop only service every 2 hours. 1 of the best places to live in Kuta for budget travelers!

Review_Bahasa: Saya telah melihat banyak ulasan beragam tentang hotel ini tetapi saya tetap memesannya dan percaya kepada saya, saya sangat senang bahwa saya melakukannya! Saya akan menyarankan ruang mewah alih -alih ruang standar. Kamar mewah memiliki kamar yang sangat luas dan kamar mandi yang bagus! Balkon besar juga di mana Anda dapat menghabiskan berjam -jam tanpa melakukan apa pun. Kolam renang yang sangat bersih dengan fasilitas bar kolam renang buka sampai jam 10 malam! Sarapan prasmanan mereka sangat menyenangkan dan begitu pula tampilan hotel yang penuh warna. Bagi mereka yang merasa tidak terlalu dekat dengan Pantai Kuta, mereka menyediakan layanan drop shop hanya setiap 2 jam. 1 tempat terbaik untuk tinggal di Kuta untuk pelancong anggaran!

Review: Hotel yg unik. Antara lobby dengan bangunan kamar terpisah dengan jalan dan ruko. Kamar di lantai 1 seperti 'gua' krn tidak ada jendela, sehingga tidak ada view kemana2. Tp kebetulan saya mendapat kamar di lantai 3. Ruangan2nya tidak kedap suara, sehingga jika ada org ribut di corridor suaranya terdengar jelas dan sangant mengganggu.
Review_English: Unique hotel. Between the lobby and the room building separately from the road and shop house. Rooms on the 1st floor are like 'caves' because there are no windows, so there is no view everywhere. But I happen to get a room on the 3rd floor. The rooms are not soundproof, so if there are noisy people in the corridor of his voice sounded clear and very disturbing.

Review: First impression of this hotel was meh.. Anyway it was free (gift from a friend) Looks like a ruko, corridor was dark, room was specious, we get room without view it was dark and spooky, so many mosquito till I got dengue fever:( the bed was comfortable only the linens and towels to old, to many stain and the color is dark white (almost light gray ) Breakfast room was extremely noise not only from kids as well from the music they play, enough variety of Indonesian food. Spa was ok, the therapist was the only gems of the spa, the room was good however the music was terrible as they have centralized music so is not adjustable u need to bare with annoying music while u suppose to be relax. Wifi was to slow Never come back for this

Review: Everything was fine. Clean room, friendly staffs, good location, good service. My friend forgot her wallet in room, the stiffs kept for her, really appreciated! The food in the restaurant was good with good price. Recommend for the stay!!!

Review: Located at the central park kuta, this hotel surrounded by a lot of street food and great restaurant. The famous district in bali : pantai kuta is just 10minute drive. They have shuttle to excort you to beach walk and also discovery shoping mall. The menu set in the pool bar was delicious and cheap. Ace hardware, circle K, harry and harrys salon was just a minute walk from the hotel.

Review: Kami memesan kamar untuk 3 ranjang pada bulan februari untuk 3hari. Pelayanan bagus, petugas sangat membantu dan terlebih lagi ada shuttle bus free nya. Tetapi yang mengecewakan kamarnya lembab, selimut juga lembab. Ac sempet bocor pada hari ke 2 tapi petugas segera datang setelah kami menelepon. Overall saya menikmati perjalanan saya di bali dan tinggal di hotel ini.
Review_English: We ordered a room for 3 beds in February for 3 days. Good service, officers are very helpful and moreover there is a shuttle bus free. But the one who disappointed his room was moist, the blanket was also moist. AC was leaked on day 2 but officers immediately arrived after we called. Overall I enjoy my trip in Bali and live in this hotel.
Review_Summary: We ordered a room for 3 beds in February for 3 days. Good service, officers are very helpful and moreover there is a shuttle bus free. But the one who disappointed his room was moist, the blanket was also moist. AC was leaked on day 2 but officers immediately arrived after we called. Overall I enjoy my trip in Bali and live in this hotel.
Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan kamar untuk 3 tempat tidur di bulan Februari selama 3 hari. Pelayanan yang baik, petugas sangat membantu dan terlebih lagi ada bus antar -jemput gratis. Tapi orang yang mengecewakan kamarnya lembab, selimut itu juga lembab. AC bocor pada hari ke -2 tetapi petugas segera tiba setelah kami menelepon. Secara keseluruhan saya menikmati perjalanan saya di Bali dan tinggal di hotel ini.

Review: hmm asik bannget. pelayanan ok dan ramah with suprise welcome drink lemon tea dingin. homie banget. Kamar bersih dan cantik. Selain itu, malam hari tenang. Menu sarapan luar biasa, western, indo,chinese food semua ada,plus pelayanan yang super ramah dan sabar. Mayoritas pengunjung berasal dari mancanegara. Ada kejutan selamat ulang tahun kepada salah satu wisatawan mancanegara, yang nampak terharu atas kejutan itu saat sedang sarapan. Pokoknya pelayanannya patut diberi jempol. Ada pula drop bus ke destinasi wisata favorit setiap 2 jam sekali. Benar-benar kita dimanjakan pelayanan yang all out. Makasih Kuta CP
Review_English: hmm cool bannget. OK and friendly service with Suprise Welcome Drink Lemon Tea Cold. really homie. Clean and beautiful room. In addition, the night is calm. Extraordinary breakfast menu, western, indo, chinese food all there, plus super -friendly and patient services. The majority of visitors come from foreign countries. There was a happy birthday surprise to one of the foreign tourists, who seemed touched by the surprise when he was breakfast. Anyway, the service should be given a thumb. There is also a bus drop to a favorite tourist destination every 2 hours. We really are spoiled by all out services. Thanks Kuta CP

There was a happy birthday surprise to one of the foreign tourists, who seemed touched by the surprise when he was breakfast. Anyway, the service should be given a thumb. Review_Bahasa: Hmm Bannget Keren. OK dan layanan ramah dengan minuman selamat datang minuman lemon dingin. Benar -benar homie. Kamar yang bersih dan indah. Selain itu, malam itu tenang. Menu Sarapan Luar Biasa, Barat, Indo, Makanan Cina Di sana, ditambah layanan super -ramah dan sabar. Mayoritas pengunjung berasal dari negara asing. Ada kejutan selamat ulang tahun bagi salah satu wisatawan asing, yang tampaknya tersentuh oleh kejutan ketika dia sedang sarapan. Bagaimanapun, layanan harus diberikan ibu jari. Ada juga drop bus ke tujuan wisata favorit setiap 2 jam. Kami benar -benar dimanjakan oleh semua layanan. Terima kasih Kuta CP

Subjeck: Great Place at a good price
Review: We stayed for 8 nights in a family room. Room was clean however had no window. Kids club didnt really have much for kids to do, however we didnt really use it very often anyway. Restaurant was lovely and staff were fantastic. Swim up bar and pool was small but nice.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal selama 8 malam di ruang keluarga. Kamar bersih namun tidak memiliki jendela. Kids Club tidak benar -benar memiliki banyak hal untuk dilakukan anak -anak, namun kami tidak terlalu sering menggunakannya. Restorannya indah dan staf sangat fantastis. Berenang di bar dan kolam renang kecil tapi bagus.

Subjeck: Hotel nyaman di lokasi strategis bali
Review: Saya datang ke tempat ini bersama dengan teman-teman untuk liburan dimana kami tiba sudah malam di tempat ini dan tetap di layani dengan baik oleh resepsionisnya. untuk letaknya cukup strategis dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan dan hiburan di area kuta. Serta untuk kapalnya juga lumayan luas dengan interior minimalis dilengkapi pula mini bar dan kolam renang. Akan tetapi yang agak sedikit kurang adalah pada bantalnya yang sudah terlalu lembek sehingga perlu diadakan pergantian baru.
Review_English: I came to this place with friends for a vacation where we arrived at night in this place and stayed well served by the receptionist. For its location is quite strategic close to shopping and entertainment centers in the Kuta area. And for the ship is also quite spacious with a minimalist interior also equipped with a mini bar and swimming pool. However, what is a bit lacking is on the pillow which is already too soft so new changes need to be held.
Review_Summary: I came to this place with friends for a vacation where we arrived at night in this place and stayed well served by the receptionist. For its location is quite strategic close to shopping and entertainment centers in the Kuta area. And for the ship is also quite spacious with a minimalist interior also equipped with a mini bar and swimming pool. However, what is a bit lacking is on the pillow which is already too soft so new changes need to be held.

Review: Saya merasa sangat puas menginap di sini..Pelayanan cepat dan ramah..Kamar luas dengan kamar mandi yg luas dan bersih..Kolam renang cukup nyaman untuk anak2..Letak hotel strategis dekat dengan mall..Makanan enak.
Review_English: I feel very satisfied staying here ... fast and friendly service ... spacious room with a spacious and clean bathroom ... swimming polam is quite comfortable for children ... the strategic hotel location is close to the mall ... good food.
Review_Summary: I feel very satisfied staying here ... fast and friendly service ... spacious room with a spacious and clean bathroom ... swimming polam is quite comfortable for children ... the strategic hotel location is close to the mall ... good food.

Review: We spent ten nights at KCP and it was great. The food was top notch and very affordable. The staff were so friendly and efficient and we got to know some of the bar and restaurant staff quite well. It was really great to spend some time with them and chat and share a few jokes. The spa do a great job at very good prices. The pool and bar were a great place to spend time and unwind. The courtesy bus for drop offs was very handy and you could arrange a driver to take you on day trips around Bali through the tour desk. We met a great driver by the name of Yum Yum, and he took us on several trips and also told us a lot about Balinese history and culture, plus what was going on in Bali at the time. He also gave us some good advice on what to do and not do in Bali, and what you need to be cautious of. There was some repairs and renovations being carried out while we were there, but none of it was intrusive and it did not affect our stay in any way. Overall, the prices were great for us, the service was excellent, the staff were all friendly, and we would definitely stay there again.

Review_Bahasa: Kami menghabiskan sepuluh malam di KCP dan itu hebat. Makanannya adalah kedudukan tertinggi dan sangat terjangkau. Staf sangat ramah dan efisien dan kami mengenal beberapa staf bar dan restoran dengan cukup baik. Sungguh luar biasa menghabiskan waktu bersama mereka dan mengobrol dan berbagi beberapa lelucon. Spa melakukan pekerjaan dengan sangat baik dengan harga yang sangat baik. Kolam renang dan bar adalah tempat yang tepat untuk menghabiskan waktu dan bersantai. Bus kesopanan untuk drop off sangat berguna dan Anda bisa mengatur pengemudi untuk membawa Anda dalam perjalanan sehari -hari di sekitar Bali melalui meja tur. Kami bertemu dengan seorang pengemudi hebat bernama Yum Yum, dan dia membawa kami dalam beberapa perjalanan dan juga memberi tahu kami banyak tentang sejarah dan budaya Bali, ditambah apa yang sedang terjadi di Bali pada saat itu. Dia juga memberi kami beberapa nasihat yang baik tentang apa yang harus dilakukan dan tidak dilakukan di Bali, dan apa yang perlu Anda berhati -hati. Ada beberapa perbaikan dan renovasi yang dilakukan saat kami berada di sana, tetapi tidak ada yang mengganggu dan itu tidak memengaruhi kami tinggal dengan cara apa pun. Secara keseluruhan, harganya bagus untuk kami, layanannya sangat baik, staf semuanya ramah, dan kami pasti akan tinggal di sana lagi.

Review: We stayed for 3 nights. The room may be considered as very spacous for an affordable hotel. The hotel is not so far from Jl Legian, and surrounded by convenience stores and nice/famous local restaurants, such as Ayam Betutu Khas Gilimanuk, Bebek Gorenf Gober, and Babi Guling Men Suka. Breakfast (buffet) was average. It is a high density hotel and replacement rate was too slow for the crowd. You can easily rent a normal range of motorbike from a free-lancer at the hotel lobby with 60k per day. Petrol station is not so far from the hotel.

Review: Harga oke banget pada waktu itu. Murah. Tapi kualitas hotel oke banget. Pelayanan nya, tipe room nya, kebersihan nya. Tv kabel nya banyak channel nya. Terus untuk wifi koneksinya bagus. Pokoknya pingin nginep disini lg. Apalagi sarapan pagi nya. Sangat lengkap. Tapi sayang skrng harga nya mahal. Pokoknya recommended hotel deh.
Review_English: The price was really okay at that time. Cheap. But the quality of the hotel is really okay. Service, the room type, cleanliness. The cable TV has many channels. Then for the WiFi the connection is good. Anyway, I want to stay here again. Especially breakfast. Very complete. But unfortunately the price is expensive. Anyway, recommended hotel.

Then for the WiFi the connection is good. Anyway, I want to stay here again. Especially breakfast. Very complete. But unfortunately the price is expensive. Anyway, recommended hotel.

Kemudian untuk wifi koneksi bagus. Bagaimanapun, saya ingin tinggal di sini lagi. Terutama sarapan. Sangat lengkap. Tapi sayangnya harganya mahal. Bagaimanapun, hotel yang direkomendasikan.

Review: Op de foto s ziet het hotel er een stuk netter uit dan in het echt. Het is wat vervallen en de kamer viel tegen. Badkamer was erg vies. Met name de douche. Deze was zwart en op de wastafel zaten nog slijm vlekken van de vorige gasten! Ontbijt is wel goed. Zwembad is niet erg zweervol en er zijn dan ook weinig gasten die hier gebruik van maken.
Review_English: In the photos, the hotel looks a lot nicer than in real life. It is somewhat expired and the room was disappointing. Bathroom was very dirty. In particular the shower. This was black and there were still mucus stains from the previous guests on the sink! Breakfast is good. Swimming pool is not very swear and there are therefore few guests who use this.

This was black and there were still mucus stains from the previous guests on the sink! Breakfast is good. Swimming pool is not very swear and there are therefore few guests who use this.
Review_Bahasa: Di foto, hotel ini terlihat jauh lebih bagus daripada di kehidupan nyata. Ini agak kedaluwarsa dan ruangan itu mengecewakan. Kamar mandi sangat kotor. Khususnya kamar mandi. Ini hitam dan masih ada noda lendir dari tamu sebelumnya di wastafel! Sarapan itu enak. Kolam renang tidak terlalu bersumpah dan karena itu ada beberapa tamu yang menggunakan ini.

Review: Hotelnya besar sekali dan akses lift terbatas, jadi kalau menginap di kamar dengan angka belakang 50-60, lebih baik minta ganti kamar karena sangat jauh, dan kamarnya tidak ada view. Kamarnya standar, namun bed sheet selalu bernoda, meskipun diganti setiap hari. Sarapannya lumayan.
Review_English: The hotel is huge and the elevator access is limited, so if you stay in a room with a number of back 50-60, it's better to ask for a room because it is very far away, and the room has no view. The room is standard, but the bed sheet is always stained, even though it is replaced every day. The breakfast is pretty good.

The room is standard, but the bed sheet is always stained, even though it is replaced every day. The breakfast is pretty good.

Kamar itu standar, tetapi loyang selalu diwarnai, meskipun diganti setiap hari. Sarapannya cukup bagus.

Review: Из минусов: 1.нам подсунули номер без окон! в таком номере крайне неудобно жить, ориентирование во времени полностью пропадает. 2.в последний день проживания попытали совершить чек аут в 6 утра. пришел персонал, начал стучать в дверь со словами чек аут. 3.парковка не охраняется, украли шлемы и порезали сидение байка, при чем это было в разные дни. Из плюсов: есть спортзал достаточно большой бассейн
Review_English: Of the minuses: 1. Dom slipped a number without windows! In such a room it is extremely inconvenient to live, orientation in time completely disappears. 2. On the last day of residence, they tried to make a check at 6 in the morning. The staff came, began to knock on the door with the words check out. 3. The parking is not guarded, the helmets were stolen and the bike was cut, and it was on different days. Of the pluses: there is a large pool gym

Subjeck: Nice clean hotel and friendly staff.
Review: Pros: friendly staff, drop off shuttle bus, chit chat cafe is cheap to eat and basically the same menu as the restaurant, the spa services are heavenly, large room (we had balcony room 106 and 100 are close but not too close to pool) and comfortable beds, away from the Kuta Chaos, join in the free hotel activities like yoga or towel decorating. The pool is okay / average and the kids pool is enough to sit in relax and get wet. There is a play ground mainly for little ones and the kids club is for smaller children (we had an 8yr old and was too small for him). Breakfast was okay is buffet style with eggs and pancakes being prepared by chef on floor for your order. I can ask for cereal and doesn't cost extra but not in buffet. There is a supermarket and convenient store close by. Cons: the shuttle is drop off only not pick up the hotel isn't that close to Kuta, some times the staff don't understand your question or request, the balcony isn't a balcony as is on the main floor but gives u access to the pool - if u are too close u will get the pool / party noise in your room, the food is slow to cook and the BBQ night is not organized so not worth going to, at times the front of house staff don't communicate well with back of house especially if u want to join in with hotel activities that need booking. No restaurants close by so have to use hotel.

The pool is okay / average and the kids pool is enough to sit in relax and get wet. Breakfast was okay is buffet style with eggs and pancakes being prepared by chef on floor for your order. I can ask for cereal and doesn't cost extra but not in buffet. There is a supermarket and convenient store close by. Cons: the shuttle is drop off only not pick up the hotel isn't that close to Kuta, some times the staff don't understand your question or request, the balcony isn't a balcony as is on the main floor but gives u access to the pool - if u are too close u will get the pool / party noise in your room, the food is slow to cook and the BBQ night is not organized so not worth going to, at times the front of house staff don't communicate well with back of house especially if u want to join in with hotel activities that need booking. No restaurants close by so have to use hotel.
Review_Summary: The pool is okay / average and the kids pool is enough to sit in relax and get wet. Breakfast was okay is buffet style with eggs and pancakes being prepared by chef on floor for your order. The BBQ night is not organized so not worth going to.
Review_Bahasa: Pro: Staf yang ramah, drop off shuttle bus, Chit Chat Cafe murah untuk dimakan dan pada dasarnya menu yang sama dengan restoran, layanan spa adalah ruang surgawi, besar (kami memiliki ruang balkon 106 dan 100 dekat tetapi tidak terlalu dekat dengan kolam renang) dan tempat tidur yang nyaman, jauh dari kekacauan Kuta, bergabunglah dalam kegiatan hotel gratis seperti yogi atau dekorasi handuk. Kolam renangnya baik -baik saja / rata -rata dan kolam anak -anak sudah cukup untuk duduk santai dan basah. Ada tempat bermain terutama untuk anak -anak kecil dan Kids Club adalah untuk anak -anak yang lebih kecil (kami memiliki usia 8 tahun dan terlalu kecil untuknya). Sarapan baik -baik saja adalah gaya prasmanan dengan telur dan pancake yang disiapkan oleh koki di lantai untuk pesanan Anda. Saya bisa meminta sereal dan tidak membutuhkan biaya tambahan tetapi tidak dalam prasmanan. Ada toko supermarket dan nyaman di dekatnya. Cons: the shuttle is drop off only not pick up the hotel isn't that close to Kuta, some times the staff don't understand your question or request, the balcony isn't a balcony as is on the main floor but gives u access to the pool - if u are too close u will get the pool / party noise in your room, the food is slow to cook and the BBQ night is not organized so not worth going to, at times the front of house staff don't communicate well with back of house especially if u want to join in with Kegiatan hotel yang perlu dipesan. Tidak ada restoran di dekatnya, jadi harus menggunakan hotel.

Tidak ada restoran di dekatnya, jadi harus menggunakan hotel.

Subjeck: Hotel Kuta Central - Best food and Spa
Review: This hotel is best for any age. Specially excellent Breakfast and any food ordered. The spa is very good. very friendly staff. We had issues with a.c though. called reception at 12 am night. came and fixed within 10 min. After that all good. only thing rooms are small. we were only 2 people so no problem.. but they have other category executive rooms also which I did not check out. Pool for kids and adults. The front part is renovating so there price is very low. but it is great. will stay at the same place next time.

After that all good. only thing rooms are small. we were only 2 people so no problem.. but they have other category executive rooms also which I did not check out. Pool for kids and adults. Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini terbaik untuk segala usia. Sarapan yang sangat baik dan makanan apa pun yang dipesan. Spanya sangat bagus. Staf yang sangat ramah. Kami memiliki masalah dengan A.C. Disebut resepsi pada jam 12 pagi. datang dan diperbaiki dalam waktu 10 menit. Setelah itu semua bagus. Satu -satunya kamar yang kecil. Kami hanya 2 orang jadi tidak ada masalah .. tetapi mereka memiliki ruang eksekutif kategori lain juga yang tidak saya periksa. Kolam renang untuk anak -anak dan orang dewasa. Bagian depan sedang direnovasi sehingga harga sangat rendah. Tapi itu bagus. akan tinggal di tempat yang sama lain kali.

Disebut resepsi pada jam 12 pagi. datang dan diperbaiki dalam waktu 10 menit. Setelah itu semua bagus. Satu -satunya kamar yang kecil. Bagian depan sedang direnovasi sehingga harga sangat rendah. Tapi itu bagus. akan tinggal di tempat yang sama lain kali.

Review: Standard room doesn't have any window, air condition is not working well. Only good thing is, buffet breakfast was nice. There are other hotels in this area with this sort of price. Far from kuta central.
Review_English: Standard room doesn't have any window, air condition is not working well. Only good thing is, buffet breakfast was nice. There are other hotels in this area with this sort of price. Far from kuta central.
Review_Summary: Standard room doesn't have any window, air condition is not working well. Only good thing is, buffet breakfast was nice. There are other hotels in this area with this sort of price. Far from kuta central.
Review_Bahasa: Kamar standar tidak memiliki jendela, AC tidak berfungsi dengan baik. Satu -satunya hal yang baik, sarapan prasmanan bagus. Ada hotel lain di daerah ini dengan harga semacam ini. Jauh dari Kuta Central.
Review_Clean: Kamar standar tidak memiliki jendela, AC tidak berfungsi dengan baik. Satu -satunya hal yang baik, sarapan prasmanan bagus. Ada hotel lain di daerah ini dengan harga semacam ini. Jauh dari Kuta Central.

Review: The hotel is alright. The service is good, but the facilities are not that great. The pool is small, so not all guests can utilise the pool at the same time. There is a shuttle bus to (1) Discovery Mall (2) Beachwalk [Kuta Beach] (3) Legian Beach. However, the shuttle bus will only take you to one of these destinations. It will not take you back to the hotel. Taxis parked on the hotel premises are expensive. Of all the taxi companies, Blue Bird seems the least expensive. From Kuta Beach to the hotel, will cost you about 20.000 (= €2) during the day and 27.500 (= €2,75) during the evening/night. The hotel also has a spa, but the prices for a massage are much lower if you go to a massage salon in the "centre". Also, all the prices in the hotel (with the exception of food & beverages ordered at the Chat Time café) are subject to tax. The "centre" is about a 10-15 min walk from the hotel. When you exit the hotel from the lobby (the hotel has multiple exists) you take a left and then keep walking straight. Overall, I had an enjoyable stay. However, I probably would not recommend this hotel to family or friends. I would advise them to pick a hotel in the "centre" or closer to the beach. If you are staying for a few days and you ordered a standard room, ask for an upgrade. The standard rooms either have no windows or are located next to the pool. The rooms on the second floor have a balcony and the rooms on the third floor have windows which can be opened.

The rooms on the second floor have a balcony and the rooms on the third floor have windows which can be opened.

Review_Bahasa: Hotelnya baik -baik saja. Layanannya bagus, tetapi fasilitasnya tidak terlalu bagus. Kolam renang kecil, jadi tidak semua tamu dapat memanfaatkan kolam renang pada saat yang sama. Ada bus antar -jemput untuk (1) Discovery Mall (2) Beachwalk [Pantai Kuta] (3) Pantai Legian. Namun, bus antar -jemput hanya akan membawa Anda ke salah satu tujuan ini. Ini tidak akan membawa Anda kembali ke hotel. Taksi yang diparkir di tempat hotel itu mahal. Dari semua perusahaan taksi, Blue Bird tampaknya paling murah. Dari Pantai Kuta ke hotel, akan dikenakan biaya sekitar 20.000 (= € 2) pada siang hari dan 27.500 (= € 2,75) selama malam/malam. Hotel ini juga memiliki spa, tetapi harga pijatan jauh lebih rendah jika Anda pergi ke salon pijat di "pusat". Juga, semua harga di hotel (dengan pengecualian makanan & minuman yang dipesan di kafe waktu obrolan) dikenakan pajak. "Pusat" berjarak sekitar 10-15 menit berjalan kaki dari hotel. Saat Anda keluar dari hotel dari lobi (hotel ini ada banyak), Anda pergi dan kemudian terus berjalan lurus. Secara keseluruhan, saya memiliki masa tinggal yang menyenangkan. Namun, saya mungkin tidak akan merekomendasikan hotel ini kepada keluarga atau teman. Saya akan menyarankan mereka untuk memilih hotel di "pusat" atau lebih dekat ke pantai. Jika Anda tinggal selama beberapa hari dan Anda memesan kamar standar, minta upgrade. Kamar standar tidak memiliki jendela atau terletak di sebelah kolam renang. Kamar -kamar di lantai dua memiliki balkon dan kamar -kamar di lantai tiga memiliki jendela yang dapat dibuka.

Review: Room was fine however the restaurant was very busy at breakfast and in the evening. Staff did their best but there wasn't enough of them. Breakfast food was good but evening BBQ was less so. The hotel is a good 20-30 mins to the beach.
Review_English: Room was fine however the restaurant was very busy at breakfast and in the evening. Staff did their best but there wasn't enough of them. Breakfast food was good but evening BBQ was less so. The hotel is a good 20-30 mins to the beach.

Review_Bahasa: Kamar baik -baik saja namun restoran itu sangat sibuk saat sarapan dan di malam hari. Staf melakukan yang terbaik tetapi tidak ada cukup dari mereka. Makanan sarapan enak tapi BBQ malam kurang begitu. Hotel ini adalah 20-30 menit yang bagus ke pantai.

Subjeck: not too pricey hotel with 4 star services
Review: been here 2 times. the first time we came here, we're travelling with toddler. we got a very big room and so spacious (i dont know what type the room we slept in but i ordered standard room via pegipegi.com) this year i came with my toddler, baby and maid. the room i request is triple bed. the room is quiet small for triple bed. not like the first time i came. the room size for triple bed is not quiet cozy. but i happy with the services. i ordered via hotel web, airport transfer and they pick me up on time in the middle of the night and the check in process is fast. the staff is really helpfull and they reply my email fast. the breakfast has a various menu. from asian and western.

Review_Bahasa: pernah ke sini 2 kali. Pertama kali kami datang ke sini, kami bepergian dengan balita. Kami mendapat ruangan yang sangat besar dan sangat luas (saya tidak tahu jenis kamar apa yang kami tidur, tetapi saya memesan kamar standar melalui Pegipegi.com) tahun ini saya datang dengan balita, bayi, dan pelayan saya. Kamar yang saya minta adalah tiga tempat tidur. Kamarnya tenang kecil untuk triple bed. Tidak seperti pertama kali saya datang. Ukuran kamar untuk triple bed tidak nyaman nyaman. Tapi saya senang dengan layanannya. Saya memesan melalui web hotel, transfer bandara dan mereka menjemput saya tepat waktu di tengah malam dan proses check -in cepat. Staf sangat membantu dan mereka membalas email saya dengan cepat. Sarapan memiliki berbagai menu. dari Asia dan Barat.

Subjeck: Jangan pesan online sebelum anda lihat kamarnya!
Review: Mereka punya byk kamar dan tempatnya berjauhan.. Pertama sy dpt kmr kecil tdk spt di foto dan bau yg tdk sedap dr kmr. Lalu km komplain dan di ganti ke kmr yg lbh besar dan jauh letak nya dr yg pertama. Kira2 ada 1jam lbh kita dikamar tapi ac tdk dingin juga. Kami komplain 2xbaru di tanggapi oleh pihak hotel dan di pindah ke kamar yg lbh bagus dg 2bh ac dan didpn pool. Kondisi kami saat itu capek dan harus pindah2 kamar karena kesalahan pihak hotel. Sangat disayangan kejadian spt ini bisa terjadi. Check in yg lama dan hrs menunggu kamar yg msh dibersihkan jg sangat buruk pelayanan nya.
Review_English: They have a lot of rooms and the place is far apart .. first I can get small like not in photos and unpleasant odors from kmr. Then you complain and changed to the bigger KMR and far from the first. I guess there is 1 hour more we are in the room but the air conditioner is not cold either. We complained 2xbaru in responding to the hotel and moved to a room that was better with 2bh AC and Didpn Pool. Our condition at that time was tired and had to move rooms because of the fault of the hotel. Very spoiled events such as this can occur. Check in the old one and must wait for the room that is still cleaned also very bad service.

Then you complain and changed to the bigger KMR and far from the first. I guess there is 1 hour more we are in the room but the air conditioner is not cold either. We complained 2xbaru in responding to the hotel and moved to a room that was better with 2bh AC and Didpn Pool. Our condition at that time was tired and had to move rooms because of the fault of the hotel. Very spoiled events such as this can occur. Check in the old one and must wait for the room that is still cleaned also very bad service.
Review_Bahasa: Mereka memiliki banyak kamar dan tempat ini berjauhan .. Pertama saya bisa menjadi kecil seperti tidak di foto dan bau yang tidak menyenangkan dari KMR. Kemudian Anda mengeluh dan berubah menjadi KMR yang lebih besar dan jauh dari yang pertama. Saya kira ada 1 jam lagi kami berada di dalam ruangan tetapi AC juga tidak dingin. Kami mengeluh 2xbaru dalam menanggapi hotel dan pindah ke kamar yang lebih baik dengan kolam 2bh AC dan DIDPN. Kondisi kami pada waktu itu lelah dan harus memindahkan kamar karena kesalahan hotel. Peristiwa yang sangat manja seperti ini dapat terjadi. Periksa yang lama dan harus menunggu kamar yang masih dibersihkan juga layanan yang sangat buruk.

Subjeck: Never trust pics you see online
Review: The pictures on the internet make this place look like a new hotel with up to date facilities. Believe me it's not and way far from it. The only thing good about this place is the friendly staff and their service. They get paid so little for everything they do. The hallways echo and it becomes so noisy especially at night where you can hear everything amplified. The pool is small especially for the amount of people staying at this place and the positioning only gets the morning sun for barely 2-3 hours as the shade from the building completely blocks it out. The rooms aren't the cleanest and they are outdated not like what you see in the beautifully presented pics online. The entry via the car park is like some run down deserted ghost town if it wasn't for all the vehicles. The restaurant doesn't provide a decent range of food for breakfast; mostly Indonesian but taste is up there in rating. Would have been great to cater for the westerners or most of the Aussies staying here. You need to ask for housekeeping to change the sheets every now and then but that's not bad as anything you ask for they run and go out of their way to do it for your satisfaction. A rating of 2 stars is quite complimentary for this place; if it wasn't for the staff, it would be lucky to get a rating of 1 star. Really disappointed and looking for another place to stay for the remaining 10 days with my family.

The pool is small especially for the amount of people staying at this place. Would have been great to cater for the westerners or most of the Aussies staying here.
Review_Bahasa: Gambar -gambar di internet membuat tempat ini terlihat seperti hotel baru dengan fasilitas terkini. Percayalah itu tidak dan jauh dari itu. Satu -satunya hal yang baik tentang tempat ini adalah staf yang ramah dan layanan mereka. Mereka dibayar sangat sedikit untuk semua yang mereka lakukan. Lorong -lorong bergema dan menjadi sangat berisik terutama di malam hari di mana Anda dapat mendengar semuanya diperkuat. Kolam renang kecil terutama untuk jumlah orang yang tinggal di tempat ini dan posisinya hanya mendapatkan matahari pagi selama 2-3 jam karena naungan dari gedung sepenuhnya menghalangi. Kamar -kamarnya bukan yang paling bersih dan mereka sudah ketinggalan zaman tidak seperti apa yang Anda lihat di foto -foto yang disajikan dengan indah secara online. Entri melalui tempat parkir mobil seperti beberapa lari ke kota hantu sepi jika bukan karena semua kendaraan. Restoran tidak menyediakan berbagai makanan yang layak untuk sarapan; Sebagian besar orang Indonesia tetapi rasanya ada di peringkat. Akan sangat bagus untuk melayani orang Barat atau sebagian besar orang Australia yang tinggal di sini. Anda perlu meminta rumah tangga untuk mengganti lembaran sesekali tetapi itu tidak buruk karena apa pun yang Anda minta mereka berlari dan pergi keluar dari jalan mereka untuk melakukannya untuk kepuasan Anda. Peringkat 2 bintang cukup gratis untuk tempat ini; Jika bukan karena staf, akan beruntung mendapatkan peringkat 1 bintang. Benar -benar kecewa dan mencari tempat lain untuk tinggal selama 10 hari yang tersisa bersama keluarga saya.
Review_Clean: Gambar -gambar di internet membuat tempat ini terlihat seperti hotel baru dengan fasilitas terkini. Percayalah itu tidak dan jauh dari itu. Satu -satunya hal yang baik tentang tempat ini adalah staf yang ramah dan layanan mereka. Mereka dibayar sangat sedikit untuk semua yang mereka lakukan. Lorong -lorong bergema dan menjadi sangat berisik terutama di malam hari di mana Anda dapat mendengar semuanya diperkuat. Kolam renang kecil terutama untuk jumlah orang yang tinggal di tempat ini dan posisinya hanya mendapatkan matahari pagi selama 2-3 jam karena naungan dari gedung sepenuhnya menghalangi. Kamar -kamarnya bukan yang paling bersih dan mereka sudah ketinggalan zaman tidak seperti apa yang Anda lihat di foto -foto yang disajikan dengan indah secara online. Entri melalui tempat parkir mobil seperti beberapa lari ke kota hantu sepi jika bukan karena semua kendaraan. Restoran tidak menyediakan berbagai makanan yang layak untuk sarapan Sebagian besar orang Indonesia tetapi rasanya ada di peringkat. Akan sangat bagus untuk melayani orang Barat atau sebagian besar orang Australia yang tinggal di sini. Anda perlu meminta rumah tangga untuk mengganti lembaran sesekali tetapi itu tidak buruk karena apa pun yang Anda minta mereka berlari dan pergi keluar dari jalan mereka untuk melakukannya untuk kepuasan Anda. Peringkat 2 bintang cukup gratis untuk tempat ini Jika bukan karena staf, akan beruntung mendapatkan peringkat 1 bintang. Benar -benar kecewa dan mencari tempat lain untuk tinggal selama 10 hari yang tersisa bersama keluarga saya.

Review: Stayed with our 3 children for one week. $100 a night for a family of 5 is very cheap and so my expectations were adjusted accordingly. Our Family Room was of a generous size and was clean upon arrival. Housekeeping very efficient so no complaints there. Pool is not huge but we all enjoyed it and it never seemed crowded though the hotel was full. Staff are very friendly and the manager Adam was everything you would expect from a manager, knowledgeable engaged and personable. Babysitting service was very good and i would be comfortable leaving my children with any of the hotels sitters. If you are looking for somewhere to stay that is clean and comfortable with friendly service but will not break the budget then this is the hotel for you.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal dengan 3 anak kami selama satu minggu. $ 100 per malam untuk keluarga yang terdiri dari 5 orang sangat murah sehingga harapan saya disesuaikan. Ruang keluarga kami berukuran besar dan bersih pada saat kedatangan. Housekeeping sangat efisien sehingga tidak ada keluhan di sana. Kolam renang tidak besar tetapi kami semua menikmatinya dan sepertinya tidak pernah ramai meskipun hotel itu penuh. Staf sangat ramah dan manajer Adam adalah segalanya yang Anda harapkan dari seorang manajer, bertunangan dan kepribadian yang berpengetahuan luas. Layanan pengasuhan anak sangat bagus dan saya akan merasa nyaman meninggalkan anak -anak saya dengan pengasuh hotel mana pun. Jika Anda mencari tempat tinggal yang bersih dan nyaman dengan layanan yang ramah tetapi tidak akan merusak anggaran maka ini adalah hotel untuk Anda.

Review: Hotel oceniam na bobry, polozony jest w dobrym miejscu z ktorego mozna w miare krotkim czasie dostac sie w kazde interesujace jsz miejsce tj. lotnisko, plaza, centrum handlowe itp. Czytalem kilka zlych opini o hotelu ale byly one od osob ktore zamowily najtansze pokoje ja zabukowalem Deluxe Room i wszytko bylo ok. Pokoje dobrej wielkosci, czyste, duzy balkon z dobrze dzialajaca klimatyzacja. Na terenie hotelu przyjemne Spa, salon fryzjerski itp. Jedzenie bardzo dobre, zawsze smaczne choc sniadania monotematyczne no ale nie czepiajmy sie. Hotel zapewnia takze transport na pobliskie plaze i do centrow handlowych. Obsluga zawsze usmiechnieta i bardzo pomocna super customer service. Godny polecenia hotel. Jezeli masz jakiekolwiek pytania zapraszam na priv.
Review_English: I assess the hotel on beavers, it is located in a good place from which you can get in a short time in every interesting place, i.e. the airport, plaza, shopping center, etc. I read a few bad opinions about the hotel but they were from the people who ordered the cheapest rooms. Air conditioning well working. At the hotel, a pleasant spa, hair salon, etc. Eating very good, always tasty, though monothematic breakfast, but let's not cling to. The hotel also provides transport to nearby planes and to shopping center. Service always smiled and very helpful Super Customer Service. Hotel recommendable. If you have any questions, I invite you to priv.

Review_Bahasa: Saya menilai hotel dengan Beavers, terletak di tempat yang baik dari mana Anda bisa mendapatkan waktu singkat di setiap tempat yang menarik, yaitu bandara, plaza, pusat perbelanjaan, dll. Saya membaca beberapa pendapat buruk tentang hotel tetapi mereka berasal dari orang -orang yang memesan kamar termurah. AC bekerja dengan baik. Di hotel, spa yang menyenangkan, salon rambut, dll. Makan dengan sangat enak, selalu enak, meskipun sarapan monothematic, tapi jangan berpegang teguh. Hotel ini juga menyediakan transportasi ke pesawat terdekat dan ke pusat perbelanjaan. Layanan selalu tersenyum dan sangat membantu layanan pelanggan super. Hotel Direkomendasikan. Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan, saya mengundang Anda ke Priv.

Review: It was a pleasant stay at Kuta Central Park Hotel. Rooms were well maintained and came with inclusive breakfast buffet which covered pretty much everything. The pool is pretty clean and pool-side bad was a nice effect as well. Hotel staff is well behaved and highly co-operative. It is walking distance from legian beach and you can walk through legian street for street shopping. We got it on discount and it was truly value for money :)

Review_Bahasa: Itu adalah masa menginap yang menyenangkan di Kuta Central Park Hotel. Kamar dipelihara dengan baik dan datang dengan sarapan prasmanan inklusif yang mencakup hampir semuanya. Kolam renang sangat bersih dan bad-side bad juga merupakan efek yang bagus. Staf hotel berperilaku baik dan sangat kooperatif. Berjalan kaki dari pantai Legian dan Anda dapat berjalan melalui Legian Street untuk berbelanja di jalanan. Kami mendapatkannya dengan diskon dan itu benar -benar nilai uang :)

Review: Check your room facilities before booking. There are three categories: basis - no window; deluxe - with window and superior - with balcony or patio. Main downside for this hotel is its position. In town and not near any shops, bars or restaurants. If you only want a quiet hotel away from tourist outlets then this is perfect. Hotel staff very friendly and helpful. They can help you arrange any trips you may want to make and help you decide what you may want. Food was good and breakfast was excellent. Room [ I had one with a patio ] was large and had two air/con units. Large bathroom also with air/con. Daily and friendly room service. Could be a problem if anyone is disabled depending on degree of disability. I need a stick and hotel not designed for wheelchairs although staff were very friendly and helpful to me where there were steps involved. If I were going back to Bali I would pick a different position due to lack of amenities but if only going for hotel and a few trips then I would choose this hotel again as everyone very friendly and helpful.

Review_Bahasa: Periksa fasilitas kamar Anda sebelum memesan. Ada tiga kategori: basis - tidak ada jendela; Deluxe - dengan jendela dan superior - dengan balkon atau teras. Kelemahan utama untuk hotel ini adalah posisinya. Di kota dan tidak dekat toko, bar, atau restoran. Jika Anda hanya ingin hotel yang tenang jauh dari outlet wisata maka ini sempurna. Staf hotel sangat ramah dan membantu. Mereka dapat membantu Anda mengatur perjalanan apa pun yang mungkin ingin Anda lakukan dan membantu Anda memutuskan apa yang Anda inginkan. Makanan enak dan sarapan sangat baik. Kamar [saya punya satu dengan teras] besar dan memiliki dua unit udara/con. Kamar mandi besar juga dengan udara/penipu. Layanan kamar harian dan ramah. Bisa menjadi masalah jika ada yang dinonaktifkan tergantung pada tingkat kecacatan. Saya membutuhkan tongkat dan hotel yang tidak dirancang untuk kursi roda meskipun staf sangat ramah dan membantu saya di mana ada langkah -langkah yang terlibat. Jika saya kembali ke Bali, saya akan memilih posisi yang berbeda karena kurangnya fasilitas tetapi jika hanya pergi untuk hotel dan beberapa perjalanan maka saya akan memilih hotel ini lagi karena semua orang yang sangat ramah dan membantu.

Review: buon hotel, abbastanza pulito, piscina leggermente piccola rispetto al numero di camere. Ristorante nella media, niente di speciale. La colazione eccellente molto variata che accontenta tutti. Il personale molto gentile e disponibile. Camere spaziose ed accoglienti.
Review_English: Good hotel, fairly clean, slightly small swimming pool compared to the number of rooms. Average restaurant, nothing special. Very varied excellent breakfast that satisfies everyone. Very kind and helpful staff. Spacious and welcoming rooms.
Review_Summary: Good hotel, fairly clean, slightly small swimming pool compared to the number of rooms. Average restaurant, nothing special. Very varied excellent breakfast that satisfies everyone. Very kind and helpful staff. Spacious and welcoming rooms.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus, kolam renang yang cukup bersih, sedikit kecil dibandingkan dengan jumlah kamar. Rata -rata restoran, tidak ada yang istimewa. Sarapan yang sangat bervariasi yang memuaskan semua orang. Staf yang sangat baik dan membantu. Kamar yang luas dan ramah.
Review_Clean: Hotel yang bagus, kolam renang yang cukup bersih, sedikit kecil dibandingkan dengan jumlah kamar. Rata -rata restoran, tidak ada yang istimewa. Sarapan yang sangat bervariasi yang memuaskan semua orang. Staf yang sangat baik dan membantu. Kamar yang luas dan ramah.

Subjeck: Super venlige og meget hjælpsomme ansatte på hele hotellet
Review: Min kone og jeg har lige været på denne hotel i 3 uger ,og vi blev meget tilfredse med de meget venlige personale på hele hotel ,meget pænt rent alle steder og incl. på vores værelser ,samt en meget bredt udvalg af morgenmad til alle gæster .
Review_English: My wife and I have just been to this hotel for 3 weeks and we were very pleased with the very friendly staff in the whole hotel, very nicely clean everywhere and incl. in our rooms, as well as a very wide selection of breakfast for all guests.
Review_Summary: My wife and I have just been to this hotel for 3 weeks and we were very pleased with the very friendly staff in the whole hotel, very nicely clean everywhere and incl. in our rooms, as well as a very wide selection of breakfast for all guests.
Review_Bahasa: Saya dan istri saya baru saja ke hotel ini selama 3 minggu dan kami sangat senang dengan staf yang sangat ramah di seluruh hotel, sangat bersih di mana -mana dan termasuk. Di kamar kami, serta banyak pilihan sarapan untuk semua tamu.

Review: What a pleasant stay at KUTA Central Park hotel. Rooms very amazing and very clean great breakfast menus and staff were so helpful. Would recommend this hotel to anyone waiting a peaceful relaxing holiday

Review: We used this hotel as somewhere to stay on our last night, as we were flying out late at night. The hotel is a very strange set up (surrounded by local businesses and offices.) The staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms we had didn't have windows (we didn't mind because we had a great sleep in) but the room is fit with a deodoriser which can get a bit full on after a while.) The pool temperature was colder than other resorts as its surrounded by buildings and doesn't seem to get much sunlight during the day. Besides the restaurant in the resort there are no other restaurants within walking distance. Overall not bad, and suited for what we needed it for.

Review_Bahasa: Kami menggunakan hotel ini sebagai tempat untuk menginap di malam terakhir kami, saat kami terbang larut malam. Hotel ini merupakan pengaturan yang sangat aneh (dikelilingi oleh bisnis dan kantor lokal.) Staf ramah dan membantu. Kamar -kamar yang kami tidak memiliki jendela (kami tidak keberatan karena kami tidur nyenyak) tetapi kamarnya cocok dengan deodoriser yang bisa menjadi sedikit penuh setelah beberapa saat.) Suhu kolam lebih dingin daripada resor lain seperti yang dikelilingi oleh bangunan dan tampaknya tidak mendapatkan banyak sinar matahari di siang hari. Selain restoran di resor, tidak ada restoran lain dalam jarak berjalan kaki. Secara keseluruhan tidak buruk, dan cocok untuk apa yang kami butuhkan.

Review: Kuta Central Park Hotel is fantastic!! The room i stayed in was very comfy and clean, pool area and overall hotel styling was very nice and staff were also very friendly. The hotel exceeded my expectations noting it is not an expensive hotel. I highly recommend the hotel.

Review: We booked from the UK a 'standard room' and on our arrival we were advised that these do not have a window so we upgraded at a reasonable rate to a large room on the second floor (room 245) with a very large window. Unfortunately after an early night post our very long flight time from the UK we were astounded to be woken by noisy guests in the passage outside the room at 0330 in the morning. The rooms insulation from sound was useless. We were woken by children playing in the pool at 0700 in the morning and on another day by adults walking back to their rooms at 0400 and at just about any other time you could imagine. When we eventually checked out we were very sleep deprived and glad to leave! It wasn't all bad by any means as the breakfasts were very pleasant until a sudden influx of short stay backpackers upped the numbers to 600 for two days! The staff in most areas were lovely, friendly, helpful and polite. Reception staff in particular were really helpful in changing money and arranging trips. The walk if you are mad enough to try it to the beach at Kuta/Legian which takes about 20 minutes is very challenging with very poor paths and no way to get across roads unless you are brave and fast. Once at the beach you have to contend with plastic debris in the water by the ton and it really is ghastly to swim in, although the beach itself is kept reasonably clean by various local sun bed owners and government JCBs who rake and remove the rubbish between them! Far from the standard we expect to see! Although not directly a hotel responsibility it must be considered by customers who are expecting to be able get to a beach without using a taxi!
Review_English: We booked from the UK a 'standard room' and on our arrival we were advised that these do not have a window so we upgraded at a reasonable rate to a large room on the second floor (room 245) with a very large window. Unfortunately after an early night post our very long flight time from the UK we were astounded to be woken by noisy guests in the passage outside the room at 0330 in the morning. The rooms insulation from sound was useless. We were woken by children playing in the pool at 0700 in the morning and on another day by adults walking back to their rooms at 0400 and at just about any other time you could imagine. When we eventually checked out we were very sleep deprived and glad to leave! It wasn't all bad by any means as the breakfasts were very pleasant until a sudden influx of short stay backpackers upped the numbers to 600 for two days! The staff in most areas were lovely, friendly, helpful and polite. Reception staff in particular were really helpful in changing money and arranging trips. The walk if you are mad enough to try it to the beach at Kuta/Legian which takes about 20 minutes is very challenging with very poor paths and no way to get across roads unless you are brave and fast. Once at the beach you have to contend with plastic debris in the water by the ton and it really is ghastly to swim in, although the beach itself is kept reasonably clean by various local sun bed owners and government JCBs who rake and remove the rubbish between them! Far from the standard we expect to see! Although not directly a hotel responsibility it must be considered by customers who are expecting to be able get to a beach without using a taxi!
Review_Summary: We booked from the UK a 'standard room' and on our arrival we were advised that these do not have a window. We upgraded at a reasonable rate to a large room on the second floor (room 245) with a very large window. The rooms insulation from sound was useless. We were woken by children playing in the pool at 0700 in the morning and on another day by adults walking back to their rooms at 0400 and at just about any other time you could imagine.
Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan dari Inggris A 'Ruang Standar' dan pada saat kedatangan kami disarankan agar ini tidak memiliki jendela sehingga kami memutakhirkan dengan harga yang wajar ke ruangan besar di lantai dua (Kamar 245) dengan jendela yang sangat besar. Sayangnya setelah postingan di awal malam kami waktu penerbangan yang sangat lama dari Inggris, kami terkejut dibangunkan oleh para tamu yang bising di bagian di luar ruangan pada pukul 03330 pagi. Insulasi kamar dari suara tidak berguna. Kami dibangunkan oleh anak -anak yang bermain di kolam renang pukul 07.00 di pagi hari dan pada hari lain oleh orang dewasa berjalan kembali ke kamar mereka pada pukul 04.00 dan di waktu lain yang bisa Anda bayangkan. Ketika kami akhirnya memeriksa, kami sangat kurang tidur dan senang pergi! Dengan cara apa pun tidak semuanya buruk karena sarapan sangat menyenangkan sampai tiba -tiba masuknya backpacker pendek meningkatkan angka menjadi 600 selama dua hari! Staf di sebagian besar wilayah itu indah, ramah, membantu dan sopan. Staf resepsi khususnya sangat membantu dalam mengubah uang dan mengatur perjalanan. Jalan -jalan jika Anda cukup marah untuk mencobanya ke pantai di Kuta/Legian yang membutuhkan waktu sekitar 20 menit sangat menantang dengan jalan setapak yang sangat buruk dan tidak ada cara untuk melintasi jalan kecuali Anda berani dan cepat. Begitu berada di pantai Anda harus bersaing dengan puing -puing plastik di dalam air dan benar -benar mengerikan untuk berenang, meskipun pantai itu sendiri dijaga cukup bersih oleh berbagai pemilik tempat tidur berjemur lokal dan JCB pemerintah yang menyapu dan melepas sampah di antara mereka! Jauh dari standar yang kami harapkan untuk dilihat! Meskipun tidak secara langsung tanggung jawab hotel, itu harus dipertimbangkan oleh pelanggan yang berharap bisa sampai ke pantai tanpa menggunakan taksi!

Review: Kuta Central Park Hotel Bali, adalah Hotel di Jl Patih Jelantik . Lokasinya tidak jauh dari Kuta Bali , dari Pom Bensin Kuta masih lurus nanti ada perempatan pertama belok kiri. Kesan pertama menginap di hotel ini , di mulai dari check in kita sudah di sambut dengan welcome drink utk 2 org . Saat itu saya tidak bisa check in karna kurang dari Pukul 12.00 sehingga saya hanya menitipkan barang - barang saya di Hotel dan mendapatkan bukti penitipan . Itu poin plus pertama karna safety jika mau menitipkan barang bawaan kita . Kebetulan saya menginap 1 malam di kamar 384 . Room nya sangat luas , ada kursi untuk tamu , bed nya sangat nyaman , ada 4 bantal besar dan 2 bantal kecil jadi total 1 room ada 6 bantal . Kamar mandi luas beserta peralatan mandi , handuk bersih , ada meja rias , lemari baju , mini bar , telepon , shower berfungsi dengan baik . Breakfast sangat bervariasi , petugas sangat ramah , pool nya luas , ada 2 pool utk anak dan dewasa . Sangat di sarankan untuk menginap disini .
Review_English: Kuta Central Park Hotel Bali, is a hotel on Jl Patih Jelantik. The location is not far from Kuta Bali, from the Kuta gas station is still straight there will be the first intersection turn left. The first impression of staying at this hotel, starting from the check -in we have been welcomed with a welcome drink for 2 people. At that time I could not check in because it was less than 12.00 so I only left my items at the hotel and got proof of daycraft. That's the first plus point because safety if you want to leave our luggage. I happened to stay 1 night in room 384. The room is very spacious, there are chairs for guests, the bed is very comfortable, there are 4 large pillows and 2 small pillows so a total of 1 room has 6 pillows. The room is spacious along with toiletries, clean towels, there are dressing tables, wardrobes, mini bar, telephone, shower functioning properly. Breakfast varies greatly, the officers are very friendly, the pool is wide, there are 2 pools for children and adults. It is highly recommended to stay here.

Subjeck: Clean Hotel and value for money
Review: It's affordable with massive, clean and tidy room. The breakfast offer lots of choices but it's repetitive menu. Not a real strategic location, but the price of this hotel is very economical providing such good and excellent room and services.
Review_English: It's affordable with massive, clean and tidy room. The breakfast offer lots of choices but it's repetitive menu. Not a real strategic location, but the price of this hotel is very economical providing such good and excellent room and services.
Review_Summary: It's affordable with massive, clean and tidy room. The breakfast offer lots of choices but it's repetitive menu. Not a real strategic location, but the price of this hotel is very economical providing such good and excellent room and services.
Review_Bahasa: Terjangkau dengan kamar besar, bersih dan rapi. Sarapan menawarkan banyak pilihan tetapi ini menu berulang. Bukan lokasi strategis yang nyata, tetapi harga hotel ini sangat ekonomis menyediakan kamar dan layanan yang baik dan sangat baik.

Subjeck: Lovely hotel.. Well worth a visit!
Review: This is a lovely hotel, we arrived in the middle night & there is a 24 hour front desk with concierge who took our bags from the taxi to our room The staff are so friendly & helpful all around the hotel, from reception to restaurant to bar to housekeeping, all so lovely and makes the visit so much better The breakfast is included & is a buffet selection. They could have a few more western options as it is unusual for us to eat rice & potatoes for breakfast but they have got a pancake & crepe station and the food quality is lovely We had one of the BBQ nights in the restaurant - highly recommended it was such amazing food all fresh from the grill and very cheap! Our room was 'no view' according to booking.com which means 'no window'. In honesty it took me a day to realise what it was (I was very tired when we arrived!) I didn't like about the room as it's very spacious with a huge bed etc. But once I realised, it was a bit claustrophobic, it's more that you don't know about the weather/time of day etc. But as we only stayed a few nights it wasn't the end of the world! A free shuttle is offered which is great, when we moved on the taxi driver from in the hotel wanted to charge us 80,000 rupies, when we walked outside to the taxi rank it was 40,000 so be careful! The location isn't hugely central, about 35 mins walk to kuta beach & about 15 mins to legion. There isn't much directly around the hotel compared to other hotels which are more central but there's a lot going on in the hotel! Definitely worth a stay!

They could have a few more western options as it is unusual for us to eat rice & potatoes for breakfast but they have got a pancake & crepe station and the food quality is lovely We had one of the BBQ nights in the restaurant - highly recommended it was such amazing food all fresh from the grill and very cheap! Review_Bahasa: Ini adalah hotel yang indah, kami tiba di malam tengah & ada meja depan 24 jam dengan concierge yang membawa tas kami dari taksi ke kamar kami, stafnya sangat ramah & membantu di sekitar hotel, dari resepsi ke restoran hingga bar hingga rumah tangga, semuanya sangat indah dan membuat kunjungan jauh lebih baik, sarapan sudah termasuk & merupakan pilihan prasmanan. Mereka dapat memiliki beberapa pilihan Barat karena tidak biasa bagi kami untuk makan nasi & kentang untuk sarapan tetapi mereka memiliki stasiun pancake & crepe dan kualitas makanannya indah kami memiliki salah satu malam BBQ di restoran - sangat disarankan itu adalah makanan yang luar biasa yang segar dari panggangan dan sangat murah! Kamar kami 'tidak ada tampilan' menurut booking.com yang berarti 'tidak ada jendela'. Sebagai kejujuran, saya butuh satu hari untuk menyadari apa itu (saya sangat lelah ketika kami tiba!) Saya tidak suka tentang ruangan itu karena sangat luas dengan tempat tidur besar dll. Tapi begitu saya menyadari, itu agak sesak, itu lebih dari Anda, Anda tidak tahu tentang cuaca/waktu, dll. Tapi karena kami hanya tinggal beberapa malam, itu bukan akhir dunia! Pesawat ulang -alik gratis ditawarkan yang hebat, ketika kami pindah ke sopir taksi dari di hotel ingin menagih kami 80.000 rupies, ketika kami berjalan di luar ke peringkat taksi itu adalah 40.000 jadi berhati -hatilah! Lokasi tidak terlalu sentral, sekitar 35 menit berjalan kaki ke Pantai Kuta & sekitar 15 menit ke Legiun. Tidak ada banyak hal langsung di sekitar hotel dibandingkan dengan hotel lain yang lebih sentral tetapi ada banyak hal yang terjadi di hotel! Pasti layak untuk tinggal!

Review: I wouldn't thunk twice to visit this hotel again. Had a really good breakfast with international and local items. Prices of other food and stuff were fair. Rooms were massive but unfortunately you can get barely feel the air condition. I believe air condition is a problem of the entire island. Pool was pretty small but still enjoyable, specially because it located in front of the bar. If you are looking for shopping just across the road you wouldn't book this hotel as you have to walk pretty far for shopping unless you wanna take cab. Overall good stay.

Review_Bahasa: Saya tidak akan berkecimpung dua kali untuk mengunjungi hotel ini lagi. Sarapan yang sangat enak dengan barang -barang internasional dan lokal. Harga makanan dan barang -barang lainnya adil. Kamar sangat besar tetapi sayangnya Anda hampir tidak merasakan kondisi udara. Saya percaya AC adalah masalah seluruh pulau. Pool cukup kecil tapi masih menyenangkan, khususnya karena terletak di depan bar. Jika Anda mencari belanja di seberang jalan, Anda tidak akan memesan hotel ini karena Anda harus berjalan cukup jauh untuk berbelanja kecuali Anda ingin naik taksi. Secara keseluruhan tetap bagus.

Review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for 9 days. We have stayed here including this stay, 3 times now. We are an older couple in our 70s. This last time was not as pleasant as previous stays. The main problem is that the hotel appears to cater for large tour groups from Java for weekends starting Friday to Sunday or we just happened to arrive in a really busy period. Consequently breakfast on those days was very busy and we found it very difficult to get a table. The food and juices on the busy days did not appear to be replenished regularly so sometimes the selection was not so good. Also on the busier days there was only one person cooking at the egg station and subsequently long queues formed. For all that the dining staff to their credit were very helpful and polite and assisted us two oldies in finding a table ( though we waited a short while at times) and also were helpful by bringing our order of eggs, tea and coffee to our table so that we didn't have to queue. So very thankful for that. I think the hotel strategy has changed recently and I believe is now marketing as a budget hotel to a more localised clientele. The hotel itself is reasonable, the rooms are clean and tidy, the beds clean and very comfortable and bathroom and toilets hygienic. Our rooms two aircon were very efficient and quiet. Some mornings the shower was only Luke warm but was bearable. Once again we found the staff throughout the hotel to be polite and helpful. This has always been the case when we have stayed previously. It is one of the hotels outstanding features The location of the hotel is good and while a little out of the way that suits us. Free shuttle service to Kuta runs every two hours from 10am to 6pm. The security is very good now they have moved the lobby across the way. Vehicle entry has to be through ticketed gateway and after dark access to the hotel itself is only possible with room keycard. Also there are several security guards patrolling around the perimeters. The only real con was that our room was on the ground floor right by the kids pool and play slides and constant screaming etc during day and up until 10pm at night was annoying, but kids have got to have fun and a set of earplugs fixed the problem. All in all the hotel is good value for the price paid. We will probably stay here again but maybe not so long next time.

The only real con was that our room was on the ground floor right by the kids pool and play slides and constant screaming etc during day and up until 10pm at night was annoying, but kids have got to have fun and a set of earplugs fixed the problem. All in all the hotel is good value for the price paid. We will probably stay here again but maybe not so long next time.
Review_Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for 9 days. We have stayed here including this stay, 3 times now. This last time was not as pleasant as previous stays. The hotel appears to cater for large tour groups from Java for weekends starting Friday to Sunday.
Review_Bahasa: Saya dan istri saya tinggal di hotel ini selama 9 hari. Kami telah tinggal di sini termasuk masa inap ini, 3 kali sekarang. Kami adalah pasangan yang lebih tua di usia 70 -an. Terakhir kali ini tidak semarak sebelumnya. Masalah utama adalah bahwa hotel tampaknya melayani kelompok wisata besar dari Jawa untuk akhir pekan mulai Jumat hingga Minggu atau kami kebetulan tiba dalam periode yang sangat sibuk. Akibatnya sarapan pada hari -hari itu sangat sibuk dan kami merasa sangat sulit untuk mendapatkan meja. Makanan dan jus pada hari -hari sibuk tampaknya tidak diisi ulang secara teratur sehingga kadang -kadang pilihannya tidak begitu baik. Juga pada hari -hari yang lebih sibuk hanya ada satu orang yang memasak di stasiun telur dan kemudian antrian panjang terbentuk. Untuk semua bahwa staf makan untuk kredit mereka sangat membantu dan sopan dan membantu kami dua oldies dalam menemukan meja (meskipun kami menunggu beberapa waktu) dan juga membantu dengan membawa pesanan telur, teh, dan kopi kami ke meja kami sehingga kami tidak perlu mengantri. Sangat berterima kasih untuk itu. Saya pikir strategi hotel telah berubah baru -baru ini dan saya percaya sekarang pemasaran sebagai hotel anggaran untuk pelanggan yang lebih terlokalisasi. Hotel itu sendiri masuk akal, kamarnya bersih dan rapi, tempat tidur bersih dan sangat nyaman dan kamar mandi dan toilet higienis. Kamar kami, dua AC sangat efisien dan tenang. Beberapa pagi kamar mandi hanya Luke hangat tetapi dapat ditanggung. Sekali lagi kami menemukan staf di seluruh hotel bersikap sopan dan bermanfaat. Ini selalu menjadi kasus ketika kami tetap sebelumnya. Ini adalah salah satu hotel fitur luar biasa lokasi hotel ini bagus dan sementara sedikit keluar dari cara yang cocok untuk kita. Layanan antar -jemput gratis ke Kuta berjalan setiap dua jam dari jam 10 pagi hingga 6 sore. Keamanan sangat bagus sekarang mereka telah memindahkan lobi di seberang jalan. Entri kendaraan harus melalui gateway yang ditukanya dan setelah akses gelap ke hotel itu sendiri hanya dimungkinkan dengan kartu kunci kamar. Juga ada beberapa penjaga keamanan yang berpatroli di sekelilingnya. Satu -satunya penipu yang sebenarnya adalah bahwa kamar kami berada di lantai dasar tepat di dekat kolam anak -anak dan bermain slide dan berteriak terus -menerus dll di siang hari dan sampai jam 10 malam di malam hari menjengkelkan, tetapi anak -anak harus bersenang -senang dan satu set penyumbat telinga memperbaiki masalah. Semua di semua hotel adalah nilai bagus untuk harga yang dibayarkan. Kami mungkin akan tinggal di sini lagi tetapi mungkin tidak lama lagi.

Review: Have had the best 16 days in this hotel is now my second home .Staff are amazing Management always aim to please with there Service nothing is to much trouble Can't say enough about all the team members they make my stay here so enjoyable.Hotel location is great can walk in to Legian Shops Restaurants and beach in 10 minutes so easy

Review_Bahasa: Telah memiliki 16 hari terbaik di hotel ini sekarang adalah rumah kedua saya. Staf adalah manajemen yang luar biasa selalu bertujuan untuk menyenangkan dengan layanan tidak ada yang bisa banyak kesulitan tidak bisa mengatakan cukup tentang semua anggota tim yang mereka buat saya tinggal di sini sehingga menyenangkan. Lokasi hotel hebat dapat berjalan ke restoran dan pantai di 10 menit dalam 10 menit begitu mudah.
