Review: Inget att klaga på, mitt första omdöme med 5 stjärnor tror jag. Vilken service, vilka rum, vilken pool. Vi fick hjälp med allt. Vi bodde där en natt och dagen efter när vi skulle flyga 22.25 fick vi vara hos deras hotell hela dagen, bada, sola, äta, duscha, byta om, dom ringde taxi. Helt underbart, förmodligen det bästa hotellet vi någonsin besökt. Vi kommer tillbaka, kram Filip och Elvira.
Review_English: Nothing to complain about, my first judgment with 5 stars I think. What service, what rooms, what pool. We got help with everything. We stayed there one night and the day after when we were going to fly 22.25 we got to be at their hotel all day, swim, sunbathe, eat, shower, change, they called taxis. Absolutely wonderful, probably the best hotel we've ever visited. We come back, hug Filip and Elvira.
Review_Summary: Nothing to complain about, my first judgment with 5 stars I think. What service, what rooms, what pool. We got help with everything. We stayed there one night and the day after when we were going to fly 22.25 we got to be at their hotel all day, swim, sunbathe, eat, shower, change, they called taxis. Absolutely wonderful, probably the best hotel we've ever visited. We come back, hug Filip and Elvira.
Review_Bahasa: Tidak ada yang perlu dikeluhkan, penilaian pertama saya dengan 5 bintang menurut saya. Layanan apa, kamar apa, kolam renang apa. Kami mendapat bantuan dengan segalanya. Kami tinggal di sana suatu malam dan sehari setelahnya ketika kami akan terbang 22.25 kami harus berada di hotel mereka sepanjang hari, berenang, berjemur, makan, mandi, berubah, mereka memanggil taksi. Benar -benar luar biasa, mungkin hotel terbaik yang pernah kami kunjungi. Kami kembali, memeluk Filip dan Elvira.

Review: Very clean hotel with all staff being very polite and friendly. Room was comfortable and a good size. The food and bar area was a good size with inside and outside dining, room service was also available. There could be stricter rules with regards to smoking areas. Would stay here again.
Review_English: Very clean hotel with all staff being very polite and friendly. Room was comfortable and a good size. The food and bar area was a good size with inside and outside dining, room service was also available. There could be stricter rules with regards to smoking areas. Would stay here again.

The food and bar area was a good size with inside and outside dining, room service was also available. There could be stricter rules with regards to smoking areas. Would stay here again.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bersih dengan semua staf yang sangat sopan dan ramah. Kamar nyaman dan ukurannya bagus. Area makanan dan bar berukuran baik dengan makan di dalam dan di luar, layanan kamar juga tersedia. Mungkin ada aturan yang lebih ketat sehubungan dengan area merokok. Akan tinggal di sini lagi.

Review: The rooms here have no windows! Be aware of false advertising. No view here means No window!!! Very poor customer service! The room and as clean, but since there is as no window... Was stinky. Lots of strange people wandering in lobby, made me feel unsafe! I would never go back there again!

Was stinky. Lots of strange people wandering in lobby, made me feel unsafe! I would never go back there again!
Review_Summary: The rooms here have no windows! Be aware of false advertising. No view here means No window!!! Very poor customer service! The room and as clean, but since there is as no window... Was stinky. Lots of strange people wandering in lobby, made me feel unsafe! I would never go back there again!
Review_Bahasa: Kamar -kamar di sini tidak memiliki jendela! Waspadai iklan palsu. Tidak ada tampilan di sini berarti tidak ada jendela !!! Layanan pelanggan yang sangat buruk! Kamar dan bersih, tetapi karena tidak ada jendela ... bau. Banyak orang aneh berkeliaran di lobi, membuat saya merasa tidak aman! Saya tidak akan pernah kembali ke sana lagi!

Review: 房间很大，双人床也非常大和舒适，还有四个大枕头，让人可以睡上一个好觉。 有wifi ，游泳池不错，服务也很好。 但看起来是商务式酒店，地点离kuta市中心和海滩稍为远了一点。我们尝试步行到上述地点，走了整整30-40 分钟。不是很方便。 酒店有免费巴士送客人去市中心与海滩，但回程必须自理。
Review_English: The room is large, the double bed is very large and comfortable, and there are four large pillows that allow you to have a good sleep. There is wifi, the pool is good, and the service is also very good. But it looks like a business-style hotel, located a little further from the center of kuta and the beach. We tried walking to the above location for a full 30-40 minutes. Not very convenient. The hotel has free buses to the city center and the beach, but the return journey must be taken by yourself.
Review_Summary: The room is large, the double bed is very large and comfortable, and there are four large pillows that allow you to have a good sleep. There is wifi, the pool is good, and the service is also very good. But it looks like a business-style hotel, located a little further from the center of kuta and the beach. We tried walking to the above location for a full 30-40 minutes. Not very convenient. The hotel has free buses to the city center and the beach, but the return journey must be taken by yourself.
Review_Bahasa: Kamarnya besar, tempat tidur ganda sangat besar dan nyaman, dan ada empat bantal besar yang memungkinkan Anda tidur nyenyak. Ada wifi, kolam renangnya bagus, dan layanannya juga sangat bagus. Tapi sepertinya hotel bergaya bisnis, yang terletak sedikit lebih jauh dari pusat Kuta dan pantai. Kami mencoba berjalan ke lokasi di atas selama 30-40 menit penuh. Tidak terlalu nyaman. Hotel ini memiliki bus gratis ke pusat kota dan pantai, tetapi perjalanan kembali harus diambil sendiri.
Review_Clean: Kamarnya besar, tempat tidur ganda sangat besar dan nyaman, dan ada empat bantal besar yang memungkinkan Anda tidur nyenyak. Kami mencoba berjalan ke lokasi di atas selama 30-40 menit penuh. Tidak terlalu nyaman. Hotel ini memiliki bus gratis ke pusat kota dan pantai, tetapi perjalanan kembali harus diambil sendiri.

Review: I was stay 1 night in this hotel with kidz, They have kidz room and small swimming pool. The point that WOW me is their bedroom, it is big for 3 stars hotel. The staff were helpful, specially the security, helping people with umbrella when rainy while open and close the doors and still keep Smile and polite, its rare to find in 3 Stars hotel. For low budget but expect good service, this hotel is recomended. Thank you Kuta Central. Keep your good service and Smileee

Review_Bahasa: Saya menginap 1 malam di hotel ini dengan Kidz, mereka memiliki kamar kidz dan kolam renang kecil. Poin yang wow saya adalah kamar tidur mereka, itu besar untuk 3 bintang hotel. Staf sangat membantu, khususnya keamanan, membantu orang -orang dengan payung ketika hujan saat terbuka dan menutup pintu dan tetap tersenyum dan sopan, jarang ditemukan di 3 bintang hotel. Untuk anggaran rendah tetapi mengharapkan layanan yang baik, hotel ini direkomendasikan. Terima kasih Kuta Central. Jaga agar layanan dan smileee Anda

Untuk anggaran rendah tetapi mengharapkan layanan yang baik, hotel ini direkomendasikan. Terima kasih Kuta Central. Jaga agar layanan dan smileee Anda

Review: Stayed in Jan 2016 for 5 nights. Room was a triple for myself, wife and daughter. Little tired but quite comfortable. Pool was small but had no problems with too many people and the poolbar was nice and convenient for cold ones during a swim. Staff all friendly and happy to help. Location is good with either a 15min walk to the main drag of Legian St but taxi fares were only around $3AUD anyway back from shopping district and Kuta. maybe $4-5 to Seminyak restaurants depending on traffic. Breakfast was always a good spread with ample choices. Couple of convenience stores and ATMs right out front. Can recommend the massage at the spa 100m to the left as you walk out. Didn't try the in-house spa as it seemed a little pricey but they do have some happy hours with discounts if you wanted. Didn't try the gym. WIFI was quite good in our room which was on the ground floor. heard it was a little poor on the upper floors tho. All up a pleasant stay for the price. Hope your experience will be the same. Cheers, Michael.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal pada Januari 2016 selama 5 malam. Kamar adalah tiga kali lipat untuk saya, istri dan anak perempuan. Sedikit lelah tapi cukup nyaman. Kolam renang kecil tetapi tidak memiliki masalah dengan terlalu banyak orang dan biliar itu bagus dan nyaman untuk yang dingin selama berenang. Staf semua ramah dan senang membantu. Lokasi baik dengan berjalan kaki 15 menit ke hambatan utama Legian St tetapi tarif taksi hanya sekitar $ 3AUD kembali dari distrik perbelanjaan dan Kuta. Mungkin $ 4-5 untuk restoran Seminyak tergantung pada lalu lintas. Sarapan selalu menjadi penyebaran yang baik dengan banyak pilihan. Beberapa toko serba ada dan ATM di depan. Dapat merekomendasikan pijatan di spa 100m ke kiri saat Anda keluar. Tidak mencoba spa in-house karena sepertinya sedikit mahal tetapi mereka memiliki beberapa jam bahagia dengan diskon jika Anda mau. Tidak mencoba gym. WiFi cukup bagus di kamar kami yang berada di lantai dasar. Mendengar itu agak buruk di lantai atas. Semua menaikkan tinggal yang menyenangkan untuk harganya. Semoga pengalaman Anda sama. Cheers, Michael.

Cheers, Michael.

Review: Got on plane took the flight not to bad tired from getting up early and the flight. Got cab to hotel ready for a snooze. No chance room 139 has the kids pool right out front of it. Screaming kids crying kids noisey kids adults yelling at kids. Over it, i am currently seeking elsewhere to stay as its seems this is the room i was allocated and they are unable to move me unless i make another booking. Not a good start to party town

Review_Bahasa: Mulai pesawat naik pesawat tidak lelah dari bangun pagi dan penerbangan. Punya taksi ke hotel siap untuk ditunda. No Chance Room 139 memiliki kolam renang anak -anak di depannya. Berteriak anak -anak menangis anak -anak noisey anak -anak orang dewasa berteriak pada anak -anak. Di atasnya, saya saat ini mencari di tempat lain untuk tinggal karena sepertinya ini adalah ruangan yang saya alokasikan dan mereka tidak dapat memindahkan saya kecuali saya melakukan pemesanan lain. Bukan awal yang baik untuk kota pesta

Subjeck: poor service, no value for money
Review: The air-conditioner in our room did not work. On repeated request, after 2 days, they brought a pedestal fan in our room-it was covered with cob-webs and whirred so slowly! The balcony was sealed off though we could see it through the glass ('you have booked a superior room, not a deluxe one'-whatever that meant), and this was full of dirt, cigarette butts, etc. Food is very average, nothing to write home about

Review_Bahasa: AC di kamar kami tidak berfungsi. Pada permintaan yang berulang, setelah 2 hari, mereka membawa kipas angin di kamar kami-ditutupi dengan tongkolan dan berputar sangat lambat! Balkon itu disegel meskipun kami bisa melihatnya melalui gelas ('Anda telah memesan kamar yang superior, bukan yang mewah-apa artinya), dan ini penuh dengan kotoran, puntung rokok, dll. Makanan sangat rata-rata, tidak ada yang bisa ditulis di rumah tentang

Review: We upgraded our room to a balcony as couldn't face not having a window. The room was clean and comfortable. Buffet style breakfast with plenty of choices. The restaurant had a good menu and the food was good. They also had a BBQ evening which was well organized and reasonably priced. The only downside was the location, but they provided a free shuttle service and taxi's are cheap.

The only downside was the location, but they provided a free shuttle service and taxi's are cheap.

Review_Bahasa: Kami meningkatkan kamar kami ke balkon karena tidak bisa menghadapi tidak memiliki jendela. Ruangan itu bersih dan nyaman. Sarapan gaya prasmanan dengan banyak pilihan. Restoran memiliki menu yang bagus dan makanannya enak. Mereka juga memiliki malam BBQ yang terorganisir dengan baik dan terjangkau. Satu -satunya downside adalah lokasi, tetapi mereka menyediakan layanan antar -jemput gratis dan taksi murah.

Review: Our first night at the hotel was interesting, we arrived at the hotel late at night, then shown to our superior room which on the outset looked lovely (no different to a standard double room ). Went to bed got up the next morning covered in bites, could not have been the mozzies as we had not been out and arrived in long trousers. My partner was also covered in bites. Reported it to reception but nothing was done! Left it to the following day and a lady at breakfast who was most helpful did something about my concerns and 1 hour later the room was fumigated and we witnessed this happen, clean sheets and topper on the bed. Touch wood we are still here and this has not happened since. Breakfast is everything Asian and we love that. Some of the staff are rude, but as a whole most are very welcoming. One week to go and things can only get better!

Review_Bahasa: Malam pertama kami di hotel itu menarik, kami tiba di hotel larut malam, kemudian ditunjukkan ke kamar superior kami yang pada awalnya terlihat indah (tidak berbeda dengan kamar ganda standar). Pergi tidur keesokan paginya tertutup gigitan, tidak mungkin menjadi mozzies karena kami belum keluar dan tiba dengan celana panjang. Pasangan saya juga tertutup gigitan. Melaporkannya ke resepsi tetapi tidak ada yang dilakukan! Meninggalkannya ke hari berikutnya dan seorang wanita saat sarapan yang paling membantu melakukan sesuatu tentang kekhawatiran saya dan 1 jam kemudian ruangan itu difumigasi dan kami menyaksikan ini terjadi, seprai bersih dan topper di tempat tidur. Touch Wood Kami masih di sini dan ini belum terjadi sejak itu. Sarapan adalah segalanya Asia dan kami menyukainya. Beberapa staf kasar, tetapi secara keseluruhan sangat ramah. Satu minggu lagi dan segalanya hanya bisa menjadi lebih baik!

Review: Good service, nice breakfast, clean and peaceful, nearby have Giant (by walking distance only 5-10mins) overall is worthy of price. Welcome dinner is just a very simple food, and free massage only average, but the hotel price consider worthy (Around RM900+-), travelling on last year Oct 2015. Definitely can stay here with friends and family.

Review_Bahasa: Pelayanan yang baik, sarapan yang baik, bersih dan damai, di dekatnya memiliki raksasa (dengan jarak berjalan kaki hanya 5-10 menit) secara keseluruhan layak harga. Selamat datang makan malam hanyalah makanan yang sangat sederhana, dan pijat gratis hanya rata-rata, tetapi harga hotel dianggap layak (sekitar RM900+-), bepergian pada tahun lalu Oktober 2015. Pasti dapat tinggal di sini bersama teman dan keluarga.

Review: My room was lovely and spacious and clean, the place is like a maze though after a few days I worked out where I'm going! Restaurant was ok with big choice for breakfast.. Kinda in the middle of nowhere,although they do provide free shuttle bus to the town. Bed was so comfy thank you :)

Review_Bahasa: Kamar saya indah dan luas dan bersih, tempat itu seperti labirin meskipun setelah beberapa hari saya berolahraga di mana saya akan pergi! Restoran baik -baik saja dengan pilihan besar untuk sarapan .. agak di tengah -tengah dari mana, meskipun mereka menyediakan bus antar -jemput gratis ke kota. Tempat tidur sangat nyaman terima kasih :)

Review: Stay away There are better hotels in BALI for the same price Always ask to see room on arrival and dont be affraid to complain Breakfast is at the least end of adequate Air conditioners dont work properly

Review_Bahasa: Meninggal di sana ada hotel yang lebih baik di Bali dengan harga yang sama selalu meminta untuk melihat kamar pada saat kedatangan dan jangan takut untuk mengeluh sarapan adalah setidaknya AC yang memadai tidak berfungsi dengan benar

Review: We decided to spend more on activities/tours than for the hotel. But this place has the most friendly and hospitable people. We booked the superior family room for a good price. Emails to the hotel were replied quickly and they gave us a ground floor room, spacious and clean near the pool which is a good enough size. Buffet breakfast was always wonderful and menus on the Lotus Cafe were affordable and tasty. Bagus in the cafe is a fantastic manager. Nothing too fancy outside and within the hotel but the atmosphere is great. There's a free bus to go to main Kuta, malls and beaches. Across this hotel is a great restaurant as well and more so is a massage bldg (forgot the name) $5AUD for 1.5hrs of reflexology. We wished we found that place earlier. It was awesome even better than the more expensive ones we've been. Note: Take the Bluebird taxi, they go by metre. Taxis are supposed to go by metre but some will just give a price.

Review_Bahasa: Kami memutuskan untuk menghabiskan lebih banyak untuk kegiatan/tur daripada untuk hotel. Tetapi tempat ini memiliki orang -orang yang paling ramah dan ramah. Kami memesan Ruang Keluarga Superior dengan harga bagus. Email ke hotel dijawab dengan cepat dan mereka memberi kami ruang lantai dasar, luas dan bersih di dekat kolam yang merupakan ukuran yang cukup baik. Sarapan prasmanan selalu indah dan menu di kafe Lotus terjangkau dan lezat. Bagus di kafe adalah manajer yang fantastis. Tidak ada yang terlalu mewah di luar dan di dalam hotel tetapi suasananya hebat. Ada bus gratis untuk pergi ke Kuta, mal, dan pantai utama. Di seberang hotel ini adalah restoran yang hebat juga dan lebih dari itu adalah pijat BLDG (lupa namanya) $ 5AUD untuk 1,5 jam refleksi. Kami berharap kami menemukan tempat itu sebelumnya. Itu luar biasa bahkan lebih baik daripada yang lebih mahal kita. Catatan: Ambil taksi Bluebird, mereka pergi dengan meter. Taksi seharusnya berjalan dengan meteran tetapi beberapa hanya akan memberikan harga.

Subjeck: kamar luas dan best breakfast to eat
Review: buat kami 1. kamar luas 2. Pool side yang nyaman 3. Menu breakfast tidak terlalu variatif tapi sangat enak rasanya 4. FO yang friendly dan komunikatif Kekurangan 1. lahan parkir kurang memadai di sekitar lobi semoga lebih memantapkan pelayanan dan dapat menambah menu untuk sarapan pagi THx ibu rika FO - ibu dewi FO Mgr - ibu hani RSVP
Review_English: For us 1. Spacious room 2. Comfortable Pool Side 3. Breakfast menu is not too varied but very good taste 4. FO friendly and communicative deficiencies 1. Parking space around the lobby hopefully more establishing services and can add menu for breakfast thx Mrs. Rika Fo - Ibu Dewi Fo Mgr - Ibu Hani RSVP

Review: Stayed here 2 nights. Booked a twin room with an extra bed. The extra bed left little room to move about the room but as we don't spend too much time in the hotel it really wasn't a problem. The room was clean as was the bathroom. The mattresses are due for an upgrade tho. Breakfast was as you would expect, plentiful and delicious with a good range of food. The hotel seemed a bit confusing as it is set among office buildings. Would stay here again without the extra bed.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di sini 2 malam. Memesan kamar kembar dengan tempat tidur tambahan. Tempat tidur ekstra meninggalkan ruang kecil untuk bergerak di sekitar ruangan, tetapi karena kami tidak menghabiskan terlalu banyak waktu di hotel, itu benar -benar tidak menjadi masalah. Ruangan itu bersih seperti kamar mandi. Kasur -kasur itu akan ditingkatkan. Sarapan seperti yang Anda harapkan, berlimpah dan lezat dengan beragam makanan. Hotel ini tampak agak membingungkan karena ditetapkan di antara gedung -gedung perkantoran. Akan tinggal di sini lagi tanpa tempat tidur tambahan.

Review: Overall, we had a good experience here; the staff were super friendly and accommodating, and the room was good. Our only problems were that the room had no window, we weren't always left the right amount of fresh towels after house keeping had been in, and music was played through a speaker directly outside our room at 8.30am onwards, meaning any sleep after this was impossible. And considering we had rough sleeps due to jet leg, this was a huge nightmare! But all in all, we were happy with the accommodation!
Review_English: Overall, we had a good experience here; the staff were super friendly and accommodating, and the room was good. Our only problems were that the room had no window, we weren't always left the right amount of fresh towels after house keeping had been in, and music was played through a speaker directly outside our room at 8.30am onwards, meaning any sleep after this was impossible. And considering we had rough sleeps due to jet leg, this was a huge nightmare! But all in all, we were happy with the accommodation!

And considering we had rough sleeps due to jet leg, this was a huge nightmare! But all in all, we were happy with the accommodation!
Review_Bahasa: Secara keseluruhan, kami memiliki pengalaman yang baik di sini; Stafnya sangat ramah dan akomodatif, dan kamarnya bagus. Satu -satunya masalah kami adalah bahwa ruangan itu tidak memiliki jendela, kami tidak selalu meninggalkan handuk segar dalam jumlah yang tepat setelah pemeliharaan rumah, dan musik dimainkan melalui pembicara langsung di luar kamar kami pada pukul 8.30 pagi dan seterusnya, yang berarti setiap tidur setelah ini tidak mungkin. Dan mengingat kami tidur nyenyak karena jet kaki, ini adalah mimpi buruk yang besar! Tapi secara keseluruhan, kami senang dengan akomodasi!

Review: I stay here for 3 nights, beautiful hotel, good location. There are swimingpool inside. But the hotel is not big enoug for me. Room is clean, staff are friendly. I buy this room without breakfast, but i order some menu for dinner, and the price is not expensive but the taste is very delicious

Subjeck: Affordable budget hotel in a great location
Review: Central location (5 mins from Legian, 10 mins from Kuta Beach, a stone throw away from Sunset Road) with a very reasonably priced budget. Seems like it is converted from shop/office buildings and it was smacked right among other shops so it was convenient to buy food/amenities but also unfortunately not very hotel-like. Parking space is also limited if you drive a car. Has a nice little swimming pool that seems to be full all the time.

Seems like it is converted from shop/office buildings and it was smacked right among other shops so it was convenient to buy food/amenities but also unfortunately not very hotel-like. Parking space is also limited if you drive a car. Has a nice little swimming pool that seems to be full all the time.
Review_Summary: Central location (5 mins from Legian, 10 mins from Kuta Beach, a stone throw away from Sunset Road) with a very reasonably priced budget. Seems like it is converted from shop/office buildings and it was smacked right among other shops so it was convenient to buy food/amenities but also unfortunately not very hotel-like. Parking space is also limited if you drive a car. Has a nice little swimming pool that seems to be full all the time.
Review_Bahasa: Lokasi pusat (5 menit dari Legian, 10 menit dari Pantai Kuta, sepelemparan batu dari Sunset Road) dengan anggaran yang sangat terjangkau. Sepertinya itu dikonversi dari gedung toko/kantor dan dipukul tepat di antara toko-toko lain sehingga lebih mudah untuk membeli makanan/fasilitas tetapi juga sayangnya tidak terlalu seperti hotel. Tempat parkir juga terbatas jika Anda mengendarai mobil. Memiliki kolam renang kecil yang menyenangkan yang tampaknya penuh sepanjang waktu.

Sepertinya itu dikonversi dari gedung tokokantor dan dipukul tepat di antara toko-toko lain sehingga lebih mudah untuk membeli makananfasilitas tetapi juga sayangnya tidak terlalu seperti hotel. Tempat parkir juga terbatas jika Anda mengendarai mobil. Memiliki kolam renang kecil yang menyenangkan yang tampaknya penuh sepanjang waktu.

Review: We were a group of 7 incl. kids, that came and stayed here over Xmas/New Years for 15 days and all I can say is that I absolutely adore this place! Location is very handy as is the hotels free shuttle. Even when that isn't available taxis are very easy to find. Every meal we had from both the restaurant and pool bar were lovely. Pool area is great & both the kids & adults loved it. Cocktails are delicious too. Rooms are lovely & clean, however the thing that makes this hotel one of the most amazing places that I have ever stayed is the staff!! Some of the most friendly & beautiful natured people I have come across. Always greet you with a big smile & more than happy to sit & have a chat & a laugh & give out some local advice-be it on tourist activities, shopping, local phrases or even a history lesson. I was actually quite teary-eyed when we left & I can't wait to return here to see them all again. "Bagus" in the restaurant is a wonderful man!!

Review_Bahasa: Kami adalah sekelompok 7 termasuk. Anak -anak, itu datang dan tinggal di sini selama Xmas/Tahun Baru selama 15 hari dan yang bisa saya katakan adalah bahwa saya benar -benar menyukai tempat ini! Lokasi sangat berguna seperti pesawat ulang -alik gratis hotel. Bahkan ketika itu tidak tersedia taksi sangat mudah ditemukan. Setiap makan yang kami miliki dari restoran dan bar biliar sangat indah. Area kolam renang sangat bagus & anak -anak & orang dewasa menyukainya. Koktail juga lezat. Kamar indah & bersih, namun hal yang menjadikan hotel ini salah satu tempat paling menakjubkan yang pernah saya tinggali adalah staf !! Beberapa orang yang paling ramah & cantik yang saya temui. Selalu menyambut Anda dengan senyum lebar & lebih dari senang duduk & mengobrol & tertawa & memberikan beberapa saran lokal untuk kegiatan wisata, belanja, frasa lokal atau bahkan pelajaran sejarah. Saya sebenarnya cukup berlinang air mata ketika kami pergi & saya tidak sabar untuk kembali ke sini untuk melihat mereka semua lagi. "Bagus" di restoran adalah pria yang luar biasa !!

Review: Kuta Central Park Hotel is situated in the heart of Kuta. I chose this hotel as it fitted my budget and had good reviews. Booked the rooms via Agoda. Upon my arrival, I was a bit worried since the hotel is situated facing a main road and that I would experience loud noise from the vehicles. But it turned out different. My stay was awesome!! I went with my elderly parents and young daughter and since I have e-mailed the hotel about my stay, they managed to get me 2 rooms at the terrace, facing the pool. Staff in this hotel are very friendly and they always share a smile. The rooms are spacious and clean. So is the pool.They also serve a good in-dine pizza. A must try!! I will definitely recommend this stay for any1 whose travelling to Bali.

Review_Bahasa: Kuta Central Park Hotel terletak di jantung Kuta. Saya memilih hotel ini karena sesuai dengan anggaran saya dan memiliki ulasan yang bagus. Memesan kamar melalui Agoda. Setelah kedatangan saya, saya agak khawatir karena hotel ini terletak di jalan utama dan bahwa saya akan mengalami kebisingan keras dari kendaraan. Tapi ternyata berbeda. Masa tinggal saya luar biasa !! Saya pergi dengan orang tua dan putri saya yang sudah tua dan karena saya telah mengirim email ke hotel tentang masa tinggal saya, mereka berhasil memberi saya 2 kamar di teras, menghadap kolam renang. Staf di hotel ini sangat ramah dan mereka selalu berbagi senyum. Kamar -kamarnya luas dan bersih. Begitu juga kolam renang. Mereka juga menyajikan pizza yang enak. A harus mencoba !! Saya pasti akan merekomendasikan masa inap ini untuk any1 yang bepergian ke Bali.

Review: This is my favourite hotel to stay in Kuta Bali, because its sooo comfortable, clean room, helpful and friendly staff, good spa for relaxing, and also have a good spot for us to drink beer and fun which is the swimming pool. They also provide motorcycle to rent, because of the location is quite far from beach, so i need a motorcycle for our transport and for joyriding and alsooo for beach hoping... Overall i love this hotel and always come to this hotel every year

Review_Bahasa: Ini adalah hotel favorit saya untuk menginap di Kuta Bali, karena kamarnya yang sangat nyaman, bersih, staf yang membantu dan ramah, spa yang baik untuk bersantai, dan juga memiliki tempat yang baik bagi kami untuk minum bir dan kesenangan yang merupakan kolam renang. Mereka juga menyediakan sepeda motor untuk disewa, karena lokasinya cukup jauh dari pantai, jadi saya membutuhkan sepeda motor untuk transportasi kami dan untuk gembira dan juga untuk pantai berharap ... secara keseluruhan saya suka hotel ini dan selalu datang ke hotel ini setiap tahun

Review: We had a great stay here. The swim up bar was a favourite where we spent most of our time!! The restaurant served great meals and the staff were very friendly. The room was clean and with the curtains drawn was dark so it helped us sleep in. We will defiantly stay again.

Review_Bahasa: Kami senang tinggal di sini. Bar berenang adalah favorit tempat kami menghabiskan sebagian besar waktu kami !! Restoran menyajikan makanan enak dan stafnya sangat ramah. Ruangan itu bersih dan dengan tirai yang ditarik gelap sehingga membantu kami tidur. Kami akan tetap tinggal lagi.

Review: Had two rooms booked for family of 7 (2 adults, 5 children). Unfortunately rooms were located in separate areas of hotel (not interconnecting) but we made do. Comfortable, clean and attractive rooms. Good facilities - used pool and gym (not that great but adequate enough). Very friendly staff. Breakfast buffet was again adequate enough - children were able to find enough familiar foods to eat and good to be able to have a hearty meal at the beginning of the day before embarking on activities.

Review_Bahasa: Memiliki dua kamar yang dipesan untuk keluarga 7 (2 orang dewasa, 5 anak). Sayangnya kamar terletak di area hotel yang terpisah (tidak saling berhubungan) tetapi kami berhasil. Kamar yang nyaman, bersih, dan menarik. Fasilitas yang baik - biliar bekas dan gym (tidak cukup bagus tapi cukup). Staf yang sangat ramah. Sarapan prasmanan lagi cukup memadai - anak -anak dapat menemukan makanan yang cukup akrab untuk dimakan dan enak untuk dapat makan yang lezat di awal hari sebelum memulai kegiatan.

Subjeck: Hotel dengan Family Room yang Bagus
Review: Hotel ini terletak di belakang ruko, dekat dengan tempat makan dan oleh2 Krisna. Fasilitasnya cukup lengkap, kolam renang, bar, restoran. Saya menempati family room dengan 5 orang dewasa dan masih terasa longgar. Tapi sayangnya kamar yang saya tempati tidak ada jendela nya sehingga terasa pengap dan selalu terasa malam hari. Untuk makanan cukup variatif tapi rasanya kurang sempurna. Overall bagus!!
Review_English: The hotel is located behind the shophouse, close to the eating place and Krisna souvenirs. The facilities are quite complete, swimming pool, bar, restaurant. I occupy the family room with 5 adults and still feels loose. But unfortunately the room that I live in has no window so it feels stuffy and always feels at night. For food is quite varied but it tastes less than perfect. Overall Good !!

For food is quite varied but it tastes less than perfect. Overall Good !!

Untuk makanan cukup bervariasi tetapi rasanya kurang sempurna. Secara keseluruhan bagus !!

Subjeck: Great stay for budget with quality
Review: I stayed here with my wife on our honeymoon exactly a year ago. During which, i asked that they set up the room nicely to welcome our honeymoon and it was great. This year we came with our friends. All of us were given welcome drinks. We immediately were processed for check-in and we got a deluxe room which came with a balcony(smoking area) overlooking the Lotus Pond(breakfast area). Whilst enetering our room, a staff came in smiling and brought with her a cut piece of cake and a note with it. Its for our 1-year anniversary. It was really thoughtful and just plain awesome for them to remember and delight us with a small token. Hotel staff(beside the main check-in counter) provided us with our motorbike for us to roam around in Bali. Ask for your best price. We got alot cheaper than normal rates as we got a total of 6 motorbikes from them. All were automatic scooters. Breakfast was simple and not bad. Do not expect a wide spread of sumptious breakfast buffet though it is indicated as 4-star hotel. But there were 'live' pancakes and omelette/sunny-side. Did not get to enjoy the pool on this visit. They have since added buoys for everyones use to play in the pool area. Convenience store is just outside the hotel. Kuta beach in 20-30mins walk. McDonalds, Starbucks, Cold Stone Creamery is 15mins walk(straight north from the hotel entrance). One local satay stall diagonally across the hotel serves magneficiently delicious satay madura with rice and soup. Must-try! Will definitely come back again.

Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal di sini dengan istri saya di bulan madu kami tepat setahun yang lalu. Selama itu, saya meminta mereka mengatur ruangan dengan baik untuk menyambut bulan madu kami dan itu hebat. Tahun ini kami datang dengan teman -teman kami. Kami semua diberi minuman selamat datang. Kami segera diproses untuk check-in dan kami mendapat ruang mewah yang datang dengan balkon (area merokok) yang menghadap ke Lotus Pond (area sarapan). Sambil membuat kamar kami, seorang staf datang dengan tersenyum dan membawa sepotong kue yang dipotong dan catatan dengannya. Ini untuk peringatan 1 tahun kami. Itu benar -benar bijaksana dan luar biasa luar biasa bagi mereka untuk mengingat dan menyenangkan kami dengan token kecil. Staf hotel (di samping meja check-in utama) memberi kami sepeda motor untuk kami berkeliaran di Bali. Minta harga terbaik Anda. Kami mendapat jauh lebih murah dari tarif normal karena kami mendapat total 6 sepeda motor dari mereka. Semua adalah skuter otomatis. Sarapan itu sederhana dan tidak buruk. Jangan mengharapkan penyebaran luas sarapan prasmanan mewah meskipun diindikasikan sebagai hotel bintang 4. Tapi ada pancake 'hidup' dan omelet/sisi cerah. Tidak bisa menikmati kolam renang pada kunjungan ini. Sejak itu mereka menambahkan pelampung untuk digunakan semua orang di area kolam renang. Toko Sambungan di luar hotel. Pantai Kuta dalam 20-30 menit berjalan kaki. McDonalds, Starbucks, Cold Stone Creamery berjarak 15 menit berjalan kaki (lurus ke utara dari pintu masuk hotel). Satu kios sate lokal secara diagonal di seberang hotel menyajikan sate madura yang sangat lezat dengan nasi dan sup. HARUS-TRI! Pasti akan kembali lagi.

Subjeck: Friendly staff, good hotel on a budget
Review: The staff are very friendly, we arrived on a late flight and the shuttle was ready waiting for us and the check in was seamless. The staff are extremely friendly and willing to help. The hotel has several free shuttles at different times of the day which was a great help in getting around especially with young kids. The rooms were standard but comfortable but all we needed. The breakfast menu is a bit limited in terms of western food and could be changed up a bit as we stayed for 10days and it got a bit monotonous. Overall we had a great stay!

The hotel has several free shuttles at different times of the day which was a great help in getting around especially with young kids. The rooms were standard but comfortable but all we needed. The breakfast menu is a bit limited in terms of western food and could be changed up a bit as we stayed for 10days and it got a bit monotonous. Overall we had a great stay!
Review_Summary: The staff are very friendly, we arrived on a late flight and the shuttle was ready waiting for us and the check in was seamless. The staff are extremely friendly and willing to help. The hotel has several free shuttles at different times of the day which was a great help in getting around especially with young kids. The rooms were standard but comfortable but all we needed. The breakfast menu is a bit limited in terms of western food and could be changed up a bit as we stayed for 10days and it got a bit monotonous. Overall we had a great stay!
Review_Bahasa: Staf sangat ramah, kami tiba dengan penerbangan terlambat dan pesawat ulang -alik siap menunggu kami dan check -in mulus. Staf sangat ramah dan bersedia membantu. Hotel ini memiliki beberapa angkutan gratis pada waktu yang berbeda sepanjang hari yang sangat membantu untuk berkeliling terutama dengan anak -anak muda. Kamar -kamarnya standar tetapi nyaman tetapi semua yang kami butuhkan. Menu sarapan agak terbatas dalam hal makanan Barat dan bisa diubah sedikit saat kami tinggal selama 10 hari dan itu menjadi sedikit monoton. Secara keseluruhan kami senang tinggal di sini!

Review: Not as good as I expected. made my day worse upon check-in after 13 hour flight. Reception staff weren't nice and friendly. receptionists are lack of knowledge in giving information about hotel neighborhood.The staffs at the restaurant however were very nice.and the hotel location is good.

Review_Bahasa: Tidak sebagus yang saya harapkan. Membuat hari saya lebih buruk saat check-in setelah penerbangan 13 jam. Staf resepsi tidak baik dan ramah. Resepsionis kurangnya pengetahuan dalam memberikan informasi tentang lingkungan hotel. Staf di restoran namun sangat bagus. Dan lokasi hotel bagus.

Review: Honestly when we first arrived I thought it was going to be horrible, but I have been mistaken big time. The staff are fantastic and friendly the service is amazing and it really is a nice small resort. Can't complain about anything. When we arrived they had over booked the style room we paid for so we were upgraded for free to a pool side room,

Stafnya fantastis dan ramah layanan ini luar biasa dan benar -benar merupakan resor kecil yang bagus. Tidak bisa mengeluh tentang apapun. Ketika kami tiba, mereka sudah memesan ruang gaya yang kami bayar sehingga kami ditingkatkan secara gratis ke ruang samping kolam renang,

Review: That was my first stay in November 30th until December 4th, it was the best experience i ever had.. The receptionist named Wida gave me early check in, she knew that me and my mom need to take a rest after a night without sleep, The pool was good with the pool bar manager Adam who served me with excellent service and also waitress named Ria who has a good smile and fast service. Definitely will stay for the next trip to Bali, keep it up!

Review_Bahasa: Itu adalah kunjungan pertama saya pada 30 November hingga 4 Desember, itu adalah pengalaman terbaik yang pernah saya miliki .. Resepsionis bernama Wida memberi saya check -in lebih awal, dia tahu bahwa saya dan ibu saya perlu beristirahat setelah malam tanpa tidur, kolam renang baik dengan manajer bar kolam renang Adam yang melayani saya dengan layanan yang sangat baik dan juga pelayan bernama Ria yang memiliki senyum baik dan layanan cepat. Pasti akan tinggal untuk perjalanan berikutnya ke Bali, pertahankan!

Review: Hotel is about 30 mins walk from Kuta Beach so if you are a beach person it's not convenient although the hotel does provide shuttle service to the shopping mall, Discovery Mall and the beach at 2 hourly intervals. You get back on your own. The hotel staff is very nice and helpful but the room ac is not cold. The hotel pool is too small but there is a small gym if you need to work out everyday. The breakfast buffet that comes with the room is alright at food at the Lotus Pond Cafe is reasonably priced and as good as hotel food goes. If you don't mind walking you can get to Legian Street where the activity is in about 20 mins. For the special price we got, we have no complaints. I would recommend it for short stays.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel berjarak sekitar 30 menit berjalan kaki dari Pantai Kuta, jadi jika Anda adalah orang pantai, itu tidak nyaman meskipun hotel ini menyediakan layanan antar -jemput ke pusat perbelanjaan, Discovery Mall, dan pantai dengan interval 2 jam. Anda kembali sendirian. Staf hotel sangat baik dan bermanfaat tetapi AC kamarnya tidak dingin. Kolam renang hotel terlalu kecil tetapi ada gym kecil jika Anda perlu berolahraga setiap hari. Sarapan prasmanan yang dilengkapi dengan kamar baik -baik saja di makanan di Lotus Pond Cafe dengan harga terjangkau dan sebagus makanan hotel. Jika Anda tidak keberatan berjalan, Anda bisa sampai ke Legian Street di mana aktivitasnya dalam waktu sekitar 20 menit. Untuk harga khusus yang kami dapatkan, kami tidak memiliki keluhan. Saya akan merekomendasikan ini untuk kunjungan singkat.

Review: I have mixed feelings about this hotel. We had a group of 15 staying here for 12 days some people's stayz shorter than others. We all experienced problems with our air con not beong cold enough. My partner and I booked a standard room but after the hotel double charged us for the "deposit" they upgraded us to a superior. We stayed in room 335 we got about 2 hours sleep or first night with the room being 30 degrees and we are from melbourne it was just to hot. We told reception and was stuffed around for 2 hours lookong at rooms with different a or cons 2 hours seriously!! Anyway we eventually was moved to 243 which had a great aircon unfortunately we lost our veiw, we also was moved away from our group. The other very annoying thing was we had requested a queen bed and was moved to Two singles. So to celebrate my partners and I upcoming wedding we had to sleep in separate beds and blankets.... was not a great start and to be honest the hotel staff seemed to not care and offered no apology or reduced rate even though it was not what we booked. Other problems experienced was under cooked chicken which i was still charged for. I asked for a well done burger and it came out sloppy and very pink at which I was given 15 percent off... I also found there was different rules for different people .. at breakfast some people requested bacon and were given it, on same day my partner was refused. Same thing happened with chocolate sauce. We tried the hotel spa and really enjoyed our massages. We tried the pizza and thought they were nice. The cocktails were hit and miss my fav was bailey's comet. There was no specials that are often on for beer buckets at most other hotels. The room could be made up most days however we chose to get it made every 2-3 days undortunalty over the 2 weeks we were there the sheets were not changed and the room was not swept. I guess there is a large room for improvement at this hotel. I won't stay there again. Out of our group of 15 .. 2 of us said we would. Location ok 5 -10 mins to get to kuta. Pool was nice, but the ladder dodgy. Circle k outside hotel great for supplies. I also found checking in and out very slow. I also was informed the hotel lost the receipt for my deposit and they would not be returning the hold for 14 days which they failed to say would happen when checking in. Overall the stay was good and you could have a great stay.. for us maybe it was not due to aspects outlined above.

Review_Bahasa: Saya memiliki perasaan campur aduk tentang hotel ini. Kami memiliki sekelompok 15 tinggal di sini selama 12 hari beberapa orang tetap lebih pendek dari yang lain. Kita semua mengalami masalah dengan udara kita tidak cukup dingin. Saya dan mitra saya memesan kamar standar tetapi setelah hotel ganda menagih kami untuk "setoran" mereka meningkatkan kami ke atasan. Kami tinggal di kamar 335 kami tidur sekitar 2 jam atau malam pertama dengan kamar yang 30 derajat dan kami berasal dari Melbourne itu hanya untuk panas. Kami memberi tahu resepsi dan diisi sekitar 2 jam melihat ke kamar dengan A atau kontra yang berbeda 2 jam dengan serius !! Pokoknya kami akhirnya dipindahkan ke 243 yang memiliki AC yang hebat sayangnya kami kehilangan Veiw kami, kami juga pindah dari kelompok kami. Hal yang sangat menjengkelkan lainnya adalah kami telah meminta tempat tidur queen dan dipindahkan ke dua single. Jadi untuk merayakan mitra saya dan saya yang akan datang, kami harus tidur di tempat tidur dan selimut yang terpisah .... bukanlah awal yang baik dan jujur ​​saja staf hotel tampaknya tidak peduli dan tidak memberikan permintaan maaf atau berkurangnya tarif meskipun bukan itu yang kami pesan. Masalah lain yang dialami adalah di bawah ayam yang dimasak yang masih saya tuduhkan. Saya meminta burger yang dilakukan dengan baik dan keluar dengan ceroboh dan sangat merah muda di mana saya diberi diskon 15 persen ... Saya juga menemukan ada aturan yang berbeda untuk orang yang berbeda .. Saat sarapan beberapa orang meminta bacon dan diberikan, pada hari yang sama pasangan saya ditolak. Hal yang sama terjadi dengan saus cokelat. Kami mencoba hotel spa dan sangat menikmati pijat kami. Kami mencoba pizza dan berpikir mereka bagus. Koktail dipukul dan merindukan favorit saya adalah komet Bailey. Tidak ada spesial yang sering digunakan untuk ember bir di sebagian besar hotel lainnya. Kamar bisa dibuat hampir setiap hari namun kami memilih untuk mendapatkannya setiap 2-3 hari yang tidak diselesaikan selama 2 minggu kami berada di sana, lembaran tidak berubah dan ruangan itu tidak tersapu. Saya kira ada kamar besar untuk perbaikan di hotel ini. Saya tidak akan tinggal di sana lagi. Keluar dari kelompok kami yang terdiri dari 15 orang. 2 dari kami mengatakan kami akan melakukannya. Lokasi OK 5 -10 menit untuk sampai ke Kuta. Kolam renang bagus, tapi tangga yang cerdik. Lingkari h hotel di luar bagus untuk persediaan. Saya juga menemukan check -in dan di luar sangat lambat. Saya juga diberi tahu bahwa hotel kehilangan tanda terima untuk deposit saya dan mereka tidak akan mengembalikan penahanan selama 14 hari yang mereka katakan akan terjadi ketika check -in. Secara keseluruhan menginapnya baik dan Anda bisa senang tinggal di sini .. bagi kami mungkin itu bukan karena aspek yang diuraikan di atas.

Review: We are currently staying here for 20 days, and loving it! Although the location is not beach front, there is a free shuttle service running to three beachside locations every two hours so it's really not an issue! The staff are so polite and helpful, always looking to make sure your stay is going well! We have booked the one bedroom suite and the room is huge and has all the necessary features including two tvs! The pool is lovely, with the added bonus of a pool bar you really can't go wrong! We really can't complain as the price is so cheap, with so many bonuses such as free bottles of water every day, free buffet breakfast (with many western and Indonesian options, also a pancake corner!), free shuttle service and free airport transfers! We would definitely come back and will be sad to leave when the time comes!

Review_Bahasa: Kami saat ini tinggal di sini selama 20 hari, dan menyukainya! Meskipun lokasinya bukan di depan pantai, ada layanan antar -jemput gratis yang berjalan ke tiga lokasi di tepi pantai setiap dua jam sehingga benar -benar bukan masalah! Stafnya sangat sopan dan bermanfaat, selalu mencari untuk memastikan masa tinggal Anda berjalan dengan baik! Kami telah memesan suite satu kamar tidur dan kamarnya sangat besar dan memiliki semua fitur yang diperlukan termasuk dua TV! Kolam renang indah, dengan bonus tambahan dari bilah biliar yang benar -benar tidak bisa Anda salah! Kami benar -benar tidak dapat mengeluh karena harganya sangat murah, dengan begitu banyak bonus seperti botol air gratis setiap hari, sarapan prasmanan gratis (dengan banyak pilihan Barat dan Indonesia, juga sudut pancake!), Layanan antar -jemput gratis dan transfer bandara gratis! Kami pasti akan kembali dan akan sedih untuk pergi ketika saatnya tiba!

Review: Hotel terbilang murahan dengan fasilitas lengkap. Ada pool, ada play ground. Cocok buat keluarga. Dan sarapannya enak. Dan lokasi strategis dekat kemana mana. Saya akan mengenal lagi di sini jika kembali lagi.
Review_English: Hotel is fairly cheap with complete facilities. There is a pool, there is a play ground. Suitable for family. And the breakfast is delicious. And strategic location near anywhere. I will get to know again here if you come back again.
Review_Summary: Hotel is fairly cheap with complete facilities. There is a pool, there is a play ground. Suitable for family. And the breakfast is delicious. And strategic location near anywhere. I will get to know again here if you come back again.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel cukup murah dengan fasilitas lengkap. Ada kolam renang, ada tempat bermain. Cocok untuk keluarga. Dan sarapan lezat. Dan lokasi strategis di dekat mana saja. Saya akan mengenal lagi di sini jika Anda kembali lagi.

Review: Untuk ke 2 kalinya saya menginap dihotel ini, sebelumnya pada agustus 2013. Ada sedikit perubahan dihotel ini dimana sekarang bagian penerima tamu ada di depan, bukan di samping dekat kolam renang. Overall saya puas dengan fasilitas dan pelayanan hotel ini. Terutama sarapannya yang sangat memanjakan tamu.
Review_English: For the second time I stayed at this hotel, previously in August 2013. There was a slight change in this hotel where now the reception of the guest was in front, not next to the pool. Overall I am satisfied with the facilities and services of this hotel. Especially the breakfast which is very spoiled guests.

Overall I am satisfied with the facilities and services of this hotel. Especially the breakfast which is very spoiled guests.
Review_Bahasa: Untuk kedua kalinya saya tinggal di hotel ini, sebelumnya pada Agustus 2013. Terutama sarapan yang merupakan tamu yang sangat manja.

Review: The hotel rooms are large and clean but the AC doesn't work too well. The room was always hot and when we asked reception to check the AC, they fixed it but the difference in temperature was marginal. Breakfast is good with a wide selection of fruits/salad/Asian food/pancakes/breads etc The staff are very friendly and always ready to assist if needed. The location isn't great. It's a HUGE walk in the heat to the beaches and bars. You have to take a taxi to really get anywhere

Sarapan baik dengan berbagai pilihan buah/salad/makanan/pancake/roti Asia dll. Stafnya sangat ramah dan selalu siap membantu jika diperlukan. Lokasi tidak bagus. Jalan -jalan besar di panas ke pantai dan bar. Anda harus naik taksi untuk benar -benar pergi ke mana pun

Subjeck: Menikmati fasilitas & makan enak di Kuta Central Park Hotel
Review: Pada tanggal 28 Agustus 2015 saya liburan ke Bali. Pada saat itu kami liburan bertiga alias 3 orang. Bingung milih kamar yang bisa menampung ganjil 3 orang. Rata-rata pada menyediakan 1 kamar unuk 2 orang. Saya pilihlah Kuta Central Park Hotel dengan type kamar Triple Strudio Room. Ternyata kamarnya besar dan luas. Selain itu makanan yang disajikan juga enak. Pada saat datang malam hari sehabis jalan-jalan saya melihat sedang ada pertunjukan tari. Rencana 23 November besok saya akan ke Bali lagi dan menginap di sana lagi. Mantap deh untuk saat ini. Tingkatkan terus pelayanannya & promo diskonnya.
Review_English: On August 28, 2015 I was on vacation to Bali. At that time we were a three -person vacation alias 3 people. Confused to choose a room that can accommodate 3 people. The average of providing 1 room for 2 people. I chose Kuta Central Park Hotel with Triple Studio Room room type. It turned out that the room was large and spacious. Besides the food served is also delicious. When I arrived at night after a walk I saw a dance performance. November 23's plan tomorrow I will go to Bali again and stay there again. Great for now. Continue to improve the service & the discount promo.

Subjeck: menyenangkan namun “Lebih pantas bintang 3 dari pada bintang 4”
Review: seperti yang sudah diulas oleh jefry_lau, saya rasa hotel ini lebih pantas mendapat bintang 3 karena beberapa aspek. yang saya notice adalah lorong yang sangat polos tanpa karpet. di kamar mandi pun tidak ada bath tub hanya shower. namun overall, it was a nice stay. kamar saya deluxe and it was comfy.
Review_English: As reviewed by Jefry_lau, I think this hotel deserves 3 stars because of several aspects. What I am notice is a very innocent hallway without carpet. Even in the bathroom there is no bath tub just a shower. But overall, it was a nice stay. My room is deluxe and it was comfy.
Review_Summary: As reviewed by Jefry_lau, I think this hotel deserves 3 stars because of several aspects. What I am notice is a very innocent hallway without carpet. Even in the bathroom there is no bath tub just a shower. But overall, it was a nice stay. My room is deluxe and it was comfy.
Review_Bahasa: Seperti yang ditinjau oleh Jefry_lau, saya pikir hotel ini layak mendapatkan 3 bintang karena beberapa aspek. Yang saya perhatikan adalah lorong yang sangat tidak bersalah tanpa karpet. Bahkan di kamar mandi tidak ada bak mandi hanya mandi. Tapi secara keseluruhan, itu adalah tinggal yang menyenangkan. Kamar saya mewah dan nyaman.
Review_Clean: Seperti yang ditinjau oleh Jefry_lau, saya pikir hotel ini layak mendapatkan 3 bintang karena beberapa aspek. Yang saya perhatikan adalah lorong yang sangat tidak bersalah tanpa karpet. Bahkan di kamar mandi tidak ada bak mandi hanya mandi. Tapi secara keseluruhan, itu adalah tinggal yang menyenangkan. Kamar saya mewah dan nyaman.

Subjeck: HUGE rooms but location is not good
Review: Booked via expedia.com. It was sooo afforable. For a triple room, the room is sooo huge. Hotel pickup is IDR150K per car. Arrival is ok. Well-accommodated upon check-in. Free glass of refreshment. You have an option of giving a deposit if you want charges be billed to your room or pay by cash/card each time you order. I opted that latter option. Free water bottles (literal glass bottle) every day. Showerhead is broken. Water pressure is not strong but manageable. Breakfast buffet is ok. But restaurant is literally open-air so it's really hot to eat there. I hated that they wont let you split your bill and pay in cash and card at the same time in one bill. Weird. INTERNET IS INTERMITTENT. Does not connect to the login page most of the time. Location is a bit far from everywhere. Nothing is walking distance. You really need to take a cab or get their free shuttle to 4 main locations-- BeachWalk Mall, Legian Beach, Kuta Beach or Discovery Mall. Though you have to take a cab on your way back. Want to buy affordable souvenirs? Avoid Discovery Mall. Head on to Carrefour and there are souvenirs there at really affordable rates. Want a cheap SIM card with data load? Buy at the cellphone accessories store at Carrefour. You can hae a 4GB internet for IDR150K (card plus load). This is enough for almost/more than a week of internet.

Review_Bahasa: Dipesan melalui Expedia.com. Itu sangat terkenal. Untuk kamar tiga, kamarnya sangat besar. Pickup hotel adalah IDR150K per mobil. Kedatangan tidak apa -apa. Diakomodasi dengan baik saat check-in. Segelas penyegaran gratis. Anda memiliki opsi untuk memberikan setoran jika Anda ingin biaya ditagih ke kamar Anda atau membayar dengan uang tunai/kartu setiap kali Anda memesan. Saya memilih opsi terakhir itu. Botol air gratis (botol kaca literal) setiap hari. Pancuran rusak. Tekanan air tidak kuat tetapi mudah dikelola. Sarapan prasmanan baik -baik saja. Tapi restoran benar-benar terbuka sehingga sangat panas untuk makan di sana. Saya benci bahwa mereka tidak akan membiarkan Anda membagi tagihan dan membayar tunai dan kartu secara bersamaan dalam satu tagihan. Aneh. Internet terputus -putus. Tidak terhubung ke halaman login hampir sepanjang waktu. Lokasi agak jauh dari mana -mana. Tidak ada yang berjalan kaki. Anda benar-benar perlu naik taksi atau mendapatkan antar-jemput gratis ke 4 lokasi utama- Beachwalk Mall, Legian Beach, Kuta Beach atau Discovery Mall. Padahal Anda harus naik taksi dalam perjalanan kembali. Ingin membeli suvenir yang terjangkau? Hindari Discovery Mall. Pergilah ke Carrefour dan ada suvenir di sana dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Ingin kartu SIM murah dengan beban data? Beli di toko aksesoris ponsel di Carrefour. Anda dapat memiliki internet 4GB untuk IDR150K (kartu plus beban). Ini cukup untuk hampir/lebih dari seminggu internet.

Review: Mycket bra hotell. Bodde här först tillsammans med 4 kompisar, då hade vi ett 5 manna-rum, superbra och stort och rymligt. Mycket för pengarna plus superbra wifi! Bra frukost. Men när vi var tre som bodde här hade vi ett väldigt litet rum som luktade lite märkligt samt att wifit inte funkade. Men bra hotell överlag, bra mat och bra poolområde.
Review_English: Very good hotel. Stayed here first with 4 friends, then we had a 5 man room, superb and big and spacious. Much for the money plus superb wifi! Good breakfast. But when we were three who lived here we had a very small room that smelled a bit strange and that Wifit did not work. But good hotel overall, good food and good pool area.
Review_Summary: Very good hotel. Stayed here first with 4 friends, then we had a 5 man room, superb and big and spacious. Much for the money plus superb wifi! Good breakfast. But when we were three who lived here we had a very small room that smelled a bit strange and that Wifit did not work. But good hotel overall, good food and good pool area.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bagus. Tinggal di sini terlebih dahulu dengan 4 teman, lalu kami memiliki kamar 5 orang, luar biasa dan besar dan luas. Banyak untuk uang plus wifi luar biasa! Sarapan enak. Tetapi ketika kami berusia tiga tahun yang tinggal di sini, kami memiliki ruangan yang sangat kecil yang berbau agak aneh dan wifit itu tidak berfungsi. Tapi hotel yang bagus secara keseluruhan, makanan enak dan area kolam renang yang bagus.
Review_Clean: Hotel yang sangat bagus. Tinggal di sini terlebih dahulu dengan 4 teman, lalu kami memiliki kamar 5 orang, luar biasa dan besar dan luas. Banyak untuk uang plus wifi luar biasa! Sarapan enak. Tetapi ketika kami berusia tiga tahun yang tinggal di sini, kami memiliki ruangan yang sangat kecil yang berbau agak aneh dan wifit itu tidak berfungsi. Tapi hotel yang bagus secara keseluruhan, makanan enak dan area kolam renang yang bagus.

Review: Firstly they offer very competitive rates. Secondly, their services are fantastic !! The staff always has a smile on their faces and they do everything possible to make your stay comfortable. The room we stayed in was a Superior room - it was nice and airy and had ample room for the kid to run around. However, it is definitely not a 4 star hotel. It is a budget hotel which has a small splash pool. The splash pool also doubles up as a pool bar and makes for highly entertaining times with the family !! Apart from the pool and bar, the hotel also has a decent gymnasium and spa. The location of the hotel is perhaps the biggest advantage - it is close to the Kuta part circuit but not in the middle of the mad traffic rush. It is fairly easy to get around from the hotel area. The hotel also has a K-Circle store next door which is a great convenience point for buying water/ drinks/ ATM Cash dispensing/ any other need! The only point of improvement - they should really give better quality and quantity of drinking water for the rooms - they hardly cost any significant additional money !!

Review_Bahasa: Pertama mereka menawarkan harga yang sangat kompetitif. Kedua, layanan mereka fantastis !! Staf selalu memiliki senyum di wajah mereka dan mereka melakukan segala yang mungkin untuk membuat Anda tetap nyaman. Kamar yang kami tinggali adalah ruangan yang unggul - itu bagus dan lapang dan memiliki ruang yang cukup untuk anak -anak itu berlarian. Namun, itu jelas bukan hotel bintang 4. Ini adalah hotel anggaran yang memiliki kolam renang splash kecil. Pool splash juga berfungsi ganda sebagai bar biliar dan membuat masa -masa yang sangat menghibur bersama keluarga !! Terlepas dari kolam renang dan bar, hotel ini juga memiliki gimnasium dan spa yang layak. Lokasi hotel mungkin merupakan keuntungan terbesar - dekat dengan sirkuit bagian Kuta tetapi tidak di tengah -tengah terburu -buru lalu lintas gila. Cukup mudah untuk berkeliling dari area hotel. Hotel ini juga memiliki toko K-Circle di sebelahnya yang merupakan titik kenyamanan yang bagus untuk membeli air/ minuman/ pengeluaran tunai ATM/ kebutuhan lainnya! Satu -satunya titik peningkatan - mereka harus benar -benar memberikan kualitas dan jumlah air minum yang lebih baik untuk kamar - mereka hampir tidak membutuhkan biaya tambahan yang signifikan !!

Review: Not a great location if you want to be within walking distance to the restaurants, shopping etc and definitely not safe to walk around at night. We requested a non-smoking room with a balcony. We got 2 balconies (corner room) with a view into the office buildings across the narrow street. The smell of stale cigarette smoke was pretty bad and it was obvious that the room had been frequently smoked in. Besides the smell, the room itself was comfortable, the bed was large and firm, the shower had good flow and was quick to get hot. Wifi worked well and good variety of pay TV channels to choose. The included breakfast was nice and the staff were very friendly and helpful.

Review_Bahasa: Bukan lokasi yang bagus jika Anda ingin berada dalam jarak berjalan kaki ke restoran, berbelanja dll dan jelas tidak aman untuk berjalan -jalan di malam hari. Kami meminta ruang yang tidak merokok dengan balkon. Kami mendapat 2 balkon (ruang sudut) dengan pemandangan ke gedung perkantoran di seberang jalan sempit. Aroma asap rokok basi sangat buruk dan jelas bahwa ruangan itu sering diasikan. Selain bau, ruangan itu sendiri nyaman, tempat tidurnya besar dan kencang, kamar mandi memiliki aliran yang baik dan cepat menjadi panas. WiFi bekerja dengan baik dan berbagai saluran TV gaji yang baik untuk dipilih. Sarapan yang disertakan menyenangkan dan stafnya sangat ramah dan membantu.
Review_Clean: Bukan lokasi yang bagus jika Anda ingin berada dalam jarak berjalan kaki ke restoran, berbelanja dll dan jelas tidak aman untuk berjalan -jalan di malam hari. Kami meminta ruang yang tidak merokok dengan balkon. Kami mendapat 2 balkon ruang sudut dengan pemandangan ke gedung perkantoran di seberang jalan sempit. Aroma asap rokok basi sangat buruk dan jelas bahwa ruangan itu sering diasikan. Selain bau, ruangan itu sendiri nyaman, tempat tidurnya besar dan kencang, kamar mandi memiliki aliran yang baik dan cepat menjadi panas. WiFi bekerja dengan baik dan berbagai saluran TV gaji yang baik untuk dipilih. Sarapan yang disertakan menyenangkan dan stafnya sangat ramah dan membantu.

Subjeck: Lebih pantas bintang 3 dari pada bintang 4
Review: Beberapa kelebihan : + Harga cukup murah + Kamar cukup luas + Kamar mandi luas + Menu breakfast cukup variatif Beberapa kekurangan - Design kamar kurang spesial - Lokasi hotel terlihat seperti ruko - Receptionis kurang tanggap - lokasi agak jauh dari pantai overall kesimpulan hotel ini pantas nya bintang 3 bukan bintang 4, tapi oke untuk yang mencari hotel dengan harga murah.
Review_English: Some advantages: + price is quite cheap + room is quite spacious + spacious bathroom + Breakfast menu is quite varied some deficiencies - Room designs are less special - Hotel locations look like shop houses - Receptionists are less responsive - Locations are some distance from the beach Overall Conclusion This hotel is appropriate for 3 stars not 4 stars, but okay for those who are looking for hotels at low prices.
Review_Summary: Some advantages: + price is quite cheap + room is quite spacious + spacious bathroom + Breakfast menu is quite varied some deficiencies - Room designs are less special - Hotel locations look like shop houses - Receptionists are less responsive - Locations are some distance from the beach Overall Conclusion This hotel is appropriate for 3 stars not 4 stars, but okay for those who are looking for hotels at low prices.

Review: ketika saya tiba di kuta central park hotel di sambut staff yg ramah, dan untuk kamar nya juga luas serta bersih , makan pagi cukup bervariasi, yang sangat saya senang adalah ketika kertas tiket, serta voucher dinner saya di koper basah kena air,saya minta tolong resepsionis untuk membantu print kembali , dan itu tidak di kenakan biaya, padahal di hotel lain biasanya print 1 lembar saja dikenakan biaya.
Review_English: When I arrived at Kuta Central Park Hotel was welcomed by a friendly staff, and for the room was also spacious and clean, breakfast was quite varied, what I really liked was when the ticket paper, and my dinner voucher at the wet suitcase hit by water, I asked for help the receptionist to help print again, and it was not charged, even though in other hotels usually print 1 sheet print.

Review_Bahasa: Ketika saya tiba di Kuta Central Park Hotel disambut oleh staf yang ramah, dan untuk kamar itu juga luas dan bersih, sarapan cukup bervariasi, yang benar -benar saya sukai adalah ketika kertas tiket, dan voucher makan malam saya di koper basah yang dilanda air, saya meminta bantuan resepsionis untuk membantu mencetak lagi, dan tidak dikenakan biaya, meskipun di hotel lain yang biasanya mencetak 1 lembar cetakan.

Review: We stayed here seven nights and it was fine. Our room was kept clean, the staff were very friendly, housekeeping were quick to help when I accidentally broke a glass on my room. The breakfast is good, especially the crepes with chocolate sauce. The pool is nice and cool and although sometimes it was very busy, we could almost always find a time of the day when we could swim by ourselves. At the restaurant, you must try the pizzas- they have a pizza oven and make a really amazing margarita pizza and Balinese pizza. Only real bad point was how empty room service plates and dishes were to be just left in the hallway, sometimes taking 24 hours or more to be cleaned up. Also, sometimes people would be yelling or talking too loud in the corridors. But apart from that, a good stay.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di sini tujuh malam dan itu baik -baik saja. Kamar kami tetap bersih, staf sangat ramah, rumah tangga dengan cepat membantu ketika saya secara tidak sengaja memecahkan gelas di kamar saya. Sarapannya enak, terutama crepes dengan saus cokelat. Kolam renangnya bagus dan keren dan meskipun kadang -kadang sangat sibuk, kami hampir selalu dapat menemukan waktu ketika kami bisa berenang sendiri. Di restoran, Anda harus mencoba pizza- mereka memiliki oven pizza dan membuat pizza margarita yang sangat menakjubkan dan pizza Bali. Hanya poin buruk yang benar -benar buruk adalah bagaimana pelat layanan dan hidangan kamar kosong harus ditinggalkan di lorong, kadang -kadang memakan waktu 24 jam atau lebih untuk dibersihkan. Juga, kadang -kadang orang akan berteriak atau berbicara terlalu keras di koridor. Tapi terlepas dari itu, masa tinggal yang baik.

Review: Hotel ini bentuknya agak unik, karena mungkin bangunan ini dulu ditujukan untuk pusat perbelanjaan, tapi akhirnya dirubah jadi hotel. Letaknya lumayan strategis, gampang cari atm dan nasi pedas ibu andika ada di seberang jalan. Kamar nya biasa saja, tapi kebetulan saya dapat kamar yang dilengkapi balkon yang lumayan besar, kamar mandinya juga luas dan bersih. Hanya saja lorong lorong hotel terkesan agak sedkit suram. Staf ramah dan cekatan walaupun sedang ramai. Untuk sarapan, menunya lumayan bervariasi untuk hotel sejenis
Review_English: The hotel is rather unique in shape, because maybe this building was intended for shopping centers, but eventually changed to a hotel. It is quite strategic, easy to find ATMs and Spicy Rice Ms. Andika is across the street. The room is normal, but I happen to get a room that is equipped with a fairly large balcony, the bathroom is also spacious and clean. It's just that the hotel hallway seems rather gloomy. Staff are friendly and deft even though they are crowded. For breakfast, the menu is quite varied for similar hotels

Review: -Zimmer: großzügig, sauber, sehr dunkel da kein Fenster und keine Terrasse/Balkon, Wenn die anderen Gäste Rücksichtsvoller sind dann ist es auch ruhig -Badezimmer: großzügig, kein Fenster und deshalb gelbe Fugen wegen Nässe, Fön/Showercap/Zahnbürste/Mini Zahnpasta/Mini Showergel vorhanden -Klimaanlage: funktioniert gut, tropft bei langer Betrieb -WLan: funktioniert einwandfrei obwohl wir im 3. Stock wohnen -Essen: Sehr gutes und umfangreiches Frühstücksbuffet, Abendessen sehr empfehlenswert (beim Burgerfleisch kann man aussuchen wie man das Fleisch haben möchte) -Anlage: Swimmingpool/Billardtisch/Kickertisch/Cocktailbar vorhanden, alles schön mit Pflanzen/Blumen angelegt -Lage: ruhig, zum Legian Beach ca. 15 Min zu Fuß, zum Kuta Beach ca. 30 Min zu Fuß, in der Nähe ist ein größerer Supermarkt vorhanden -Shuttlebus: fährt 5 Mal am Tag kostenlos zum Kuta Beach / Discovery Shopping Mall
Review_English: -Cimmer: generous, clean, very dark since no window and no terrace/balcony, if the other guests are more considerate then it is also calm -bathroom: generous, no window and therefore yellow joints due to wet, hair dryer/showercap/toothbrush/mini toothpasta/mini shower gel available -Clima system: works well, drips with a long operation -WLAN: Very good and extensive breakfast buffet, dinner highly recommended (with the burger meat you can choose how you want the meat) system: swimming pool/billiard table/kicker table/cocktail bar available, everything nicely with plants/flowers -position: calm, for the Legian beach approx. 15 minutes on foot, to the Kuta beach on foot, nearby is a larger supermarket: Day free of charge to the Kuta Beach / Discovery Shopping Mall
Review_Summary: -Cimmer: generous, clean, very dark since no window and no terrace/balcony, if the other guests are more considerate then it is also calm -bathroom: generous, no window and therefore yellow joints due to wet, hair dryer/showercap/toothbrush/mini toothpasta/mini shower gel available -Clima system: works well, drips with a long operation -WLAN: Very good and extensive breakfast buffet, dinner highly recommended (with the burger meat you can choose how you want the meat) system: swimming pool/billiard table/kicker table/cocktail bar available, everything nicely with plants/flowers -position: calm, for the Legian beach approx. 15 minutes on foot, to the Kuta beach on foot, nearby is a larger supermarket: Day free of charge to the Kuta Beach / Discovery Shopping Mall

Review: Kammar yang kami pilih tidak memiliki pemandangan, tetapi kamar nya cukup luas dan bersih, begitu juga dengan kamar mandi nya. Lokasi hotel berada di pinggir obyek wisata Kuta dan Legian sehingga tidak terlalu macet, dan harga nya cukup tinggi dibandingkan dengan hotel yang yang sekelas.
Review_English: Kammar that we chose did not have a view, but the room was quite spacious and clean, as well as the bathroom. The location of the hotel is on the edge of Kuta and Legian tourism objects so it is not too jammed, and the price is quite high compared to a hotel that is in the same class.

Review_English: This hotel is said to be just ordinary, it's not, it's not luxurious too ... but it's quite comfortable and close to the city ... the access is also easy ... being in a crowded area ... the room is quite comfortable .. Overall can be used as one of the recommended hotels in Bali

Review: The pictures of the hotel in the internet does not match the look in actual. I was quite shocked to see it because it was different from what I expected. The pool looks old and not so inviting. Also, the set up is quite confusing, had to walk a lot before reaching the hotel rooms proper. However, the rooms are clean and trendy. It was spacious and has a nice color variation. Also had a good spa experience. The location is near the downtown area (shopping malls, restaurants etc) Overall, it's a so-so hotel for me.

Review_Bahasa: Gambar -gambar hotel di internet tidak cocok dengan tampilan aktual. Saya cukup terkejut melihatnya karena itu berbeda dari yang saya harapkan. Kolam itu terlihat tua dan tidak begitu mengundang. Juga, pengaturannya cukup membingungkan, harus banyak berjalan sebelum mencapai kamar hotel yang tepat. Namun, kamarnya bersih dan trendi. Itu luas dan memiliki variasi warna yang bagus. Juga memiliki pengalaman spa yang baik. Lokasi berada di dekat area pusat kota (pusat perbelanjaan, restoran dll) secara keseluruhan, ini adalah hotel yang sangat bagi saya.

Subjeck: Convenient location and amazing hospitable hotel staff
Review: We were greeted by the staff of Kuta Central Park Hotel the moment we touched down in Bali International Airport. He was waiting for us to arrive to fetch us to the hotel. We could find him very quickly and he greeted us with a big smile on his face and welcomed us to Bali. We got very comfortable with him immediately. Even though his English was not very good, we could understand him and he tried to explain to us whenever we asked him something. When we reached the hotel, we were greeted by the rest of the staff members. They were quick with their service to help us get our luggage from the van. The check-in process was also very quick and we got to our rooms almost immediately. We were even shown to our rooms personally, unlike in other hotels I have visited where we have to go look for it on our own. Our hotel room was very huge and had 2 separate rooms and a living area. It was on the ground floor and when we open the sliding doors, the swimming pool is just right outside. The room wasn't exceptionally fancy and luxurious looking but we were happy as it feels very cosy like a home. They provide a safe which is very important as we would want to keep certain valuables in the hotel room. Also, they provide basic toiletries, an iron board with iron, and a nice bath robe for everyone. Overall, pretty much satisfied with the room. The hotel breakfast offers a good variety and on top of that it tastes really good! We were very excited for breakfast everyday. Pancakes, waffles, porridge, pastries, fried rice, noodles, sausage, eggs and more. What I would really commend on would the staff, they are really very very nice and made our stay very enjoyable. One tiny flaw would be the water heater. There is no switch to on the water heater, we have to just turn the tap to the "hot" side and hot water is supposed to come out. However, many times the hot water doesn't come out. The water heating system could do with an upgrade. In conclusion, this hotel is highly recommended!

We could find him very quickly and he greeted us with a big smile on his face and welcomed us to Bali. We got very comfortable with him immediately. One tiny flaw would be the water heater. There is no switch to on the water heater, we have to just turn the tap to the "hot" side and hot water is supposed to come out. However, many times the hot water doesn't come out. The water heating system could do with an upgrade. In conclusion, this hotel is highly recommended!
Review_Summary: Kuta Central Park Hotel is one of the most popular hotels in Bali. The hotel offers a good variety of breakfast options. The water heating system could do with an upgrade. The staff at the hotel are very nice and made our stay very enjoyable.
Review_Bahasa: Kami disambut oleh staf Kuta Central Park Hotel saat kami mendarat di Bandara Internasional Bali. Dia menunggu kami tiba untuk menjemput kami ke hotel. Kami dapat menemukannya dengan sangat cepat dan dia menyambut kami dengan senyum lebar di wajahnya dan menyambut kami di Bali. Kami segera merasa nyaman dengannya. Meskipun bahasa Inggrisnya tidak terlalu baik, kami bisa memahaminya dan dia mencoba menjelaskan kepada kami setiap kali kami menanyakan sesuatu kepadanya. Ketika kami sampai di hotel, kami disambut oleh anggota staf lainnya. Mereka cepat dengan layanan mereka untuk membantu kami mendapatkan barang bawaan kami dari van. Proses check-in juga sangat cepat dan kami segera sampai di kamar kami. Kami bahkan ditunjukkan ke kamar kami secara pribadi, tidak seperti di hotel lain yang telah saya kunjungi di mana kami harus mencarinya sendiri. Kamar hotel kami sangat besar dan memiliki 2 kamar terpisah dan ruang tamu. Itu di lantai dasar dan ketika kami membuka pintu geser, kolam renang tepat di luar. Kamar itu tidak terlalu mewah dan terlihat mewah tetapi kami senang karena rasanya sangat nyaman seperti rumah. Mereka menyediakan brankas yang sangat penting karena kami ingin menyimpan barang -barang berharga tertentu di kamar hotel. Juga, mereka menyediakan perlengkapan mandi dasar, papan besi dengan besi, dan jubah mandi yang bagus untuk semua orang. Secara keseluruhan, cukup puas dengan ruangan. Sarapan hotel menawarkan variasi yang baik dan di atasnya rasanya sangat enak! Kami sangat bersemangat untuk sarapan setiap hari. Pancake, wafel, bubur, kue kering, nasi goreng, mie, sosis, telur dan banyak lagi. Apa yang benar -benar saya puji akan staf, mereka benar -benar sangat baik dan membuat kami tinggal sangat menyenangkan. Salah satu cacat kecil adalah pemanas air. Tidak ada sakelar ke pemanas air, kita harus mengubah keran ke sisi "panas" dan air panas seharusnya keluar. Namun, berkali -kali air panas tidak keluar. Sistem pemanas air dapat dilakukan dengan peningkatan. Sebagai kesimpulan, hotel ini sangat dianjurkan!

Review: Directly booked via hotel website and got special price for Studio King Queen room. Room space is spacious for family. We're in room 137 ground level which connecting kids pool access. Check in process quite long since we arrived at 12.30 and shall wait until 14.00 to get in room. Cleanness/Kebersihan is poor , sprei n bedcover ada bekas noda. Bathroom shower kurang deras dan aliran air dilantai tumpat hingga lantai becek. Breakfast at Ponds cafe is great. Overall it's OK for short stay.

Review: Room was great, staff were very helpful and friendly. Need more options on the lunch/dinner menu. The buffet breakfast also needs some more aussie food as its mostly rice curry beef and all sorts of weird and wonderful things. Bed was amazing and the room very clean and homey. Tv is horrible as its all foreign. Swim up pool bar was good just a bit pricey so i would suggest eating and drinking elsewhere to save on cash.

Berenang di Bar Pool sangat bagus, jadi saya sarankan makan dan minum di tempat lain untuk menghemat uang tunai.

Review: do not expect more than you paid for. booked for my group of company family gathering and i stayed for 3 nights at triple share room (consist 3 single beds) at ground floor and it has no window. the wall is too thin, you can hear noise from your next room is quite annoying for me. need more effort for bathroom, since it's only a small glass cubicle. breakfast is good, pool and kids playground is kewl. wifi is available at all area of the hotel (love it)

Review: Saya memesan kamar untuk 5orang. Saat masuk kamar, staff hotel mengetuk pintunya dulu sebanyak 3x, ini asli membuat angker. Kamarnya tidak terkena sinar matahari dan tidak ada udara, jadi pengap, berbau. Lebih baik request kamar yang terkena cahaya dan udara langsung.. terletak tidak jauh dari nasi pedas ibu andhika. Namun jauh dari pusat keramaian,tidak ada apa2,tempat makan juga sedikit

The room is not exposed to sunlight and there is no air, so it is stuffy, smells. It's better to request the room that is exposed to light and direct air. Located not far from the spicy rice of Mrs. Andhika. But far from the center of the crowd, there is nothing, a little place to eat
