Review: Easy to reach the hotel.. but the aisle so creepy. My wife scare to pass the aisle alone. So I went to lobby to accompanied her to our room. For breakfast, it's various menu, smells good, great taste. It made me forgot all include my wife's bag when we return to the room. She mad at me. Luckily, the staff keep it. Thank you for young woman at restaurant who keep my wife's bag. I have quality sleep here. But not for my wife. I made her woke up twice because I turn off the AC. Hehehe... I spent few minutes in bathtub in the morning before breakfast. It made me so fresh to start my day.. thank you. I have little difficult to get parking here. And the pool just until 7pm,.

Review_Bahasa: Mudah mencapai hotel .. tapi lorong sangat menyeramkan. Istri saya menakut -nakuti lorong sendirian. Jadi saya pergi ke lobi untuk menemaninya ke kamar kami. Untuk sarapan, ini beragam menu, baunya enak, rasanya enak. Itu membuat saya lupa semua termasuk tas istri saya ketika kami kembali ke kamar. Dia marah padaku. Untungnya, staf menyimpannya. Terima kasih untuk wanita muda di restoran yang menyimpan tas istri saya. Saya memiliki tidur berkualitas di sini. Tapi bukan untuk istriku. Saya membuatnya bangun dua kali karena saya mematikan AC. Hehehe ... Saya menghabiskan beberapa menit di bathtub di pagi hari sebelum sarapan. Itu membuat saya sangat segar untuk memulai hari saya .. terima kasih. Saya memiliki sedikit sulit untuk diparkir di sini. Dan kolam sampai jam 7 malam,.
Review_Clean: Mudah mencapai hotel .. tapi lorong sangat menyeramkan. Istri saya menakut -nakuti lorong sendirian. Jadi saya pergi ke lobi untuk menemaninya ke kamar kami. Subjeck: Очень хороший отель в центре Куты
Review: Отель превосходно расположен в самом центре Куты. Мы брали на прокат машину поэтому нам было очень удобно добираться из этого отеля в аэропорт ( около 10 км ) и к достопримечательностям. У отеля очень удобная собственная стоянка. Очень хорошие завтраки, прекрасный персонал.
Review_English: The hotel is excellently located in the very center of Kuta. We rented a car so it was very convenient for us to get from this hotel to the airport (about 10 km) and to the sights. The hotel has a very convenient parking lot. Very good breakfasts, wonderful staff.
Review_Summary: The hotel is excellently located in the very center of Kuta. We rented a car so it was very convenient for us to get from this hotel to the airport (about 10 km) and to the sights. The hotel has a very convenient parking lot. Very good breakfasts, wonderful staff.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini terletak sangat baik di pusat Kuta. Kami menyewa mobil sehingga sangat nyaman bagi kami untuk pergi dari hotel ini ke bandara (sekitar 10 km) dan pemandangan. Hotel ini memiliki tempat parkir yang sangat nyaman. Sarapan yang sangat enak, staf yang luar biasa.
Review_Clean: Hotel ini terletak sangat baik di pusat Kuta. Kami menyewa mobil sehingga sangat nyaman bagi kami untuk pergi dari hotel ini ke bandara sekitar 10 km dan pemandangan. Hotel ini memiliki tempat parkir yang sangat nyaman. Sarapan yang sangat enak, staf yang luar biasa.

Review: I traveled in a group of 16 with my friends and this was one of the few hotels that actually has rooms big enough to host 5 people in each room at an affordable price for us. We booked the family suite for four nights at only IDR800.000 per night which includes breakfast. That in itself was already a jackpot. The rooms were comfortable, very spacious. Housekeeping did a such fantastic job cleaning our rooms that no matter how messy or dirty we made the room to be, they made it good as new. The bathroom was okay, but the shower was way too close to the wall so each bath felt like I'm hugging the wall. Service was not bad, although not exactly the best either. Breakfast was nice and I love the fact that they switch it up each day. The hotel has quite a range of free facilities too. There's a lounge by the pool that plays some great selection of music at night. I wouldn't recommend working out at their gym though because it is literally just a square glass box with a 3 equipment and a set of dumbbells. One thing that really bummed me out was the location. It's kind of too far to walk anywhere and it's located in the middle of a shop house complex so it's kind of creepy to arrive in the middle of the night when everything's closed and dark there. I HATE the fact that hotel guests still have to pay parking too, which is about IDR4.000/hour (and yes, stopping for a while counts as an hour already). One thing I like about the location is that it's next to a Circle K with an ATM. All in all, you get a bit more than you pay for when it comes to this hotel, but they could use a lot of improvements in certain things.

Review_Bahasa: Saya bepergian dalam kelompok 16 dengan teman -teman saya dan ini adalah salah satu dari sedikit hotel yang sebenarnya memiliki kamar yang cukup besar untuk menampung 5 orang di setiap kamar dengan harga terjangkau bagi kami. Kami memesan The Family Suite untuk empat malam hanya dengan IDR800.000 per malam yang termasuk sarapan. Itu sendiri sudah menjadi jackpot. Kamar -kamarnya nyaman, sangat luas. Housekeeping melakukan pekerjaan yang fantastis membersihkan kamar kami sehingga tidak peduli seberapa berantakan atau kotor kami membuat ruangan, mereka menjadikannya baik seperti baru. Kamar mandi baik -baik saja, tapi kamar mandi terlalu dekat dengan dinding sehingga setiap kamar mandi terasa seperti aku memeluk dinding. Layanan tidak buruk, meskipun bukan yang terbaik. Sarapan itu menyenangkan dan saya suka fakta bahwa mereka beralih setiap hari. Hotel ini memiliki berbagai fasilitas gratis juga. Ada lounge di tepi kolam renang yang memainkan beberapa pilihan musik di malam hari. Saya tidak akan merekomendasikan berolahraga di gym mereka karena secara harfiah hanya kotak kaca persegi dengan 3 peralatan dan satu set dumbel. Satu hal yang benar -benar membuat saya bingung adalah lokasinya. Terlalu jauh untuk berjalan ke mana saja dan terletak di tengah kompleks rumah toko sehingga agak menyeramkan tiba di tengah malam ketika semuanya tertutup dan gelap di sana. Saya benci fakta bahwa tamu hotel masih harus membayar parkir juga, yaitu sekitar IDR.000/jam (dan ya, berhenti untuk sementara waktu dianggap satu jam). Satu hal yang saya sukai dari lokasi adalah bahwa itu di sebelah lingkaran K dengan ATM. Secara keseluruhan, Anda mendapatkan sedikit lebih banyak daripada yang Anda bayar ketika datang ke hotel ini, tetapi mereka dapat menggunakan banyak peningkatan dalam hal -hal tertentu.

Subjeck: Average Hotel but GOOD SLEEP for me
Review: Saya Menginap mulai 20-23 mei 2015. Booked 1 kamar Standard Room utk mama dan adik saya, sdgkan saya 2 dewasa dan 2 anak menginap di Triple Studio Room. Booking lewat website hotel yg menawarkan free airport pick up utk 2 malam. Sebetulnya saya ingin pindah ke hotel lain. karena tdk terlalu ada yg menarik di hotel ini. tp krn pertimbangan lain hal dan yg terpenting Hotelnya sunyi. ga berisik, jdnya saya putuskan utk extend 1 malam lagi hingga tgl 23. Saya pun meminta utk mendapatkan free airport transfer. Seharusnya Hotel memberikan saya fasilitas itu, memang sih aturan nya itu utk 4 malam jika ingin airport PP for free. Tapiiii...gue kan booking 2 kamar kali....kejam amat deh. Kebangetan pelitnya. Beralasan sdh di pick up free. Kalo Breakfastnya sih ganti2. tapi menunya tahu melulu, ayam cuma pd hari pertama. Harga sih bagus kalo buat kamar standard jika beli dgn harga promo. Tapi diluar itu semua not bad lah. seneng gue bisa tidur tanpa berisik
Review_English: I stayed overnight May 20-23, 2015. Book 1 Standard Room Room for Mama and My Sister, I have 2 adults and 2 children stay at the Triple Studio Room. Booking via a hotel website that offers free airport pick up for 2 nights. Actually I want to move to another hotel. Because there isn't anything interesting in this hotel. but because of other considerations and the most important thing the hotel is quiet. Not noisy, so I decided to extend another 1 night until 23. I also asked to get a free airport transfer. The hotel should have given me the facility, indeed the rules are for 4 nights if you want PP for free airport. Tapiiii ... I'm booking 2 rooms times ... very cruel. The stingy too. Reasoned already on pick up free. If the breakfast is changed. But the menu knows merely, the chicken is only on the first day. The price is good if you make a standard room if you buy at a promo price. But beyond that all not bad. I am happy to sleep without noisy

Pemesanan melalui situs web hotel yang menawarkan pengambilan bandara gratis selama 2 malam. Sebenarnya saya ingin pindah ke hotel lain. Karena tidak ada yang menarik di hotel ini. Tetapi karena pertimbangan lain dan hal terpenting hotel ini sunyi. Tidak berisik, jadi saya memutuskan untuk memperpanjang 1 malam lagi sampai 23. Saya juga meminta untuk mendapatkan transfer bandara gratis. Hotel seharusnya memberi saya fasilitas, memang peraturannya untuk 4 malam jika Anda ingin PP untuk bandara gratis. Tapiiii ... Saya memesan 2 kamar kali ... sangat kejam. Pelit juga. Beralasan sudah di pick up gratis. Jika sarapan diubah. Tapi menu hanya tahu, ayam hanya pada hari pertama. Harganya bagus jika Anda membuat kamar standar jika Anda membeli dengan harga promo. Tapi di luar itu semua tidak buruk. Saya senang tidur tanpa berisik

Review: How this hotel has gained a 4* is beyond me. We checked out early as the place was full of kids who thought if funny to ring your room at 7am not once but three or four times, we reported this to reception but they are not interested and say they can't understand what you are saying. Again these same young guests are running around and shouting to way past midnight but again reception could not understand and did nothing about it. The food in the hotel is average and European guests are not catered for eg if you require bacon in a morning it has to be asked for a can take up 30mins to arrive and then it's not the best we have seen. Everything closes in the hotel at 10.30pm prompt so don't expect a night cap here. I would not recommend this venue and certainly would not visit again.

Review_Bahasa: Bagaimana hotel ini mendapatkan 4* di luar jangkauan saya. Kami memeriksa lebih awal karena tempat itu penuh dengan anak -anak yang berpikir jika lucu untuk menelepon kamar Anda pada jam 7 pagi tidak hanya sekali tetapi tiga atau empat kali, kami melaporkan ini ke resepsi tetapi mereka tidak tertarik dan mengatakan mereka tidak dapat memahami apa yang Anda katakan. Sekali lagi tamu -tamu muda yang sama ini berlarian dan berteriak melewati tengah malam tetapi sekali lagi penerimaan tidak bisa mengerti dan tidak melakukan apa pun tentang hal itu. Makanan di hotel rata -rata dan tamu Eropa tidak dipenuhi EG jika Anda memerlukan bacon di pagi hari, ia harus diminta untuk dapat memakan waktu 30 menit untuk tiba dan kemudian itu bukan yang terbaik yang pernah kami lihat. Semuanya ditutup di hotel pukul 22:30, jadi jangan berharap topi malam di sini. Saya tidak akan merekomendasikan tempat ini dan tentu saja tidak akan berkunjung lagi.

Review: A good choice at Kuta area for all type clients 1.good big standard rooms 2.nice pool and nice integrated complex 3.very good rates 4.nice B/F 5.nice complex and nearby Legion 6.spa & free wifi 7.nice staff

Subjeck: Out of the way, close enough to everything
Review: This hotel is clean and has a great breakfast offering, relaxed atmosphere, out of central Kuta, but close enough to get anywhere. It was a lot quieter than some i've stayed in and was well worth the price!
Review_English: This hotel is clean and has a great breakfast offering, relaxed atmosphere, out of central Kuta, but close enough to get anywhere. It was a lot quieter than some i've stayed in and was well worth the price!
Review_Summary: This hotel is clean and has a great breakfast offering, relaxed atmosphere, out of central Kuta, but close enough to get anywhere. It was a lot quieter than some i've stayed in and was well worth the price!
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini bersih dan memiliki persembahan sarapan yang luar biasa, suasana santai, di luar Kuta pusat, tetapi cukup dekat untuk pergi ke mana pun. Itu jauh lebih tenang daripada beberapa yang pernah saya tinggali dan sepadan dengan harganya!

Review: Este hotel fica um pouco distante do mar, mas oferece transporte gratuito aos seus hospedes em determinados horários. Esta situado a poucos quilometros do aeroporto de Denpasar. Possui piscinas adulto e infantil e sala de ginastica. Os funcionarios foram muito atenciosos. O cafe da manha e bom. Apesar de o quarto em que nos hospedamos tenha sido do tipo superior, achei que era bastante simples, embora tivesse TV a cabo, frigobar e dois aparelhos de ar condicionado do tipo Split. O maior incoveniente do hotel foram outros hospedes que faziam muito barulho no corredor ate tarde e tambem de manha cedo, atrapalhando o nosso sono.
Review_English: This hotel is a bit far from the sea, but offers free transportation to its guests at certain times. This is located a few kilometers from Denpasar airport. It has adult and children's pools and gym room. The employees were very attentive. The breakfast is good. Although the room we stayed in was the top type, I thought it was quite simple, although it had cable TV, minibar and two split air conditioners. The biggest inconvenient of the hotel was other guests that made a lot of noise in the hallway until late and also in the morning, hindering our sleep.
Review_Summary: This hotel is a bit far from the sea, but offers free transportation to its guests at certain times. This is located a few kilometers from Denpasar airport. It has adult and children's pools and gym room. The employees were very attentive. The breakfast is good. Although the room we stayed in was the top type, I thought it was quite simple, although it had cable TV, minibar and two split air conditioners. The biggest inconvenient of the hotel was other guests that made a lot of noise in the hallway until late and also in the morning, hindering our sleep.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini agak jauh dari laut, tetapi menawarkan transportasi gratis kepada para tamunya pada waktu -waktu tertentu. Ini terletak beberapa kilometer dari bandara Denpasar. Ini memiliki kolam dan ruang olahraga dewasa dan anak -anak. Para karyawan sangat penuh perhatian. Sarapannya enak. Meskipun ruangan tempat kami tinggal adalah tipe teratas, saya pikir itu cukup sederhana, meskipun memiliki TV kabel, minibar dan dua AC split. Yang tidak nyaman dari hotel adalah tamu lain yang membuat banyak suara di lorong sampai larut malam dan juga di pagi hari, menghambat tidur kami.

Review: Neat , Clean and well located hotel. Friendly and efficient staff. Stayed there for 3 nights with friends on a holiday. The staff were responsive and courteous. Had a mixed variety of guests including solos, families with children, couples. We were a bunch of 6 friends from Bangalore, India who stayed there. Centrally located, we never made use of the shuttle service though. Breakfast Buffet was good and so was the WiFi. Would like to stay there again and recommend it to friends/family

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang rapi, bersih, dan berlokasi baik. Staf yang ramah dan efisien. Tinggal di sana selama 3 malam dengan teman -teman berlibur. Staf itu responsif dan sopan. Memiliki berbagai macam tamu termasuk solo, keluarga dengan anak -anak, pasangan. Kami adalah sekelompok 6 teman dari Bangalore, India yang tinggal di sana. Berlokasi sentral, kami tidak pernah menggunakan layanan antar -jemput. Sarapan prasmanan bagus dan begitu pula wifi. Ingin tinggal di sana lagi dan merekomendasikannya kepada teman/keluarga

Memiliki berbagai macam tamu termasuk solo, keluarga dengan anak -anak, pasangan. Kami adalah sekelompok 6 teman dari Bangalore, India yang tinggal di sana. Berlokasi sentral, kami tidak pernah menggunakan layanan antar -jemput. Sarapan prasmanan bagus dan begitu pula wifi. Ingin tinggal di sana lagi dan merekomendasikannya kepada temankeluarga

Review: just home from a great vacation for 12 days . breakfast was very good , room was clean. internet was good , but at the lobby it was very fast , so if you need to upload some photos sit at the lobby and log in with your id you use at your room. great eating places nearby , sate house / thai food .

Review_Bahasa: Hanya pulang dari liburan yang menyenangkan selama 12 hari. Sarapan sangat enak, kamarnya bersih. Internet bagus, tetapi di lobi itu sangat cepat, jadi jika Anda perlu mengunggah beberapa foto duduk di lobi dan masuk dengan ID Anda yang Anda gunakan di kamar Anda. Tempat makan yang bagus di dekatnya, Sate House / Thailand Food.

Review: We stayed here for 7 nights. Good location! Spacious room and with friendly staff - cheerful and helpful! Buffet breakfast very good! Room well maintained and very clean! Nice pool! I will definitely recommend this hotel my relatives and friends!
Review_English: We stayed here for 7 nights. Good location! Spacious room and with friendly staff - cheerful and helpful! Buffet breakfast very good! Room well maintained and very clean! Nice pool! I will definitely recommend this hotel my relatives and friends!

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di sini selama 7 malam. Lokasi bagus! Kamar yang luas dan dengan staf yang ramah - ceria dan bermanfaat! Sarapan prasmanan sangat enak! Kamar terawat dengan baik dan sangat bersih! Kolam renang yang bagus! Saya pasti akan merekomendasikan hotel ini kerabat dan teman saya!

Subjeck: UN ENFER TANT LE PERSONNEL QUE L'HÔTEL LUI MÊME
Review: Si il y a bien un hôtel que je vous déconseille sur kuta c'est celui-ci! Des mon arrivée j'ai du changer 3 fois de chambre tellement sa sentais le renfermé, l'humidité, à vrai dire normale quand il n'y a AUCUNE FENÊTRE DANS LA CHAMBRE, les chambres sont très sales avec toile d'araignée dans chaque chambre. La nourriture est de très mauvaise qualité et le petit déjeuner est très gras. Mais le pompom dans ce taudis d'hôtel c'est le personnel qui est absolument ignoble avec leur clients ils font tous pour vous arnaquer, sont désagréables au plus au point, menteurs et arogants, surtout un certain jéjé a l'accueil mais ce sont vraiments tous les mêmes. On a voulu partir avec mon mari et nos amis , ils nous ont obliger à payer une nuit supplémentaires alors que nous vouliond partir de cet enfer. Bref surtout n'y aller pas c'est vraiment un conseil que vous donne! Votre séjour sera un véritable enfer avec ses voleurs.
Review_English: If there is a hotel that I do not recommend on Kuta it is this one! My arrival I had to change the room 3 times so much the withdrawal, humidity, to tell normal when there is no window in the room, the rooms are very dirty with spider web in each room. The food is of very poor quality and the breakfast is very fatty. But the pompom in this hotel slum is the staff who are absolutely despicable with their customers they all do to scam you, are unpleasant to the point, liars and arguments, especially a certain jéjé has the reception but they are all the same. We wanted to leave with my husband and our friends, they forced us to pay an additional night when we wanted to start from this hell. In short, especially not to go, it is really a advice that gives you! Your stay will be a real hell with its thieves.

My arrival I had to change the room 3 times so much the withdrawal, humidity, to tell normal when there is no window in the room, the rooms are very dirty with spider web in each room. The food is of very poor quality and the breakfast is very fatty. But the pompom in this hotel slum is the staff who are absolutely despicable with their customers they all do to scam you, are unpleasant to the point, liars and arguments, especially a certain jéjé has the reception but they are all the same. We wanted to leave with my husband and our friends, they forced us to pay an additional night when we wanted to start from this hell. In short, especially not to go, it is really a advice that gives you! Your stay will be a real hell with its thieves.
Review_Bahasa: Jika ada hotel yang tidak saya rekomendasikan di Kuta, ini yang ini! Kedatangan saya, saya harus mengganti ruangan 3 kali penarikan, kelembaban, untuk memberi tahu normal ketika tidak ada jendela di kamar, kamarnya sangat kotor dengan jaring laba -laba di setiap kamar. Makanannya berkualitas sangat buruk dan sarapannya sangat berlemak. Tetapi Pompom di daerah kumuh hotel ini adalah staf yang benar -benar tercela dengan pelanggan mereka yang mereka semua lakukan untuk menipu Anda, tidak menyenangkan ke intinya, pembohong dan argumen, terutama jéjé tertentu memiliki resepsi tetapi mereka semua sama. Kami ingin pergi dengan suami dan teman -teman saya, mereka memaksa kami untuk membayar malam tambahan ketika kami ingin memulai dari neraka ini. Singkatnya, terutama untuk tidak pergi, itu benar -benar saran yang memberi Anda! Masa tinggal Anda akan menjadi neraka nyata dengan pencurinya.

Review: Friendly staff and good service the whole time we were there. The breakfasts were good and the swim up bar was well utilised. There are always drivers to take you places although we usually walked as the beach and shopping areas are with a couple of km

Subjeck: Very Good Hotel But Aircon Is Not That Good
Review: We were a group of 5 friends and booked 5 deluxe rooms with balcony the rooms were very spacious and all the amenities for the bathroom was good as well the only minus point was the Aircon which was not enough for the room size it takes a lot of time to cool the room temperature other than that the hotel was very good to stay and I would love to stay in the hotel in my next trip

Subjeck: Hotelnya bagus dan bersih tapi check-in lelet
Review: Hotelnya sih bagus dengan harga yang standart, breakfast standart, pelayanan standart, kolam renang standart, staff standart cuma 1 kendalanya yaitu proses check-in yang lelet let let let,,,,,,, Lokasinya strategis jadi gampang kemana2 dan ada fasilitas antar jemput bandara.
Review_English: The hotel is good with standard prices, standard breakfasts, standard services, standard swimming pools, standard staff only 1 obstacle, namely the slow check-in process, letting let let ,,,,,,, the strategic location is easy everywhere and there is an airport shuttle facility.

Subjeck: A budget hotel with some good facilities, friendly staff and central location in Kuta
Review: Stayed for 4 nights. Prompt pick-up/drop to airport. Room was clean and spacious. Friendly staff. Good buffet breakfast with both continental and regional mix. Clean pool but small relative to the number of accommodations. Average bar, restaurant, spa and gym facilities. Kids would love the place as it has small play area, kids room and pool. Average bed comfort. In room, aircon is located far from bed so will take some time to get the right temp close to bed. My over all experience was good. Would recommend to friends and family.
Review_English: Stayed for 4 nights. Prompt pick-up/drop to airport. Room was clean and spacious. Friendly staff. Good buffet breakfast with both continental and regional mix. Average bed comfort. In room, aircon is located far from bed so will take some time to get the right temp close to bed. My over all experience was good. Would recommend to friends and family.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal selama 4 malam. Pick-up/drop cepat ke bandara. Kamar bersih dan luas. Staf yang ramah. Sarapan prasmanan yang baik dengan campuran benua dan regional. Kolam renang bersih tetapi relatif kecil terhadap jumlah akomodasi. Rata -rata bar, restoran, spa, dan fasilitas gym. Anak -anak akan menyukai tempat ini karena memiliki area bermain kecil, kamar anak -anak dan kolam renang. Kenyamanan tempat tidur rata -rata. Di kamar, AC yang terletak jauh dari tempat tidur sehingga akan membutuhkan waktu untuk mendapatkan suhu yang tepat di dekat tempat tidur. Semua pengalaman saya bagus. Akan merekomendasikan kepada teman dan keluarga.

Review: This hotel has a great pool, quality free breakfast and the room was well maintained. I would recommend staying here if you are hoping to avoid the crazy partying of the main pub area. It is an easy 10 minute walk down to the night life anyway. Thanks guys!

Review: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights and it was the best three nights sleep I've had after a long time. Went with my 4 months old baby, when asked for an infant bed they upgrade our room and gave us a seperate twin bed for the baby. The room and bathroom were very clean. The beds were very comfortable. The room did not have any windows but that was not a huge problem for us. Friendly staff and the breakfast buffet was excellent.

The room did not have any windows but that was not a huge problem for us. Friendly staff and the breakfast buffet was excellent.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di hotel selama 3 malam dan itu adalah tidur tiga malam terbaik yang pernah saya miliki setelah waktu yang lama. Pergi dengan bayi saya yang berusia 4 bulan, ketika diminta tempat tidur bayi, mereka meningkatkan kamar kami dan memberi kami tempat tidur kembar yang terpisah untuk bayi itu. Kamar dan kamar mandi sangat bersih. Tempat tidurnya sangat nyaman. Kamar tidak memiliki jendela tetapi itu bukan masalah besar bagi kami. Staf yang ramah dan prasmanan sarapan sangat baik.

Review: Lovely hotel, with fantastic pool and room was great. Buffet breakfast was okay but lacking European food such as bacon, mushrooms or breakfast cereal etc. Shuttle bus is one way only necessitating a taxi back or a walk crossing very busy roads. No nice restaurants close by and the hotel menu good but not for every night so shuttle into town again at night is required. Staff were extremely friendly. Would probably stay somewhere closer to beach, shops and restaurants next time.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang indah, dengan kolam renang dan kamar yang fantastis sangat bagus. Sarapan prasmanan baik -baik saja tetapi kekurangan makanan Eropa seperti bacon, jamur atau sereal sarapan dll. Bus antar -jemput hanya satu cara hanya memerlukan taksi kembali atau jalan -jalan melintasi jalan yang sangat sibuk. Tidak ada restoran yang bagus di dekatnya dan menu hotel bagus tapi tidak untuk setiap malam jadi antar -jemput ke kota lagi di malam hari diperlukan. Staf sangat ramah. Mungkin akan tinggal di suatu tempat yang lebih dekat dengan pantai, toko, dan restoran lain kali.

Mungkin akan tinggal di suatu tempat yang lebih dekat dengan pantai, toko, dan restoran lain kali.

Review: Me and my partner initially stayed for 4 nights and loved it that much we decided to book the rest of our 2 week trip with this hotel! The rates are cheap & the room very tidy. People complaining about the no window and so on here are kidding themselves. You pay $50 a night for a room you just go to sleep in. The pool is great with a kid section at the top, the staff are most friendly & the buffet breakfast is unbelievable. Loved the donuts on the days they came out! Wednesday is BBQ night and its just superb, worth staying to eat that night, the free shuttle bus that leaves 5 times a day into the main parts of kuta are very useful as well. I would definitely use this place again!

Review_Bahasa: Saya dan mitra saya awalnya tinggal selama 4 malam dan sangat menyukainya, kami memutuskan untuk memesan sisa perjalanan 2 minggu kami dengan hotel ini! Tarifnya murah & ruangannya sangat rapi. Orang -orang mengeluh tentang tidak ada jendela dan sebagainya di sini bercanda. Anda membayar $ 50 per malam untuk kamar yang baru saja Anda tidur. Kolam renang sangat bagus dengan bagian anak -anak di bagian atas, stafnya paling ramah & sarapan prasmanan tidak dapat dipercaya. Mencintai donat pada hari -hari mereka keluar! Rabu adalah BBQ Night dan sangat luar biasa, layak untuk dimakan malam itu, bus antar -jemput gratis yang menyisakan 5 kali sehari ke bagian utama Kuta juga sangat berguna. Saya pasti akan menggunakan tempat ini lagi!

Tarifnya murah  ruangannya sangat rapi. Orang -orang mengeluh tentang tidak ada jendela dan sebagainya di sini bercanda. Anda membayar  50 per malam untuk kamar yang baru saja Anda tidur. Kolam renang sangat bagus dengan bagian anak -anak di bagian atas, stafnya paling ramah  sarapan prasmanan tidak dapat dipercaya. Mencintai donat pada hari -hari mereka keluar! Rabu adalah BBQ Night dan sangat luar biasa, layak untuk dimakan malam itu, bus antar -jemput gratis yang menyisakan 5 kali sehari ke bagian utama Kuta juga sangat berguna. Saya pasti akan menggunakan tempat ini lagi!

Review: Great place to stay, tidy and clean, staff are very friendly and welcoming, food is great. A special thankyou to Gusdek he was fantastic and made is a special table for dinner when he found out we were there on our honeymoon! Very happy with the service. Will be recommending you to family and friends.

Subjeck: AC Tidak Dingin dan Serapan Tidak Berkualitas
Review: Saya pernah menginap di hotel ini selama 4 hari. Saya memesan kamar dengan kapasitas 3 orang. Saat pertama masuk kamar, Ac menyala namun tidak dingin. Hingga akhir nya esok harinya saya minta untuk pindah kamar. Stelah nego" akhirnya dpat kamar yg cocok. Untuk pelayanan Ok. Namun kualitas breakfast sangat buruk untuk kualitas hotel bintang 4. tidak ada menu daging. Slama 4hari menginap menu yg tersedia hnya hati ayam, kaki cumi, bakso ikan. Saat saya komplain, akhirnya koki menyediakan masakan yang lain.
Review_English: I had stayed at this hotel for 4 days. I ordered a room with a capacity of 3 people. When you first entered the room, the AC was on but not cold. Until the end the next day I asked to move rooms. After negotiable "finally a suitable room. For ok service. But the quality of breakfast is very bad for the quality of 4 -star hotels. There is no meat menu. Also 4 days staying at a menu that is available at chicken hearts, squid feet, fish meatballs. When I complain, finally the chef provides other dishes.

Subjeck: Reasonable rates with good food and spa
Review: We stayed here during the stay at bali. The hotel has clean and well furnished maintained rooms. Hotel has wifi access. only the problem was our room had no view. Otherwise the ambience was good. Swimming pool attractive. Hotel offered free airport pick up and drop.Food was good. The spa service in the hotel was excellent. we had many spas in bali but the spa we had here in hotel was best.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di sini selama menginap di Bali. Hotel ini memiliki kamar -kamar terpelihara yang bersih dan dilengkapi dengan baik. Hotel memiliki akses wifi. Hanya masalahnya yang tidak memiliki pemandangan. Kalau tidak, suasana itu bagus. Kolam renang menarik. Hotel menawarkan pengambilan dan drop bandara gratis. Makanan bagus. Layanan spa di hotel sangat baik. Kami memiliki banyak spa di Bali tetapi spa yang kami miliki di sini di hotel adalah yang terbaik.

Subjeck: Colourful and relaxing with amazing staff
Review: Stayed herewith some girls. Wasn't expecting much cause we got the deal for so cheap, but was very very happy. Has an elevator (unlike the previous 4* I've stayed at), good selection for buffet breakfast, lovely spacious shuttle buses, very colourful and big rooms (we stayed in a triple studio) plus the pool is good -bit slippery around the edges. Has good deals and comfort for the children including a playground near the kids pool. THE STaff were very helpful as to tips and useful information. The only real down I had about the stay was the on site massage centre. My friends and I came out hurting because they didn't listen when asked numerous times to soften up - do not get the hair treatment, it kills. Also don't ask the hotel to call a cab because they don't tell u there's a minimum call out fee, we got stuck paying double for the taxi because of it. Other then that super glade and would stay here again in the triple room.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal dengan beberapa gadis. Tidak mengharapkan banyak karena kami mendapatkan kesepakatan dengan sangat murah, tetapi sangat sangat senang. Memiliki lift (tidak seperti 4* sebelumnya yang pernah saya tinggali), pilihan yang bagus untuk sarapan prasmanan, bus antar -jemput luas yang indah, kamar yang sangat berwarna dan besar (kami tinggal di studio triple) ditambah kolam renang yang bagus -bit licin di sekitar tepi. Memiliki penawaran bagus dan kenyamanan untuk anak -anak termasuk taman bermain di dekat kolam anak -anak. Staf sangat membantu untuk tips dan informasi yang berguna. Satu -satunya down nyata yang saya miliki tentang tinggal adalah pusat pijat di situs. Teman -teman saya dan saya keluar sakit karena mereka tidak mendengarkan ketika diminta beberapa kali untuk melunak - jangan mendapatkan perawatan rambut, itu membunuh. Juga jangan meminta hotel untuk menelepon taksi karena mereka tidak memberi tahu Anda bahwa ada biaya panggilan minimum, kami macet membayar dua kali lipat untuk taksi karenanya. Selain itu super glade itu dan akan tinggal di sini lagi di kamar triple.

Review: Kuta Central Park is a lovely hotel, just outside Kuta Central. The staff are super helpful and very friendly and attentive. The food was great and reasonably priced and overall, the staff really made our stay very comfortable and extremely memorable with all their little extra touches. Adam and Putu really went out on a limb to make us feel very welcome and happy. I would happily recommend this hotel to anyone, families with children, couples or those on a business trip. The rooms are clean and spacious and well maintained. The bathrooms are clean and large with lovely showers. Everything was just real value for money with a great atmosphere. Will be back next year.

Review_Bahasa: Kuta Central Park adalah hotel yang indah, tepat di luar Kuta Central. Stafnya sangat membantu dan sangat ramah dan penuh perhatian. Makanannya enak dan terjangkau dan secara keseluruhan, staf benar -benar membuat kami tinggal sangat nyaman dan sangat berkesan dengan semua sentuhan tambahan kecil mereka. Adam dan Putu benar -benar mengambil risiko untuk membuat kami merasa sangat disambut dan bahagia. Saya akan dengan senang hati merekomendasikan hotel ini kepada siapa pun, keluarga dengan anak -anak, pasangan atau mereka yang dalam perjalanan bisnis. Kamar -kamarnya bersih dan luas dan terawat dengan baik. Kamar mandi bersih dan besar dengan pancuran yang indah. Semuanya adalah nilai nyata untuk uang dengan suasana yang hebat. Akan kembali tahun depan.

Review: Pros: Price - very cheap considering the facilities and the room Facilities and room - clean and has that classic bali hotel look Staff - staff were very friendly and helpful Cons: Parking - there was no parking next to the hotel and had to pay to park in the actual kuta central park complex. A great hotel considering it's price point.

Review: The rooms were nice with good amenities however ours didn't have a window (there were rooms for the same price with a window but it didn't bother us enough to want to move). We loved the pool area and swim up bar! Bar staff were fun and friendly. Buffet breakfast was one of the best we had in Indonesia. Good location - 10 min walk to Legian Rd, but further to the beach. We hired cheap scooters from near the hotel and so only took a couple of minutes to get in to the centre. Value for money and would stay again!

Subjeck: Nice Inexpensive Hotel- not for everyone
Review: My family and I stayed at Kuta Central Park Hotel on our recent visit to Bali. I had completed our booking via email with the hotel which I found convenient, and as complementary airport transfers are not a part of their packages, I also booked return transfers with them for 300,000 IDR. Our driver was at the airport waiting for us as we came through customs with a sign and a smile- lovely after a 6 hour flight! Upon arrival to the hotel we were informed our rooms were ready (I had booked 2 rooms - one with 2 single beds and one with a king sized bed) but both had single beds despite my booking. I was informed that there were no king beds available but that it would be fixed the next day. The next day my husband and I returned to our room to see that our single beds were pushed together to make a larger bed which we were grateful for. The food in the restaurant is average- my niece who was on the trip with us hardly ate there as she didn't enjoy the flavours of the food, however my husband and I enjoyed the complementary breakfasts. I ordered a 'custom' pizza one night from the restaurant and found a prawn hidden on it- a disaster seeing as I'm allergic to seafood, I promptly informed the waitress and the pizza was taken off the bill however it made me concerned about eating there again. The food really was the disappointing thing about this hotel. The staff were very friendly and the rooms were always clean, the pool was lovely and refreshing to jump into after a day out, however there were some cracked tiles lining the inside edge of the pool which are a hazard, the tiles on the outer edge of the pool can be slippery when wet and there is nowhere near enough lounge chairs for the amount of people using the pool. All in all, it was ok value for money however I now know not to trust photos on the internet when booking accommodation.

I ordered a 'custom' pizza one night from the restaurant and found a prawn hidden on it- a disaster seeing as I'm allergic to seafood, I promptly informed the waitress and the pizza was taken off the bill however it made me concerned about eating there again. The food really was the disappointing thing about this hotel. The staff were very friendly and the rooms were always clean, the pool was lovely and refreshing to jump into after a day out, however there were some cracked tiles lining the inside edge of the pool which are a hazard, the tiles on the outer edge of the pool can be slippery when wet and there is nowhere near enough lounge chairs for the amount of people using the pool. All in all, it was ok value for money however I now know not to trust photos on the internet when booking accommodation.
Review_Summary: The food in the restaurant is average- my niece who was on the trip with us hardly ate there as she didn't enjoy the flavours of the food. The staff were very friendly and the rooms were always clean. The pool was lovely and refreshing to jump into after a day out, but there were some cracked tiles lining the inside edge of the pool.
Review_Bahasa: Saya dan keluarga saya tinggal di Kuta Central Park Hotel pada kunjungan kami baru -baru ini ke Bali. Saya telah menyelesaikan pemesanan kami melalui email dengan hotel yang menurut saya nyaman, dan sebagai transfer bandara yang saling melengkapi bukan bagian dari paket mereka, saya juga memesan transfer pengembalian dengan mereka untuk 300.000 IDR. Sopir kami berada di bandara menunggu kami ketika kami datang melalui bea cukai dengan tanda dan senyum- indah setelah penerbangan 6 jam! Setibanya di hotel, kami diberi tahu kamar kami sudah siap (saya telah memesan 2 kamar - satu dengan 2 tempat tidur tunggal dan satu dengan tempat tidur berukuran king) tetapi keduanya memiliki tempat tidur tunggal meskipun saya memesan. Saya diberitahu bahwa tidak ada tempat tidur raja yang tersedia tetapi itu akan diperbaiki pada hari berikutnya. Keesokan harinya saya dan suami saya kembali ke kamar kami untuk melihat bahwa tempat tidur tunggal kami didorong bersama untuk membuat tempat tidur yang lebih besar yang kami syukuri. Makanan di restoran rata-rata- keponakan saya yang berada di perjalanan bersama kami hampir tidak makan di sana karena dia tidak menikmati citarasa makanan, namun saya dan suami saya menikmati sarapan pelengkap. Saya memesan pizza 'adat' pada suatu malam dari restoran dan menemukan udang yang tersembunyi di atasnya- bencana karena saya alergi terhadap makanan laut, saya segera memberi tahu pelayan dan pizza dilepas dari tagihan namun itu membuat saya khawatir tentang makan di sana lagi. Makanan benar -benar adalah hal yang mengecewakan tentang hotel ini. Staf sangat ramah dan kamar selalu bersih, kolam renangnya indah dan menyegarkan untuk melompat ke dalam sehari keluar, namun ada beberapa ubin retak yang melapisi tepi bagian dalam kolam yang merupakan bahaya, ubin di tepi luar kolam renang bisa licin ketika basah dan tidak ada tempat yang cukup dekat dengan jumlah kursi lounge untuk jumlah orang yang menggunakan kolam. Secara keseluruhan, itu adalah nilai yang baik untuk uang namun sekarang saya tahu untuk tidak mempercayai foto di internet saat memesan akomodasi.

Review: I stayed here during nyepi days ( 21-23 march ), Mrs Lokita from marketing department helped me to book this package, she is really kind and clear to help me, all bout process was perfect, room, food, and all facilities are perfect too, I wanna thank to Mrs Lokita that gave me that special nyepi package, One thing that I have to tell is about staff hospitality, I was kinda disapponted coz some of them ( receptionist and staff in restaurant were not too friendly ) but it is okey, I realy understand about it, but I and my friend would be very happy if they just give a smile and their passion to serve guest mus t be incresed for example, when I want to check in and standing up from receptionist , no greetings at all, at least they say hi or something, so i just felt like stranger, and also the supervisor though in restaurant, I dont know who is he, he wear diffrent uniform, when he told us about time to finish our lunch and dinner like a militer :( , we would be very glad if his announcement was a little bit friendly, smile, or warm, It would be very amazing, thank you

Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal di sini selama Nyepi Days (21-23 Maret), Ny. Lokita dari departemen pemasaran membantu saya memesan paket ini, dia benar-benar baik dan jelas untuk membantu saya, semua proses pertarungan adalah sempurna, kamar, makanan, dan semua fasilitas juga sempurna, saya ingin berterima kasih kepada staf yang ada di rumah tangga yang memberi saya co-cous, satu hal yang baik, satu hal yang saya katakan, saya harus memberi tahu bahwa saya harus mengatakan bahwa saya harus memberi tahu bahwa saya harus memberi tahu bahwa saya harus mengatakan tentang staf, tidak terlalu ramah) Tapi itu oke, saya benar -benar mengerti tentang hal itu, tetapi saya dan teman saya akan sangat senang jika mereka hanya memberikan senyum dan hasrat mereka untuk melayani tamu yang dibakar misalnya, ketika saya ingin check -in dan berdiri dari resepsionis, tidak ada salam sama sekali, setidaknya mereka tahu atau sesuatu, jadi saya hanya merasa seperti orang asing, dan juga supervisor di antara mereka, setidaknya mereka tahu atau sesuatu yang tidak ada di restoran, saya tidak tahu, saya tidak tahu di restoran kami, saya tidak tahu, saya tidak tahu di restoran kami, saya tidak tahu di restoran, saya tidak tahu di restoran, saya tidak tahu di restoran, saya tidak tahu di restoran, saya tidak tahu di restoran, dan juga ada di restoran kami, dan juga ada di restoran kami, dan juga ada di restoran kami, dan juga di Feed Of Miding, dan juga, dan juga, saya tidak tahu, saya tidak tahu, saya tidak tahu, Dan makan malam seperti militer :(, kami akan sangat senang jika pengumumannya sedikit ramah, tersenyum, atau hangat, itu akan sangat menakjubkan, terima kasih

Subjeck: Welcoming F&B staffs and wonderful atmosphere
Review: Most wonderful stay thanks to the staffs at Lotus Pond. We stayed at the hotel at the start of February for my birthday. Upon request we had a lovely birthday cake upon arrival. First interaction was with Meriaska who has an amazing customer service skills and extremely friendly. Thank you Meriaska for your service. The food was great and the variety in breakfast was nice too. Other staffs that were very helpful were Miku, Wina, Deni who served us at dinner time. Gusdek and Bagus have excellent teams, thank you for your time in making our stay wonderful. Sorry if we missed out some names :-) We would surely recommend this place to everyone. The place is so relaxing and quiet. Just needed a window in the room and this would have been the best. We will definitely return to Bali because of the friendliness and wonderful atmosphere. We missed the Friday night buffet and the Balinese dance, hopefully we will get to see it next time we are there. Good price for the room. The transport facility at the hotel was good. There are shuttle bus during the day to take you to main places. Can't wait to go there again.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal yang paling indah berkat staf di Lotus Pond. Kami tinggal di hotel pada awal Februari untuk ulang tahun saya. Atas permintaan kami memiliki kue ulang tahun yang indah pada saat kedatangan. Interaksi pertama adalah dengan Meriaska yang memiliki keterampilan layanan pelanggan yang luar biasa dan sangat ramah. Terima kasih Meriaska atas layanan Anda. Makanannya enak dan varietas dalam sarapan juga enak. Staf lain yang sangat membantu adalah Miku, Wina, Deni yang melayani kami pada waktu makan malam. Gusdek dan Bagus memiliki tim yang sangat baik, terima kasih atas waktu Anda dalam membuat kami tetap indah. Maaf jika kami melewatkan beberapa nama :-) Kami pasti akan merekomendasikan tempat ini kepada semua orang. Tempatnya sangat santai dan tenang. Hanya membutuhkan jendela di kamar dan ini akan menjadi yang terbaik. Kami pasti akan kembali ke Bali karena keramahan dan suasana yang indah. Kami melewatkan prasmanan Jumat malam dan tarian Bali, semoga kami akan melihatnya lain kali kami berada di sana. Harga bagus untuk kamar. Fasilitas transportasi di hotel itu bagus. Ada bus antar -jemput di siang hari untuk membawa Anda ke tempat -tempat utama. Tidak sabar untuk pergi ke sana lagi.

Subjeck: Nice place with decent pricing and good food
Review: Stayed for 2 nights. not very far off from Denpasar Airport. Beware of the taxi touts at the airport. They will ask 200 thousand IDR for a drop to the hotel. But the price is fixed at 50 thousand. So bargain and fix it somewhere near 50-60 thousand. nice garden maintained just next to the lobby in hotel. rooms are secured and you need your room key card to enter the premises. A security guard is their 24X7. Pool was neat and clean. Luckily got a pool view room on ground floor, with a balcony with seating just next to the pool. quite a nice place to sit and relax in the evening. Lotus Garden, the inhouse cafe serves delicious food but the prices are on a bit higher side. my favourites were Nasi Goreng, Fish n Chips, Fresh Fruit Platter, Lumpia (Spring Rolls) and Fish Satay. Worth Trying and very very tasty. Room was neither big nor small. bathroom was neat and clean. bedroll was crisp. the only problem in the room was the aircon. it was installed just above the main entrance of the room and was unable to cool the full room. they tried cleaning the filters on complaint but it was still same because of the shape (L) of the room. Inhouse spa was also good, neat and clean. Staff was very courteous, always ready to help and always smiling. Taxi's are available just outside the hotel. there is a mini mart also just next to the hotel.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal selama 2 malam. Tidak terlalu jauh dari Bandara Denpasar. Waspadalah terhadap tout taksi di bandara. Mereka akan meminta 200 ribu IDR untuk setetes ke hotel. Tetapi harganya ditetapkan pada 50 ribu. Jadi tawar-menawar dan perbaiki di suatu tempat di dekat 50-60 ribu. Taman yang bagus dipertahankan tepat di sebelah lobi di hotel. Kamar diamankan dan Anda memerlukan kartu kunci kamar Anda untuk memasuki tempat. Seorang penjaga keamanan adalah 24x7 mereka. Kolam rapi dan bersih. Beruntung mendapat ruang pemandangan kolam renang di lantai dasar, dengan balkon dengan tempat duduk tepat di sebelah kolam renang. Tempat yang cukup bagus untuk duduk dan bersantai di malam hari. Lotus Garden, Inhouse Cafe menyajikan makanan lezat tetapi harganya sedikit lebih tinggi. Favorit saya adalah Nasi Goreng, keripik ikan, piring buah segar, lumpia (lumpia) dan sate ikan. Layak dicoba dan sangat enak. Kamar tidak besar atau kecil. Kamar mandi rapi dan bersih. Bedroll renyah. Satu -satunya masalah di ruangan itu adalah AC. Itu dipasang tepat di atas pintu masuk utama ruangan dan tidak dapat mendinginkan ruangan penuh. Mereka mencoba membersihkan filter pada keluhan tetapi masih sama karena bentuk (l) ruangan. Inhouse Spa juga baik, rapi dan bersih. Staf sangat sopan, selalu siap membantu dan selalu tersenyum. Taksi tersedia tepat di luar hotel. Ada mini mart juga tepat di sebelah hotel.

Review: Makanannya enak, hotelnya nyaman, kamar juga nyaman, ngga terlalu jauh dari bandara, cuman sayangnya ada beberapa stafnya yang kurang senyum jadi kadang suka bete kalau ketemu staff hotel yang manyun gitu, ayo senyum donk Bli dan Mbok ;)
Review_English: The food is delicious, the hotel is comfortable, the room is also comfortable, not too far from the airport, but unfortunately there are some staff who are less smile so sometimes like to be frustrated if you meet the hotel staff who are soyun, let's smile, please smile and mbok;)

Review: j’étais avec mes amis dans cette établissement au mois de juillet 2014 pour 5 jours c-à-d 4 nuits , c'est vraiment un super Hotel que je vous recommande pour passer vous vacance. personnel sympa , une grand piscine avec bar. Super !
Review_English: I was with my friends in this establishment in July 2014 for 5 days that is 4 nights, it is really a great hotel that I recommend to pass you vacancy. Nice staff, a large swimming pool with bar. Great !

Review: Hi we stayed 10 nights at kuta central the staff could not do enough for us the rooms were kept very clean the only thing is some rooms dont have windows .there were hardly any aussies staying there and late at night children were running around screaming it was to far from kuta for us we caught a taxi everyday . the pool is a bit shallow but if you just want a rest great place to stay thank you to all the staff there sandra and george perth wa

Review_Bahasa: Hai, kami tinggal 10 malam di Kuta Central, staf tidak bisa melakukan cukup untuk kami, kamar -kamarnya tetap sangat bersih. Satu -satunya hal adalah beberapa kamar yang tidak memiliki jendela. Tidak ada orang Australia yang tinggal di sana dan larut malam anak -anak berlarian berteriak jauh dari Kuta untuk kami, kami menangkap taksi setiap hari. Kolam renang agak dangkal tetapi jika Anda hanya ingin istirahat yang bagus untuk tinggal terima kasih kepada semua staf di sana Sandra dan George Perth WA

Review: last july i went to bali and stayed ar central park kuta hotel. it's a great hotel. the price is afforadble too. the room is spacious and big. the bed is clean. no moldy humes or smelly whatsoever things. the hotel is clean(really!) the bathroom is clean too,they even had hot water too(you need to wait so the hot water will come out). they always cleaned the room everyday,they also changed the already used towel with the new and clean one everyday.the breakfast is good. the staff is friendly too. overall this hotel is good,the location is strategy,near with kuta and supermarket(but i think you need to walk for 10-30minutes to kuta.) i enjoyed my stay at there! and i hope you'll have a good one too if you stayed at this hotel.

Review_Bahasa: Juli lalu saya pergi ke Bali dan menginap AR Central Park Kuta Hotel. Ini hotel yang bagus. Harganya juga aforadble. Kamarnya luas dan besar. Tempat tidurnya bersih. Tidak ada hume berjamur atau bau apa pun. Hotel ini bersih (sungguh!) Kamar mandi juga bersih, mereka bahkan memiliki air panas juga (Anda harus menunggu sehingga air panas akan keluar). Mereka selalu membersihkan ruangan setiap hari, mereka juga mengubah handuk yang sudah digunakan dengan yang baru dan bersih setiap hari. Sarapan baik. Stafnya juga ramah. Secara keseluruhan hotel ini bagus, lokasinya adalah strategi, dekat dengan Kuta dan supermarket (tapi saya pikir Anda perlu berjalan selama 10-30 menit ke Kuta.) Saya menikmati masa tinggal saya di sana! Dan saya harap Anda juga memiliki yang bagus jika Anda tinggal di hotel ini.

Review: stayed 10 nights at kuta central park which is located about a 15minute walk from bars ,clubs ,restaurants , beach.The staff is what impressed me the most with this hotel very helpful and friendly. Breakfast had a great selection and was very tasty.A few things i didnt like was the location unless you want to take a taxi everytime you want to go out for a meal as there are hardly any restaurants near the hotel.Rooms near the pool can be very noisy day and night up until 11pm mainly due to screaming kids.Alot of asians mainly chinese people stay at this hotel so if your an aussie expecting to meet other aussies you might want to try somewhere else. Apart from that wifi was good , good selection of tv channels, nice big clean room.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal 10 malam di Kuta Central Park yang terletak sekitar 15 menit berjalan kaki dari bar, klub, restoran, pantai. Staf adalah yang paling membuat saya terkesan dengan hotel ini sangat membantu dan ramah. Sarapan memiliki banyak pilihan dan sangat lezat. Beberapa hal yang tidak saya sukai adalah lokasinya kecuali Anda ingin naik taksi setiap kali Anda ingin pergi makan karena hampir tidak ada restoran di dekat hotel. Kamar di dekat kolam renang bisa sangat berisik siang dan malam hingga pukul 11 ​​malam. Selain itu wifi itu bagus, pilihan saluran TV yang bagus, kamar bersih besar yang bagus.

Subjeck: Good for the price but not 4 star
Review: Good hotel for cheap accommodation. I would say 3 star. Extremely friendly staff except the staff member that drove off with only half of my 70 year old mother in the car. Luckily the door slammed onto her leg wedging her against the car while trying to stay on her feet as she was being dragged along the road. Hint: when screaming stop, stop, stop it doesn't make them stop.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus untuk akomodasi murah. Saya akan mengatakan bintang 3. Staf yang sangat ramah kecuali anggota staf yang pergi dengan hanya setengah dari ibu saya yang berusia 70 tahun di dalam mobil. Untungnya pintu itu menabrak kakinya memadamkannya ke mobil sambil mencoba untuk tetap berdiri saat dia diseret di sepanjang jalan. Petunjuk: Saat berteriak berhenti, berhenti, berhenti itu tidak membuat mereka berhenti.

Subjeck: The best kept secret in the quieter part of kuta.
Review: the staff are beautiful and friendly and remember you when you return again. Its in the quieter part of kuta very peaceful.The rooms are great value and bigger then alot of more expensive places in kuta..great for families,couples singles great value for money. The food is delicious and breakfast has a good variety.Have made many friends here and will always return when in Bali.Adam the manager is lovely and will go out of his way to make sure your stay here is great.

Review_Bahasa: Stafnya cantik dan ramah dan mengingat Anda saat Anda kembali lagi. Ini di bagian yang lebih tenang dari Kuta sangat damai. Kamar -kamarnya bernilai tinggi dan lebih besar daripada banyak tempat yang lebih mahal di Kuta..hebat untuk keluarga, pasangan bernilai tinggi untuk uang. Makanannya lezat dan sarapan memiliki variasi yang baik. Telah membuat banyak teman di sini dan akan selalu kembali ketika di Bali. Adam manajernya indah dan akan berusaha keras untuk memastikan masa tinggal Anda di sini hebat.

Review: Pertama kali stay dihotel ini, suasananya nyaman, bagus, bisa dibilang kreatif sih karena ada simbol toliet nya seperti tidak biasa, untuk beberapa hotel u/ menunjukan toilet pria & wanita mereka memakai tulisan ataupun symbol yang lumrah, nah kalo hotel ini beda.. mereka memakai symbol patung setengah badan, untuk kamarnya bersih, tetapi sayang pelayanan housekeepingnya lama, anyway, recomended buat keluarga karena ada kids room, nice hotel ! and for breakfastnya cukuplah, walaupun omellettenya kurang sesuai dengan keinginan hehehhe
Review_English: The first time staying in this hotel, the atmosphere is comfortable, good, arguably creative because there are symbols of the Toliet such as unusual, for some hotels to show their men & women toilets using normal writing or symbols, well if the hotel is different ... they use a half -body statue symbol, for the rooms clean, but unfortunately the housekeeping service is long and for breakfast is sufficient, even though the omelelette is not in accordance with the wishes hehehhe

Review: We stayed at Kuta Central Park Hotel for 3 weeks. Its in the calmer parts of Kuta, with good restaurants around and easy to get a cab. Its a nice hotell with very service minded and friendly staff that gladly helps out if they can. We got help with phone calls and medicin when I was ill. The cleaning was good and we got new towels etc. as often as we wanted. The restsurant had a good menu with a little bit of everything, both indonesian and global food. Allot value for a little money. Worth a visit. We will definitly come back. Hugs Nathalie from Sweden

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di Kuta Central Park Hotel selama 3 minggu. Di bagian Kuta yang lebih tenang, dengan restoran yang bagus di sekitar dan mudah mendapatkan taksi. Ini adalah hotell yang bagus dengan staf yang berpikiran sangat dan ramah yang dengan senang hati membantu jika mereka bisa. Kami mendapat bantuan dengan panggilan telepon dan Medicin ketika saya sakit. Pembersihannya bagus dan kami mendapat handuk baru, dll. Seseringan yang kami inginkan. Restsurant memiliki menu yang bagus dengan sedikit dari segalanya, baik makanan Indonesia maupun global. Memberikan nilai sedikit uang. Patut dikunjungi. Kami pasti akan kembali. Peluk Nathalie dari Swedia

Review: Nice hotel, easy to find, good breakfast, hotel is clean, nice rooms and staff are friendly and helpful. A little away from kuta centre, it wasn't near the beach but free shuttle bus into town from 10 AM - 06 PM.
Review_English: Nice hotel, easy to find, good breakfast, hotel is clean, nice rooms and staff are friendly and helpful. A little away from kuta centre, it wasn't near the beach but free shuttle bus into town from 10 AM - 06 PM.
Review_Summary: Nice hotel, easy to find, good breakfast, hotel is clean, nice rooms and staff are friendly and helpful. A little away from kuta centre, it wasn't near the beach but free shuttle bus into town from 10 AM - 06 PM.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus, mudah ditemukan, sarapan yang enak, hotel bersih, kamar yang bagus dan staf ramah dan membantu. Sedikit jauh dari Kuta Center, itu tidak ada di dekat pantai tetapi bus antar -jemput gratis ke kota mulai jam 10 pagi - 06:00.

Subjeck: An affordable 4 star. Know what to expect.
Review: We got a great deal on an extended stay at this hotel. $35 per night for a large suite, including breakfast. The room was massive with floor to ceiling windows and a couch and table to sit at. Floor lamps, table lamps, a wardrobe, slippers. Well equipped with a fridge, kettle, flat screen HDTV with plenty of channels including English movie channels, excellent water pressure, always hot water, air con that worked brilliantly and very fast, reliable wifi. (Although the frequent need to log in can be annoying.) Toiletries and water are provided daily, complimentary. The level of cleanliness was superb. The bed was really comfortable and we slept well. Breakfast is amazing, you'll definitely gain weight! An endless buffet of all kinds of tasty foods. It'll overwhelm you. Room service option. The restaurant is outdoor, and often teeming with mosquitos in the evening. As such it was usually empty. If people choose to eat at the hotel they tend to do it in their rooms. We used the gym every day. They have 4 machines plus weights. They have a spa too, but we didn't use it. We went during low season so it was never too busy, although it doesn't take much for their small pool area to get crowded. That said, we stayed long enough to chose quieter days to enjoy the pool, we often had it to ourselves. The swim up bar is a great touch. (Although don't be surprised if you hear drunken singing coming from the pool in the hours after dark!) It's impossible to sleep when it's stormy as the tin roof amplifies the rain fall. Luckily, it didn't rain often. At times, and i imagine during high season, this place can get rowdy. Not a good choice if you're seeking serenity. Large groups come here for the low prices. It's affordable luxury, so expect a clientele that's seeking that. Stupidly their free shuttle into town does not offer a timetable for returning. This doesn't make sense when it's driving into town every couple of hours. They'll take you, but they won't bring you back. They want to drive an empty mini bus back. (?) That said, it's walkable, if you don't mind walking. About 20mins to Legian. There aren't many restaurants nearby. (None actually) you'll need to go into central Kuta for that. One of the senior staff (who we decided not to name) is VERY annoying. "Befriending" everyone the day they arrive and offering private day tours with him for $70. (They should cost $30. That's what we've paid elsewhere.) Ask how he is and he'll respond "oh, you know, tired, but I have to work." But, rather than 'working', he likes to tell anyone who'll listen (or looks like they have more money) stories about his sick relatives, low rate of pay, long hours, extra shifts and do nothing but make you feel guilty and then says "enjoy your breakfast. Can I get you anything else?" I mean, this guy couldn't make it more obvious that he hates all guests. It made us feel awkward and uncomfortable. (We didn't have issues with any other staff members. They were all lovely.) Equally annoying are the taxi drivers at the hotel. Seeking to make as much money as possible for as little work as they can get away with. Use bluebird taxis only. They're safe, honest, legal and legitimate. Never accept a taxi without a meter. Tourists who think "ah it's only $5" only fuel the dishonest and lazy attitude which will not help the country to develop and prosper. If you want to overpay, tip a bluebird taxi driver. They work hard all day, long hours, for a set rate. They deserve the business far more than the lazy snoozers who yell "taxi, taxi? Yes sir, taxi please." The hotel should not allow these scamsters to sit outside their reception area. Most guests do ignore them and ask the hotel to call them a bluebird taxi. It's the best thing to do. Kuta is good for surfing, partying and shopping. The beach isn't good for sunbathing or swimming. It's dirty and full of people wanting to hustle you in some way or another. If you're looking to relax in Bali, and absorb the historic culture in a peaceful place where scamming is less prevalent, (but does still happen) do it in Ubud. If you want to see Kuta, you could definitely do worse than Kuta Central Park Hotel. Our room was perfect. We'd stay there again, if it wasn't in Kuta, and if a certain member of staff wasn't there...!
Review_English: We got a great deal on an extended stay at this hotel. $35 per night for a large suite, including breakfast. The room was massive with floor to ceiling windows and a couch and table to sit at. Floor lamps, table lamps, a wardrobe, slippers. Well equipped with a fridge, kettle, flat screen HDTV with plenty of channels including English movie channels, excellent water pressure, always hot water, air con that worked brilliantly and very fast, reliable wifi. (Although the frequent need to log in can be annoying.) Toiletries and water are provided daily, complimentary. The level of cleanliness was superb. The bed was really comfortable and we slept well. Breakfast is amazing, you'll definitely gain weight! An endless buffet of all kinds of tasty foods. It'll overwhelm you. Room service option. The restaurant is outdoor, and often teeming with mosquitos in the evening. As such it was usually empty. If people choose to eat at the hotel they tend to do it in their rooms. We used the gym every day. They have 4 machines plus weights. They have a spa too, but we didn't use it. We went during low season so it was never too busy, although it doesn't take much for their small pool area to get crowded. That said, we stayed long enough to chose quieter days to enjoy the pool, we often had it to ourselves. The swim up bar is a great touch. (Although don't be surprised if you hear drunken singing coming from the pool in the hours after dark!) It's impossible to sleep when it's stormy as the tin roof amplifies the rain fall. Luckily, it didn't rain often. At times, and i imagine during high season, this place can get rowdy. Not a good choice if you're seeking serenity. Large groups come here for the low prices. It's affordable luxury, so expect a clientele that's seeking that. Stupidly their free shuttle into town does not offer a timetable for returning. This doesn't make sense when it's driving into town every couple of hours. They'll take you, but they won't bring you back. They want to drive an empty mini bus back. (?) That said, it's walkable, if you don't mind walking. About 20mins to Legian. There aren't many restaurants nearby. (None actually) you'll need to go into central Kuta for that. One of the senior staff (who we decided not to name) is VERY annoying. "Befriending" everyone the day they arrive and offering private day tours with him for $70. (They should cost $30. That's what we've paid elsewhere.) Ask how he is and he'll respond "oh, you know, tired, but I have to work." But, rather than 'working', he likes to tell anyone who'll listen (or looks like they have more money) stories about his sick relatives, low rate of pay, long hours, extra shifts and do nothing but make you feel guilty and then says "enjoy your breakfast. Can I get you anything else?" I mean, this guy couldn't make it more obvious that he hates all guests. It made us feel awkward and uncomfortable. (We didn't have issues with any other staff members. They were all lovely.) Equally annoying are the taxi drivers at the hotel. Seeking to make as much money as possible for as little work as they can get away with. Use bluebird taxis only. They're safe, honest, legal and legitimate. Never accept a taxi without a meter. Tourists who think "ah it's only $5" only fuel the dishonest and lazy attitude which will not help the country to develop and prosper. If you want to overpay, tip a bluebird taxi driver. They work hard all day, long hours, for a set rate. They deserve the business far more than the lazy snoozers who yell "taxi, taxi? Yes sir, taxi please." The hotel should not allow these scamsters to sit outside their reception area. Most guests do ignore them and ask the hotel to call them a bluebird taxi. It's the best thing to do. Kuta is good for surfing, partying and shopping. The beach isn't good for sunbathing or swimming. It's dirty and full of people wanting to hustle you in some way or another. If you're looking to relax in Bali, and absorb the historic culture in a peaceful place where scamming is less prevalent, (but does still happen) do it in Ubud. If you want to see Kuta, you could definitely do worse than Kuta Central Park Hotel. Our room was perfect. We'd stay there again, if it wasn't in Kuta, and if a certain member of staff wasn't there...!
Review_Summary: Central Park Hotel is one of the best hotels in Kuta. Free shuttle into town does not offer a timetable for returning. Staff at the hotel are annoying. Use bluebird taxis only. Never accept a taxi without a meter. Kuta is good for surfing, partying and shopping.
Review_Bahasa: Kami mendapat banyak hal di masa menginap di hotel ini. $ 35 per malam untuk suite besar, termasuk sarapan. Ruangan itu sangat besar dengan jendela dari lantai ke langit -langit dan sofa dan meja untuk duduk. Lampu lantai, lampu meja, lemari pakaian, sandal. Dilengkapi dengan kulkas, ketel, layar datar HDTV dengan banyak saluran termasuk saluran film Inggris, tekanan air yang sangat baik, selalu air panas, air con yang bekerja dengan cemerlang dan sangat cepat, wifi yang andal. (Meskipun perlu sering masuk bisa menjengkelkan.) Perlengkapan mandi dan air disediakan setiap hari, gratis. Tingkat kebersihannya luar biasa. Tempat tidurnya sangat nyaman dan kami tidur nyenyak. Sarapan luar biasa, Anda pasti akan menambah berat badan! Prasmanan tak berujung dari semua jenis makanan lezat. Itu akan membanjiri Anda. Opsi layanan kamar. Restorannya di luar ruangan, dan sering dipenuhi dengan nyamuk di malam hari. Karena itu biasanya kosong. Jika orang memilih untuk makan di hotel, mereka cenderung melakukannya di kamar mereka. Kami menggunakan gym setiap hari. Mereka memiliki 4 mesin plus bobot. Mereka juga memiliki spa, tetapi kami tidak menggunakannya. Kami pergi selama musim rendah sehingga tidak pernah terlalu sibuk, meskipun tidak perlu banyak untuk area kolam kecil mereka untuk menjadi ramai. Yang mengatakan, kami tinggal cukup lama untuk memilih hari yang lebih tenang untuk menikmati kolam renang, kami sering memilikinya untuk diri kami sendiri. Bilah berenang adalah sentuhan yang bagus. (Meskipun jangan kaget jika Anda mendengar nyanyian mabuk datang dari kolam dalam jam setelah gelap!) Tidak mungkin untuk tidur ketika badai saat atap timah memperkuat hujan turun. Untungnya, itu tidak sering hujan. Kadang -kadang, dan saya membayangkan selama musim tinggi, tempat ini bisa menjadi gaduh. Bukan pilihan yang baik jika Anda mencari ketenangan. Kelompok besar datang ke sini dengan harga murah. Ini mewah yang terjangkau, jadi harapkan klien yang mencari itu. Dengan bodohnya pesawat ulang -alik gratis mereka ke kota tidak menawarkan jadwal untuk kembali. Ini tidak masuk akal saat berkendara ke kota setiap beberapa jam. Mereka akan membawa Anda, tetapi mereka tidak akan membawa Anda kembali. Mereka ingin mengendarai bus mini kosong kembali. (?) Yang mengatakan, itu bisa berjalan, jika Anda tidak keberatan berjalan. Sekitar 20 menit ke Legian. Tidak banyak restoran di dekatnya. (Tidak ada sebenarnya) Anda harus pergi ke Kuta Tengah untuk itu. Salah satu staf senior (yang kami putuskan untuk tidak disebutkan namanya) sangat menjengkelkan. "Berteman" semua orang pada hari mereka tiba dan menawarkan tur hari pribadi bersamanya seharga $ 70. (Harganya $ 30. Itulah yang kami bayar di tempat lain.) Tanyakan bagaimana dia dan dia akan merespons "Oh, Anda tahu, lelah, tetapi saya harus bekerja." Tapi, alih -alih 'bekerja', dia suka memberi tahu siapa pun yang akan mendengarkan (atau sepertinya mereka punya lebih banyak uang) cerita tentang kerabatnya yang sakit, tingkat upah rendah, berjam -jam, shift ekstra dan tidak melakukan apa pun selain membuat Anda merasa bersalah dan kemudian berkata "Nikmati sarapan Anda. Bisakah saya mendapatkan hal lain?" Maksudku, orang ini tidak bisa membuatnya lebih jelas bahwa dia membenci semua tamu. Itu membuat kami merasa canggung dan tidak nyaman. (Kami tidak memiliki masalah dengan anggota staf lainnya. Mereka semua cantik.) Sama -sama menjengkelkan adalah pengemudi taksi di hotel. Berusaha menghasilkan uang sebanyak mungkin untuk pekerjaan sesedikit yang bisa mereka lakukan. Gunakan taksi bluebird saja. Mereka aman, jujur, legal dan sah. Jangan pernah menerima taksi tanpa meter. Turis yang berpikir "ah itu hanya $ 5" hanya memicu sikap tidak jujur ​​dan malas yang tidak akan membantu negara untuk berkembang dan makmur. Jika Anda ingin membayar lebih, tip sopir taksi Bluebird. Mereka bekerja keras sepanjang hari, berjam -jam, untuk tarif yang ditetapkan. Mereka pantas mendapatkan bisnis lebih dari sekadar tunda malas yang berteriak "taksi, taksi? Ya, tuan, taksi tolong." Hotel tidak boleh membiarkan penipuan ini duduk di luar area resepsi mereka. Sebagian besar tamu mengabaikannya dan meminta hotel untuk memanggil mereka taksi Bluebird. Itu hal terbaik untuk dilakukan. Kuta baik untuk berselancar, berpesta dan berbelanja. Pantai tidak baik untuk berjemur atau berenang. Kotor dan penuh dengan orang -orang yang ingin membuat Anda terburu -buru dengan cara tertentu. Jika Anda ingin bersantai di Bali, dan menyerap budaya bersejarah di tempat yang damai di mana penipuan kurang lazim, (tetapi masih terjadi) melakukannya di Ubud. Jika Anda ingin melihat Kuta, Anda pasti bisa melakukan lebih buruk daripada Kuta Central Park Hotel. Kamar kami sempurna. Kami akan tinggal di sana lagi, jika tidak ada di Kuta, dan jika anggota staf tertentu tidak ada di sana ...!

Review: My fiancé and I stayed only 3 days, but, that was one of the best hotel we stay in Bali! Kuta is a really noisy city, but when your inside the hotel, you're so relaxing! I want to point that some costumer put comments about that hotel, about the fact that they didn't have any window: you should read what you have booked! We didn't have windows, but that's because we took one of the lowest price! We cannot have everything for nothing! Anyway, the spa has very reasonable price, the restaurant is good, and clean, all the staff from the lobby to the restaurant and the spa are qualified ! We really appreciated that stay! Thanks to all the staff for making our stay beautiful and relaxing! Hope to come again!

Kuta adalah kota yang sangat bising, tetapi ketika Anda di dalam hotel, Anda sangat santai! Saya ingin menunjukkan bahwa beberapa pelanggan memberi komentar tentang hotel itu, tentang fakta bahwa mereka tidak memiliki jendela: Anda harus membaca apa yang telah Anda pesan! Kami tidak memiliki Windows, tapi itu karena kami mengambil salah satu harga terendah! Kami tidak dapat memiliki segalanya tanpa hasil! Ngomong -ngomong, spa memiliki harga yang sangat masuk akal, restorannya bagus, dan bersih, semua staf dari lobi ke restoran dan spa memenuhi syarat! Kami sangat menghargai tinggal itu! Terima kasih kepada semua staf karena telah membuat kami tetap indah dan santai! Berharap untuk datang lagi!

Subjeck: Hotel yang bagus dengan low budget
Review: 3D2N menginap dihotel ini menggunakan voucher, ruangannya cukup luas, kebetulan saya menginap menggunakan kamar studio (for 3 person) terdiri dari 1 queen bed dan 1 single bed. pelayanan dan tanggapan dr receptionist & room servicenya sangat baik.. saat saya ingin menyewa motor untuk pergi ke denpasar, saya dibantu oleh receptionistnya dengan sangat jelas sampai memberi tahu urutan jalan menuju ketempat yang saya tuju. Tempatnya cukup strategis di area kuta, yang dekat dengan airport dan pantai. Mudah di akses krn memiliki 2 akses menuju lobby..
Review_English: 3D2N staying in this hotel using a voucher, the room is quite spacious, I happen to stay using a studio room (for 3 person) consisting of 1 queen bed and 1 single bed. The service and response of Dr. Receptionist & Room Services is very good ... When I want to rent a motorcycle to go to Denpasar, I was assisted by the receptionist very clearly to tell the order of the way to the place I was aiming for. The place is quite strategic in the Kuta area, which is close to the airport and the beach. Easy to access because it has 2 access to the lobby ..

Review: Отель находиться в 15 минутах ходьбы от пляжа куты. Заезд и заселение произошло очень быстро. Дали приветственный напиток. Так как останавливались надолго. Поменяли категорию номера на более высокую. Номера большие чистые. Все нужное для жизни есть. Завтраки прекрасные. За 20 дней всегда находили что то новое. Уборка хорошая. Единственное, не оставляйте вещи в номере не в сейфе и закрывайте в номере окна. Воруют.
Review_English: The hotel is a 15 -minute walk from Kuta beach. The race and settlement occurred very quickly. Give a welcoming drink. Since they stopped for a long time. Changed the number category to a higher one. The numbers are large clean. Everything necessary for life is. Breakfasts are beautiful. In 20 days, they always found something new. The cleaning is good. The only thing, do not leave things in the room not in the safe and close in the window room. Steal.

The cleaning is good. The only thing, do not leave things in the room not in the safe and close in the window room. Steal.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini berjarak 15 menit berjalan kaki dari Pantai Kuta. Perlombaan dan penyelesaian terjadi dengan sangat cepat. Berikan minuman yang ramah. Karena mereka berhenti untuk waktu yang lama. Mengubah kategori angka menjadi yang lebih tinggi. Jumlahnya sangat bersih. Segala sesuatu yang diperlukan untuk hidup adalah. Sarapan itu indah. Dalam 20 hari, mereka selalu menemukan sesuatu yang baru. Pembersihannya bagus. Satu -satunya hal, jangan meninggalkan barang -barang di ruangan itu tidak di tempat yang aman dan dekat di ruang jendela. Mencuri.
