Subjeck: Good stay at Kuta Central Park Hotel in Bali
Review: I stayed 4 nights and 5 days in Kuta Central Park Hotel in the Kuta area of Bali island. Before arriving, I was able to reserve through the hotel for airport to hotel car service, and it was reasonable ($15 U.S. each way). The hotel's reception is in an open area and one has to walk through an open patio and go by the open restaurant to get to the rooms. As it was raining everyday when I was there, I had to make sure to carry an umbrella with me whenever I got out of the room. The room was very nice and clean, the bed was comfortable and they were able to give me a quiet, non-smoking room on the 3rd floor of the hotel. The bathroom was good and had a bathtub as well as a shower but the towels could have been better. The room had free wifi, which was good. But the floor layout and the signage were confusing and I had to find my way back to the room each time. If the direction signs to particular room numbers are right on the wall when the elevator door opens, it will be much easier for travelers to follow. The restaurant is in an open-walled area outside where the rooms are and the breakfast buffet was good. I was able to get pancakes and crepes but the rest of the menu items seemed to be for meat lovers. I was able to find some vegetables and rice, and I was happy with that. The hotel had a nice tourist car service and I was able to rent a car and driver each day and see a lot of sites, and this was very nice as they had a planned itinerary and I didn't have to worry about what to see. The hotel is not on the beach or the main thoroughfare but the beach is about 15 minutes walking distance from the beach and along the way there are a lot of souvenir shops and restaurants. One has to navigate the traffic while walking. The hotel has a free shuttle to the beach, shopping mall and a few other sites, but one has to walk back or take a taxi to return back. One bit of caution when navigating the souvenir shops as the vendors try to pressure you and you can be easily taken advantage of. Also, if you are exchanging currency, do it in regular currency exchange counters inside convenience stores instead of in any store. You may find a lot of souvenir stores advertising with signs outside their stores offering better exchange rates than currency exchange places but they may cheat, and so beware. The hotel's exchange rate was not very good compared to currency exchange places, and so I exchanged currency at a currency exchange counter inside a convenience store near the hotel. Overall, my hotel stay was good and the hotel staff were helpful.
Review_English: I stayed 4 nights and 5 days in Kuta Central Park Hotel in the Kuta area of Bali island. Before arriving, I was able to reserve through the hotel for airport to hotel car service, and it was reasonable ($15 U.S. each way). The hotel's reception is in an open area and one has to walk through an open patio and go by the open restaurant to get to the rooms. As it was raining everyday when I was there, I had to make sure to carry an umbrella with me whenever I got out of the room. The room was very nice and clean, the bed was comfortable and they were able to give me a quiet, non-smoking room on the 3rd floor of the hotel. The bathroom was good and had a bathtub as well as a shower but the towels could have been better. The room had free wifi, which was good. But the floor layout and the signage were confusing and I had to find my way back to the room each time. If the direction signs to particular room numbers are right on the wall when the elevator door opens, it will be much easier for travelers to follow. The restaurant is in an open-walled area outside where the rooms are and the breakfast buffet was good. I was able to get pancakes and crepes but the rest of the menu items seemed to be for meat lovers. I was able to find some vegetables and rice, and I was happy with that. The hotel had a nice tourist car service and I was able to rent a car and driver each day and see a lot of sites, and this was very nice as they had a planned itinerary and I didn't have to worry about what to see. The hotel is not on the beach or the main thoroughfare but the beach is about 15 minutes walking distance from the beach and along the way there are a lot of souvenir shops and restaurants. One has to navigate the traffic while walking. The hotel has a free shuttle to the beach, shopping mall and a few other sites, but one has to walk back or take a taxi to return back. One bit of caution when navigating the souvenir shops as the vendors try to pressure you and you can be easily taken advantage of. Also, if you are exchanging currency, do it in regular currency exchange counters inside convenience stores instead of in any store. You may find a lot of souvenir stores advertising with signs outside their stores offering better exchange rates than currency exchange places but they may cheat, and so beware. The hotel's exchange rate was not very good compared to currency exchange places, and so I exchanged currency at a currency exchange counter inside a convenience store near the hotel. Overall, my hotel stay was good and the hotel staff were helpful.
Review_Summary: I stayed 4 nights and 5 days in Kuta Central Park Hotel in the Kuta area of Bali island. The room was very nice and clean, the bed was comfortable and they were able to give me a quiet, non-smoking room on the 3rd floor of the hotel. The hotel had a nice tourist car service and I was able to rent a car and driver each day and see a lot of sites.
Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal 4 malam dan 5 hari di Kuta Central Park Hotel di daerah Kuta di Pulau Bali. Sebelum tiba, saya dapat memesan melalui hotel untuk Bandara ke Layanan Mobil Hotel, dan itu masuk akal ($ 15 A.S. Resepsi hotel berada di area terbuka dan seseorang harus berjalan melalui teras terbuka dan pergi ke restoran terbuka untuk sampai ke kamar. Saat hujan setiap hari ketika saya berada di sana, saya harus memastikan untuk membawa payung setiap kali saya keluar dari ruangan. Ruangan itu sangat bagus dan bersih, tempat tidurnya nyaman dan mereka bisa memberi saya ruang yang tenang dan tidak merokok di lantai 3 hotel. Kamar mandi bagus dan memiliki bak mandi serta mandi tetapi handuk bisa lebih baik. Ruangan itu memiliki wifi gratis, yang bagus. Tetapi tata letak lantai dan papan nama membingungkan dan saya harus menemukan jalan kembali ke kamar setiap kali. Jika arahan menandatangani nomor kamar tertentu tepat di dinding ketika pintu lift terbuka, akan jauh lebih mudah bagi wisatawan untuk diikuti. Restoran berada di area berdinding terbuka di luar tempat kamarnya dan sarapan prasmanan bagus. Saya bisa mendapatkan pancake dan crepes tetapi item menu lainnya tampaknya untuk pecinta daging. Saya dapat menemukan beberapa sayuran dan nasi, dan saya senang dengan itu. Hotel ini memiliki layanan mobil wisata yang bagus dan saya dapat menyewa mobil dan pengemudi setiap hari dan melihat banyak situs, dan ini sangat bagus karena mereka memiliki rencana perjalanan yang direncanakan dan saya tidak perlu khawatir tentang apa yang harus dilihat. Hotel ini tidak berada di pantai atau jalan raya utama tetapi pantai berjarak sekitar 15 menit berjalan kaki dari pantai dan di sepanjang jalan ada banyak toko suvenir dan restoran. Seseorang harus menavigasi lalu lintas saat berjalan. Hotel ini memiliki antar -jemput gratis ke pantai, pusat perbelanjaan dan beberapa situs lainnya, tetapi orang harus berjalan kembali atau naik taksi untuk kembali. Sedikit hati -hati saat menavigasi toko -toko suvenir saat vendor mencoba menekan Anda dan Anda dapat dengan mudah dimanfaatkan. Juga, jika Anda bertukar mata uang, lakukan di penghitung pertukaran mata uang reguler di dalam toko serba ada alih -alih di toko mana pun. Anda mungkin menemukan banyak toko suvenir yang beriklan dengan tanda -tanda di luar toko mereka yang menawarkan nilai tukar yang lebih baik daripada tempat pertukaran mata uang tetapi mereka mungkin curang, dan waspadalah. Nilai tukar hotel tidak terlalu baik dibandingkan dengan tempat -tempat pertukaran mata uang, dan jadi saya menukar mata uang di konter pertukaran mata uang di dalam toko serba ada di dekat hotel. Secara keseluruhan, menginap di hotel saya bagus dan staf hotel sangat membantu.

Review: Расположен далековато от пляжей, но можно взять мотобайк и передвигаться на нем. Обслуживающий персонал отзывчивый и всегда готов помочь. Есть бесплатный шатл, но на него очередь. Пытались подсунуть номер без окон, но потом согласились поменять.
Review_English: Located far from the beaches, but you can take a motorcycle and move on it. The service staff is responsive and is always ready to help. There is a free shaft, but it is in line. They tried to slip a number without windows, but then agreed to change.
Review_Summary: Located far from the beaches, but you can take a motorcycle and move on it. The service staff is responsive and is always ready to help. There is a free shaft, but it is in line. They tried to slip a number without windows, but then agreed to change.
Review_Bahasa: Terletak jauh dari pantai, tetapi Anda dapat mengambil sepeda motor dan memindahkannya. Staf layanan responsif dan selalu siap membantu. Ada poros gratis, tetapi sejalan. Mereka mencoba menyelipkan angka tanpa Windows, tetapi kemudian setuju untuk berubah.
Review_Clean: Terletak jauh dari pantai, tetapi Anda dapat mengambil sepeda motor dan memindahkannya. Staf layanan responsif dan selalu siap membantu. Ada poros gratis, tetapi sejalan. Mereka mencoba menyelipkan angka tanpa Windows, tetapi kemudian setuju untuk berubah.

Review: 3 hari di hotel ini. Saya mengambil kamar triple studio room. Kamar nya enak luas, kebersihan kamar oke, sarapan enak bervariasi, pelayanan hotel sangat ramah, letak strategis dekat kemana mana. Pokonya ga salah dech pilih hotel ini untuk berlibur.
Review_English: 3 days at this hotel. I took the Triple Studio Room room. The rooms are spacious, the cleanliness of the room is okay, good breakfast varies, hotel services are very friendly, strategic location near anywhere. Pokonya is not wrong, chose this hotel for a vacation.
Review_Summary: 3 days at this hotel. I took the Triple Studio Room room. The rooms are spacious, the cleanliness of the room is okay, good breakfast varies, hotel services are very friendly, strategic location near anywhere. Pokonya is not wrong, chose this hotel for a vacation.
Review_Bahasa: 3 hari di hotel ini. Saya mengambil kamar ruang studio triple. Kamar -kamarnya luas, kebersihan ruangan tidak apa -apa, sarapan yang baik bervariasi, layanan hotel sangat ramah, lokasi strategis di dekat mana saja. Pokonya tidak salah, memilih hotel ini untuk liburan.
Review_Clean: 3 hari di hotel ini. Saya mengambil kamar ruang studio triple. Kamar -kamarnya luas, kebersihan ruangan tidak apa -apa, sarapan yang baik bervariasi, layanan hotel sangat ramah, lokasi strategis di dekat mana saja. Pokonya tidak salah, memilih hotel ini untuk liburan.

Subjeck: Hated our original room - paid to upgrade and loved
Review: Our first room which we paid $30 a night for was the pits, no windows, fuzzy tv, tiny vanity and for some weird reason, a bad smell when the water turned on... BUT then we paid an extra $15 a night to upgrade to a suite, loved it. No complains with the new room. The location is very much non-central, however they made it up with a courtesy bus to popular locations. The breakfast is certainly aimed towards Indians and Asians but did find out (on our last day) you can request pork bacon at the omelette station. I did not like that when I posted a review on TripAdvisor saying that the room was poor and comparing to someone else's room we had seen, they simply wrote me a letter justifying that the people did not pay the price they claimed and gave us some oranges. I kind of felt it was a little intrusive and therefore I had to re-write this review.

I kind of felt it was a little intrusive and therefore I had to re-write this review.
Review_Bahasa: Kamar pertama kami yang kami bayar $ 30 per malam adalah lubang, tidak ada jendela, TV fuzzy, kesombongan kecil dan untuk beberapa alasan aneh, bau yang tidak enak ketika air menyala ... tapi kemudian kami membayar tambahan $ 15 per malam untuk meningkatkan ke suite, menyukainya. Tidak ada mengeluh dengan kamar baru. Lokasi sangat non-sentral, namun mereka mengada-ada dengan bus sopan ke lokasi populer. Sarapan tentu ditujukan untuk orang India dan Asia tetapi mengetahuinya (pada hari terakhir kami) Anda dapat meminta daging babi di stasiun omelet. Saya tidak suka itu ketika saya memposting ulasan tentang TripAdvisor yang mengatakan bahwa ruangan itu buruk dan membandingkan dengan kamar orang lain yang telah kami lihat, mereka hanya menulis surat kepada saya bahwa orang -orang tidak membayar harga yang mereka klaim dan memberi kami beberapa jeruk. Saya merasa itu sedikit mengganggu dan karena itu saya harus menulis ulang ulasan ini.

Review: This hotel doesn't look appealing from the outside but it is from the inside. The hotel itself is a bit of a maze but after a while you kind understand how it works. The rooms are comfortable and spacious with lots of room, not a lot of room on the pool side. The bar itself is great with great music while cooling of in the pool.

Review: I booked and stayed here for 3 nights and I got a very good deal from Agoda. I didn't expect that there's a buffet breakfast that is really good. Buffet is included with my Agoda booking. I have attached some pictures. Rooms are clean and mattress is not bad. Location is close to some shops and Nasi goreng food place. The only comment I have is they only give 1 keycard unless you ask for it. And the rooms on the 3rd floor are a little bit confusing.

Review: We stayed 4 nights here in a 2 bedroom apartment and all was sweet. Rooms were a little old and rugged but clean and comfortable. Wifi great, breakfast 8/10 and swim up pool bar was sensational with nice happy hour rates ! Very busy little resort and would definitely return for the price and of course the good old Balinese hospitality.

Resor kecil yang sangat sibuk dan pasti akan kembali untuk harga dan tentu saja keramahan Bali tua yang baik.

Subjeck: Penginapan bagus dengan budget yang tidak begitu mahal
Review: Menurut Saya pribadi hotel lokasinya cukup strategis, makanan banyak variasinya pelayanan pegawainya ramah, cukup membantu dan harganya terjangkau , kamarnya besar dan bersih, hanya saja lampu kurang terang, kalau untuk tidur ya cocok. di dalam area tempat makan ada TV yg memberikan informasi2 tempat wisata yg akan dikunjungi bagi wisatawan dapat membantu kelancaran perjalanan wisata
Review_English: In my opinion, the hotel is quite strategic, the food variations of the employees are friendly, quite helpful and the price is affordable, the rooms are large and clean, it's just that the lights are not bright, if you sleep it is suitable. In the eating area there is a TV that provides information on tourist attractions that will be visited for tourists can help the smooth travel
Review_Summary: In my opinion, the hotel is quite strategic, the food variations of the employees are friendly, quite helpful and the price is affordable, the rooms are large and clean, it's just that the lights are not bright, if you sleep it is suitable. In the eating area there is a TV that provides information on tourist attractions that will be visited for tourists can help the smooth travel

Di area makan ada TV yang menyediakan informasi tentang tempat -tempat wisata yang akan dikunjungi untuk wisatawan dapat membantu perjalanan yang lancar

Subjeck: Loud, noisy, not to clean hotel.
Review: We had to stay for five nights but left after four. It really was enough. The free shuttle was welcome, as the swimming pool. But can you believe they closed the swimming pool for a complete day for maintenance instead of doing it during the night. There were a lot of children crying. Such a pitty. Our room diddnt have a window, so no fresh air, terrible smell.

Review_Clean: Kami harus tinggal selama lima malam tetapi pergi setelah empat. Itu benar -benar cukup. Pesawat ulang -alik gratis disambut, sebagai kolam renang. Tetapi dapatkah Anda percaya mereka menutup kolam renang untuk hari yang lengkap untuk pemeliharaan alih -alih melakukannya pada malam hari. Ada banyak anak yang menangis. Sungguh sekali. Kamar kami tidak punya jendela, jadi tidak ada udara segar, bau yang mengerikan.

Review: tempatnya asik dan nyaman, namun parkirannya agak ribet, kasiahan yang jemput masuk bentar bayar 2 ribu rupiah. Buat pengelolanya harusnya menyediakan parkir gratis untuk tamu hotel dan lobinya juga bikin bingung karena ada 2.
Review_English: The place is cool and comfortable, but the parking lot is rather complicated, the picked up that picks up for a while paying 2 thousand rupiah. For the manager, it should provide free parking for hotel guests and lobbies also confused because there are 2.
Review_Summary: The place is cool and comfortable, but the parking lot is rather complicated, the picked up that picks up for a while paying 2 thousand rupiah. For the manager, it should provide free parking for hotel guests and lobbies also confused because there are 2.
Review_Bahasa: Tempatnya keren dan nyaman, tetapi tempat parkir agak rumit, diambil yang diambil untuk sementara waktu membayar 2 ribu rupiah. Untuk manajer, ini harus menyediakan parkir gratis untuk tamu hotel dan lobi juga bingung karena ada 2.

Review: We had such an amazing time staying at this hotel, the staff are so friendly and welcoming, nothing is too much trouble for them and they greet you every time they see you in the hotel and ask how things are going. They have a free shuttle bus (minivan) that goes to many areas in kuta and drops you off wherever you'd like to go. This runs several times per day. The resort itself is beautiful, lovely gardens and landscaping, the pool has a swim up bar and is very clean, the room itself we stayed in was lovely too- massive bed, large sized room far enough away from pool to not be disturbed but not too far from amenities and restaurant. We enjoyed having wifi in our rooms to be able to upload our photos etc to Facebook from the comfort of our rooms; toiletries and water were replaced daily as required by housekeeping, really can't fault anyone or anything at this hotel. We had breakfast included in our package, and this varied every day, great selection of foods especially for a fussy vegetarian like myself, I never left the buffet room hungry! Thank you to all the staff who made our stay so wonderful for our first trip to Bali. We were travelling home to UK from Australia so may not get the chance to come back to Bali so we definitely feel they gave us the best stay to experience all the niceness Bali has to offer. Great hotel, fantastic staff and highly recommended - take me back!!!

Review_Bahasa: Kami memiliki waktu yang luar biasa tinggal di hotel ini, stafnya sangat ramah dan ramah, tidak ada terlalu banyak masalah bagi mereka dan mereka menyambut Anda setiap kali mereka melihat Anda di hotel dan bertanya bagaimana keadaannya. Mereka memiliki bus antar -jemput gratis (minivan) yang menuju ke banyak daerah di Kuta dan mengantar Anda ke mana pun Anda ingin pergi. Ini berjalan beberapa kali per hari. Resor itu sendiri adalah taman yang indah dan indah dan lansekap, kolam renang memiliki bar berenang dan sangat bersih, ruangan itu sendiri yang kami tinggali adalah tempat tidur yang terlalu besar, kamar berukuran besar yang cukup jauh dari kolam renang untuk tidak diganggu tetapi tidak terlalu jauh dari fasilitas dan restoran. Kami menikmati wifi di kamar kami untuk dapat mengunggah foto kami dll ke Facebook dari kenyamanan kamar kami; Perlengkapan mandi dan air diganti setiap hari seperti yang dipersyaratkan oleh rumah tangga, benar -benar tidak bisa menyalahkan siapa pun atau apa pun di hotel ini. Kami sarapan termasuk dalam paket kami, dan ini bervariasi setiap hari, banyak pilihan makanan terutama untuk vagina rewel seperti saya, saya tidak pernah meninggalkan ruang prasmanan lapar! Terima kasih kepada semua staf yang membuat kami tinggal begitu indah untuk perjalanan pertama kami ke Bali. Kami bepergian pulang ke Inggris dari Australia sehingga mungkin tidak mendapatkan kesempatan untuk kembali ke Bali sehingga kami merasa mereka memberi kami tinggal terbaik untuk mengalami semua kebaikan yang ditawarkan Bali. Hotel yang bagus, staf yang fantastis dan sangat disarankan - Take saya kembali !!!

Review: Me and friends stayed here for 4 days 5 nights after New Year. I came to the hotel around 11 am and they let us into the room even though check -in time is at 2 pm. The room... is not as good as the picture they show on the web, there is like a leak in my room 310 and also the rain shower is not strong enough. But after all the luxury you can get from this hotel is the air of the hotel, the view of the hotel it self, the pool which is nice when you want to swim day or night, The breakfast is well, nice and have varied choice, and the staff is very nice and helpful if you ask them to go somewhere around the hotel, they will show and lead you to the place. After all, I enjoy my vacation in here so I enjoy my staying in Bali. For tips perhaps you should consider to rent a motorcycle, It's cheap and save a lot of time especially when you headed to the beach area.

Review_Bahasa: Saya dan teman -teman tinggal di sini selama 4 hari 5 malam setelah Tahun Baru. Saya datang ke hotel sekitar jam 11 pagi dan mereka membiarkan kami masuk ke kamar meskipun check -dalam jam 2 siang. Kamar ... tidak sebagus gambar yang mereka tunjukkan di web, ada seperti kebocoran di kamar saya 310 dan juga hujan hujan tidak cukup kuat. Tapi setelah semua kemewahan yang bisa Anda dapatkan dari hotel ini adalah udara hotel, pemandangan hotel itu sendiri, kolam renang yang bagus ketika Anda ingin berenang siang atau malam, sarapan baik, bagus dan memiliki berbagai pilihan, dan stafnya sangat baik dan membantu jika Anda meminta mereka untuk pergi ke suatu tempat di sekitar hotel, mereka akan menunjukkan dan mengantar Anda ke tempat itu. Lagi pula, saya menikmati liburan saya di sini jadi saya menikmati tinggal di Bali. Untuk tips mungkin Anda harus mempertimbangkan untuk menyewa sepeda motor, murah dan menghemat banyak waktu terutama ketika Anda menuju ke area pantai.

Review: we had a plan to stay here for 4 days, but we checked out after first day. Staffs were not really friendly, room quite smelly, and there was not a window, quite disappointing for me and my family, especially I went here with my 2 kids.

Review: We stayed from 22 -24 dec 2014. The room is nice, large bathroom, clean. A bit smelly when I entered the room, but when the air con is on, the smell quickly dissapear. Great food at breakfast, friendly staffs. Quite far location from the beach, but whoever booked this must've know that since its located in central kuta. Now the down points is, we did book a car from the hotel to drives us around, unfortunately it went with other guest that they thought it was us. We ended up rent a local taxi which was more expensive. So they need to improve confirmation system, and its not a rocket science really. Other down point is when we get back at noon, we found that the towels are missing, so we called room service, and we were inform that the towels are still being processed, and we waited for like 2 hours untill it was delivered to our room. Well its not a big deal, but it doesn't usually happen. To sum it all, I think its a quite nice hotel, fair enough with the price, although I can find a similar price hotel at just next to kuta beach.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal dari 22-24 Des 2014. Kamar ini bagus, kamar mandi besar, bersih. Agak bau ketika saya memasuki ruangan, tetapi ketika udara con menyala, bau dengan cepat menghilang. Makanan enak saat sarapan, staf yang ramah. Lokasi yang cukup jauh dari pantai, tetapi siapa pun yang memesan ini pasti tahu bahwa sejak berlokasi di Kuta tengah. Sekarang poin turun, kami memesan mobil dari hotel untuk mengantarkan kami berkeliling, sayangnya itu pergi dengan tamu lain yang mereka pikir itu adalah kami. Kami akhirnya menyewa taksi lokal yang lebih mahal. Jadi mereka perlu meningkatkan sistem konfirmasi, dan itu bukan ilmu roket. Titik turun lainnya adalah ketika kami kembali pada siang hari, kami menemukan bahwa handuk hilang, jadi kami menelepon layanan kamar, dan kami menginformasikan bahwa handuk masih diproses, dan kami menunggu selama 2 jam sampai dikirim ke kamar kami. Yah ini bukan masalah besar, tetapi biasanya tidak terjadi. Singkatnya, saya pikir ini hotel yang cukup bagus, cukup adil dengan harganya, meskipun saya dapat menemukan hotel harga yang sama di sebelah Kuta Beach.

Subjeck: Hotel kecil yang bagus dengan beberapa kamar untuk perbaikan
Review: "He flew to Bali and arrived at the end of the night. We decided to stay at a transit hotel for the night and we chose Hotel Central Kuta. This small shophouse hotel was nicely renovated and we were please with the reception. The room was nicely decorated. While this is generally good, we have 2 complaints: 1. When we turned on the water tap, brown water came out. We ran the tap for a few minutes before we used the water. 2. My wife and I felt that there were bed-bugs biting us. We couldn't sleep, and we asked the maid to change all the sheets, blankets and pillow packs, then it was just ok. Hope the management take note on their complaint. The next morning, we tried to find breakfast nearby to no avail. We ended up paying for the hotel breakfast which was ok and nice. Our experience was good if not for those two complaints. "

Review: Stayed with 4 other adults overnight in a family room. Plenty of room for the 5 of us. Air con worked well, room clean, heaps of extra amenities that I wasn't expecting, buffet breakfast was good and front desk helpful. The only thing I didn't like was the mattress were very hard. Will definitely stay here again for a cheap overnight stay which is close to the airport.

Air Con bekerja dengan baik, kamar bersih, tumpukan fasilitas ekstra yang tidak saya harapkan, sarapan prasmanan bagus dan meja depan membantu. Satu -satunya hal yang tidak saya sukai adalah kasurnya sangat keras. Pasti akan tinggal di sini lagi untuk menginap semalam yang murah yang dekat dengan bandara.

Subjeck: Excellent budget hotel to stay for big family
Review:
I stayed in Kuta Central Park Hotel for 3 nights. I choose family room with shower. The room size is 46 m2 with 1 bed king size and 3 single beds. The room is clean and comfort with air conditioner. The bath room is space enough. I paid 480K rupiah/night. The price is reasonable. It has swimming pool. I swam at 9 pm to burn my fat after consume too many delicious food at Bali :) 
My family and I was happy to stay at this Hotel

Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal di Kuta Central Park Hotel selama 3 malam. Saya memilih ruang keluarga dengan shower. Ukuran kamar adalah 46 m2 dengan ukuran 1 tempat tidur dan 3 tempat tidur tunggal. Kamar bersih dan nyaman dengan AC. Ruang mandi cukup ruang. Saya membayar rupiah/malam 480 ribu. Harganya masuk akal. Itu memiliki kolam renang. Saya berenang jam 9 malam untuk membakar lemak saya setelah mengonsumsi terlalu banyak makanan lezat di Bali :) 
Saya dan keluarga saya senang menginap di hotel ini

Saya dan keluarga saya senang menginap di hotel ini

Review:
Had a fantastic 10 day stay the staff were so friendly and helpful rooms are nice ( only lacking ceiling fans but we are from darwin and so used to the noise of fan lol ) close enough to shopping and beach with free shuttle leaving every 2 hours.Got very used to waking up for a lovely breakfast then a swim in the nice pool ( always extremely clean and well maintained ) will definitely recommend to friends or anyone and definitely stay here again. 

Thanks Kuta Central Park for a great stay and see u again soon.

Review_Bahasa:
Memiliki 10 hari yang fantastis, staf sangat ramah dan kamar -kamar yang bermanfaat bagus (hanya kurang kipas langit -langit tetapi kami berasal dari Darwin dan sangat terbiasa dengan suara kipas lol) cukup dekat untuk berbelanja dan pantai dengan antar -jemput gratis meninggalkan setiap 2 jam. Got sangat terbiasa bangun untuk sarapan yang indah kemudian berenang di kolam renang yang bagus (selalu sangat bersih dan dirawat dengan baik) pasti akan merekomendasikan untuk teman -teman dan siapa pun yang tinggal di sini. 

Terima kasih Kuta Central Park untuk menginap dan sampai jumpa lagi.

Got sangat terbiasa bangun untuk sarapan yang indah kemudian berenang di kolam renang yang bagus selalu sangat bersih dan dirawat dengan baik pasti akan merekomendasikan untuk teman -teman dan siapa pun yang tinggal di sini. 

Terima kasih Kuta Central Park untuk menginap dan sampai jumpa lagi.

Subjeck: Had an amazing 2 weeks, thank you!
Review:
Absolutely loved staying at this hotel. It was our first time in Bali and the staff and atmosphere of this hotel made us feel so welcome, nothing was too much trouble. Rooms were really clean and thoroughly cleaned every day. Free buffet breakfast was awesome, lots of variety! Free shuttles into town and to the shopping centres- very helpful! Gave us umbrellas and adapters! The spa here is amazing as well- recommend the hot stone massage to anyone! The girls are amazing and will make you feel famous. The gym is good, enough for 2/3 people to be in there, but this wasn't a problem for us as we were here during the less busy season. The location of the hotel is great! A bit out of town away from the hustle and bustle but close enough for a taxi to cost 3 bucks! :) pool is awesome, swim up pool bar a definite plus! 
All in all, we had a lovely stay at kuta Central Park, and the staff are so welcoming and kind :)

Review_Bahasa:
Benar -benar senang tinggal di hotel ini. Ini adalah pertama kalinya kami di Bali dan staf dan suasana hotel ini membuat kami merasa sangat disambut, tidak ada yang terlalu banyak masalah. Kamar benar -benar bersih dan dibersihkan secara menyeluruh setiap hari. Sarapan prasmanan gratis luar biasa, banyak variasi! Busana gratis ke kota dan ke pusat perbelanjaan- sangat membantu! Memberi kami payung dan adaptor! Spa di sini luar biasa dan dengan baik merekomendasikan pijat batu panas kepada siapa pun! Gadis -gadis itu luar biasa dan akan membuat Anda merasa terkenal. Gymnya bagus, cukup untuk 2/3 orang di sana, tetapi ini bukan masalah bagi kami karena kami di sini selama musim yang kurang sibuk. Lokasi hotel sangat bagus! Sedikit di luar kota yang jauh dari keramaian dan kesibukan tetapi cukup dekat untuk taksi berharga 3 dolar! :) Kolam renang luar biasa, berenang di Bar Pool Plus yang pasti! 
Secara keseluruhan, kami memiliki tinggal yang menyenangkan di Kuta Central Park, dan stafnya sangat ramah dan baik :)

Subjeck: Good hotel but far from the beach
Review: Really nice, clean and safe hotel. Friendly staff, good breakfast. Nice pool with a poolbar. We stayed there for two nights that we had booked before arriving to Bali. When we arrived we realized that it was really far from the beach, so after that we changed to a hotel thats closer to the beach, so it's easier to go surfing. 😊

When we arrived we realized that it was really far from the beach, so after that we changed to a hotel thats closer to the beach, so it's easier to go surfing. 😊

Kami tinggal di sana selama dua malam yang telah kami pesan sebelum tiba di Bali. Ketika kami tiba, kami menyadari bahwa itu benar -benar jauh dari pantai, jadi setelah itu kami berubah menjadi hotel yang lebih dekat ke pantai, jadi lebih mudah untuk berselancar. 😊

Review: We stayed here two nights prop to leaving Bali , we had just come from a 8night stay at the 5 star resort pan pacific nirvana so anything else was never going to compete with that , however kits Central Park.is probably more suited for backpackers or young travellers ,here are the pros / good location , good TV channels , good internet , that's all I can be positive about, here are the cons/ ordinary service / ordinary rooms with bad odours , getting to your rooms is quite a challenge (it's like a concrete multilevel maze) very stuffy corridors with that damp concrete musty smell , you have to pay when you leave their car park if you have your own transport , staff don't speak English very we'll at all , breakfast not included in room price , the rooms are not that cheap and should include buffet breakfast like we were told on the phone initially, the poolside very small and cramped , slippery poolside decking not suitable for children , all in all is rather go camping in a tent than stay there with their cigarette smoke filled concrete corridors with no air circulation . Thanks but no thanks ,

Review: Very good hotel.Rooms were very clean.We stayed from 6th till 9th December 2014 and enjoyed our stay.Staff is very helpful and always smiling.Pools were good.Kids play are was very nice.Breakfast was very sufficient with a variety. Rooms service was excellent.They do provide shuttle service to kuta and legian.We went for our anniversary and felt special.They gave us a nice romantic candle night dinner.Our flight was early morning but they packed a nice breakfast for us at 6:00 AM which is very good.I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang sangat bagus. Kamar sangat bersih. Kami tinggal dari 6 hingga 9 Desember 2014 dan menikmati masa menginap kami. Staf sangat membantu dan selalu tersenyum. POOLS bagus. Permainan Kids sangat bagus. Penyebaran sangat cukup dengan variasi. Layanan kamar sangat baik. Mereka memang memberikan layanan antar -jemput kepada Kuta dan Legian. Kami pergi untuk ulang tahun kami dan merasa istimewa. Mereka memberi kami makan malam lilin romantis yang menyenangkan. Penerbangan kami dini hari tetapi mereka mengemas sarapan yang menyenangkan untuk kami pada pukul 6:00 pagi yang sangat bagus. Saya pasti akan menginap di hotel ini lagi.

Permainan Kids sangat bagus. Penyebaran sangat cukup dengan variasi. Layanan kamar sangat baik. Mereka memang memberikan layanan antar -jemput kepada Kuta dan Legian. Subjeck: 3 nite stay in Kuta Central Park Hotel Bali
Review:
We had a short stay of 3 nites in Kuta Ceniral Park Hotel from 22/11 to 25/11/14 .Our deluxe room spacious with balcony and very clean. Wifi available in room and public areas very convenient. Free shuttle bus services at 2 hourly intervals to Kuta beach ,Discovery Mall (10am to 6pm) ,buffet breakfast spread tasty . 
Hotel staff friendly and very helpful in all ways , can speak simple English. 
Overall we are very happy , will be back on our next Bali trip !

Review_Bahasa:
Kami memiliki menginap singkat 3 nites di Kuta Ceniral Park Hotel dari 22/11 hingga 25/11/14. Kamar mewah kami luas dengan balkon dan sangat bersih. WiFi tersedia di kamar dan area publik sangat nyaman. Layanan bus antar -jemput gratis pada interval 2 jam ke Pantai Kuta, Discovery Mall (pukul 10:00 hingga 6 sore), sarapan prasmanan menyebar lezat. 
Staf hotel ramah dan sangat membantu dalam segala hal, dapat berbicara bahasa Inggris yang sederhana. 
Secara keseluruhan kami sangat senang, akan kembali ke perjalanan Bali kami berikutnya!

Review: A good hotel with a very nice pool and spa.food is average and staff is good.but one thing that turns me off is tge smelling toilets here.some problem with the drainage system, don't know.reception staff should amile a bit and rooms need more ventilation.Its a good place to hangout and well connected with places nearby.but I won't be visiting same hotel again.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus dengan kolam renang dan spa yang sangat bagus. Makanan rata -rata dan staf bagus. Tetapi satu hal yang membuat saya tidak bisa berbau toilet di sini. Beberapa masalah dengan sistem drainase, tidak tahu. Staf penerima harus sedikit mengamuk dan kamar membutuhkan lebih banyak ventilasi.

Review: Semalam menginap disini. Kebersihannya kurang. Seprei dan kamar mandinya agak kotor. AC kamar kurang nyaman. Breakfast nya simple, not bad. Positif nya, lokasi oke. Value for money average lah. Kalau ada budget lebih, saran saya bisa cari hotel lainnya.
Review_English: Last night staying here. The cleanliness is lacking. The sheets and bathrooms are rather dirty. Room air conditioner is not comfortable. The breakfast is simple, not bad. Positive, the location is okay. Value for money average. If there is more budget, my advice can find other hotels.
Review_Summary: Last night staying here. The cleanliness is lacking. The sheets and bathrooms are rather dirty. Room air conditioner is not comfortable. The breakfast is simple, not bad. Positive, the location is okay. Value for money average. If there is more budget, my advice can find other hotels.
Review_Bahasa: Tadi malam tinggal di sini. Kebersihannya kurang. Seprai dan kamar mandi agak kotor. AC room tidak nyaman. Sarapannya sederhana, tidak buruk. Positif, lokasinya baik -baik saja. Nilai rata -rata uang. Jika ada lebih banyak anggaran, saran saya dapat menemukan hotel lain.

Review:
I booked from groupon.co.id for 1 night. I got a spacious room but in the midst of the building, so there only window seeing through the corridor. nice bed, interior and amenities. bathroom either spacy but when i come it's closet spray is dirty with mud. i tried to use the bathtub but when i filled the tub, the water either looking dirty again ;( so i choose to only use its shower room. another good point, the location is near circle K, it's great for me to find some snack for my late working. (for foreigner : circle K only using IDR for payment). And their swimming pool is nice, even not as long as the pictures represents, enough for quick relax moment :) but i don't think you can really enjoy the pool on high season days, might be crowd. they offer me breakfast for 75k/pax, but i'm busy enough to try their foods :( 
Overal, as i put on title, was only the room and pool i enjoyed, and fairly enough. am going back here only if i got 'nice' rate again haha..
Review_English:
I booked from groupon.co.id for 1 night. I got a spacious room but in the midst of the building, so there only window seeing through the corridor. nice bed, interior and amenities. bathroom either spacy but when i come it's closet spray is dirty with mud. i tried to use the bathtub but when i filled the tub, the water either looking dirty again ;( so i choose to only use its shower room. another good point, the location is near circle K, it's great for me to find some snack for my late working. (for foreigner : circle K only using IDR for payment). And their swimming pool is nice, even not as long as the pictures represents, enough for quick relax moment :) but i don't think you can really enjoy the pool on high season days, might be crowd. they offer me breakfast for 75k/pax, but i'm busy enough to try their foods :( 
Overal, as i put on title, was only the room and pool i enjoyed, and fairly enough. am going back here only if i got 'nice' rate again haha..
Review_Summary:
I booked from groupon.co.id for 1 night. I got a spacious room but in the midst of the building, so there only window seeing through the corridor. nice bed, interior and amenities. bathroom either spacy but when i come it's closet spray is dirty with mud. i tried to use the bathtub but when i filled the tub, the water either looking dirty again ;( so i choose to only use its shower room. another good point, the location is near circle K, it's great for me to find some snack for my late working. (for foreigner : circle K only using IDR for payment). And their swimming pool is nice, even not as long as the pictures represents, enough for quick relax moment :) but i don't think you can really enjoy the pool on high season days, might be crowd. they offer me breakfast for 75k/pax, but i'm busy enough to try their foods :( 
Overal, as i put on title, was only the room and pool i enjoyed, and fairly enough. am going back here only if i got 'nice' rate again haha..
Review_Bahasa:
Saya memesan dari groupon.co.id untuk 1 malam. Saya mendapat kamar yang luas tetapi di tengah -tengah gedung, jadi hanya ada jendela yang melihat melalui koridor. Tempat tidur, interior, dan fasilitas yang bagus. Kamar mandi baik spacy tetapi ketika saya datang, semprotan lemari itu kotor dengan lumpur. Saya mencoba menggunakan bathtub tetapi ketika saya mengisi bak mandi, airnya terlihat kotor lagi; (jadi saya memilih untuk hanya menggunakan kamar mandi. Poin bagus lainnya, lokasinya dekat lingkaran K, sangat bagus bagi saya untuk menemukan camilan untuk pekerjaan saya yang terlambat. (Untuk waktu yang sangat baik, tidak ada waktu yang baik untuk pembayaran. Dan kumpulan renang mereka benar -benar bagus, bahkan tidak lama lagi, tetapi pada saat -saat yang lebih cepat untuk pembayaran. Mereka menawari saya sarapan untuk 75k/pax, tapi saya cukup sibuk untuk mencoba makanan mereka :( 
Overal, saat saya memakai judul, hanya kamar dan kolam renang yang saya nikmati, dan cukup. Saya akan kembali ke sini hanya jika saya mendapatkan tingkat 'bagus' lagi haha ​​..

Subjeck: Not at all "central"; but nice pool
Review:
The hotel provides a Mitsubishi L300 shuttle van to bring guests to Kuta because the hotel is not at all centrally located. 

The room was big, but it did not have adequate illumination. The bathroom was huge, but other than the size, it was normal. 

Breakfast was nice. Adequate choices. 

The pool was pretty good. Clean and conducive to swimming and socializing with other travellers. 

Would not choose to stay here again because of the poor location.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini menyediakan van antar -jemput Mitsubishi L300 untuk membawa para tamu ke Kuta karena hotel ini sama sekali tidak terletak di pusat. 

Ruangan itu besar, tetapi tidak memiliki iluminasi yang memadai. Kamar mandi sangat besar, tetapi selain ukurannya, itu normal. 

Sarapan itu enak. Pilihan yang memadai. 

Kolam itu cukup bagus. Bersih dan kondusif untuk berenang dan bersosialisasi dengan pelancong lain. 

Tidak akan memilih untuk tinggal di sini lagi karena lokasi yang buruk.

Review: "The only split AC blower is mounted above the entry door of the room and the area is enclosed by the passage between the two walls of room and bath room. The AC did not cool the room as, it was far away from the bed and also even at 17 degrees setting, the room was hot, all three nights. The toiletaries are scanty and are of poor quality. The towels were hard, rough and not very clean. I did not get hot water in the shower all 3 days in spite of informing at the front desk on the first day. The tea maker set is kept on a table where there is no electric point to connect. One needs to carry the kettle with the base to the other end of the room to use it. They charged for ice bucket ordered in the room. The wi-fi is pathetic though it is free and they have also blocked some sites. Breakfast was good but the attendants were less in number to serve the huge no of guests."

AC tidak mendinginkan ruangan karena itu jauh dari tempat tidur dan juga pada pengaturan 17 derajat, di seluruh kamarnya, tidak terlalu banyak. Di meja depan pada hari pertama.

Review: Неплохой отель за не большие деньги,но расположен далековато от моря, от отеля каждое утро с интервалом в два часа идет автобус до пляжа и ТЦ, с учетом постоянных пробок в Куте и узких улиц ,время в пути от 20 минут.Трансфер предоставляется только в одну сторону,обратно пешком или на такси (16-30 тыс.IDR=2,5s usa),территория отеля небольшая,есть два бассейна(детский и взрослый),наш номер выходил прям на бассейн и бар,очень удобное расположение номера 116, а вот номер 101 в котором мы жили 2 суток, я не рекомендую на большое кол-во дней,так он маленький и у него нет окон,есть СПА салон и тренажерный зал,обслуживающий персонал отличный,завтраки обыкновенные,если в баре брать напитки ,то в итоговом чеке прибавляется % за обслуживание,за территорией отеля много закусочных,продуктовых магазинов и рядом 3-х этажный массажный салон с недорогими ценами,в принципе отель понравился, за такие деньги близко от моря не найти,неделя проживание здесь вполне сойдет,но не более!!!
Review_English: A good hotel for not a lot of money, but is located far from the sea, from the hotel every morning with an interval of two hours there is a bus to the beach and shopping center, taking into account constant traffic jams in Kuta and narrow streets, travel time from 20 minutes. Transfer is provided only one way, on foot or taxi (16-30 thousand = 2.5S USA), the hotel area is small, there are two pools (children and children and children and children adult), our number went straight to the pool and a bar, a very convenient location of the number 116, but number 101 in which we lived for 2 days, I do not recommend it for a large number of days, so it is small and it has no windows, there is a spa salon and a gym, the service staff is excellent, ordinary breakfasts, if you take drinks in the bar, then the maintenance is added in the hotel, there is a lot of the hotel. snack, grocery stores and a 3-storey massage salon with inexpensive prices nearby, in principle, I liked the hotel, not to find it close to the sea for that kind of money, the week will come here quite, but no more !!!

Review_Bahasa: Sebuah hotel yang bagus untuk tidak banyak uang, tetapi terletak jauh dari laut, dari hotel setiap pagi dengan selang waktu dua jam ada bus ke pantai dan pusat perbelanjaan, memperhitungkan kemacetan lalu lintas yang konstan di Kuta dan jalan -jalan sempit, waktu perjalanan dari 20 menit. Transfer disediakan hanya satu arah, dengan berjalan kaki atau taksi (16-30 ribu = 2.5S USA), area hotel kecil, ada dua kolam (anak-anak dan anak-anak dan anak-anak dan anak-anak dewasa), jumlah kami langsung ke kolam renang dan sebuah bar, lokasi yang sangat nyaman dari SaM, tetapi nomor 101 di mana kami tinggal selama 2 hari, saya tidak merekomendasikannya untuk sejumlah besar hari, tetapi sebanyak itu ada di sana, tidak ada di dunia, saya tidak akan merekomendasikannya selama 2 hari, saya tidak merekomendasikannya selama 2 hari, saya tidak merekomendasikannya selama 2 hari, saya tidak merekomendasikannya selama ini, saya tidak merekomendasikan sejumlah besar hari, tetapi jumlahnya, saya tidak merekomendasikannya selama ini, saya tidak merekomendasikan sejumlah besar hari, tetapi jumlahnya, saya tidak merekomendasikannya selama ini, saya tidak merekomendasikan sejumlah besar hari, tetapi jumlahnya. Sarapan yang luar biasa dan biasa, jika Anda minum di bar, maka pemeliharaan ditambahkan di hotel, ada banyak hotel. Camilan, toko kelontong, dan salon pijat 3 lantai dengan harga murah di dekatnya, pada prinsipnya, saya suka hotel, tidak menemukannya di dekat laut untuk uang sebanyak itu, minggu ini akan datang ke sini cukup, tetapi tidak lebih !!!

Review: I will never stay there again,the service was shocking especially the in the reception area they were just hell rude.they charged us for a night we had all ready paid for went to get the recipe to show the all faded could not read them..then surprise surprise so was there's they basically called us liers and it was our cult..I gave them $300 for 12 night's at $25 per day.there cleaning was shocking leaving dirty glasses not changing pillow cases.and boy do they know how to charge we never ate part from brekky or drank there..two drinks nearly $18.00....never again...was not happy ruined my holiday could not afford any were ealse...but never never never stay there..we had kids on our floor running around from 5am banging on our door and 11.30pm same put a complaints in got told we basically had to deal with it...them screaming in the pool at 6.45 even though your not allowed in pool till 7am got told to deal with that to...pool bar play's same song's over and over and over again they have pool table witch you have to pay to use to ..not a good place wast of time never again.... You want a nice hotel to stay at there us white rose,adi darmah and the best place lovely staff love it there is kuta townhouse apartments we spent all our time and money there

Review:
For those who prefer quietness away from the madding crowd this hotel is ideal as it is just a walking distance to the main Legian hustle and bustle and there are many local eatery around it. Transport is easy to obtain just out on your door. 
I would choose this hotel again provided it has a special again as I travel cheaply

I would choose this hotel again provided it has a special again as I travel cheaply

Review_Bahasa:
Bagi mereka yang lebih suka keheningan dari kerumunan yang gila, hotel ini sangat ideal karena hanya berjalan kaki ke hiruk pikuk dan hiruk pikuk utama dan ada banyak restoran lokal di sekitarnya. Transportasi mudah didapat di pintu Anda. 
Saya akan memilih hotel ini lagi asalkan memiliki spesial lagi saat saya bepergian dengan murah

Review:
I want to start this by acknowledging that I only paid $35 for this hotel on Expedia. So goes the old saying "you get what you pay for". 
The rooms are big but my standard room comes with no natural light and a thick layer of dust on the floor and everything else. The bed is fine but the musky smell of the sheets give me an insane headache. The adapters fall out of the wall so phone charger is a balancing challenge. 
Probably the worst thing is the walls are made the finest tissue paper. I was kept up all night by Indonesian men yelling and bellowing all night. I had to call the front desk at 3am to ask them to stop. I was awoken to this again at about 6am. 
I ordered an English breakfast which took an hour and ten minutes. When it arrived, it was two pieces of bread next to a dollop of jam and the thinnest omelette you've ever seen, half sitting in the jam. It was for lack of a better word, disgusting. 
The spa however is expensive but worth it. 
Would not stay, would not recommend and have learned my lesson on $35 hotel sales.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya ingin memulai ini dengan mengakui bahwa saya hanya membayar $ 35 untuk hotel ini di Expedia. Begitu pula pepatah lama "Anda mendapatkan apa yang Anda bayar". 
Kamar -kamarnya besar tapi kamar standar saya datang tanpa cahaya alami dan lapisan debu tebal di lantai dan yang lainnya. Tempat tidurnya baik -baik saja tapi bau lembaran lembaran memberi saya sakit kepala gila. Adaptor jatuh dari dinding sehingga pengisi daya telepon adalah tantangan penyeimbang. 
Mungkin yang terburuk adalah dinding menjadi kertas tisu terbaik. Saya dijaga sepanjang malam oleh pria Indonesia berteriak dan berteriak sepanjang malam. Saya harus menelepon meja depan pada jam 3 pagi untuk meminta mereka berhenti. Saya terbangun lagi sekitar pukul 6 pagi. 
Saya memesan sarapan Inggris yang memakan waktu satu jam dan sepuluh menit. Ketika tiba, itu adalah dua potong roti di sebelah sesendok selai dan telur dadar tertipis yang pernah Anda lihat, setengah duduk di selai. Itu karena kurangnya kata yang lebih baik, menjijikkan. 
Namun spa itu mahal tapi sepadan. 
Tidak akan tinggal, tidak akan merekomendasikan dan telah mempelajari pelajaran saya tentang penjualan hotel $ 35.

Review: Stayed for 11 days with a booking for 3 people. Only 2 single beds I refused to pay extra for another bed when booking was made for 3 people so 3 people sleeping on 2 singles was quite uncomfortable. Everyday they would only give 2 towels 2 waters etc. The pool is quite small and after 2pm the pool area becomes shaded. Breakfast is average. The staff are helpful and friendly with the exception of the front female staff. I found them to be quite rude. Personally I would not stay here again.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal selama 11 hari dengan pemesanan untuk 3 orang. Hanya 2 tempat tidur tunggal saya menolak untuk membayar ekstra untuk tempat tidur lain ketika pemesanan dibuat untuk 3 orang sehingga 3 orang tidur dengan 2 single cukup tidak nyaman. Setiap hari mereka hanya akan memberikan 2 handuk 2 perairan dll. Kolam ini cukup kecil dan setelah pukul 2 siang area kolam menjadi teduh. Sarapan rata -rata. Staf sangat membantu dan ramah dengan pengecualian staf wanita depan. Saya menemukan mereka sangat kasar. Secara pribadi saya tidak akan tinggal di sini lagi.

Review: Kamar hotel bersih dan nyaman. Karyawan hotel yang ramah dan jujur. Pelayanan baik. Lokasi hotel yg cukup dekat dengan minimarket dan beberapa tempat makan. Walaupun agak jauh dari pantai, hotel menyediakan transportasi gratis ke wilayah kuta pada jam2 tertentu.
Review_English: Clean and comfortable hotel rooms. Friendly and honest hotel employees. Good service. The location of the hotel is quite close to the minimarket and some places to eat. Although a bit far from the beach, the hotel provides free transportation to the Kuta region at certain hours.

Review:
We stayed at this hotel with a group of friends for 5 nights. In my honest opinion I wouldn't stay here again simply because of the location, there is nothing at all within walking distance of the hotel expect a Circle K/Mini Mart & a small massage place. No shops/bars/restaurants etc. You need to get a taxi to do anything & flagging one down on the busy hwy is very frustrating. The general area that the hotel in located in is very scabby & not very nice at all. 

Breakfast was so so, limited selection normally a rice dish, noodle dish, squishy meat & eggs or toast. Very simple compared to hotels we normally stayed at. 

The customer service was outstanding, the staff helped us with whatever we needed - they didn't clean our room till 3-4pm most days. One thing that sucked was room service stopped at 11pm, 24hr room service would have been excellent. 

Room wise we had a suite & it was spacious & very nice altho we couldnt let any light in without everyone outside in the pool seeing us. You had to dance around in the shower to get wet because it sprayed in every direction. I don't recommend staying on the bottom floor near the pool - VERY noisy with techno music blaring from 11am till late at night, the pool is meant to close at 7pm & people would be in the pool & sitting outside your room at 3am in the morning talking loudly. There is also only one umbrella for the entire pool area & no other shade. 

The grounds were very well maintained & the hotel itself was beautiful, its just the people around the pool & the location that didn't suit us. But for a cheap stay in Bali it was fine & good value for money.

The general area that the hotel in located in is very scabby & not very nice at all.
Review_Bahasa:
Kami tinggal di hotel ini dengan sekelompok teman selama 5 malam. Menurut pendapat jujur ​​saya, saya tidak akan tinggal di sini lagi hanya karena lokasinya, tidak ada sama sekali dalam jarak berjalan kaki dari hotel mengharapkan lingkaran K/Mini Mart & tempat pijat kecil. Tidak ada toko/bar/restoran, dll. Anda perlu mendapatkan taksi untuk melakukan apa pun & menandai satu di Hwy yang sibuk sangat membuat frustrasi. Area umum tempat hotel berada sangat berkurang & tidak terlalu bagus sama sekali. 

Sarapan memang demikian, pilihan terbatas biasanya hidangan nasi, hidangan mie, daging & telur yang licin atau roti panggang. Sangat sederhana dibandingkan dengan hotel yang biasanya kami tinggali. 

Layanan pelanggan luar biasa, staf membantu kami dengan apa pun yang kami butuhkan - mereka tidak membersihkan kamar kami sampai jam 3-4 sore hampir setiap hari. Satu hal yang mengisap adalah layanan kamar berhenti pada pukul 11 ​​malam, layanan kamar 24 jam akan sangat baik. 

Kamar bijaksana kami memiliki suite & itu luas & sangat bagus meskipun kami tidak bisa membiarkan cahaya masuk tanpa semua orang di luar di kolam melihat kami. Anda harus menari -nari di kamar mandi untuk basah karena disemprotkan ke segala arah. Saya tidak merekomendasikan tinggal di lantai bawah dekat kolam renang - sangat bising dengan musik techno yang menggelegar dari jam 11 pagi sampai larut malam, kolam renang dimaksudkan untuk ditutup pada jam 7 malam & orang -orang akan berada di kolam renang & duduk di luar kamar Anda pada jam 3 pagi di pagi hari berbicara dengan keras. Hanya ada satu payung untuk seluruh area kolam & tidak ada naungan lainnya. 

Lapangannya terawat dengan sangat baik & hotel itu sendiri indah, hanya orang -orang di sekitar kolam renang & lokasi yang tidak cocok untuk kita. Tapi untuk masa tinggal yang murah di Bali, itu baik -baik saja & nilai yang baik untuk uang.

Review:
We were put up in this hotel from jetstar due to flight cancellation. After spending 14 days in a lavish hotel the courtyard marriott in seminyak we were disappointed especially my 8 year old who didn't want to stay comparing the two hotels. 
We arrived late and were offered two connecting rooms as we are a family of 5. The rooms stunk of cigarettes I had to put a scented candle on. The rooms were big and spacious but with no windows so dark, needs more lighting, but good forba sleep in as its so dark! The air conditioning was leaking the whole time we were there. The pool area was small and very loud with bogans hanging around at night. The food was ok but not enough selection. The staff were all lovely but not very knowledgable. The location is terrible, too far to the shops, bars & beach etc 
On a positive the massages were great! 
I wouldn't stay there again. It's a budget hotel.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami dipasang di hotel ini dari Jetstar karena pembatalan penerbangan. Setelah menghabiskan 14 hari di sebuah hotel mewah, Courtyard Marriott di Seminyak kami kecewa terutama anak saya yang berusia 8 tahun yang tidak ingin tetap membandingkan dua hotel. 
Kami tiba terlambat dan ditawari dua kamar penghubung karena kami adalah keluarga yang terdiri dari 5 orang. Kamar -kamarnya keriting rokok yang harus saya pakai lilin wangi. Kamar -kamarnya besar dan luas tetapi tanpa jendela yang begitu gelap, membutuhkan lebih banyak pencahayaan, tetapi tidur Forba yang nyenyak begitu gelap! AC bocor sepanjang waktu kami berada di sana. Area kolam renang kecil dan sangat keras dengan bogan berkeliaran di malam hari. Makanannya baik -baik saja tetapi tidak cukup pilihan. Staf semua cantik tapi tidak terlalu berpengetahuan. Lokasi mengerikan, terlalu jauh ke toko -toko, bar & pantai dll 
Pada pijat yang positif itu bagus! 
Saya tidak akan tinggal di sana lagi. Ini hotel anggaran.

Review: Rooms were spacious and clean, with daily rotation of towels & toiletries. Staff are very friendly and helpful. My family felt relaxed and at home here. Pool was clean and refreshing! A special thankyou to Bagus Adam & Bagus Wijana! <3

Review_Bahasa: Kamar luas dan bersih, dengan rotasi handuk & perlengkapan mandi harian. Staf sangat ramah dan membantu. Keluarga saya merasa santai dan di rumah di sini. Kolam renang bersih dan menyegarkan! Terima kasih khusus kepada Bagus Adam & Bagus Wijana! <3

Review:
We stayed here for one night in mid-September before moving on. Our flight to Bali arrived late in the afternoon and we didn’t want to be making the drive to Ubud at night. This place was good at served it's purpose for us. 

Check-In: We were greeted with cold juice drinks upon arrival. Check-in was quick and easy because we had reserved and paid ahead of time through a travel site. The only thing we paid for upon arriving was the airport pick-up we arranged through the hotel ahead of time. They also walked us to our room and carried our luggage for us. Glad they did because this place looks a little like a maze at night. 

Location: We didn't leave the hotel except upon arriving and leaving but the area seemed a little sketchy in appearance. 

Room: Positives, it was clean, cold and comfortable in size. Negatives, we had a room with no window (not a big deal but it felt weird) and the door was super thin. The people across the hall were coming and going from their room all night and sometimes it sounded like someone was trying to open our door. 

Pool: We didn’t use it but it looked nice. But we did notice it’s in a high traffic area but it could maybe be more relaxing after breakfast and checkout time. 

Breakfast: Was a buffet style. There was a large variety of foods with a pancake and egg station. Some of it was really good and some wasn’t but I think it was overall worth it because of the amount of food. 

Staff: Always greeted us and were very nice and polite. 

Car Service: Can arrange ahead of time for them to pick you up at the airport. We did and tipped the driver well because he waited almost 2 hours for us. The lines for the visa payment and immigration were INSANE and took WAY longer than they should have. I would highly recommend using this service so you don’t have to deal with hiring a driver at the airport. 

Notes/Tips: They exchange money at the front desk and at a pretty reasonable exchange rate

Review_Bahasa:
Kami tinggal di sini selama satu malam di pertengahan September sebelum pindah. Penerbangan kami ke Bali tiba sore hari dan kami tidak ingin berkendara ke Ubud di malam hari. Tempat ini pandai melayani tujuannya bagi kami. 

Check-in: Kami disambut dengan minuman jus dingin pada saat kedatangan. Check-in cepat dan mudah karena kami telah memesan dan membayar sebelumnya melalui situs perjalanan. Satu-satunya hal yang kami bayar setelah tiba adalah penjemputan bandara yang kami atur melalui hotel sebelumnya. Mereka juga mengantar kami ke kamar kami dan membawa barang bawaan kami untuk kami. Senang mereka melakukannya karena tempat ini terlihat sedikit seperti labirin di malam hari. 

Lokasi: Kami tidak meninggalkan hotel kecuali setelah tiba dan pergi tetapi daerah itu tampak agak samar. 

Kamar: Positif, bersih, dingin dan nyaman dalam ukuran. Negatif, kami memiliki kamar tanpa jendela (bukan masalah besar tapi rasanya aneh) dan pintunya sangat tipis. Orang -orang di seberang lorong datang dan pergi dari kamar mereka sepanjang malam dan kadang -kadang terdengar seperti seseorang mencoba membuka pintu kami. 

Pool: Kami tidak menggunakannya tetapi terlihat bagus. Tapi kami memang memperhatikan itu di area lalu lintas tinggi tetapi mungkin lebih santai setelah sarapan dan waktu checkout. 

Sarapan: adalah gaya prasmanan. Ada berbagai macam makanan dengan pancake dan stasiun telur. Beberapa di antaranya benar -benar bagus dan beberapa tidak, tetapi saya pikir itu secara keseluruhan sepadan karena jumlah makanan. 

Staf: Selalu menyapa kami dan sangat baik dan sopan. 

Layanan Mobil: Dapat mengatur sebelumnya agar mereka menjemput Anda di bandara. Kami melakukan dan memberi tip kepada pengemudi dengan baik karena dia menunggu hampir 2 jam untuk kami. Garis untuk pembayaran visa dan imigrasi gila dan memakan waktu lebih lama dari yang seharusnya. Saya akan sangat merekomendasikan menggunakan layanan ini sehingga Anda tidak perlu berurusan dengan mempekerjakan pengemudi di bandara. 

Catatan/Tips: Mereka menukar uang di meja depan dan dengan nilai tukar yang cukup masuk akal
Review_Clean:

Senang mereka melakukannya karena tempat ini terlihat sedikit seperti labirin di malam hari. 

Lokasi Kami tidak meninggalkan hotel kecuali setelah tiba dan pergi tetapi daerah itu tampak agak samar. 

Kamar Positif, bersih, dingin dan nyaman dalam ukuran. Negatif, kami memiliki kamar tanpa jendela bukan masalah besar tapi rasanya aneh dan pintunya sangat tipis. Orang -orang di seberang lorong datang dan pergi dari kamar mereka sepanjang malam dan kadang -kadang terdengar seperti seseorang mencoba membuka pintu kami. 

Pool Kami tidak menggunakannya tetapi terlihat bagus. Tapi kami memang memperhatikan itu di area lalu lintas tinggi tetapi mungkin lebih santai setelah sarapan dan waktu checkout. 

Sarapan adalah gaya prasmanan. Ada berbagai macam makanan dengan pancake dan stasiun telur. Beberapa di antaranya benar -benar bagus dan beberapa tidak, tetapi saya pikir itu secara keseluruhan sepadan karena jumlah makanan. 

Staf Selalu menyapa kami dan sangat baik dan sopan. 

Layanan Mobil Dapat mengatur sebelumnya agar mereka menjemput Anda di bandara. Kami melakukan dan memberi tip kepada pengemudi dengan baik karena dia menunggu hampir 2 jam untuk kami. Garis untuk pembayaran visa dan imigrasi gila dan memakan waktu lebih lama dari yang seharusnya. Saya akan sangat merekomendasikan menggunakan layanan ini sehingga Anda tidak perlu berurusan dengan mempekerjakan pengemudi di bandara. 

CatatanTips Mereka menukar uang di meja depan dan dengan nilai tukar yang cukup masuk akal

Review:
Kuta Central Park Hotel is a nice hotel that gets the job done for a reasonable price. The breakfast buffet was fantastic, staff were friendly and charismatic. The rooms are nice without being spectacular and the pool and pool bar are clean and central. 
Prices at the bar are a little too expensive to warrant staying at the hotel for prolonged amounts of time drinking. The hotel is located a little outside the hustle and bustle of Kuta which can make for a nice break but also means you need transport to get in. The surrounding area is a little sketchy as well in terms of development. 
Overall we enjoyed our stay here but would probably look for somewhere that you could spend more time partying at.

Review_Bahasa:
Kuta Central Park Hotel adalah hotel yang bagus yang menyelesaikan pekerjaan dengan harga yang wajar. Sarapan prasmanan fantastis, staf ramah dan karismatik. Kamar -kamarnya bagus tanpa menjadi spektakuler dan batang kolam renang dan kolam renang bersih dan sentral. 
Harga di bar agak terlalu mahal untuk menjamin tinggal di hotel untuk minum waktu yang lama. Hotel ini terletak sedikit di luar keramaian dan kesibukan Kuta yang dapat membuat istirahat yang bagus tetapi juga berarti Anda perlu transportasi untuk masuk. Daerah sekitarnya juga sedikit samar dalam hal pengembangan. 
Secara keseluruhan kami menikmati kami tinggal di sini tetapi mungkin akan mencari di suatu tempat di mana Anda bisa menghabiskan lebih banyak waktu berpesta.

Review: Melihat tampilan hotel dari luar bagus, hanya saja bersatu dengan toko-toko. Tapi setelah melihat lagi ke dalamnya bagus, langsung terlihat kolam renang yang ok. setelah melihat isi kamar, ternyata kamarnya memang luaaaas sekali, ruangannya terbagi menjadi dua: ruang tidur dan ruang duduk, kebetulan kami bertiga tidur di hotel ini, jadi nambah extra bed. secara keseluruhan hotel ini ok, tapi ada satu yang kurang, air showernya kurang besar, jadi kami mandi agak lama.
Review_English: Seeing the appearance of the hotel from outside is good, it's just united with the shops. But after looking again into it was good, immediately visible swimming pool ok. After seeing the contents of the room, it turned out that the room was very much, the room was divided into two: bedrooms and sitting rooms, coincidentally the three of us slept in this hotel, so add extra beds. Overall this hotel is ok, but there is one lack of, the water shower is not big, so we take a shower for a long time.

Review: bila kita berkunjung ke kuta bali dengan anak anak hotel ini patut dikunjungi sebab selain harganya bersahabat hotel ini menyediakan kolam renang yanh bagus untuk anak kita tidak bosan plus ada play ground untuk anak dibawah 3 tahun loh plus ditempat ini banyak sekali makanan jadi kita tidak susah mencari makan.
Review_English: When we visit Kuta Bali with children, this hotel is worth a visit because in addition to the price of friendly this hotel provides a good swimming pool for our children not bored plus there is a play ground for children under 3 years plus in this place a lot of food so we are not difficult to find food.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya berencana kembali hotel ini pada bulan April 2015. Staf yang ramah dan saya suka sarapan. 
Spa hotel ini bagus dan harganya murah. 
Kamar lebih besar dan bersih. Menyukai sangat menyukainya. 
Kamar dekat kolam renang berisik bagi saya, karena pagi hari itu akan bermain dan berteriak di sana, ruangan itu sangat dekat kolam renang. Ini buruk.

Subjeck: 2nd home . Love just love !!!! will be back
Review: I travelled to bali with my friend and my 8 year old son. And we loved it. the staff are truley amazing and make you feel so welcome. My son OMG thinks he runs the Hotel haha they looked after us so well. I am a little over protective of my son but with the staff at Kuta Central Park Hotel i was at ease. Food was cheap and yummy and everything was clean and tidy. You get what you pay for and more. I can not complain at all about this hotel. nothing was to much trouble. Beds where amazing as well. ssoo comfy. My son wanted to stay and live here. Thank you so much everyone and we will be back 100%.

Anak saya OMG mengira dia menjalankan hotel haha, mereka menjaga kami dengan sangat baik. Saya sedikit terlalu melindungi putra saya tetapi dengan staf di Kuta Central Park Hotel saya merasa nyaman. Makanan murah dan enak dan semuanya bersih dan rapi. Anda mendapatkan apa yang Anda bayar dan banyak lagi. Saya tidak bisa mengeluh sama sekali tentang hotel ini. Tidak ada masalah yang banyak. Tempat tidur di mana luar biasa juga. SSOO Comfy. Anak saya ingin tinggal dan tinggal di sini. Terima kasih banyak semuanya dan kami akan kembali 100%.

Subjeck: Price is justified with the service, ambience and room
Review: had a pleasant stay at the Hotel with my family and appreciated the service and the ambience of the hotel. The rooms are spacious with comfortable beds, positive pictures and lots of stuffs that a traveller need not carry particularly hair dryer and tooth brush.

Review: We stayed at the superior room and took the free and easy package. It was really value for money deal. It comes with breakfast, steamboat dinner and also massage for a couple. So it was great. The room was spacious. Eventhough it doesnt have any view but since we spent most of our time sightseeing it wasnt really a problem. We had a toddler with us and he had fun at the kids pool. The staff are really friendly and attentive. Check in went smoothly, check out was fast its just that because we didn't have to sign anything we didn't know that we had already checked out. So we waited cluelessly. The room we stayed was clean though as with other reviews the towels are not white but grey and some were stained. My suggestion is that they should boil it with detergent/bleach and it'll be brilliant white again. Other than that we had a great stay. I don't have any real complains and would definitely recommend my friends and family to stay at the hotel. ☺

Muncul dengan sarapan, makan malam kapal uap dan juga pijat untuk pasangan. Jadi itu bagus. Ruangan itu luas. Meskipun itu tidak memiliki pandangan apa pun tetapi karena kami menghabiskan sebagian besar waktu kami, itu tidak benar -benar menjadi masalah. Kami memiliki balita dengan kami dan dia bersenang -senang di kolam anak -anak. Stafnya sangat ramah dan penuh perhatian. Check -in berjalan lancar, check out cepat hanya karena kami tidak perlu menandatangani apa pun yang kami tidak tahu bahwa kami sudah check out. Jadi kami menunggu tanpa alasan. Kamar kami tinggal bersih meskipun dengan ulasan lain handuknya tidak putih tapi abu -abu dan beberapa diwarnai. Saran saya adalah bahwa mereka harus merebusnya dengan deterjen/pemutih dan itu akan menjadi putih cemerlang lagi. Selain itu, kami senang tinggal di sini. Saya tidak memiliki keluhan nyata dan pasti akan merekomendasikan teman dan keluarga saya untuk menginap di hotel. ☺

Review: Got a very big room with bath-tub, super friendly and cooperative staff. Clean and great pool and my daughter love to play at the playground. Will surely comeback. Thank you Rajakamar&Kuta Central Park
Review_English: Got a very big room with bath-tub, super friendly and cooperative staff. Clean and great pool and my daughter love to play at the playground. Will surely comeback. Thank you Rajakamar&Kuta Central Park

Review_Bahasa: Punya kamar yang sangat besar dengan staf mandi, super ramah dan kooperatif. Kolam renang yang bersih dan hebat dan putri saya suka bermain di taman bermain. Pasti akan kembali. Terima kasih Rajakamar & Kuta Central Park
Review_Clean: Punya kamar yang sangat besar dengan staf mandi, super ramah dan kooperatif. Kolam renang yang bersih dan hebat dan putri saya suka bermain di taman bermain. Pasti akan kembali. Terima kasih Rajakamar  Kuta Central Park

Review:
This hotel, though seems a bit sad from the back side and the front, is a nice comfy hotel from the inside. 

POSITIVES: 
- Staff are courteous and friendly. No one's taking advantage of unsuspecting guests. They'll make you feel comfortable at every spot in the hotel. 
- The staff can understand every bit of English that I said. It feels nice to get understood. 
- Spacious room 
- Beds are good 
- Clean CR 
- Lotus Pond Cafe is good, I liked their breakfast meals, though it would be much nicer if there would be a bit more variety in their menu. 
- Very affordable 
- Shuttle service 
- Good aircon 

NEGATIVES: 
- Bar bill is separate from the room. I guess it would be better if bills from the bar can be charged to the room so there is no need for guests to carry around money, specially since the bar is beside the pool. 
- Shower curtain rod is not fixed. It's like the shower curtain was just recently added. It would be better if they permanently attach this. (it fell on me once actually). 
- Mini cockroach in the room (not in the CR). I think I saw them once a day in our 4-day stay. (for the record, the management is aware of this, and I laud them for taking the necessary steps in eliminating/minimizing the occurrence of these pests) 
- Not much cable channels 

Overall, I recommend this hotel. This is a good one.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini, meskipun tampaknya agak menyedihkan dari sisi belakang dan depan, adalah hotel nyaman yang bagus dari dalam. 

Positif: 
- Staf sopan dan ramah. Tidak ada yang memanfaatkan tamu yang tidak curiga. Mereka akan membuat Anda merasa nyaman di setiap tempat di hotel. 
- Staf dapat memahami setiap bahasa Inggris yang saya katakan. Rasanya menyenangkan bisa dipahami. 
- Kamar yang luas 
- Tempat tidur bagus 
- Bersihkan Cr 
- Lotus Pond Cafe bagus, saya suka makanan sarapan mereka, meskipun akan jauh lebih baik jika akan ada sedikit lebih banyak variasi dalam menu mereka. 
- Sangat terjangkau 
- Layanan antar -jemput 
- AC yang bagus 

Negatif: 
- Tagihan bar terpisah dari ruangan. Saya kira akan lebih baik jika tagihan dari bar dapat dibebankan ke kamar sehingga tidak perlu bagi para tamu untuk membawa uang, khususnya karena bar berada di samping kolam renang. 
- Batang tirai mandi tidak diperbaiki. Ini seperti tirai shower baru saja ditambahkan. Akan lebih baik jika mereka secara permanen melampirkan ini. (Sebenarnya itu jatuh pada saya). 
- Kecoak mini di ruangan (bukan di CR). Saya pikir saya melihat mereka sekali sehari dalam tinggal 4 hari kami. (Sebagai catatan, manajemen menyadari hal ini, dan saya memuji mereka karena mengambil langkah -langkah yang diperlukan dalam menghilangkan/meminimalkan terjadinya hama ini) 
- Tidak banyak saluran kabel 

Secara keseluruhan, saya merekomendasikan hotel ini. Ini bagus.

Review: I was more than happy with the service at this hotel from the reception to the cleaners to the bar staff, everyone was more than helpful and kind! Our room was on the third floor over looking the pool, it was modern and spacious! We had breakfast included in our stay and it was nice, not what I would usually want nor have for breakfast but never the less most of it was nice. The hotel is about a 10 minute walk to the main strip but the 2 times we walked this my handbag was almost snatched from my shoulder by a young guy on a scooter driving past (so definitely get a taxi) the only reason we walked was because it took so long in traffic and would have been easier to walk. We took advantage of the hotel spa as it is so relaxing and very reasonably priced! Overall very happy with my stay and will definitely be back!

We took advantage of the hotel spa as it is so relaxing and very reasonably priced! Overall very happy with my stay and will definitely be back!
Review_Bahasa: Saya sangat senang dengan layanan di hotel ini dari resepsi ke staf pembersih ke staf bar, semua orang lebih dari membantu dan baik! Kamar kami berada di lantai tiga karena melihat kolam renang, itu modern dan luas! Kami memiliki sarapan yang termasuk dalam kami tinggal dan itu bagus, bukan yang biasanya saya inginkan dan nikmati untuk sarapan tetapi tidak pernah sebagian besar sebagian besar bagus. Hotel ini berjarak sekitar 10 menit berjalan kaki ke strip utama, tetapi 2 kali kami berjalan ini tas saya hampir direnggut dari bahu saya oleh seorang pria muda dengan skuter yang melewati (jadi pasti mendapatkan taksi) satu -satunya alasan kami berjalan adalah karena butuh waktu lama dalam lalu lintas dan akan lebih mudah untuk berjalan. Kami memanfaatkan spa hotel karena sangat santai dan sangat terjangkau! Secara keseluruhan sangat senang dengan saya tinggal dan pasti akan kembali!

Review: Soggiorno di 22 giorni cn camera de luxe cn balcone. All'arrivo nn c'era il transfert all'aeroporto, arriviamo in albergo ci viene assegnata una camera de luxe al piano terra senza balcone ma cn finestra. Ci viene subito cambiata cn un altra più piccola ma cn balcone mlto sporco che si affaccia su un edificio decadente. Il lavandino del bagno nn scende l'acqua, i cuscini sn bassi, il letto nn viene cambiato tutti i giorni ma neanche viene rifatto. Cosa altro dire. Delusione totale
Review_English: 22 -day stay with Luxe Cn Balcony. Upon arrival, there was no transfer to the airport, we arrive at the hotel we are assigned a chamber de luxe on the ground floor without balcony but with a window. We immediately changed with another smaller but with the balcony Mlto Sparco overlooking a decadent building. The bathroom sink does not descend the water, the low SN cushions, the bed is not changed every day but it is not even redone. What else to say. Total disappointment

Upon arrival, there was no transfer to the airport, we arrive at the hotel we are assigned a chamber de luxe on the ground floor without balcony but with a window. We immediately changed with another smaller but with the balcony Mlto Sparco overlooking a decadent building. The bathroom sink does not descend the water, the low SN cushions, the bed is not changed every day but it is not even redone. What else to say. Total disappointment
Review_Bahasa: 22 -hari menginap dengan balkon CN Luxe. Setibanya di atas, tidak ada transfer ke bandara, kami tiba di hotel kami ditugaskan sebuah kamar de luxe di lantai dasar tanpa balkon tetapi dengan jendela. Kami segera berubah dengan yang lebih kecil tetapi dengan balkon MLTO Sparco yang menghadap ke bangunan dekaden. Wastafel kamar mandi tidak turun air, bantal SN rendah, tempat tidur tidak berubah setiap hari tetapi bahkan tidak diperbaiki. Apa lagi yang harus dikatakan. Total kekecewaan

Review: The room is big and staff are accommodating. I requested for additional pillows and slippers and they gave in few minutes.. However, the person at reception does not want us to check in when we arrived and asked us to wait but we did not agree, so he gave us room right away. Location is good, just few minutes taxi going to the beach. Overall, hotel is value for money.

Namun, orang di resepsi tidak ingin kami check -in ketika kami tiba dan meminta kami untuk menunggu tetapi kami tidak setuju, jadi dia segera memberi kami kamar. Lokasi bagus, hanya beberapa menit taksi pergi ke pantai. Secara keseluruhan, hotel adalah nilai uang.
