Review_Bahasa:
Kami tinggal di Kuta Central Park selama 4 malam dan menikmati kami tinggal. 

Sarapan adalah yang terbaik yang kami miliki di antara semua hotel lain karena prasmanan dengan pilihan yang sangat luas. Layanan restoran mengalahkan sebagian besar hotel lainnya. 

Ruangan yang diberikan kepada kami sudah siap sebelum waktu check -in yang biasa dan itu sangat dihargai. Kami juga diberi 4 botol air untuk setiap hari servis yang lebih dari yang disediakan oleh hotel Bali lainnya. 

Para resepsionis hotel sebagian besar akomodatif dan pengertian. Mungkin sedikit lebih banyak pelatihan untuk memberi mereka informasi yang mungkin dibutuhkan para tamu selama mereka tinggal akan dihargai seperti bagaimana mengaktifkan mobil SIM lokal (hanya dirinci dalam bahasa Indonesia) dan permintaan dasar lainnya. Saya memberikan umpan balik karena saya biasa melakukan penerimaan selama bertahun -tahun di berbagai hotel. 

Terlepas dari itu, kami benar -benar menikmati kami tinggal dan akan kembali ke hotel ini jika kami tinggal di Kuta.

Review:
When I said the hotel's name to the taxi driver, he said that the area was a parking lot previously. So, I think it is quite true because on the way to enter the area, there are some empty space and many cars there. There is Giant also, a hypermart and some small two store offices. Actually, after more than a day stay there, I realize the entry gate to the Hotel are many. The nearest one is if we go from the hotel, then walk to the left and right, then you will find the gate through the main road. From there, you can get the taxi. There is no stand by taxi in the hotel, so you must walk to the main road to get it. 

OK, the first time reach the Lobby, there are many people sitting and standing nearby. The Lobby area is not wide, so looks crowded for me. I've told that I will share a room with my colleague from Philippine who has arrived the day before. Unfortunately, they gave me new room on the first floor. The area is spacious with two sofas, office desk, twin beds, and cabinets. They did not refill the amenities on the second day, like soap and others. 

The meeting room is on the second floor, so you must get through the restaurant first and enter the building, then go by the lift. It was hot and the air con was not working properly. 

The restaurant is split to three areas, one is near where the food placed, then go down by few stairs, and then inside the room. There are few alternate food for breakfast and most of it is salty. 

The pool is small, but ok for me. They also can save your luggage and there is a shuttle bus with certain schedule. The schedule is near the receptionist.

Review_Bahasa:
Ketika saya mengatakan nama hotel kepada sopir taksi, dia mengatakan bahwa daerah itu adalah tempat parkir sebelumnya. Jadi, saya pikir itu benar karena dalam perjalanan untuk memasuki area, ada beberapa ruang kosong dan banyak mobil di sana. Ada juga raksasa, hypermart dan beberapa kantor kecil dua toko. Sebenarnya, setelah lebih dari satu hari tinggal di sana, saya menyadari gerbang masuk ke hotel banyak. Yang terdekat adalah jika kita pergi dari hotel, lalu berjalan ke kiri dan kanan, maka Anda akan menemukan gerbang melalui jalan utama. Dari sana, Anda bisa mendapatkan taksi. Tidak ada stand dengan taksi di hotel, jadi Anda harus berjalan ke jalan utama untuk mendapatkannya. 

Oke, pertama kali mencapai lobi, ada banyak orang yang duduk dan berdiri di dekatnya. Area lobi tidak lebar, jadi terlihat ramai bagi saya. Saya telah mengatakan bahwa saya akan berbagi kamar dengan kolega saya dari Filipina yang telah tiba sehari sebelumnya. Sayangnya, mereka memberi saya kamar baru di lantai pertama. Daerah ini luas dengan dua sofa, meja kantor, tempat tidur kembar, dan lemari. Mereka tidak mengisi ulang fasilitas pada hari kedua, seperti sabun dan lainnya. 

Ruang pertemuan ada di lantai dua, jadi Anda harus melewati restoran terlebih dahulu dan memasuki gedung, lalu pergi dengan lift. Itu panas dan Air Con tidak berfungsi dengan baik. 

Restoran terbagi menjadi tiga area, satu dekat tempat makanan ditempatkan, lalu turun dengan beberapa tangga, dan kemudian di dalam ruangan. Ada beberapa makanan alternatif untuk sarapan dan sebagian besar asin. 

Kolam renang kecil, tapi oke untukku. Mereka juga dapat menyimpan barang bawaan Anda dan ada bus antar -jemput dengan jadwal tertentu. Jadwal dekat resepsionis.

Subjeck: Reception service needs improvement, Cozy Environment...
Review: We spent 4 nights in this hotel. This hotel really very good and value for money. Our only issue was during check out. When we check out, staffs claims that we have took some drink from the minibar while it was empty from the beginning. The receptionist is rude by accusing us and request us to admit we have took the drink. Please at least improve the checklist for minibar or just leave it empty to avoid misunderstanding.

When we check out, staffs claims that we have took some drink from the minibar while it was empty from the beginning. The receptionist is rude by accusing us and request us to admit we have took the drink. Please at least improve the checklist for minibar or just leave it empty to avoid misunderstanding.

The receptionist is rude by accusing us and request us to admit we have took the drink. Please at least improve the checklist for minibar or just leave it empty to avoid misunderstanding.
Review_Bahasa: Kami menghabiskan 4 malam di hotel ini. Hotel ini sangat bagus dan bernilai uang. Satu -satunya masalah kami adalah selama check out. Ketika kami check out, staf mengklaim bahwa kami telah minum dari minibar saat itu kosong sejak awal. Resepsionis kasar dengan menuduh kami dan meminta kami untuk mengakui bahwa kami telah minum. Mohon setidaknya tingkatkan daftar periksa untuk minibar atau biarkan kosong untuk menghindari kesalahpahaman.

Mohon setidaknya tingkatkan daftar periksa untuk minibar atau biarkan kosong untuk menghindari kesalahpahaman.

Review: Here are loads of Asien tourists - they seem to enjoy. The reality is that seven people on the reception are not able to use the credit card terminal properly, it was even difficult to order a taxi, they would sell us a transfer to the airport double priced. Our room was not properly cleaned at least for a two weeks if not longer. We will not come back.

Review_Bahasa: Berikut adalah banyak wisatawan Asien - mereka tampaknya menikmati. Kenyataannya adalah bahwa tujuh orang di resepsi tidak dapat menggunakan terminal kartu kredit dengan benar, bahkan sulit untuk memesan taksi, mereka akan menjual transfer kepada kami ke bandara dengan harga ganda. Kamar kami tidak dibersihkan dengan benar setidaknya selama dua minggu jika tidak lagi. Kami tidak akan kembali.

Review: Our only issue was at check in. Our flight landed us there an hour before their 2pm check in. That was fair enough, and we decided to wait even though we were rather hot and tired. We found the reception staff on that particular day to be somewhat disinterested in making any special effort. When 2pm came however, our room still wasn't ready and the staff were quite happy for us to continue to wait which was unreasonable. The only reason that they actually pushed themselves was because I wasn't prepared to back down. Having said this, the rest of our stay was wonderful, and we did not experience that apathy at the front desk again, nor with any other staff. Just a pity, that's all. When we checked out, it is apparently standard for the hotel to request feedback, also requesting email address etc. I was personally disappointed to see that even though I expressed concern about check in, and gave my email address, no follow up was taken by the hotel. Why do they ask for feedback then? It appears it is a complete waste of their client's time sadly. The hotel has a very nice pool, although it isn't very deep. Breakfast was quite reasonable, and everything was very clean. And, I repeat, apart from our check in staff, the staff were excellent. My partner and I found the Carrefour shopping centre within walking distance, and being regular visitors to Bali, we rate that shopping centre as being of much better value than Hypermart. The hotel provides a free regular shuttle service into Kuta town, but not return. However taxis are very cheap. All in all, we found this hotel to be very conveniently located for shopping and very comfortable. Recommended

Review_Bahasa: Satu -satunya masalah kami adalah di check -in. Penerbangan kami mendaratkan kami di sana satu jam sebelum pukul 14:00 mereka check -in. Itu cukup adil, dan kami memutuskan untuk menunggu meskipun kami agak panas dan lelah. Kami menemukan staf penerimaan pada hari itu agak tidak tertarik dalam melakukan upaya khusus. Namun ketika jam 2 siang datang, kamar kami masih belum siap dan staf cukup senang kami untuk terus menunggu yang tidak masuk akal. Satu -satunya alasan mereka benar -benar mendorong diri mereka sendiri adalah karena saya tidak siap untuk mundur. Setelah mengatakan ini, sisa kami tinggal sangat indah, dan kami tidak mengalami apatis di meja depan lagi, juga dengan staf lain. Sayang sekali, itu saja. Ketika kami check out, tampaknya standar bagi hotel untuk meminta umpan balik, juga meminta alamat email dll. Saya secara pribadi kecewa melihat bahwa meskipun saya menyatakan kekhawatiran tentang check -in, dan memberikan alamat email saya, tidak ada tindak lanjut yang diambil oleh hotel. Mengapa mereka meminta umpan balik? Tampaknya itu adalah buang -buang waktu klien mereka dengan sedih. Hotel ini memiliki kolam renang yang sangat bagus, meskipun tidak terlalu dalam. Sarapan cukup masuk akal, dan semuanya sangat bersih. Dan, saya ulangi, terlepas dari staf check -in kami, stafnya sangat baik. Saya dan mitra saya menemukan pusat perbelanjaan Carrefour dalam jarak berjalan kaki, dan menjadi pengunjung reguler ke Bali, kami menilai pusat perbelanjaan itu sebagai nilai yang jauh lebih baik daripada Hypermart. Hotel ini menyediakan layanan antar -jemput reguler gratis ke Kuta Town, tetapi tidak kembali. Namun taksi sangat murah. Secara keseluruhan, kami menemukan hotel ini terletak sangat nyaman untuk berbelanja dan sangat nyaman. Direkomendasikan

Review: Hotel moderno e tranquillo. Camere spaziose e letto morbido. Personale gentile e disponibile, ricca colazione a buffet e Wi Fi gratuita. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Navetta gratuita per la spiaggia e il centro commerciale
Review_English: Modern and quiet hotel. Spacious rooms and soft bed. Dear and helpful staff, rich breakfast buffet and free wi fi. Excellent value for money. Free shuttle for the beach and the shopping center
Review_Summary: Modern and quiet hotel. Spacious rooms and soft bed. Dear and helpful staff, rich breakfast buffet and free wi fi. Excellent value for money. Free shuttle for the beach and the shopping center
Review_Bahasa: Hotel modern dan tenang. Kamar yang luas dan tempat tidur lembut. Staf yang terhormat dan membantu, sarapan prasmanan yang kaya dan wi fi gratis. Nilai yang sangat baik untuk uang. Antar -jemput gratis untuk pantai dan pusat perbelanjaan
Review_Clean: Hotel modern dan tenang. Kamar yang luas dan tempat tidur lembut. Staf yang terhormat dan membantu, sarapan prasmanan yang kaya dan wi fi gratis. Nilai yang sangat baik untuk uang. Antar -jemput gratis untuk pantai dan pusat perbelanjaan

Review:
Good hotel 
we got welcome drinks when we checked in the hotel. their staff are friendly and helpful, Giant hypermarket is nearby the hotel, just 5mins walking distance. Carrefour hypermarket is much bigger than Giant, but i personally not recommend Carrefour because quite far from the hotel. Although this hotel locate in Kuta but not really convenience, beside Giant hypermarket, there are ntg else nearby of hotel. We walked to Legian street at night, roughly 30mins walking distance, that is bad idea coz we are so tired to getting there. Breakfast was pretty good with western and bali style selection of food.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel yang bagus 
Kami mendapat minuman selamat datang saat kami check -check di hotel. Staf mereka ramah dan membantu, hypermarket raksasa ada di dekat hotel, hanya 5 menit berjalan kaki. Carrefour Hypermarket jauh lebih besar dari raksasa, tetapi saya pribadi tidak merekomendasikan Carrefour karena cukup jauh dari hotel. Meskipun hotel ini berada di Kuta tetapi tidak terlalu nyaman, selain hypermarket raksasa, ada NTG yang lain di dekat hotel. Kami berjalan ke Legian Street di malam hari, kira -kira 30 menit berjalan kaki, itu ide yang buruk karena kami sangat lelah untuk sampai ke sana. Sarapan cukup baik dengan pilihan makanan gaya Barat dan Bali.

Review:
we stayed here for 3 nights in a sweet at the second floor ... 
everything was nice , they provide us with praying math , thumb up ... 
the service was great .. the welcoming drink was a nice touch .. breakfast was average 
overall ,good value for money

Review: Неплохой отельчик, всё как у всех, но изюминка своя есть. Поселились на первый этаж, выходить можно прямо в бассейн. Ресторан кормит вкусно, автобусик на пляж катает туристов по заказу. На пару тройку дней вполне подойдёт.
Review_English: A good hotel, everything is like everyone else, but your own highlight is. We settled on the first floor, you can go straight to the pool. The restaurant feeds tasty, the bus on the beach rolled tourists by order. For a couple of three days it will fit.
Review_Summary: A good hotel, everything is like everyone else, but your own highlight is. We settled on the first floor, you can go straight to the pool. The restaurant feeds tasty, the bus on the beach rolled tourists by order. For a couple of three days it will fit.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang bagus, semuanya seperti orang lain, tetapi sorotan Anda sendiri. Kami menetap di lantai pertama, Anda bisa langsung ke kolam renang. Restoran ini memberi makan enak, bus di pantai menggulung wisatawan berdasarkan pesanan. Selama beberapa hari itu akan cocok.

Subjeck: It ain't bad for the price
Review: Staff are nice-place is relatively clean-swimming pool is great for families-close to Kuta-rooms are big, beds are comfy, TV are okay-don't be put off by no windows in rooms-keeps the room nice and cool! The bar is open till 11, and shuttle service is great to get about!
Review_English: Staff are nice-place is relatively clean-swimming pool is great for families-close to Kuta-rooms are big, beds are comfy, TV are okay-don't be put off by no windows in rooms-keeps the room nice and cool! The bar is open till 11, and shuttle service is great to get about!
Review_Summary: Staff are nice-place is relatively clean-swimming pool is great for families-close to Kuta-rooms are big, beds are comfy, TV are okay-don't be put off by no windows in rooms-keeps the room nice and cool! The bar is open till 11, and shuttle service is great to get about!
Review_Bahasa: Staf adalah tempat yang bagus adalah kolam renang yang relatif bersih sangat bagus untuk keluarga-close ke kamar-kamar Kuta adalah besar, tempat tidur nyaman, TV baik-baik saja tidak akan ditunda oleh tidak ada jendela di kamar-menjaga kamar yang bagus dan keren! Bar terbuka sampai 11, dan layanan antar -jemput sangat bagus untuk didapat!

Bar terbuka sampai 11, dan layanan antar -jemput sangat bagus untuk didapat!

Review: The staff were happy and friendly, nothing was too much trouble for them. Our rooms were large, spacious. The air worked well in 1 room and not so good in the other. The bathroom was large and plenty of hot water. We had complimentary tea and coffee and water every day.The pools were good, clean, and well maintained. Breakfast was included, and had a very good selection. The hotel runs a shuttle to 3 places about 5 times a day, but you have to taxi back. Its within walking distance to Legian Street, and lots of restaurants and shops. This hotel is set in its own little island of sorts, a gate to get in and lots of shops around it.

Review_Bahasa: Staf senang dan ramah, tidak ada terlalu banyak masalah bagi mereka. Kamar kami besar, luas. Udara bekerja dengan baik di 1 kamar dan tidak begitu bagus di yang lain. Kamar mandi besar dan banyak air panas. Kami memiliki teh gratis dan kopi dan air setiap hari. Kolam renang bagus, bersih, dan terawat dengan baik. Sarapan sudah termasuk, dan memiliki pilihan yang sangat bagus. Hotel ini menjalankan pesawat ulang -alik ke 3 tempat sekitar 5 kali sehari, tetapi Anda harus taksi kembali. Ini dalam jarak berjalan kaki ke Legian Street, dan banyak restoran dan toko. Hotel ini terletak di pulau kecilnya sendiri, gerbang untuk masuk dan banyak toko di sekitarnya.

Review:
Ini adalah hotel bintang 4 yang lumayan murah di daerah Kuta, dan menurut saya sangat cocok untuk liburan keluarga. 

Kamarnya sangat besar, bersih dan terawat rapi. Pelayanan dari staff hotel juga sangat memuaskan. Selain itu, pilihan makanan dan minuman yang beragam untuk sarapan pagi adalah sebuah nilai tambah yang signifikan untuk hotel ini. 

Kolam renang lumayan kecil, tetapi cukup cantik dan sangat cocok untuk bermain bagi anak-anak. 

Kekurangannya adalah lokasinya yang berada agak jauh dari pusat keramaian Kuta dan Legian, jadi untuk mencapai daerah wisata masih harus berkendaraan.
Review_English:
This is a pretty cheap 4 -star hotel in the Kuta area, and in my opinion it is very suitable for family holidays. 

The room is very large, clean and neatly maintained. Services from hotel staff are also very satisfying. In addition, a variety of food and beverage choices for breakfast is a significant added value for this hotel. 

The swimming pool is quite small, but quite beautiful and very suitable for playing for children. 

The drawback is the location which is some distance from the center of Kuta and Legian, so to reach the tourist area still have to drive.
Review_Summary:
This is a pretty cheap 4 -star hotel in the Kuta area, and in my opinion it is very suitable for family holidays. 

The room is very large, clean and neatly maintained. Services from hotel staff are also very satisfying. In addition, a variety of food and beverage choices for breakfast is a significant added value for this hotel. 

The swimming pool is quite small, but quite beautiful and very suitable for playing for children. 

The drawback is the location which is some distance from the center of Kuta and Legian, so to reach the tourist area still have to drive.

Subjeck: Good comfy happy to stay , we will back
Review:
Room was excellent, comfy ,air con we had booked for triple room. 
Nice pool, soft bed, compliment drinks , soap, clean , hair dryer 
Clean room n shower, even prepare for sewing stuff :) 
Breakfast yummy , huge line of Indonesian food, western , fresh fruit 
Staff very helpful 
Location closed to Kuta city not Kuta beach take like 30 min to the beach.

Kolam renang yang bagus, tempat tidur lembut, minuman pujian, sabun, bersih, pengering rambut

Subjeck: This hotel is the best part of Kuta
Review:
We had our doubts when our taxi was approaching the hotel and we realized we were in a shopping mall, and we had doubts again when we were told our room had no window. But we quickly learned that our doubts were unnecessary and the hotel was fabulous. 

We were greeted at the front desk by very friendly staff and were offered a nice welcome drink. Check-in was smooth, and we were escorted to our room to find that it was giant! The room was seriously bigger than our apartment back home. And, though it didn't have any windows, there was a great mural on the wall and the room still felt bright. That night we slept amazingly in the completely dark and well air conditioned room! 

The swimming pool was great, and even featured a very fun swim-up bar (though we did learn the hard way that drinks are prohibitively expensive). 

Breakfast was delicious, and was probably the best that we had on our entire trip to Bali. 

Honestly, Kuta itself seemed like a really trashy part of the island, and we didn't enjoy being out around town. Luckily, this hotel is an amazing sanctuary of great rooms and great service.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami memiliki keraguan ketika taksi kami mendekati hotel dan kami menyadari bahwa kami berada di pusat perbelanjaan, dan kami memiliki keraguan lagi ketika kami diberitahu kamar kami tidak memiliki jendela. Tetapi kami dengan cepat mengetahui bahwa keraguan kami tidak perlu dan hotel itu luar biasa. 

Kami disambut di meja depan oleh staf yang sangat ramah dan ditawari minuman selamat datang yang bagus. Check-in halus, dan kami dikawal ke kamar kami untuk menemukan bahwa itu raksasa! Ruangan itu sangat besar dari apartemen kami di rumah. Dan, meskipun tidak memiliki jendela, ada mural besar di dinding dan ruangan itu masih terasa cerah. Malam itu kami tidur dengan luar biasa di kamar yang benar -benar gelap dan ber -AC! 

Kolam renang sangat bagus, dan bahkan menampilkan bar renang yang sangat menyenangkan (meskipun kami memang belajar dengan cara yang sulit bahwa minuman itu sangat mahal). 

Sarapan lezat, dan mungkin yang terbaik yang kami miliki di seluruh perjalanan kami ke Bali. 

Sejujurnya, Kuta sendiri tampak seperti bagian pulau yang sangat sampah, dan kami tidak menikmati berada di sekitar kota. Untungnya, hotel ini adalah tempat perlindungan yang luar biasa dari kamar -kamar hebat dan pelayanan yang hebat.

Review:
Budget room with own bathroom. 
It was a standard room but be warned they have no windows or balcony. We we're fine with that since we didn't plan to spend much time in the room. That being said it was obviously always very dark in the room and that seemed to make it somewhat damp too. The wall painting behind the bed was covered in damp marks and the room did smell a small bit. Again not an issue the room was modern, clean and a comfortable place to sleep. 

Breakfast 
Was adequate, again this is a budget hotel so for the price you can't complain. It is a buffet style breakfast with mainly Indonesian food on offer but there is also a pancake stand and a chef that will make you any style egg you would like. 

Avoid the coffee and tea it just tastes weird. 

Pool 
Looks nice but we never went for a swim. 

Location 
About a 30min walk to central Kuta which is far in the heat. However there is a shuttle that runs a couple of times a day that will drop you in kuta or legian beach. If I was to go to kuta again I probably wouldn't stay here because of the location but the hotel was good for the price.

Review_Bahasa:
Kamar anggaran dengan kamar mandi sendiri. 
Itu adalah kamar standar tetapi diperingatkan bahwa mereka tidak memiliki jendela atau balkon. Kami baik -baik saja dengan itu karena kami tidak berencana untuk menghabiskan banyak waktu di kamar. Karena itu jelas selalu sangat gelap di ruangan itu dan itu tampaknya membuatnya agak lembab juga. Lukisan dinding di belakang tempat tidur ditutupi bekas lembab dan ruangan itu sedikit berbau. Sekali lagi bukan masalah ruangan itu modern, bersih dan tempat tidur yang nyaman. 

Sarapan 
Memadai, sekali lagi ini adalah hotel anggaran jadi untuk harga yang tidak dapat Anda keluhkan. Ini adalah sarapan gaya prasmanan dengan makanan Indonesia yang ditawarkan tetapi ada juga dudukan pancake dan koki yang akan membuat Anda telur gaya apa pun yang Anda inginkan. 

Hindari kopi dan teh rasanya aneh. 

Kolam 
Terlihat bagus tapi kami tidak pernah berenang. 

Lokasi 
Sekitar 30 menit berjalan kaki ke Kuta tengah yang jauh dari panas. Namun ada pesawat ulang -alik yang berjalan beberapa kali sehari yang akan membuat Anda berada di Kuta atau Legian Beach. Jika saya pergi ke Kuta lagi, saya mungkin tidak akan tinggal di sini karena lokasinya tetapi hotelnya bagus untuk harganya.

Review: デラックスルームだったので広く清潔な部屋とバスタブ付きの浴室、浴室内にロープがあり洗濯も干せました。プールも素晴らしくレストランも利用しやすく美味しかったです。朝食メニューも豊富で快適な滞在でした。周辺整備がまだ途上の感じでセントラルパークの敷地内に工事中の建物もありましたがスーパーやホームセンターなども近接しており便利でした。スタッフの応対も良く気持ちよく滞在出来ます。難点は海まで遠いので足（車・バイク）の確保は必須です
Review_English: It was a deluxe room, so it was spacious and clean, a bathroom with a bathtub, and there was a rope in the bathroom so I could dry my laundry. The pool was great and the restaurant was easy to use and delicious. The breakfast menu was extensive and it was a comfortable stay. It seemed like the area was still under construction, and there were buildings under construction on the Central Park site, but supermarkets and home improvement stores were nearby, making it convenient. The staff is very friendly and comfortable to stay. The downside is that it's far from the sea, so it's essential to secure your own foot (cars and motorcycles).
Review_Summary: It was a deluxe room, so it was spacious and clean, a bathroom with a bathtub, and there was a rope in the bathroom so I could dry my laundry. The pool was great and the restaurant was easy to use and delicious. The breakfast menu was extensive and it was a comfortable stay. It seemed like the area was still under construction, and there were buildings under construction on the Central Park site, but supermarkets and home improvement stores were nearby, making it convenient. The staff is very friendly and comfortable to stay. The downside is that it's far from the sea, so it's essential to secure your own foot (cars and motorcycles).
Review_Bahasa: Itu adalah kamar mewah, jadi luas dan bersih, kamar mandi dengan bathtub, dan ada tali di kamar mandi sehingga saya bisa mengeringkan cucian saya. Kolam renang sangat bagus dan restorannya mudah digunakan dan lezat. Menu sarapan sangat luas dan itu adalah masa menginap yang nyaman. Sepertinya daerah itu masih dalam pembangunan, dan ada bangunan yang sedang dibangun di situs Central Park, tetapi supermarket dan toko perbaikan rumah ada di dekatnya, membuatnya nyaman. Staf sangat ramah dan nyaman untuk tinggal. Kelemahannya adalah jauh dari laut, jadi penting untuk mengamankan kaki Anda sendiri (mobil dan sepeda motor).

Subjeck: Not sure how I feel about this place
Review: The start of my 2 week stay at this hotel was great, service is great! Everything is going great! Then my aircon started leaking, mould and water dripping from the aircon unit, felt very dirty, they then moved us to a new room, we got into this room, it smelt mouldy, the bathroom smelt like Sewage, the bar fridge has a musky smell that made me and 3 friends dry reach, the bed Is making us all feel very itchy, have all been attacked by mosquitoes, not one person can sleep, it's just a very bad experience and I will never return or reccoomened this hotel,

Review:
Saya menginap bersama suami dan anak (5th) pada Nov 2013. Yang menjadi pertimbangan kami al: ada kolam renang untuk anak, play ground walaupun kecil tapi lumayan bersih, ukuran kamar yang lumayan luas dan yang paling penting bed size ukuran King! Ini jarang kami dptkan di hotel bujet. 
Walaupun lokasi-nya tidak dekat pantai tapi mudah ditemukan. Hanya parkiran mobil agak susah jika pulang kemalaman. 
Jika malam hari banyak banyak pilihan makanan mulai dari nasi pedas, chinese food sampai warung tenda hanya dg berjalan kaki. Juga ada mini market yang buka 24 jam.
Review_English:
I stayed with my husband and children (5th) in Nov 2013. What is our consideration: there is a swimming pool for children, play ground though small but quite clean, a fairly spacious room size and most importantly bed size King size! This we rarely get at a budget hotel. 
Although the location is not near the beach but easy to find. Only the car park is rather difficult if you go home late. 
At night there are many food choices ranging from spicy rice, Chinese food to tent stalls only on foot. There is also a mini market that is open 24 hours.

At night there are many food choices ranging from spicy rice, Chinese food to tent stalls only on foot. There is also a mini market that is open 24 hours.

Review: dari beberapa hotel bintang 4 yang pernah saya kunjungi, Kuta Central Park mungkin menjadi hotel bintang 4 yang termurah. apa mungkin saya memesannya 4 bulan sebelumnya? bisa jadi. Secara keseluruhan hotel ini standart sama dengan hotel hotel yang lain. tidak terlalu memuaskan dan tidak terlalu mengecewakan. hotel nya bersih, lumayan jauh dari pantai (kalo jalan kaki) tapi ada shuttle dari hotel jadi ga begitu masalah.
Review_English: From several 4 -star hotels that I have visited, Kuta Central Park might be the cheapest 4 star hotel. Is it possible I ordered it 4 months before? it could be. Overall this hotel is standardized as other hotels. not too satisfying and not too disappointing. The hotel is clean, quite far from the beach (if walking) but there is a shuttle from the hotel so it's not so a problem.

Overall this hotel is standardized as other hotels. not too satisfying and not too disappointing. The hotel is clean, quite far from the beach (if walking) but there is a shuttle from the hotel so it's not so a problem.

Subjeck: harga yg murah tapi kualitas ga murahan
Review: saya menginap di hotel ini 2 malam,saya melakukan early cek in dan diterima cek in tetapi dengan menunggu 30 menit karena kamar yg saya tempati sedang dipersiapkan. Kamar standar yg saya dapat sangat luas untuk ukuran hotel yg pernah saya singgahi. Cuma sayang kamar saya berada disudut jd tidak ada pemandangan keluar. untuk breakfast nya cukup baik n kebersihan kamar juga cukup baik.
Review_English: I stayed at this hotel 2 nights, I did Early Check In and received in checking but by waiting 30 minutes because the room I was occupying was being prepared. The standard room that I got is very spacious for the size of the hotel I have ever visited. It's just a shame my room is in the corner so there is no view out. For the breakfast, it is quite good and the cleanliness of the room is also quite good.

Review: We stayed for about 6 days and loved it here. Big clean room and bed. Balcony. Pool was nice and staff were lovely and helpful. Breakfast had alot of selection. Only comments was the air conditioning was not very strong, but adequate. Overall a great place to stay.

Review:
Stayed here for a week during February 2014. Warm welcome with friendly staff. Hotel is getting on in years but overall was very clean. Bed was extremely comfy and with the air conditioning, it was a good sleep with no noise outside the room. Breakfast was included for us and while we are not used to rice etc. for breakfast, it didn't take long to get used too. Our room opened directly onto the pool which was great. 

Now, as for the staff... I have never had the privilege of having such beautifully friendly people in my years of travelling. There was nothing that was out of the way for them, and you only had to ask once for anything and it was done with outstanding speed. The staff are outgoing and happy all the time. I wish we had that type of person in Australia.... 

Highly recommend this establishment for service and price..

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di sini selama seminggu selama Februari 2014. Selamat datang dengan staf yang ramah. Hotel mulai bertahun -tahun tetapi secara keseluruhan sangat bersih. Tempat tidur sangat nyaman dan dengan AC, tidur nyenyak tanpa suara di luar ruangan. Sarapan sudah termasuk untuk kami dan sementara kami tidak terbiasa dengan nasi dll. Untuk sarapan, tidak butuh waktu lama untuk digunakan juga. Kamar kami terbuka langsung ke kolam yang bagus. 

Sekarang, untuk staf ... Saya tidak pernah memiliki hak istimewa untuk memiliki orang -orang yang sangat ramah selama bertahun -tahun bepergian. Tidak ada yang keluar dari jalan bagi mereka, dan Anda hanya perlu meminta apa pun untuk apa pun dan itu dilakukan dengan kecepatan luar biasa. Staf keluar dan senang sepanjang waktu. Saya berharap kami memiliki orang seperti itu di Australia .... 

Sangat merekomendasikan pendirian ini untuk layanan dan harga ..

Review:

- the room was spacious with nice amenities, comfort bed and nice pool view (we stayed on family room with 2 king bed) 
- fast check in check out 
- the staff were well welcoming and very friendly 
- very good rate for family room. 

Point minus :

Review: 房间很大，床也有1米8，睡得比较舒服，隔音效果也不错，有免费穿梭巴士到旅游区，不错喔，酒店有游泳池免费使用，工作人員比较热情。
Review_English: The room is large, the bed is 1.8 meters, it sleeps comfortably, the sound insulation is good, there is a free shuttle bus to the tourist area, which is good, the hotel has a swimming pool for free, and the staff are more enthusiastic.
Review_Summary: The room is large, the bed is 1.8 meters, it sleeps comfortably, the sound insulation is good, there is a free shuttle bus to the tourist area, which is good, the hotel has a swimming pool for free, and the staff are more enthusiastic.

Subjeck: lebih dari 100 hotel sy singgahi, dan ini hotel bintang 4 terparah yang pernah saya tahu.
Review: pool yg kurang nyaman, fasilitas room yang tdk selayaknya hotel bintang 4. towel yg sudah kurang layak. bbrp fasiltas standar baru di kasih jika di minta, seperti sandal dll, cukup mengecewakan. corridor yang kurang berkelas untuk standar bintang 4. parahnya lagi, banyak regulasi denda yg di terapkan & ketidak profesionalan staf karena memberikan info simpang siur (misal : receptionnya bilang fasilitas jaccusi & sauna dah include alias free ternyata di charge lagi), benar2 hotel ini tdak ada nilai plus nya sama sekali. takut kembali lagi ke hotel ini. walaupun di kasih voucher gratis.
Review_English: Pool that is uncomfortable, room facilities that are not like 4 star hotels. Towel that is already inadequate. some new standard facilities are given if asked, such as sandals, etc., quite disappointing. Corridor is less classy for 4 -star standard. Worse, many regulations are applied fines & staff unfavorable because they provide information on confusion (for example: reception says jaccusi & sauna facilities have included alias free. Afraid to return to this hotel. Although given a free voucher.

Takut untuk kembali ke hotel ini. Meskipun diberi voucher gratis.

Beberapa fasilitas standar baru diberikan jika diminta, seperti sandal, dll., Cukup mengecewakan. Koridor kurang berkelas untuk standar 4 -bintang. Lebih buruk lagi, banyak peraturan yang diterapkan denda  staf tidak menguntungkan karena mereka memberikan informasi tentang kebingungan misalnya penerimaan mengatakan fasilitas Jaccusi  Sauna termasuk Alias Free. Takut untuk kembali ke hotel ini. Meskipun diberi voucher gratis.

Review: The hotel is not near the beach, but is central to most major points in Bali. For the price, it's very affordable, and yet provides the basic functions most travellers would require: clean rooms, courteous staff, adequate breakfast, wifi, swimming pool, etc. There are shuttle buses that would take you to Kuta Shopping areas, and Seminyak beach, which is far better than the tired Kuta Beach. It is walking distance to the start of the Jalan Legian main street, and about 20 minutes walk to the nightclubs.

It is walking distance to the start of the Jalan Legian main street, and about 20 minutes walk to the nightclubs.

It is walking distance to the start of the Jalan Legian main street, and about 20 minutes walk to the nightclubs.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini tidak berada di dekat pantai, tetapi merupakan pusat dari sebagian besar poin utama di Bali. Untuk harganya, sangat terjangkau, namun memberikan fungsi dasar yang dibutuhkan sebagian besar pelancong: kamar bersih, staf yang sopan, sarapan yang memadai, wifi, kolam renang, dll. Ada bus antar -jemput yang akan membawa Anda ke area perbelanjaan Kuta, dan Pantai Seminyak, yang jauh lebih baik daripada pantai Kuta yang lelah. Berjalan kaki ke awal Jalan Jalan Main Street, dan sekitar 20 menit berjalan kaki ke klub malam.

Berjalan kaki ke awal Jalan Jalan Main Street, dan sekitar 20 menit berjalan kaki ke klub malam.

Review: There is nothing special about this hotel other than its nice pool. If you get it at a good price, go for it. It does has large room and pretty fast wifi connection. There's just nothing special about it.
Review_English: There is nothing special about this hotel other than its nice pool. If you get it at a good price, go for it. It does has large room and pretty fast wifi connection. There's just nothing special about it.

Review_Bahasa: Tidak ada yang istimewa tentang hotel ini selain kolam renang yang bagus. Jika Anda mendapatkannya dengan harga yang bagus, lakukanlah. Itu memang memiliki ruang besar dan koneksi wifi yang cukup cepat. Tidak ada yang istimewa tentang itu.

Untuk harga itu, kami menyukainya (kami mendapatkan voucher dari disdus.com untuk @200.000/nite), wifi good, rata -rata sarapan, ada biaya tambahan untuk anak -anak

Subjeck: Two thumbs up for the hospitality
Review:
First of all, we do felt uneasy finding that the Hotel located at Ruko (Rumah Toko), but in contrary, after we were entering Kuta Central Park, the one of Bali Central Business District, we can never forget, that we are admired by this Hotel....Two thumbs Up, especially for the hospitality 

We were there as a part of Karma Royal Bali invitation, so, this is the amazing adventure hotel we felt. The room was spacious for both of us (we stayed at the deluxe room type), clean, and comfort.. Also, the pool was well maintenance. 

Meal, especially, fried rice is tasty, also they have several menus for fulfill your breadbasket at breakfast time. Pastry is serve well, and you can have your "own type" omelette. I do like the hot and spicy ones, and when I asked the egg corner responsible, he felt happy to gave me that! 

As it is located at Kuta Central Park, you can enjoy several restaurants nearby while you stay at the Hotel, so, you can access several amusement point in minutes. The Hotel staff will assist you when you want to rent a bike or car for your daily or city tour, and the rate was as same as the usual price that gave by the bike and car rental at Bali. 

Last, we do bought some hotel merchandise because we are fond of "Purple" (the hotel well decorated with the purple colour!), The merchandise is crafted carefully and had a good looks, We do appreciate the directions that gave by the staff, especially from the front office staff which made our Bali Exploration more easier, thanks guys, keep up the good service!

First of all, we do felt uneasy finding that the Hotel located at Ruko (Rumah Toko), but in contrary, after we were entering Kuta Central Park, the one of Bali Central Business District, we can never forget, that we are admired by this Hotel....Two thumbs Up, especially for the hospitality 

We were there as a part of Karma Royal Bali invitation, so, this is the amazing adventure hotel we felt. The room was spacious for both of us (we stayed at the deluxe room type), clean, and comfort.. Also, the pool was well maintenance.

Review_Summary: Two thumbs Up, especially for the hospitality. The room was spacious for both of us (we stayed at the deluxe room type), clean, and comfort. Also, the pool was well maintenance. As it is located at Kuta Central Park, you can enjoy several restaurants nearby.
Review_Bahasa:
Pertama -tama, kami merasa tidak nyaman menemukan bahwa hotel yang berlokasi di Ruko (RUMAH TOKO), tetapi sebaliknya, setelah kami memasuki Kuta Central Park, salah satu dari Distrik Bisnis Pusat Bali, kami tidak akan pernah lupa, bahwa kami dikagumi oleh hotel ini .... dua jempol, terutama untuk keramahan keramahtamahannya 

Kami berada di sana sebagai bagian dari undangan Karma Royal Bali, jadi, ini adalah hotel petualangan yang luar biasa yang kami rasakan. Ruangan itu luas untuk kami berdua (kami tinggal di tipe kamar mewah), bersih, dan nyaman .. juga, kolam renang itu perawatan yang baik. 

Makanan, terutama, nasi goreng enak, juga mereka memiliki beberapa menu untuk memenuhi keranjang roti Anda saat sarapan. Pastry disajikan dengan baik, dan Anda dapat memiliki telur dadar "tipe sendiri". Saya suka yang panas dan pedas, dan ketika saya bertanya kepada sudut telur yang bertanggung jawab, dia merasa senang memberi saya itu! 

Karena terletak di Kuta Central Park, Anda dapat menikmati beberapa restoran di dekatnya saat Anda tinggal di hotel, jadi, Anda dapat mengakses beberapa titik hiburan dalam hitungan menit. Staf hotel akan membantu Anda ketika Anda ingin menyewa sepeda atau mobil untuk tur harian atau kota Anda, dan tarifnya sama dengan harga biasa yang diberikan oleh sepeda dan penyewaan mobil di Bali. 

Terakhir, kami membeli beberapa barang dagangan hotel karena kami menyukai "ungu" (hotel yang dihiasi dengan baik dengan warna ungu!), Barang dagangan dibuat dengan hati -hati dan memiliki penampilan yang baik, kami menghargai arah yang diberikan oleh staf, terutama dari staf kantor depan yang membuat eksplorasi Bali kami lebih mudah, terima kasih, pertahankan layanan yang baik!

Review: Abbiamo scelto questo hotel per i primi giorni di un soggiorno abbastanza lungo a Bali. La vicinanza all'aeroporto e la posizione centrale a Kuta risultano ideali. Struttura molto valida e moderna. Camere ampie e ottima colazione a buffet.
Review_English: We chose this hotel for the first days of a fairly long stay in Bali. The proximity to the airport and the central position in Kuta are ideal. Very valid and modern structure. Large rooms and excellent buffet breakfast.
Review_Summary: We chose this hotel for the first days of a fairly long stay in Bali. The proximity to the airport and the central position in Kuta are ideal. Very valid and modern structure. Large rooms and excellent buffet breakfast.
Review_Bahasa: Kami memilih hotel ini untuk hari -hari pertama masa menginap yang cukup lama di Bali. Kedekatan dengan bandara dan posisi sentral di Kuta sangat ideal. Struktur yang sangat valid dan modern. Kamar besar dan sarapan prasmanan yang sangat baik.
Review_Clean: Kami memilih hotel ini untuk hari -hari pertama masa menginap yang cukup lama di Bali. Kedekatan dengan bandara dan posisi sentral di Kuta sangat ideal. Struktur yang sangat valid dan modern. Kamar besar dan sarapan prasmanan yang sangat baik.

Subjeck: โรงแรมดีและเป็นกันเอง
Review:
ผมสนุกและรู้สึกดีมากกับโรงแรมนี้ ในราคาที่ไม่สูง ห้องสะอาดกว้างขวาง พนักงานในโรงแรมยิ้มแย้ม อัธยาศัยดีมาก ให้การบริการที่ดีมาก เสียอย่างเดียวอาหารเช้าค่อนข้างไม่หลากหลาย 

ประทับใจครับโดยรวม และคิดว่าครั้งหน้าจะกลับไปอีกและใช้บริการดรงแรมเดิม เพราะง่ายและสะดวกต่อการเดินชมรอบเมืองและเดินทางไปยังสถานที่ต่างๆ
Review_English:
I was fun and felt very good with this hotel. At a price that is not high The room is clean and spacious. The staff in the hotel smile. Very hospitable Providing very good service The only disadvantage is quite a variety of breakfast. 

Impressed by overall And think that the next time will go back and use the same hotel Because it's easy and easy to walk around the city and travel to various locations
Review_Summary:
I was fun and felt very good with this hotel. At a price that is not high The room is clean and spacious. The staff in the hotel smile. Very hospitable Providing very good service The only disadvantage is quite a variety of breakfast. 

Impressed by overall And think that the next time will go back and use the same hotel Because it's easy and easy to walk around the city and travel to various locations
Review_Bahasa:
Saya menyenangkan dan merasa sangat baik dengan hotel ini. Dengan harga yang tidak tinggi ruangannya bersih dan luas. Staf di hotel tersenyum. Sangat ramah memberikan layanan yang sangat baik satu -satunya kerugian adalah berbagai macam sarapan. 

Terkesan secara keseluruhan dan berpikir bahwa waktu berikutnya akan kembali dan menggunakan hotel yang sama karena mudah dan mudah berjalan di sekitar kota dan bepergian ke berbagai lokasi
Review_Clean:

Terkesan secara keseluruhan dan berpikir bahwa waktu berikutnya akan kembali dan menggunakan hotel yang sama karena mudah dan mudah berjalan di sekitar kota dan bepergian ke berbagai lokasi

Review:
The location of the hotel is not far from town side. For muslim, there is a halal stall nearby at the back of the hotel. Just beside Giant supermarket. The hotel also provide free transport to Discovery mall, Kuta beach and Legian beach however, you need to book and inform them advance of 1 hr. 

Breakfast is so so. 

On the last day, someone from the hotel will call and ask if you need help with your luggage but at 11.30am, house keeping will knock down your hotel room and ask if you want to check out early. Maybe it was fall on sat and rooms are limited. 

Distance to Legian is not that far in fact, the hotel is in between Legian and Seminyak and I once, tried to walked to Legian however, I could not finish the route as from Legian to Kuta beach is really quite a distance. 

Overall, this hotel is good.

Review_Bahasa:
Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari sisi kota. Untuk Muslim, ada sebuah kios halal di dekatnya di belakang hotel. Tepat di samping supermarket raksasa. Hotel ini juga menyediakan transportasi gratis ke Discovery Mall, Kuta Beach dan Legian Beach, Anda perlu memesan dan memberi tahu mereka kemajuan 1 jam. 

Sarapan begitu. 

Pada hari terakhir, seseorang dari hotel akan menelepon dan bertanya apakah Anda memerlukan bantuan dengan barang bawaan Anda tetapi pada pukul 11.30 pagi, menjaga rumah akan merobohkan kamar hotel Anda dan bertanya apakah Anda ingin check out lebih awal. Mungkin jatuh pada SAT dan kamar terbatas. 

Jarak ke Legian tidak sejauh itu, hotel ini berada di antara Legian dan Seminyak dan saya pernah, mencoba berjalan ke Legian, namun, saya tidak bisa menyelesaikan rute karena dari Legian ke Pantai Kuta benar -benar jauh. 

Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini bagus.

Review: Ну как-то рука не поднимается написать плохо, т.к. мы заплатили всего 50 долларов за 2 дня (с завтраком). Что можно ожидать за такую цену? Комната небольшая, в ней совершенно крошечное окно, и оно заклеено пленкой, и в комнате всегда темно. Электрический свет очень слабый, поэтому всегда полутьма. Заказали в номер ужин, т.к. после перелета сил не было никуда идти - отвратительная еда! Завтрак нормальный.
Review_English: Well, somehow the hand does not rise poorly, because We paid only $ 50 for 2 days (with breakfast). What can be expected for such a price? The room is small, it has a completely tiny window, and it is sealed with a film, and the room is always dark. Electric light is very weak, so always half a half. We ordered dinner in the room, because After the flight of strength, there was no time to go anywhere - disgusting food! Breakfast is normal.
Review_Summary: Well, somehow the hand does not rise poorly, because We paid only $ 50 for 2 days (with breakfast). What can be expected for such a price? The room is small, it has a completely tiny window, and it is sealed with a film, and the room is always dark. Electric light is very weak, so always half a half. We ordered dinner in the room, because After the flight of strength, there was no time to go anywhere - disgusting food! Breakfast is normal.
Review_Bahasa: Nah, entah bagaimana tangan tidak naik dengan buruk, karena kami hanya membayar $ 50 selama 2 hari (dengan sarapan). Apa yang bisa diharapkan dengan harga seperti itu? Ruangan itu kecil, memiliki jendela yang benar -benar kecil, dan disegel dengan film, dan ruangan itu selalu gelap. Lampu listrik sangat lemah, jadi selalu setengah setengah. Kami memesan makan malam di kamar, karena setelah penerbangan kekuatan, tidak ada waktu untuk pergi ke mana pun - makanan yang menjijikkan! Sarapan itu normal.
Review_Clean: Nah, entah bagaimana tangan tidak naik dengan buruk, karena kami hanya membayar  50 selama 2 hari dengan sarapan. Apa yang bisa diharapkan dengan harga seperti itu? Ruangan itu kecil, memiliki jendela yang benar -benar kecil, dan disegel dengan film, dan ruangan itu selalu gelap. Lampu listrik sangat lemah, jadi selalu setengah setengah. Kami memesan makan malam di kamar, karena setelah penerbangan kekuatan, tidak ada waktu untuk pergi ke mana pun - makanan yang menjijikkan! Sarapan itu normal.

Review: The hotel is ok, breakfast was good and tasty. The room was big, beds were nice. The internet speed very low, they using one internet for the whole hotel, not for each room. The towels was small and had some smell, and it was grey couloir by the way. The TV Channels was not clear, can not make the volume up. For three people was one bottle of little shampoo. Toilet shower was no door, water was everywhere, it made foot towel wet.

Toilet shower was no door, water was everywhere, it made foot towel wet.

Toilet shower was no door, water was everywhere, it made foot towel wet.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini baik -baik saja, sarapan enak dan enak. Ruangan itu besar, tempat tidurnya bagus. Kecepatan internet sangat rendah, mereka menggunakan satu internet untuk seluruh hotel, bukan untuk setiap kamar. Handuknya kecil dan bau, dan itu adalah couloir abu -abu. Saluran TV tidak jelas, tidak dapat membuat volume naik. Bagi tiga orang adalah satu botol sampo kecil. Toilet shower tidak ada pintu, air ada di mana -mana, itu membuat handuk kaki basah.

Review: Fun, economical place to stay. Deluxe room was nice and enjoyed sitting on the terrace. Had a great foot massage and back rub in the spa. No shopping area within walking distance but reasonable cost by taxi to Beach Walk area. ( shops, mini spas and restaurants) Beach itself was dirty and disappointing.
Review_English: Fun, economical place to stay. Deluxe room was nice and enjoyed sitting on the terrace. Had a great foot massage and back rub in the spa. No shopping area within walking distance but reasonable cost by taxi to Beach Walk area. ( shops, mini spas and restaurants) Beach itself was dirty and disappointing.

No shopping area within walking distance but reasonable cost by taxi to Beach Walk area. ( shops, mini spas and restaurants) Beach itself was dirty and disappointing.
Review_Bahasa: Tempat yang menyenangkan dan ekonomis untuk menginap. Kamar mewah bagus dan menikmati duduk di teras. Memiliki pijatan kaki yang bagus dan gosok punggung di spa. Tidak ada area perbelanjaan dalam jarak berjalan kaki tetapi biaya yang wajar dengan taksi ke area berjalan pantai. (Toko, Spa Mini, dan Restoran) Pantai itu sendiri kotor dan mengecewakan.

Tidak ada area perbelanjaan dalam jarak berjalan kaki tetapi biaya yang wajar dengan taksi ke area berjalan pantai. Toko, Spa Mini, dan Restoran Pantai itu sendiri kotor dan mengecewakan.

Review:
I recently stayed here for 10 nights with my girlfriend and was pleasantly surprised, for a fairly cheap hotel we didn't expect too much but it was great! (booked on AGODA in advance). On arrival we were given a welcome drink, and then upgraded to a bigger room (from superior to studio). As a lot of people have put on here the hotel is located in a industrial type area (More an old shopping complex that was used for a while then left) and is away from Kuta beach but I came to cherish this as there wasn't hordes of people trying to sell you things from the moment we walked out the door. They also run a shuttle service to Discovery and Beachwalk malls as well as Legian beach every 2 hours (10,12,2,4,6) so getting to the beach is no hassle and a taxi never cost us more than 30,000rp (approx. $3 aud) 

The room itself was great, clean, very spacious, foxtel on the tv (some channels were a bit fuzzy but there were still plenty of good ones) and a massive bathroom. The pool was also good, perhaps could be a bit bigger. The restaurant was okay, somewhat expensive compared to Bali average however. The included breakfast buffet every morning was decent, some of the dishes were quite odd and after 10 days of the same selection it got a bit boring but was convenient. 

However the best part about the hotel for us was the staff, they were all so friendly and helpful. In particular those who were at the entrance of the hotel who organise the shuttles etc., unfortunately I cant remember their names (sorry guys) but they were always super friendly and fun to have a chat with we were heading out or coming home. Also a special thanks to Rika who is behind the lobby desk, coming into Bali we were worried about how we would book our day tours but thanks to Rika it was a breeze, she booked multiple activities for us over our stay and we could not be more thankful.

The restaurant was okay, somewhat expensive compared to Bali average however.
Review_Bahasa:
Baru -baru ini saya tinggal di sini selama 10 malam dengan pacar saya dan terkejut, untuk hotel yang cukup murah yang tidak terlalu kami harapkan tetapi itu bagus! (dipesan di Agoda terlebih dahulu). Pada saat kedatangan kami diberi minuman selamat datang, dan kemudian ditingkatkan ke ruangan yang lebih besar (dari superior ke studio). Seperti yang diletakkan banyak orang di sini, hotel ini terletak di area jenis industri (lebih banyak kompleks perbelanjaan tua yang digunakan untuk sementara waktu kemudian ke kiri) dan jauh dari pantai Kuta tetapi saya datang untuk menghargai ini karena tidak ada gerombolan orang yang mencoba menjual barang -barang Anda dari saat kami berjalan keluar pintu. Mereka juga menjalankan layanan antar -jemput ke Discovery dan Beachwalk Malls serta Legian Beach setiap 2 jam (10,12,2,4,6) sehingga sampai ke pantai tidak ada kerumitan dan taksi tidak pernah menelan biaya lebih dari 30.000rp (sekitar $ 3 AUD) 

Ruangan itu sendiri hebat, bersih, sangat luas, Foxtel di TV (beberapa saluran agak kabur tetapi masih ada banyak yang bagus) dan kamar mandi besar. Kolam renang juga bagus, mungkin bisa sedikit lebih besar. Restorannya baik -baik saja, agak mahal dibandingkan dengan rata -rata Bali. Sarapan prasmanan yang disertakan setiap pagi itu layak, beberapa hidangan cukup aneh dan setelah 10 hari pilihan yang sama itu menjadi agak membosankan tetapi nyaman. 

Namun bagian terbaik tentang hotel bagi kami adalah staf, mereka semua sangat ramah dan membantu. Khususnya mereka yang berada di pintu masuk hotel yang mengatur angkutan dll., Sayangnya saya tidak dapat mengingat nama mereka (maaf teman -teman) tetapi mereka selalu sangat ramah dan menyenangkan untuk mengobrol dengan kami sedang menuju keluar atau pulang. Juga terima kasih khusus kepada Rika yang ada di belakang meja lobi, datang ke Bali, kami khawatir tentang bagaimana kami akan memesan tur harian kami tetapi terima kasih kepada Rika itu sangat mudah, ia memesan banyak kegiatan untuk kami selama kami tinggal dan kami tidak bisa lebih bersyukur.

Review: My fiancé and I stayed in a deluxe room for two weeks. On the first night it rained heavily and our room's windows started leaking. We asked for a solution and they promptly changed us to a different room of the same type, on the same day. The room was great, although the AC was not very good and even though we had TWO!! ACs blasting out at 17 C, we were still a bit too warm on the hottest days. Despite this, I loved the room: the bed was so comfortable and big, better than my bed at home! The bathroom was clean and the complimentary water replaced daily was a fantastic touch. The swimming pool was beautiful and when the filter broke down, they fixed it within a day. The location is a bit removed from the most popular areas but there are five free shuttle buses a day (you may need to book a place for some of the most popular times). The taxi from town to the hotel shouldn't be over 25,000 rupiah. The breakfast was delicious, with crêpes, pancakes, french toast, and eggs cooked in front of you. You can also order many types of coffee and two of cereal. The pool bar is great and the mixologist clearly knows what he is doing and is passionate about it. All of the staff in general were extremely helpful and very, very nice. Our needs were always handled straight away and we don't have a single complaint. Overall, I had a fantastic time and I definitely want to go back in the future.

The location is a bit removed from the most popular areas but there are five free shuttle buses a day. The breakfast was delicious, with crêpes, pancakes, french toast, and eggs cooked in front of you.
Review_Bahasa: Tunangan saya dan saya tinggal di ruang mewah selama dua minggu. Pada malam pertama hujan turun deras dan jendela kamar kami mulai bocor. Kami meminta solusi dan mereka segera mengubah kami ke kamar yang berbeda dari jenis yang sama, pada hari yang sama. Ruangan itu bagus, meskipun AC tidak terlalu bagus dan meskipun kami memiliki dua !! ACS meledak di 17 C, kami masih agak terlalu hangat di hari -hari terpanas. Meskipun demikian, saya menyukai kamar: tempat tidurnya sangat nyaman dan besar, lebih baik dari tempat tidur saya di rumah! Kamar mandi bersih dan air gratis diganti setiap hari adalah sentuhan yang fantastis. Kolam renang itu indah dan ketika filter rusak, mereka memperbaikinya dalam sehari. Lokasi sedikit dihapus dari area paling populer tetapi ada lima bus antar -jemput gratis sehari (Anda mungkin perlu memesan tempat untuk beberapa waktu yang paling populer). Taksi dari kota ke hotel seharusnya tidak lebih dari 25.000 rupiah. Sarapannya lezat, dengan crêpes, pancake, roti panggang Prancis, dan telur yang dimasak di depan Anda. Anda juga dapat memesan banyak jenis kopi dan dua sereal. Bar biliar hebat dan ahli mixologi jelas tahu apa yang dia lakukan dan bersemangat tentang hal itu. Semua staf pada umumnya sangat membantu dan sangat, sangat baik. Kebutuhan kami selalu ditangani langsung dan kami tidak memiliki satu keluhan. Secara keseluruhan, saya memiliki waktu yang fantastis dan saya pasti ingin kembali di masa depan.

Subjeck: Modern looking hotel in what looks like an abandoned plaza
Review:
This hotel alone is a modern looking hotel with nice color schemes - lots of rooms and looks like it was once very popular. But the surrounding store have been abandoned and the plaza looks completely empty. We only stayed here for one night. They have shuttles going to kuta ONE way and does not provide shuttle back. But we still went into town because there was not much to do at the hotel. We did not use their pool- but there were others using it. Our room was pretty basic and had all the amenities as a city hotel would have. What i did not like was that our room had lots of mosquitoes- we killed 3 and I still got bitten twice during my sleep. 
I don't think anyone came into our room before we checked in to make sure it was ready...because they would've noticed the bug problem. Take note that this hotel is not close to Kuta Beach but more inland and central. We got a good deal on here, that is why we booked this place. For the price we got it for it was kinda expected.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini sendiri adalah hotel yang tampak modern dengan skema warna yang bagus - banyak kamar dan sepertinya pernah sangat populer. Tapi toko di sekitarnya telah ditinggalkan dan plaza terlihat benar -benar kosong. Kami hanya tinggal di sini selama satu malam. Mereka memiliki angkutan pergi ke Kuta satu arah dan tidak memberikan pesawat ulang -alik kembali. Tapi kami masih pergi ke kota karena tidak banyak yang bisa dilakukan di hotel. Kami tidak menggunakan kolam renang mereka- tetapi ada orang lain yang menggunakannya. Kamar kami cukup mendasar dan memiliki semua fasilitas seperti hotel kota. Yang tidak saya sukai adalah bahwa kamar kami memiliki banyak nyamuk- kami membunuh 3 dan saya masih digigit dua kali selama tidur saya. 
Saya tidak berpikir ada orang yang datang ke kamar kami sebelum kami check -in untuk memastikan itu sudah siap ... karena mereka akan melihat masalah bug. Perhatikan bahwa hotel ini tidak dekat dengan Pantai Kuta tetapi lebih di pedalaman dan pusat. Kami mendapat banyak hal yang bagus di sini, itulah sebabnya kami memesan tempat ini. Untuk harga kami mendapatkannya karena itu agak diharapkan.

Subjeck: Comfortable and Spacious for a good deal.
Review:
Good service like taxi call, car rent, and i think it has a strategic place. Better for mobile person. Nice pool and bar. 
For the studio room, i think it has better facilities than other. Mini bar and free wifi with a high speed. 
Overall it is a comfortable hotel at Kuta.
Review_English:
Good service like taxi call, car rent, and i think it has a strategic place. Better for mobile person. Nice pool and bar. 
For the studio room, i think it has better facilities than other. Mini bar and free wifi with a high speed. 
Overall it is a comfortable hotel at Kuta.

Good service like taxi call, car rent, and i think it has a strategic place. Better for mobile person. Nice pool and bar. 
For the studio room, i think it has better facilities than other. Mini bar and free wifi with a high speed. 
Overall it is a comfortable hotel at Kuta.
Review_Bahasa:
Layanan yang baik seperti panggilan taksi, sewa mobil, dan saya pikir itu memiliki tempat yang strategis. Lebih baik untuk orang seluler. Kolam renang dan bar yang bagus. 
Untuk ruang studio, saya pikir itu memiliki fasilitas yang lebih baik daripada yang lain. Mini bar dan wifi gratis dengan kecepatan tinggi. 
Secara keseluruhan ini adalah hotel yang nyaman di Kuta.

Review: We stayed on 11th ,12th n 13 th January, it was a good stay ,we were 6 of us, rooms were spacious...the breakfast was quite good, the hotel is but not in walking distance to kuta beach but they do have free shuttle bus starting at 10 .i would recommend it for all.
Review_English: We stayed on 11th ,12th n 13 th January, it was a good stay ,we were 6 of us, rooms were spacious...the breakfast was quite good, the hotel is but not in walking distance to kuta beach but they do have free shuttle bus starting at 10 .i would recommend it for all.

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal pada tanggal 11, 12 Januari, ini adalah masa tinggal yang baik, kami 6 dari kami, kamarnya luas ... Sarapannya cukup bagus, hotel ini tetapi tidak dalam jarak berjalan kaki ke Pantai Kuta tetapi mereka memiliki bus antar -jemput gratis mulai pukul 10. Saya akan merekomendasikannya untuk semua.

Review:
Booked for 3 rooms, 2 superior and 1 studio room for 3 na. Stay there for pleasure. I myself choose the studio rooms but that was our mistake. Check in, quiet slow. They have to search Studio room with double bed for me. Then they put me on the 3 rd floor but that night I found out that the aircon is so noisy and not cool enough for me. 

Complained by phone that night and I prefer to change the rooms on the next day but the man in charge ( on the reception ) said that there were no rooms left so they will fix the AC problem. 

The next day in the afternoon after we went back to the hotel I found out that they only put a piece of paper on the electric switch so the AC working from morning to afternoon while we were outside. So once again we complained the AC to the reception and this time handle by Ms. Wida and we have to insist her that this is not the solution we want, but really I must put credits for her because after we went back from dinner she gave us a new studio room on the 1st floor. Better than the first rooms. FYI each rooms are using split type Aircon not centralized type Aircons. 

For Free Wifi, they gave us username and password for free wifi which never work on day 1, asked for another username/password which also not working. 

The Gym opening hours is at 8 am which we think should be earlier, We need to use the Gym 
before breakfast normally. 

PROS: 
- Spacious rooms 
- variety of breakfast 

CONS : 
- Slow check in and complaint response. 
- Thin wall, noisy 
- mosquito in the rooms 
- crowded on breakfast area.

Review_Bahasa:
Dipesan untuk 3 kamar, 2 ruang studio superior dan 1 untuk 3 na. Tetap di sana untuk kesenangan. Saya sendiri memilih ruang studio tetapi itu adalah kesalahan kami. Check -in, tenang lambat. Mereka harus mencari ruang studio dengan tempat tidur ganda untuk saya. Kemudian mereka menempatkan saya di lantai 3 tetapi malam itu saya mengetahui bahwa AC sangat berisik dan tidak cukup keren bagi saya. 

Keluhan melalui telepon malam itu dan saya lebih suka mengganti kamar pada hari berikutnya tetapi pria yang bertanggung jawab (pada resepsi) mengatakan bahwa tidak ada kamar yang tersisa sehingga mereka akan memperbaiki masalah AC. 

Hari berikutnya di sore hari setelah kami kembali ke hotel, saya mengetahui bahwa mereka hanya meletakkan selembar kertas pada sakelar listrik sehingga AC bekerja dari pagi hingga sore saat kami berada di luar. Jadi sekali lagi kami mengeluh AC ke resepsi dan kali ini ditangani oleh Ms. Wida dan kami harus bersikeras bahwa ini bukan solusi yang kami inginkan, tetapi sungguh saya harus menaruh kredit untuknya karena setelah kami kembali dari makan malam, dia memberi kami ruang studio baru di lantai 1. Lebih baik dari kamar pertama. FYI Setiap kamar menggunakan AC tipe split bukan aircons tipe terpusat. 

Untuk wifi gratis, mereka memberi kami nama pengguna dan kata sandi untuk wifi gratis yang tidak pernah berfungsi pada hari 1, meminta nama pengguna/kata sandi lain yang juga tidak berfungsi. 

Jam buka gym adalah jam 8 pagi yang menurut kami harus lebih awal, kami perlu menggunakan gym 
sebelum sarapan biasanya. 

Pro: 
- Kamar yang luas 
- Berbagai sarapan 

Kontra: 
- Respons check -in dan keluhan yang lambat. 
- Dinding tipis, berisik 
- Nyamuk di kamar 
- ramai di area sarapan.

Review:
I stayed here with my husband and 3 children and travelled with another couple and their 1 year old son. Service was outstanding. Nothing was too much trouble and everything we needed was given to us immediately. 
Rooms were spacious and clean, the bathroom probably could have done with a little more of a scrub but I think that comes with the age of the place that it was just looking a little tired in the shower area. 
Breakfast was great! Pancakes, eggs however you wanted them cooked, cakes, pastries, juices etc There was a group of 9 of us and none of us were sick from the food. 
We had a great rate and found it a short taxi ride to many places of interest. There was also a shuttle that took you to a couple of places, you just had to find your own way home. It's not close to the beach but there was plenty of transport to take you wherever you needed to go. 

There was an issue with noise at times but this is guests running through corridors or speaking and yelling at all hours of the night as they pass your room, can hardly blame the hotel. 
The only negative - I think the barman may have overcharged me for a glass of wine but more fool me to pay him and not question it... 

We enjoyed our stay. Thank you especially to the staff, they always greeted us warmly and asked us if there was anything we needed. Wonderful friendly team.

It's not close to the beach but there was plenty of transport to take you wherever you needed to go. The only negative - I think the barman may have overcharged me for a glass of wine.
Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal di sini bersama suami dan 3 anak saya dan bepergian dengan pasangan lain dan putra mereka yang berusia 1 tahun. Layanan luar biasa. Tidak ada terlalu banyak masalah dan semua yang kami butuhkan segera diberikan kepada kami. 
Kamar -kamarnya luas dan bersih, kamar mandi mungkin bisa dilakukan dengan sedikit lebih banyak scrub tapi saya pikir itu datang dengan usia tempat yang hanya terlihat sedikit lelah di area kamar mandi. 
Sarapan itu enak! Pancake, telur namun Anda ingin dimasak, kue, kue kering, jus dll. Ada sekelompok 9 dari kita dan tidak ada dari kita yang sakit karena makanan. 
Kami memiliki tarif yang bagus dan menemukannya naik taksi singkat ke banyak tempat menarik. Ada juga pesawat ulang -alik yang membawa Anda ke beberapa tempat, Anda hanya harus menemukan jalan pulang. Ini tidak dekat dengan pantai tetapi ada banyak transportasi untuk membawa Anda ke mana pun Anda harus pergi. 

Ada masalah dengan kebisingan di kali tetapi ini adalah tamu yang berlari melalui koridor atau berbicara dan berteriak sepanjang malam saat mereka melewati kamar Anda, hampir tidak bisa menyalahkan hotel. 
Satu -satunya negatif - saya pikir barterman mungkin telah membebankan saya untuk segelas anggur tetapi lebih bodoh untuk membayarnya dan tidak mempertanyakannya ... 

Kami menikmati kami tinggal. Terima kasih terutama kepada staf, mereka selalu menyapa kami dengan hangat dan bertanya apakah ada yang kami butuhkan. Tim ramah yang luar biasa.

Review:
My husband and I had just spent 3 weeks at this hotel. We spent Christmas and new year here and it was the best time we have had at any hotel in Bali. When we arrived we were very warmly welcomed ,the staff are so friendly and always helpful. Our room was right next to the pool and bar and was a bit to noisy for us , so the next day I asked if we could be moved as we were staying for three weeks and they gave us an upgrade to a studio suite( as I only booked for a deluxe. ) . They were only to happy to help. The breakfast was always good and if you wanted something special cooked they would make it for you. Every time arrived back at the hotel from a day out we were always greeted by our names. To the management (I Made , Adam , Gusdek and executive chef Ketut) and all the staff thank you for everything you done for us it made our stay wonderful. 
The hotel also has shuttle buses 6 times a day going to the discovery , beachwalk and legion beach. Or you could just do a 10 min walk to legion st , also there is an Ace Hardware right next door which is very dangerous if your a shopaholic . Overall this would be one of the best hotels to stay at if you want to feel like family and not just someone renting a room. Two thumbs up (more if I had them) 11 out of 10 . Will definitely be back. :D =) ♡♥:D

Review_Bahasa:
Suami saya dan saya baru saja menghabiskan 3 minggu di hotel ini. Kami menghabiskan Natal dan Tahun Baru di sini dan itu adalah waktu terbaik yang kami miliki di hotel mana pun di Bali. Ketika kami tiba, kami disambut dengan sangat hangat, stafnya sangat ramah dan selalu membantu. Kamar kami tepat di sebelah kolam renang dan bar dan agak bising bagi kami, jadi hari berikutnya saya bertanya apakah kami bisa dipindahkan karena kami tinggal selama tiga minggu dan mereka memberi kami peningkatan ke suite studio (karena saya hanya memesan untuk mewah.). Mereka hanya senang membantu. Sarapan selalu baik dan jika Anda menginginkan sesuatu yang spesial dimasak, mereka akan membuatnya untuk Anda. Setiap kali tiba kembali di hotel dari hari keluar, kami selalu disambut dengan nama kami. Kepada manajemen (saya buat, Adam, Gusdek dan koki eksekutif Ketut) dan semua staf terima kasih atas semua yang Anda lakukan untuk kami, itu membuat kami tetap indah. 
Hotel ini juga memiliki bus antar -jemput 6 kali sehari pergi ke Discovery, Beachwalk, dan Legion Beach. Atau Anda bisa melakukan 10 menit berjalan kaki ke Legion St, juga ada perangkat keras ace tepat di sebelah yang sangat berbahaya jika Anda seorang shopaholic. Secara keseluruhan, ini akan menjadi salah satu hotel terbaik untuk diadakan jika Anda ingin merasa seperti keluarga dan bukan hanya seseorang yang menyewa kamar. Dua jempol (lebih jika saya memilikinya) 11 dari 10. Pasti akan kembali. : D =) ♡ ♥: d

Review: Stayed here in dec13 and loved my stay..pretty frequent traveller and the customer service is above and beyond!! Yes the location is great but its way outshined by the exceptional service and huge rooms. Great job team!

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di sini pada 13 Desember dan menyukai masa tinggal saya..Pretty sering bepergian dan layanan pelanggan di atas dan di luar !! Ya, lokasinya bagus tapi caranya kalah dengan layanan yang luar biasa dan kamar -kamar besar. Tim kerja yang bagus!

Subjeck: Ok hotel but far from the beach
Review:
The Hotel is a a nice hotel and rooms are very big, however we experience some troubles during our stay there, we originally booked a room for 3 persons, but there where only 2 single beds in the room. We got extra bed but they charge us extra money... the more strange thing is that the booking was for 3 people, and we even had 3 breakfast coupons but only two beds. 

Besides that experience the rest of the trip was ok... just the beach is to far away... aprox 30 min walk... around the hotel there is nothing around so a bit boring if you want to go out of the hotel and explore the area.

The Hotel is a a nice hotel and rooms are very big, however we experience some troubles during our stay there, we originally booked a room for 3 persons, but there where only 2 single beds in the room. We got extra bed but they charge us extra money... the more strange thing is that the booking was for 3 people, and we even had 3 breakfast coupons but only two beds. 

Besides that experience the rest of the trip was ok... just the beach is to far away... aprox 30 min walk... around the hotel there is nothing around so a bit boring if you want to go out of the hotel and explore the area.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini adalah hotel yang bagus dan kamar sangat besar, namun kami mengalami beberapa masalah selama kami menginap di sana, kami awalnya memesan kamar untuk 3 orang, tetapi hanya ada 2 tempat tidur di kamar. Kami mendapat tempat tidur tambahan tetapi mereka menagih kami uang ekstra ... Semakin aneh adalah pemesanan untuk 3 orang, dan kami bahkan memiliki 3 kupon sarapan tetapi hanya dua tempat tidur. 

Selain itu pengalaman perjalanan lainnya baik -baik saja ... hanya pantai yang jauh ... aprox 30 menit berjalan kaki ... di sekitar hotel tidak ada apa -apa di sekitarnya jadi agak membosankan jika Anda ingin keluar dari hotel dan menjelajahi daerah tersebut.

Review: Have just returned yesterday from Kuta Central Park hotel. Found the hotel to be fine but a little unusual. It felt to me a little bit like a shopping centre because of the open plan layout. The room was brilliant so spacious for the three of us staying there. There were some rowdy Aussies in the pool a lot of the time but in general we did not experience any problems. We had a lovely meal at the hotel on New Years eve and there was Balinese dancers/show type thing which was very nice. The area around the hotel is a little run down and looks like it is either up and coming or deteriorating. We could not really decide. Overall we had a really good time/stay at the hotel and I would recommend it as a budget stay. However, it was spoilt a little on our last day and the trip to the Spa. I was eagerly expecting the place to be really professional as they made us complete a health questionnaire before our treatments. however I found the girl who gave me my massage to be very un professional indeed. She was firstly extremely miserable and did not make me feel welcome at all. it was almost as if she hated the job. my daughter and I chose a double room and had our treatments together but different packages. My girl kept leaving the room for some reason and I felt very uncomfortable that some one could see me laid out on the bed it was meant to be a relaxing aromatic massage to chill me out but I was so stressed. My daughter was very very cold and we told her girl she seemed to increase the heating but it did not make any difference. When my daughter took her bath it was cold. My girl very abruptly told me my treatment was finished. Following our massages we were meant to get pedicure and manicure. This was totally ruined partly due to us being pushed for time but the quality of the treatments were appalling, I asked for a French manicure and the white varnish needed was clearly empty so the girl added acetone to obviously increase the quantity. I sat for more than thirty minutes and when a went to pull up my trouser leg the whole thing just smudged and went every where. like I said we were in a rush and had to leave mid way through the treatment but the quality is poor and I would not recommend the Spa to anyone, also the manager needs to give some training to the staff on customer relations

It felt to me a little bit like a shopping centre because of the open plan layout. The room was brilliant so spacious for the three of us staying there. There were some rowdy Aussies in the pool a lot of the time but in general we did not experience any problems.
