The staff are adorable and attentive but ask for a relaxed room, we spent 10 days there, we asked to change the room two recovery, the first time because the room was downright gloomy, window overlooking pipes without external light, the second gave directly on the passage to the ground floor so oblige to close window and curtains. The third was very pleasant. On the other hand it is excessively noisy !!!! In the evening people party in the juiceka swimming pool late, we ended up using sleeping pills! We hear the steps and the voices in the corridors as if it were in the room. And we were woken up every morning by the children who were screaming. On the other hand the WiFi is free, there is a bus every 2 hours which drops you off in Kuta and the breakfast is very complete.
Review_Bahasa: Hotel yang ditempatkan dengan cukup baik, terutama jika Anda menyewa skuter. Staf menggemaskan dan penuh perhatian tetapi meminta kamar yang santai, kami menghabiskan 10 hari di sana, kami meminta untuk mengganti kamar dua pemulihan, pertama kali karena ruangan itu benar -benar suram, jendela yang menghadap ke pipa tanpa lampu eksternal, yang kedua memberi langsung pada lorong ke lantai dasar yang wajib untuk menutup jendela dan tirai. Yang ketiga sangat menyenangkan. Di sisi lain itu terlalu bising !!!! Di malam hari orang -orang berpesta di kolam renang Juiceka terlambat, kami akhirnya menggunakan pil tidur! Kami mendengar langkah -langkah dan suara -suara di koridor seolah -olah ada di dalam ruangan. Dan kami dibangunkan setiap pagi oleh anak -anak yang berteriak. Di sisi lain wifi gratis, ada bus setiap 2 jam yang mengantar Anda ke Kuta dan sarapan sangat lengkap.

Review: tempat yang bagus untuk beristirahat jika ke bali, sangat baik pelayanannya. kondisi hotel yang bersih dan masih baru, free shuttle, dekat dengan lokasi legian dan pantai kuta, menu breakfast yang cukup bervariasi, sayang di lokasi ruko belum rampung, jika saja ruko sekitar sudah terisi mungkin akan lebih baik lagi. two thumbs up buat staff dan pelayan hotel. sangat sabar dalam melayani tamu. saya hanya menginap untuk 1 malam, saya tadinya memesan standar room tetapi saat datang lagi full dan belum ada yang check out, tetapi ternyata saya dihubungi dan diberikan studio room tanpa tambahan charge, sangat berterimakasih untuk itu. mungkin jika ke bali lagi saya akan menginap disini lagi.
Review_English: A good place to rest if you go to Bali, the service is very good. The condition of the hotel is clean and still new, free shuttle, close to the location of Legian and Kuta Beach, the breakfast menu that is quite varied, unfortunately at the location of the shophouse it has not been completed, if only the surrounding shophouses might be better. Two thumbs up for hotel staff and servants. Very patient in serving guests. I only stayed for 1 night, I had ordered a standard room but when I arrived full again and no one had checked out, but apparently I was contacted and given a studio room without additional charge, very grateful for that. Maybe if I go to Bali again I will stay here again.
Review_Summary: A good place to rest if you go to Bali, the service is very good. The condition of the hotel is clean and still new, free shuttle, close to the location of Legian and Kuta Beach, the breakfast menu that is quite varied, unfortunately at the location of the shophouse it has not been completed, if only the surrounding shophouses might be better. Two thumbs up for hotel staff and servants. Very patient in serving guests. I only stayed for 1 night, I had ordered a standard room but when I arrived full again and no one had checked out, but apparently I was contacted and given a studio room without additional charge, very grateful for that. Maybe if I go to Bali again I will stay here again.

Kondisi hotel ini bersih dan masih baru, antar -jemput gratis, dekat dengan lokasi Legian dan Kuta Beach, menu sarapan yang cukup bervariasi, sayangnya di lokasi shophouse yang belum selesai, jika saja ruko di sekitarnya mungkin lebih baik. Dua jempol untuk staf hotel dan pelayan. Sangat sabar dalam melayani tamu. Saya hanya tinggal selama 1 malam, saya telah memesan kamar standar tetapi ketika saya tiba penuh lagi dan tidak ada yang check out, tetapi ternyata saya dihubungi dan diberi ruang studio tanpa biaya tambahan, sangat berterima kasih untuk itu. Mungkin jika saya pergi ke Bali lagi, saya akan tinggal di sini lagi.

Subjeck: Only if you're on a very strict budget
Review:
I stayed here for 3 nights with a friend. The checking in procedure was hassle free. We had booked the most basic room. However, when we reached there we realised that our room had no window. It felt quite claustrophobic. So we asked the hotel to upgrade us. They did and charged on 1200/- Indian Rupees for all the three nights. Generally the staff is very friendly and always willing to help. However we had a bad experience when we were flying out of Bali. We had already told the receptionist that we would require airport drop at 3:15 A.M. as our flight was at 6 A.M. She had assured us that it would be ready and had also informed us that we would be given an american breakfast basket. However, neither the car was ready nor was the breakfast when we checked out early in the morning. In fact we realised that the person at the reception had no idea that we were going to check out. It did not cause us any problem but it did leave a bad taste in the mouth. 
Another word of caution, the water bottles in the room are NOT COMPLIMENTARY. There are two bottles kept in the bathroom which are, but the ones in the room are not. So either buy water outside at a cheaper rate or just use the bottles which are kept in the bathroom. 
All in all, a decent place to stay if you're on a budget.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal di sini selama 3 malam dengan seorang teman. Prosedur check -in tidak memiliki kerumitan. Kami telah memesan kamar paling dasar. Namun, ketika kami sampai di sana, kami menyadari bahwa kamar kami tidak memiliki jendela. Rasanya cukup sesak. Jadi kami meminta hotel untuk meningkatkan kami. Mereka melakukan dan menagih rupee India/- India selama tiga malam. Umumnya staf sangat ramah dan selalu bersedia membantu. Namun kami memiliki pengalaman buruk ketika kami terbang keluar dari Bali. Kami sudah memberi tahu resepsionis bahwa kami akan membutuhkan penurunan bandara pada pukul 3:15 A.M. karena penerbangan kami pukul 6 pagi. Dia telah meyakinkan kami bahwa itu akan siap dan juga memberi tahu kami bahwa kami akan diberi keranjang sarapan Amerika. Namun, baik mobil itu tidak siap maupun sarapan ketika kami check out pagi -pagi sekali. Bahkan kami menyadari bahwa orang di resepsi tidak tahu bahwa kami akan memeriksa. Itu tidak menyebabkan kita masalah tetapi itu memang meninggalkan rasa tidak enak di mulut. 
Kata peringatan lain, botol air di ruangan itu tidak gratis. Ada dua botol yang disimpan di kamar mandi yang ada, tetapi yang ada di ruangan itu tidak. Jadi beli air di luar dengan kecepatan yang lebih murah atau hanya menggunakan botol yang disimpan di kamar mandi. 
Secara keseluruhan, tempat yang layak untuk tinggal jika Anda memiliki anggaran terbatas.

Review:
Management of the hotel is terrible! First, we come without booking to know there what rooms are available, the manager said that tomorrow will be avaible only one room and they can't show it to as, because guests there. But we looked at the booking.com there are 10 rooms available for this date! We showed this to manager, he began to wriggle and said that they are all booked. We booked room at this hotel on booking.com (room with a large window on 3th floor). 
In the next day when we come to check in they gave us room with a terrible cigarette smell, that it was impossible to breathe there. On my complaints at the reception girl said that she asks somebody to bring freshener. After persistent requests they were moved us to another room and in half an hour on the roof started to make repairs or something like that. The sound was so strong, like a jackhammer beats in the room. I went back to the reception to complain, the girl said that no repairs, and they not have the noise and she doesn't hear anything. After 3-4 calls on the reception with complaints about the noise, they stopped. But the next day started again with the same force! Only after I recorded video on my iphone what happening in the room and showed it to the manager and promised to load it on tripadvisor they changed our room to normal! 
In the hotel a lot of guests, lots of noisy young people from China. In the corridor all the time someone shouted, clapped their doors. One night our young Chinese neighbors got drunk so much that at 3 a.m. in the corridor they yelling like crazy, jumping out of their room and lay down on the corridor. They calmed down only when we went out in the corridor and said them a few words. So, if you want to stay for the long term, maybe you must thinking about another hotel.

Review_Bahasa:
Manajemen hotel itu mengerikan! Pertama, kami datang tanpa pemesanan untuk mengetahui di sana kamar apa yang tersedia, manajer mengatakan bahwa besok hanya akan dikenakan satu kamar dan mereka tidak dapat menunjukkannya kepada AS, karena tamu di sana. Tapi kami melihat Booking.com ada 10 kamar yang tersedia untuk tanggal ini! Kami menunjukkan ini kepada manajer, ia mulai menggeliat dan mengatakan bahwa mereka semua dipesan. Kami memesan kamar di hotel ini di booking.com (kamar dengan jendela besar di lantai 3). 
Pada hari berikutnya ketika kami datang untuk check -in, mereka memberi kami kamar dengan aroma rokok yang mengerikan, bahwa tidak mungkin untuk bernafas di sana. Atas keluhan saya di resepsi gadis mengatakan bahwa dia meminta seseorang untuk membawa penyegar. Setelah permintaan terus -menerus, mereka dipindahkan ke ruangan lain dan dalam setengah jam di atap mulai melakukan perbaikan atau semacamnya. Suara itu begitu kuat, seperti jackhammer ketukan di ruangan itu. Saya kembali ke resepsi untuk mengeluh, gadis itu mengatakan bahwa tidak ada perbaikan, dan mereka tidak memiliki suara dan dia tidak mendengar apa -apa. Setelah 3-4 panggilan pada resepsi dengan keluhan tentang kebisingan, mereka berhenti. Tapi hari berikutnya dimulai lagi dengan kekuatan yang sama! Hanya setelah saya merekam video di iPhone saya apa yang terjadi di ruangan dan menunjukkannya kepada manajer dan berjanji untuk memuatnya di TripAdvisor, mereka mengubah kamar kami menjadi normal! 
Di hotel banyak tamu, banyak orang muda yang bising dari Cina. Di koridor sepanjang waktu seseorang berteriak, bertepuk tangan. Suatu malam tetangga muda Cina kami sangat mabuk sehingga pada jam 3 pagi di koridor mereka berteriak seperti orang gila, melompat keluar dari kamar mereka dan berbaring di koridor. Mereka tenang hanya ketika kami keluar di koridor dan mengucapkannya beberapa kata. Jadi, jika Anda ingin tinggal untuk jangka panjang, mungkin Anda harus memikirkan hotel lain.
Review_Clean:
Manajemen hotel itu mengerikan! Pertama, kami datang tanpa pemesanan untuk mengetahui di sana kamar apa yang tersedia, manajer mengatakan bahwa besok hanya akan dikenakan satu kamar dan mereka tidak dapat menunjukkannya kepada AS, karena tamu di sana. Tapi kami melihat Booking.com ada 10 kamar yang tersedia untuk tanggal ini! Kami menunjukkan ini kepada manajer, ia mulai menggeliat dan mengatakan bahwa mereka semua dipesan. Kami memesan kamar di hotel ini di booking.com kamar dengan jendela besar di lantai 3. 
Pada hari berikutnya ketika kami datang untuk check -in, mereka memberi kami kamar dengan aroma rokok yang mengerikan, bahwa tidak mungkin untuk bernafas di sana. Atas keluhan saya di resepsi gadis mengatakan bahwa dia meminta seseorang untuk membawa penyegar. Setelah permintaan terus -menerus, mereka dipindahkan ke ruangan lain dan dalam setengah jam di atap mulai melakukan perbaikan atau semacamnya. Suara itu begitu kuat, seperti jackhammer ketukan di ruangan itu. Saya kembali ke resepsi untuk mengeluh, gadis itu mengatakan bahwa tidak ada perbaikan, dan mereka tidak memiliki suara dan dia tidak mendengar apa -apa. Setelah 3-4 panggilan pada resepsi dengan keluhan tentang kebisingan, mereka berhenti. Tapi hari berikutnya dimulai lagi dengan kekuatan yang sama! Hanya setelah saya merekam video di iPhone saya apa yang terjadi di ruangan dan menunjukkannya kepada manajer dan berjanji untuk memuatnya di TripAdvisor, mereka mengubah kamar kami menjadi normal! 
Di hotel banyak tamu, banyak orang muda yang bising dari Cina. Di koridor sepanjang waktu seseorang berteriak, bertepuk tangan. Suatu malam tetangga muda Cina kami sangat mabuk sehingga pada jam 3 pagi di koridor mereka berteriak seperti orang gila, melompat keluar dari kamar mereka dan berbaring di koridor. Mereka tenang hanya ketika kami keluar di koridor dan mengucapkannya beberapa kata. Jadi, jika Anda ingin tinggal untuk jangka panjang, mungkin Anda harus memikirkan hotel lain.

Subjeck: Nice hotel in a bad location
Review: I've stay there for 3nights.. I booked standard room but It's full so they gave me studio! It's a huge room, huge bathroom with a comfortable n clean bathtub except no windows there. N the location is far from beach,,but i still enjoy my holiday there..anyway, it's a nice hotel

Review_Bahasa: Saya telah tinggal di sana selama 3 minggu .. Saya memesan kamar standar tetapi penuh sehingga mereka memberi saya studio! Ini adalah kamar besar, kamar mandi besar dengan bathtub N yang nyaman kecuali tidak ada jendela di sana. N Lokasinya jauh dari pantai, tetapi saya masih menikmati liburan saya di sana..wesay, ini hotel yang bagus

Review: My first time with Kuta Central Park Hotel or familiar with Quest Hotel.. It's a great location just 15 min walking distance from main street of Kuta.Staff friendly, very pleasant and willing to help. Really enjoyed to stay. hotel with a cozy children's play room..clean bathroom (this is most important!) .Mobile phone signals inside rooms are not good enough.Recommended for family with children...

Review_Bahasa: Pertama kali saya dengan Kuta Central Park Hotel atau akrab dengan Quest Hotel .. Ini adalah lokasi yang bagus hanya 15 menit berjalan kaki dari Main Street of Kuta. Staff Friendly, sangat menyenangkan dan bersedia membantu. Sangat menikmati tinggal. Hotel dengan ruang bermain anak -anak yang nyaman..sclean kamar mandi (ini yang paling penting!). Sinyal telepon mobil di dalam kamar tidak cukup baik. Diberitahukan untuk keluarga dengan anak -anak ...

Review: It's the first trip here in Bali for my family and it was a pleasant one thanks to the friendly staff of Kuta Central hotel. It is also near to tourist attractions in Bali. The staff here also arranged transportation to bring us around at a low price. The only downside is the pool, a little too small for liking

Review_Bahasa: Ini adalah perjalanan pertama di sini di Bali untuk keluarga saya dan ini adalah terima kasih yang menyenangkan kepada staf ramah Kuta Central Hotel. Ini juga dekat dengan tempat -tempat wisata di Bali. Staf di sini juga mengatur transportasi untuk membawa kami berkeliling dengan harga murah. Satu -satunya downside adalah kolam, sedikit terlalu kecil untuk disukai

Subjeck: its my home away from home
Review: i have been too Bali 5 times in the last 8 mths ...i have stayed here every time... i have been else where but always regret the choice and come back to stay at my home....Being a beauty therapist myself , i highly recommend the spa at Kuta central ,,the staff are all lovely from the front of house ,to the bar staff ,to the resturant staff and the sercurity staff are also the best and have your safty at heart....awesome accomadation plus a great price...thank you to my extended family ..kisses from ms Kell...

Review:
The staff could not be any more helpful if they tried. Nothing was to much. It's a great location just 15 min walking distance from main street of Kuta.Nice and quiet not right in the heart of the bars and clubs. Bali bakery 5 min from hotel as is a small shopping complex. Going back again in Nov 2013 this time for a month. 
TIP: if you like bacon you have to ask for it when you go down for breakfast other wise all meals are great.I would recommend this hotel to anybody who likes a quiet place to stay.

Review_Bahasa:
Staf tidak bisa lagi membantu jika mereka mencoba. Tidak ada yang banyak. Ini adalah lokasi yang bagus hanya 15 menit berjalan kaki dari jalan utama Kuta. Bali Bakery 5 menit dari hotel seperti kompleks perbelanjaan kecil. Kembali lagi pada November 2013 kali ini selama sebulan. 
Kiat: Jika Anda suka bacon, Anda harus memintanya ketika Anda pergi sarapan untuk sarapan, semua makanan enak lainnya. Saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini kepada siapa saja yang suka tempat yang tenang untuk menginap.

Review: all services are very good and meet to up standerds like cleaning,hospitality,food location,transport for customers etc. the staff is also very friendly morning time break fast service also very nice and energetic

Review: A hotel with a decent location, not far from kuta beach but downside, i could not find much to eat or do within walking distance of this hotel. Rooms are large and clean; but the towels were old and fraying in my room; and as my room was on the ground floor, it was also noisy. My room also did not have a window...Breakfast selection was also poor. But friendly staff made up for all these negatives. Overall good value for the room rates. But would probably stay at another hotel closer to the action the next time i visit.

Rooms are large and clean; but the towels were old and fraying in my room; and as my room was on the ground floor, it was also noisy. My room also did not have a window...Breakfast selection was also poor. But friendly staff made up for all these negatives. Overall good value for the room rates. But would probably stay at another hotel closer to the action the next time i visit.

My room also did not have a window...Breakfast selection was also poor. But friendly staff made up for all these negatives. Overall good value for the room rates. But would probably stay at another hotel closer to the action the next time i visit.
Review_Bahasa: Sebuah hotel dengan lokasi yang layak, tidak jauh dari pantai Kuta tetapi downside, saya tidak dapat menemukan banyak untuk dimakan atau dilakukan dalam jarak berjalan kaki dari hotel ini. Kamar besar dan bersih; Tapi handuknya tua dan berjumbai di kamarku; Dan karena kamar saya berada di lantai dasar, itu juga berisik. Kamar saya juga tidak memiliki jendela ... pilihan sarapan juga buruk. Tetapi staf yang ramah menebus semua hal negatif ini. Nilai baik secara keseluruhan untuk tarif kamar. Tetapi mungkin akan tinggal di hotel lain lebih dekat dengan aksi saat berikutnya saya berkunjung.

Subjeck: Quiet location, suitable for family with kids
Review: My first time with Quest Central. The location is far away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta but a few rides away from shopping malls. The place is clean, we were upgraded to Studio, the biggest room they have (THanks Quest!) The staff are all friendly. The swimming pool size is just about right. There is a spa available, good breakfast, walking distance to Giant Supermarket, Gloria Jeans and there are a few restos/salon nearby. What is good about this hotel too is the FREE Wifi anywhere in the hotel!. There is also a free shuttle going to Legian Beach, Discovery mall and Kuta beach which is quite handy for first timers. A few minutes ride and you will be in Carrefour SUpermarket, Galleria Bali and Legian strip.

Review_Bahasa: Pertama kali saya dengan Quest Central. Lokasi jauh dari keramaian dan kesibukan Kuta tetapi beberapa wahana jauhnya dari pusat perbelanjaan. Tempatnya bersih, kami ditingkatkan ke Studio, kamar terbesar yang mereka miliki (terima kasih Quest!) Staf semuanya ramah. Ukuran kolam renang hampir tepat. Ada spa yang tersedia, sarapan yang enak, jarak berjalan kaki ke supermarket raksasa, jeans Gloria dan ada beberapa resto/salon di dekatnya. Apa yang bagus tentang hotel ini juga adalah wifi gratis di mana saja di hotel!. Ada juga antar -jemput gratis ke Legian Beach, Discovery Mall dan Kuta Beach yang cukup berguna untuk timer pertama. Beberapa menit perjalanan dan Anda akan berada di Supermarket Carrefour, Galleria Bali dan Legian Strip.

Review:
I stayed 3 nights in this hotel over all I like this hotel they have playground since I was travelling with 4 YO son. I found the superior room was small i decided to upgrade my room to Deluxe with balcony facing to the pool and my son likes this room very much. 
We spent times mostly in the pool and the pool staffs were very friendly. 
The breakfast is tasty. Special thanks to Mr. Gede who already pick and drop us back to airport and Krisnawan from front desk they were very friendly and helpfull They delivered 5 star services. 
But some accidents happened like ugly bath towel or electricity problem but I didn't want to make it a big issues and ruin our holiday. 
But on my check out time it was horrible and make me so angry . I paid the room until 18:00 because our flight at 20:30 but at 17:30 when i just finised my shower and still undres only towel in my head.. I got shocked somebody was trying to enter my room without knock my room door or interduce him self ,He said he wants to check the room cleanliness?? I said NO I will check out at 18:00 ( I opened the door only a bit so I can see his face a half) Lucky i did double locked my door if not what shall he will see??? 
How could he done that. What ever the reasons is YOU SHOULD KNOCK THE DOOR FIRST . YOU CAN NOT ENTER INTO A GUEST ROOM LIKE THAT!!

I stayed 3 nights in this hotel over all I like this hotel they have playground since I was travelling with 4 YO son. I found the superior room was small i decided to upgrade my room to Deluxe with balcony facing to the pool and my son likes this room very much. 
We spent times mostly in the pool and the pool staffs were very friendly. 
The breakfast is tasty. Special thanks to Mr. Gede who already pick and drop us back to airport and Krisnawan from front desk they were very friendly and helpfull They delivered 5 star services. 
But some accidents happened like ugly bath towel or electricity problem but I didn't want to make it a big issues and ruin our holiday.

I said NO I will check out at 18:00 ( I opened the door only a bit so I can see his face a half) Lucky i did double locked my door if not what shall he will see??? 
How could he done that. What ever the reasons is YOU SHOULD KNOCK THE DOOR FIRST . YOU CAN NOT ENTER INTO A GUEST ROOM LIKE THAT!!
Review_Summary: I stayed 3 nights in this hotel over all I like this hotel they have playground since I was travelling with 4 YO son. I found the superior room was small i decided to upgrade my room to Deluxe with balcony facing to the pool and my son likes this room very much. The pool staffs were very friendly. The breakfast is tasty.
Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal 3 malam di hotel ini di atas semua yang saya suka hotel ini mereka memiliki taman bermain sejak saya bepergian dengan 4 yo putra. Saya menemukan kamar superior kecil saya memutuskan untuk meningkatkan kamar saya ke mewah dengan balkon menghadap ke kolam renang dan anak saya sangat menyukai ruangan ini. 
Kami menghabiskan waktu sebagian besar di kolam renang dan staf kolam renang sangat ramah. 
Sarapannya enak. Terima kasih khusus kepada Tn. Gede yang sudah memilih dan mengantar kami kembali ke bandara dan Krisnawan dari meja depan mereka sangat ramah dan membantu mereka memberikan layanan bintang 5. 
Tetapi beberapa kecelakaan terjadi seperti handuk mandi jelek atau masalah listrik tetapi saya tidak ingin menjadikannya masalah besar dan merusak liburan kami. 
Tetapi pada waktu check out saya itu mengerikan dan membuat saya sangat marah. Saya membayar kamar sampai pukul 18:00 karena penerbangan kami pada pukul 20:30 tetapi pada pukul 17:30 ketika saya baru saja membiayai kamar mandi saya dan masih tidak memiliki handuk di kepala saya .. Saya terkejut seseorang mencoba memasuki kamar saya tanpa mengetuk pintu kamar saya atau mengganggu dirinya sendiri, dia bilang dia ingin memeriksa kebersihan kamar ?? Saya bilang tidak, saya akan check out pada pukul 18:00 (saya membuka pintu hanya sedikit sehingga saya bisa melihat wajahnya setengah) beruntung saya memang mengunci pintu saya jika tidak, apa yang akan dia lihat ??? 
Bagaimana dia bisa melakukan itu. Apa pun alasannya adalah Anda harus mengetuk pintu terlebih dahulu. Anda tidak bisa masuk ke kamar tamu seperti itu !!

Bagaimana dia bisa melakukan itu. Apa pun alasannya adalah Anda harus mengetuk pintu terlebih dahulu. Anda tidak bisa masuk ke kamar tamu seperti itu !!

Review: Booked off the net as somewhere to stay when flying in on a late flight before going to Ubud. Booked a deluxe poolside room with breakfast included and have to say it is amazing value for money. About to go book again for our return trip in July

Memesan kamar di tepi kolam renang mewah dengan sarapan termasuk dan harus mengatakan itu adalah nilai uang yang luar biasa. Akan pergi memesan lagi untuk perjalanan pulang kami di bulan Juli

Subjeck: Good, quiet hotel in the outskirts of Kuta
Review:
Spent 13 days in Kuta Central Park hotel - superior room. The room was very spacious and clean with a comforable king size bed in the room. Everything was very well though of - the room had to a/c which came in handy with the 34 degree heat during the days. Nice decor and atmosphere throughout the hotel. Staff friendly, very pleasant and willing to help. Really enjoyed the stay. 
On the downside, the housekeeping got lazy whilst we stayed there and the room wasnt always cleaned to the max on the daily service (although we did leave the guys a tip on the bed every day) and the breakfast buffet got a bit tiring after a while. 
The hotel is only a short taxi (max. AUD 2)/scooter ride from central Kuta, and is serviced by the hotel shuffle-bus. 
Ended up booking an extra night in the hotel as we changed our flight and the hotel was most accommodating by letting us stay in our room and change the prebooked airport-transfer to a later date. 

Would definitely reccommend it (if booking, I found the best deals through tiket.com e.g free airport transfers and upgrade to a premium room)

Review_Bahasa:
Menghabiskan 13 hari di Kuta Central Park Hotel - Kamar Superior. Ruangan itu sangat luas dan bersih dengan tempat tidur ukuran king yang nyaman di kamar. Semuanya sangat baik - ruangan harus menjadi A/C yang berguna dengan panas 34 derajat selama hari -hari. Dekorasi dan suasana yang bagus di seluruh hotel. Staf yang ramah, sangat menyenangkan dan bersedia membantu. Sangat menikmati masa tinggal. 
Pada sisi negatifnya, rumah tangga menjadi malas sementara kami tinggal di sana dan ruangan itu tidak selalu dibersihkan secara maksimal pada layanan harian (meskipun kami memang meninggalkan tip di tempat tidur setiap hari) dan sarapan prasmanan menjadi sedikit melelahkan setelah beberapa saat. 
Hotel ini hanya taksi pendek (maks. AUD 2)/skuter naik dari Central Kuta, dan dilayani oleh hotel shuffle-bus. 
Akhirnya memesan satu malam ekstra di hotel saat kami mengubah penerbangan kami dan hotel ini paling akomodatif dengan mengizinkan kami tinggal di kamar kami dan mengubah transfer bandara yang dipesan sebelumnya menjadi nanti. 

Pasti akan merekomendasikannya (jika pemesanan, saya menemukan penawaran terbaik melalui Tiket.com mis. Transfer bandara gratis dan meningkatkan ke ruang premium)

Pasti akan merekomendasikannya jika pemesanan, saya menemukan penawaran terbaik melalui Tiket.com mis. Transfer bandara gratis dan meningkatkan ke ruang premium

Review:
Our last day in Kuta Central Park Hotel. The hotel is comfortable, beds are comfy and bathroom very spacious. We were upgrade from our standard room which we booked from Asiarooms upon our arrival. The staff were very warm and friendly. 
Although the location is far from the beach (approx 20mins walk to Kuta Beach), but hotel provides shuttle service to the main locations; discovery mall, beachwalk mall and legian beach which u will need to book in advance. 
The restaurant serves delicious food. Please try the Spiced Mahi Mahi with rice and the Pizza Margerita...Yummie!

Review_Bahasa:
Hari terakhir kami di Kuta Central Park Hotel. Hotel ini nyaman, tempat tidur nyaman dan kamar mandi sangat luas. Kami meningkatkan dari kamar standar kami yang kami pesan dari Asiarooms pada saat kedatangan kami. Stafnya sangat hangat dan ramah. 
Meskipun lokasinya jauh dari pantai (sekitar 20 menit berjalan kaki ke Pantai Kuta), tetapi Hotel menyediakan layanan antar -jemput ke lokasi utama; Discovery Mall, Beachwalk Mall dan Legian Beach yang Anda perlukan untuk memesan terlebih dahulu. 
Restoran menyajikan makanan lezat. Silakan coba Mahi Mahi yang dibumbui dengan nasi dan margerita pizza ... yummie!

Restoran menyajikan makanan lezat. Silakan coba Mahi Mahi yang dibumbui dengan nasi dan margerita pizza ... yummie!

Review: Booked this hotel for an overnight stay and early flight from Bali to Java. The hotel is centrally located in Kuta, Bali away from the hustle and bustle of the beach bummers of Kuta. The rooms are clean and spacious, but the A/C Unit was not as efficient as I expected. My room type was a superior double room. The bathroom was also clean and spacious and the room also contained a mini-bar. The pool is split in two parts, one very shallow evidently for kids and another about 1.2m in depth for adults. The have a good restaurant at the back of the hotel having some very good local dishes and a spa on the second floor. Regarding the spa, it is better to book well in advance since they seem to be short of staff and 3 hours in advance i did not manage to secure a place. The staff are very nice and courteous.

Review_Bahasa: Memesan hotel ini untuk menginap semalam dan penerbangan awal dari Bali ke Jawa. Hotel ini terletak di pusat Kuta, Bali jauh dari keramaian dan kesibukan di pantai Kuta. Kamar -kamarnya bersih dan luas, tetapi unit A/C tidak seefisien yang saya harapkan. Jenis kamar saya adalah kamar ganda yang unggul. Kamar mandi juga bersih dan luas dan kamar itu juga berisi mini-bar. Kolam renang terbelah menjadi dua bagian, satu sangat dangkal jelas untuk anak -anak dan satu lagi sekitar 1,2m kedalaman untuk orang dewasa. Memiliki restoran yang bagus di bagian belakang hotel memiliki beberapa hidangan lokal yang sangat enak dan spa di lantai dua. Mengenai spa, lebih baik memesan jauh sebelumnya karena mereka tampaknya kekurangan staf dan 3 jam sebelumnya saya tidak berhasil mengamankan tempat. Stafnya sangat baik dan sopan.

Subjeck: Excellent service, cosy pool, good value
Review:
Located in central Kuta, quite a distance from the beach, this hotel is not for those who want to be surrounded by noisy surfers and beach bums. 
Clean, modern and with an excellent staff, this hotel is ideal for couples and folks with children. There is a large, shallow pool in the central court - with a swim-up bar! 
The hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to key spots on and near the beaches (kuta and Legian) as well as shopping areas. 
Excellent value for money, with a super breakfast buffet matching that found in top-end chain hotels

Review_Bahasa:
Terletak di Central Kuta, cukup jauh dari pantai, hotel ini bukan untuk mereka yang ingin dikelilingi oleh peselancar yang bising dan gelandangan pantai. 
Bersih, modern dan dengan staf yang sangat baik, hotel ini sangat ideal untuk pasangan dan orang -orang dengan anak -anak. Ada kolam besar dan dangkal di pengadilan pusat - dengan bar renang! 
Hotel ini menawarkan pesawat ulang -alik gratis ke tempat -tempat utama di dan dekat pantai (Kuta dan Legian) serta area perbelanjaan. 
Nilai sangat baik untuk uang, dengan pencocokan prasmanan super sarapan yang ditemukan di hotel rantai top-end

Review:
This hotel is great for those wanting a central location, a step back from the legian nightlife (not too close) and still walking distance to the beach( if youre keen on exercise) Theres a shuttle service every 2 hours to the malls and beach, plenty of taxis and no real problems getting wherever you want to go. 
The deluxe room is a decent size, bathroom clean and modern, satellite tv great, pool a touch shallow but poolside bar is cool. Poolside or poolview balcony rooms are the obvious preffered choice. Theres a playground for the little kids too but I didnt see too many. 
This is a great hotel for a business stay or modern tourists, not too well-located for the wild party animals but that may be a good thing. 
The security and staff are honest and friendly. Meals and room service is worth staying in for. When our phone order was "forgotten" they quickly rectified the issue, and more than made up for the minor oversight :) Prompt issue resolution shows a real credit to management and staff. Well done! 
Breakfast was tasty too, with a reasonable variety, better than most hotels in this price range. Overall I'd say the value and service makes Kuta Central Park an excellent choice for those agreeable with the location.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini sangat bagus untuk mereka yang menginginkan lokasi sentral, selangkah mundur dari kehidupan malam Legian (tidak terlalu dekat) dan masih berjalan kaki ke pantai (jika Anda ingin berolahraga) ada layanan antar -jemput setiap 2 jam ke mal dan pantai, banyak taksi dan tidak ada masalah nyata ke mana pun Anda ingin pergi. 
Kamar mewah adalah ukuran yang layak, kamar mandi bersih dan modern, TV satelit besar, kolam renang sentuhan dangkal tapi bilah tepi kolam renang keren. Kamar balkon di tepi kolam renang atau kolam renang adalah pilihan yang jelas. Ada taman bermain untuk anak -anak kecil juga tetapi saya tidak melihat terlalu banyak. 
Ini adalah hotel yang bagus untuk masa inap bisnis atau wisatawan modern, tidak terlalu berlokasi untuk hewan-hewan pesta liar tetapi itu mungkin hal yang baik. 
Keamanan dan staf jujur ​​dan ramah. Layanan makanan dan kamar layak untuk dijalani. Ketika pesanan telepon kami "dilupakan", mereka dengan cepat memperbaiki masalah ini, dan lebih dari sekadar menebus pengawasan kecil :) Resolusi masalah cepat menunjukkan kredit nyata kepada manajemen dan staf. Bagus sekali! 
Sarapan juga enak, dengan variasi yang masuk akal, lebih baik daripada kebanyakan hotel di kisaran harga ini. Secara keseluruhan saya akan mengatakan nilai dan layanan membuat Kuta Central Park menjadi pilihan yang sangat baik bagi mereka yang menyenangkan dengan lokasi.

Review:
Kami tidak menyangka akan stay di Kuta Central Park. Tetapi begitu kami menelepon dan mendapatkan rate kamar yang bagus (tapi tempat kamarnya jauhhhh dari lobby, what a pity). 
Tetapi keadaan kamar bagus, pelayanan ok, cafe ok, pool ok. I think it's a nice place to stay. 
Fasilitas yang ditawarkan juga lengkap. 
Lokasi Hotel berada di kawasan Ruko, alangkah bagusnya bila ruko" ini berisi semua dan masih berada dalam pembangunan. 
Anyway... Two Tumbs Up.
Review_English:
We did not expect to stay at Kuta Central Park. But as soon as we called and got a good room rate (but where the room was far from the lobby, what a pity). 
But the state of the room is good, ok service, ok cafe, pool ok. I think it's a nice place to stay. 
The facilities offered are also complete. 
The location of the hotel is in the shophouse area, it would be good if the shop "this" is still in construction. 
Anyway ... Two Tumbs Up.

Kami tidak berharap untuk menginap di Kuta Central Park. Tapi begitu kami menelepon dan mendapatkan tarif kamar yang baik (tetapi di mana ruangan itu jauh dari lobi, sangat kasihan). 
Tapi keadaan ruangan itu bagus, layanan ok, ok kafe, biliar ok. Saya pikir itu tempat yang bagus untuk tinggal.

Review:
I stayed for 2 weeks i originally only booked in for a week and then to stay somewhere else but when i got there i found it was actually pretty good. 
The service from the Bar staff Kumar and Suryia were excellent as a solo traveller they gave me great advice on where to visit what to avoid. The boys also had quite a lot to share about their country, customs and culture this was invaluable. 
The rooms were nice great aircon which is almost a need at this time of year. The rooms were cleaned spotless every day. The pool is very nice a little shallow but that helps keep the temperature perfect. 
The hotel is close enough to walk to Kuta or Legian I defiantly enjoyed my stay here and would go back again. Thanks to all the staff

I stayed for 2 weeks i originally only booked in for a week and then to stay somewhere else but when i got there i found it was actually pretty good. 
The service from the Bar staff Kumar and Suryia were excellent as a solo traveller they gave me great advice on where to visit what to avoid. The boys also had quite a lot to share about their country, customs and culture this was invaluable. 
The rooms were nice great aircon which is almost a need at this time of year. The rooms were cleaned spotless every day. The pool is very nice a little shallow but that helps keep the temperature perfect. 
The hotel is close enough to walk to Kuta or Legian I defiantly enjoyed my stay here and would go back again. Thanks to all the staff
Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal selama 2 minggu saya awalnya hanya memesan selama seminggu dan kemudian tinggal di tempat lain tetapi ketika saya sampai di sana saya menemukan itu sebenarnya cukup bagus. 
Layanan dari staf bar Kumar dan Suryia sangat baik sebagai pelancong solo, mereka memberi saya nasihat bagus tentang di mana harus mengunjungi apa yang harus dihindari. Anak laki -laki juga memiliki cukup banyak untuk dibagikan tentang negara mereka, kebiasaan dan budaya ini sangat berharga. 
Kamar -kamarnya sangat bagus, yang hampir merupakan kebutuhan saat ini. Kamar -kamar dibersihkan bersih setiap hari. Kolam renang sangat bagus sedikit dangkal tetapi itu membantu menjaga suhu tetap sempurna. 
Hotel ini cukup dekat untuk berjalan ke Kuta atau Legian, saya menantang menikmati masa tinggal saya di sini dan akan kembali lagi. Terima kasih untuk semua staf

Review: Got a special offer from Tiket.com.... Worth to spend and great service indeed. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Great location easy to walk around, not too crowded like Kuta / Legian area. Recommended for those who travel for Business or Leisure!

Review:
If you want the calm beach resort, then you probably want somewhere other than Kuta anyway, but if do want the bustle of Kuta, then why stay right on the beach. The traffic is even worse than other locations in Bali so tripping around Bali means a extended time on your first or last few miles of travel. 

Honestly, my advice is to visit the beach and stay somewhere with better connections. The Kuta Central Park Hotel is a very good option. You can still take one of the plentiful taxis to the beach for $2, but you get a quiet location with great staff. You might sacrifice the view from your room, but the poolside balconies are peaceful enough. The bed was great and food was good. The staff is very responsive and friendly. 

My only fault is that the second floor balconies could use a shade option for the middle of the afternoon.

Review_Bahasa:
Jika Anda menginginkan resor pantai yang tenang, maka Anda mungkin ingin di suatu tempat selain Kuta, tetapi jika ingin hiruk pikuk Kuta, maka mengapa tetap berada di pantai. Lalu lintas bahkan lebih buruk daripada lokasi lain di Bali sehingga berkeliling Bali berarti waktu yang lama pada perjalanan pertama atau terakhir Anda. 

Jujur, saran saya adalah mengunjungi pantai dan tinggal di suatu tempat dengan koneksi yang lebih baik. Kuta Central Park Hotel adalah pilihan yang sangat bagus. Anda masih dapat naik salah satu taksi berlimpah ke pantai seharga $ 2, tetapi Anda mendapatkan lokasi yang tenang dengan staf yang hebat. Anda mungkin mengorbankan pemandangan dari kamar Anda, tetapi balkon di tepi kolam renang cukup damai. Tempat tidurnya enak dan makanannya enak. Stafnya sangat responsif dan ramah. 

Satu -satunya kesalahan saya adalah bahwa balkon lantai dua dapat menggunakan opsi naungan untuk pertengahan sore hari.

Review: Amazing staff , always had a smile on their face and were happy to help. The rooms were clean and a good size. Location wise it was a bit of a walk from the night clubs but still over all not that far also taxis are cheap so on the lazy days we just took a taxi. Just outside the hotel less then 5 mins walk is 2 convince stores. Overall was a good stay

Lokasi bijaksana itu sedikit berjalan -jalan dari klub malam tetapi masih tidak terlalu jauh juga taksi murah sehingga pada hari -hari malas kami baru saja naik taksi. Tepat di luar hotel kurang dari 5 menit berjalan kaki adalah 2 toko meyakinkan. Secara keseluruhan adalah masa tinggal yang baik

Subjeck: cozy room, great breakfast, nice pool
Review:
I stayed here on 11-13 March with my family for the holidays Nyepi. I, my husband and my daughter who was 1 year old, got a deluxe room at 245, while the family was in the studio king queen 239. Upon check in the front office are very busy and they are quite confused face a lot of guests coming. my family first got a room. while I had to wait 1 hour and then get into the room. a bit disappointed because we were booking a room with a balcony in front of the pool, but it seems since we booked from travel agents, other guests who book directly through the hotel they heed. 

but the room is really comfortable ... clean bathroom (this is most important, because I do not like the slob), the mattress is also convenient, although pillow is a bit harsh. which makes this hotel outstanding, during Nyepi which tv channel all off, the hotel is showing movies box office in their internal channel, so we can still watch television. evening events, they also movie night on discovery room. so guests do not feel bored. evening we were also allowed to sit and see the stars of the pool, as long as it is not noisy and turn on the light. 

roomnya pretty good kids, unfortunately we did not get to try the spa because on Nyepi day, full booked overalls, my family and feel comfortable spending this year Nyepi holiday here. hotels are recommended for those who have enough budget. not expensive, but good service.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya tinggal di sini pada 11-13 Maret bersama keluarga saya untuk liburan Nyepi. Saya, suami dan putri saya yang berusia 1 tahun, mendapat kamar mewah di 245, sementara keluarga itu berada di studio King Queen 239. Setelah check -check di kantor depan sangat sibuk dan mereka cukup bingung banyak tamu yang datang. Keluarga saya pertama kali mendapat kamar. Sementara saya harus menunggu 1 jam dan kemudian masuk ke kamar. Agak kecewa karena kami memesan kamar dengan balkon di depan kolam renang, tetapi tampaknya sejak kami memesan dari agen perjalanan, tamu lain yang memesan langsung melalui hotel yang mereka perhatikan. 

Tapi kamarnya benar -benar nyaman ... kamar mandi bersih (ini yang paling penting, karena saya tidak suka jorok), kasurnya juga nyaman, meskipun bantal agak keras. Yang membuat hotel ini luar biasa, selama Nyepi saluran TV mana yang semuanya, hotel ini menampilkan box office film di saluran internal mereka, sehingga kita masih bisa menonton televisi. Acara malam, mereka juga menonton film malam di ruang penemuan. Jadi tamu tidak merasa bosan. Malam kami juga diizinkan duduk dan melihat bintang -bintang kolam, asalkan tidak berisik dan menyalakan cahaya. 

Roomnya anak -anak yang cukup baik, sayangnya kami tidak bisa mencoba spa karena pada hari Nyepi, overall penuh, keluarga saya dan merasa nyaman menghabiskan tahun ini liburan Nyepi di sini. Hotel direkomendasikan untuk mereka yang memiliki anggaran yang cukup. Tidak mahal, tapi layanan yang bagus.

Review:
I've stayed in this hotel twice for business purpose - surprisingly it's not as crowded and noisy as I thought it would be. The location which is in the business district probably is the reason why. The service is very good, hotel staff are friendly and attentive. This hotel used to belong to Aston and previously called Quest hotel, I guess now they want to detach themselves from Aston. 
Some things that can be improved are the wifi; twice I've been there, they always had problems with it. There is no gym available yet, I'm not sure whether they will provide one in the future as I've seen several fitness equipment lying around unused. 
If you don't mind taking taxis to go to the tourist areas, and prefer a quiet hotel where you can have a good rest, then I'd recommend this hotel. 
They do have an hourly shuttle service to several destinations around Kuta and Legian.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya telah tinggal di hotel ini dua kali untuk tujuan bisnis - secara mengejutkan itu tidak ramai dan berisik seperti yang saya kira. Lokasi yang ada di kawasan bisnis mungkin adalah alasan mengapa. Layanan ini sangat baik, staf hotel ramah dan penuh perhatian. Hotel ini dulu milik Aston dan sebelumnya disebut Quest Hotel, saya kira sekarang mereka ingin melepaskan diri dari Aston. 
Beberapa hal yang dapat ditingkatkan adalah wifi; Dua kali saya pernah ke sana, mereka selalu memiliki masalah dengannya. Belum ada gym yang tersedia, saya tidak yakin apakah mereka akan menyediakan satu di masa depan karena saya telah melihat beberapa peralatan kebugaran tergeletak di sekitar yang tidak digunakan. 
Jika Anda tidak keberatan naik taksi untuk pergi ke daerah wisata, dan lebih suka hotel yang tenang di mana Anda dapat beristirahat dengan baik, maka saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini. 
Mereka memang memiliki layanan antar -jemput per jam ke beberapa tujuan di sekitar Kuta dan Legian.

Review: We're domestic travelers. Upon check in (we got room 111 last 08/03/13) we've served very well. Hotel staffs are friendly & helpful. None of them shown sullen / awkward face as domestic traveler sometimes received. Even though after we landed @ngurah rai, we still facing some documentation lag with living social but hotel's management still approved us to come in only with minor conditions. Location is ok, many alternate path road so you'll save from legian's traffic jam & near bypass road ease you to traveling by car. Breakfast menus are oke ( i missed your scramble egg already LOL), Room is clean & neat + all facility work properly as they should be ( minus point only for the refrig, not cold at all), Pool's also clean & wide enough for swim. This hotel also got my extra rating for it's staff honesty...Few hours after check out, my wife got this called from reservation staff said that we left our pocket camera at the room & they've secured it...greattt :thumbs up.

Review_Bahasa: Kami adalah pelancong domestik. Setelah check -in (kami mendapat ruang 111 terakhir 08/03/13) kami telah melayani dengan sangat baik. Staf hotel ramah & membantu. Tak satu pun dari mereka menunjukkan wajah cemberut / canggung seperti yang kadang -kadang diterima oleh pelancong domestik. Meskipun setelah kami mendarat @ngurah Rai, kami masih menghadapi beberapa dokumentasi dengan sosial tetapi manajemen hotel masih menyetujui kami untuk datang hanya dengan kondisi kecil. Lokasi baik -baik saja, banyak jalan jalur alternatif sehingga Anda akan menyimpan dari kemacetan lalu lintas Legian & di dekat jalan bypass memudahkan Anda bepergian dengan mobil. Menu sarapan adalah oke (saya melewatkan telur macet Anda LOL), kamar bersih & rapi + semua fasilitas berfungsi dengan baik sebagaimana mestinya (minus titik hanya untuk refrig, tidak dingin sama sekali), kolam renang juga bersih & cukup lebar untuk berenang. Hotel ini juga mendapat peringkat tambahan saya untuk kejujuran stafnya ... beberapa jam setelah check out, istri saya mendapat ini dipanggil dari staf reservasi mengatakan bahwa kami meninggalkan kamera saku kami di kamar & mereka telah mengamankannya ... Greattt: jempol ke atas.

Subjeck: Good value but surrounding area requires improvement
Review: We came across this hotel when researching TA and found the price quoted on the website excellent for the standard of room. Having been to Bali a few times before, we were familiar with the location and realised it would be a short distance from the main Kuta/Legian stretch but knew the walk wouldn't be unreasonable and taxi's easy to come by. I'm pleased to say our room was replenished with water daily, but our belongings remained safe and untouched. The staff were extremely pleasant, with a special mention to Edy who collected us from the airport and always greeted us with a smile and quick chat whenever we bumped into him; another to Lusi who was always helpful at the Reception desk; and to Widia from the Hotel Spa, who became more like a friend to me. Another quick mention to Agustin from the Spa and a lovely young man at the Pool Bar who spent an afternoon chatting with us about music and other interesting topics (sorry, I didn't get his name). Without a doubt, the staff here are the hotel's best assest, always remembering your name and appearing happy, including those working the breakfast shift. On that note, after 10 days, the breakfast selection was fairly similar each day and became rather boring. We were most disappointed that bacon was not available on demand and when ordered only a measly few shrivelled up pieces are delivered to your table. Another reviewer has mentioned the absence of cereal, which would have been a welcome change, e.g. muesli with yogurt. On one occasion, a round of fruit smoothies were offered, which was a nice treat. The room was perfect and much larger than we even imagined. We booked a Studio room, on the second floor, which you could access by stairs or lift. The room included a large bathroom with at least a double size shower alcove, although no shelving or storage space to hold toiletries, so the basin area was always crowded. We also had a balcony facing the pool, which was a much nicer view than rooms facing the opposite direction and came in handy on the evening we suffered a minor blackout. I was quite impressed with the room for the price we paid and would stay here again for that reason alone. However, with two airconditioners in the room, the cooling was rather mediocre. The pictures of the pool were quite deceiving and it wasn't anywhere near as large as I had anticipated. The hotel spa was private and ambient and the prices were reasonable, with guests regulaly offered discount. The staff, who I have mentioned previously were delightful and very good at their job - I would definitely recommend using the in-house spa. The hotel also offers guest activites, such as Balinese dancing, towel origami, language lessons, temple visits, etc. Unfortunately we did not have the time to fit this in, but I thought this was a nice addition. As usual, Laundry service is available through the hotel, but I found it rather expensive and my clothes didn't smell as nice as they have in the past. Wi-fi was readily available from the room and although I had issues connecting on the first day, this was quickly resolved with a call to the IT staff member who sat with me and my laptop to fix the connection. The most negative comments I have about the hotel is the surrounding area. Although I knew the location was out of the main stretch, I didn't realise just how little was accessible in the area. Unfortunately, I also agree with a recent reviewer, we also found the hotel security to be lax and although they were ever present, I would not say diligent. It appeared anyone could waltz in without being challenged and there were a number of ways to enter the premises on foot. As for vehicle entrance, I also found the parking booth attendants to be inconsistent, sometimes charging drivers to enter and other times just waving through. As I write this review and add pictures, I realise there wasn't any nice garden area to the hotel, which would have a lot to do with location. Perhaps this didn't affect our time too much as we were without child and visited a beautiful scenic area of Ubud to break up the stay, but this is a serious disadvantage to the property. Overall, our stay here was pleasant, trouble free and worth the price we paid. I would like to see the area improved before I would choose to stay here again.
Review_English: We came across this hotel when researching TA and found the price quoted on the website excellent for the standard of room. Having been to Bali a few times before, we were familiar with the location and realised it would be a short distance from the main Kuta/Legian stretch but knew the walk wouldn't be unreasonable and taxi's easy to come by. I'm pleased to say our room was replenished with water daily, but our belongings remained safe and untouched. The staff were extremely pleasant, with a special mention to Edy who collected us from the airport and always greeted us with a smile and quick chat whenever we bumped into him; another to Lusi who was always helpful at the Reception desk; and to Widia from the Hotel Spa, who became more like a friend to me. Another quick mention to Agustin from the Spa and a lovely young man at the Pool Bar who spent an afternoon chatting with us about music and other interesting topics (sorry, I didn't get his name). Without a doubt, the staff here are the hotel's best assest, always remembering your name and appearing happy, including those working the breakfast shift. On that note, after 10 days, the breakfast selection was fairly similar each day and became rather boring. The room included a large bathroom with at least a double size shower alcove, although no shelving or storage space to hold toiletries, so the basin area was always crowded. We also had a balcony facing the pool, which was a much nicer view than rooms facing the opposite direction.
Review_Bahasa: Kami menemukan hotel ini ketika meneliti TA dan menemukan harga yang dikutip di situs web yang sangat baik untuk standar kamar. Setelah ke Bali beberapa kali sebelumnya, kami akrab dengan lokasi dan menyadari itu akan tidak jauh dari peregangan utama Kuta/Legian tetapi tahu jalan itu tidak akan masuk akal dan taksi mudah didapat. Saya senang mengatakan kamar kami diisi ulang dengan air setiap hari, tetapi barang -barang kami tetap aman dan tidak tersentuh. Staf sangat menyenangkan, dengan menyebutkan khusus kepada Edy yang mengumpulkan kami dari bandara dan selalu menyambut kami sambil tersenyum dan mengobrol cepat setiap kali kami menabraknya; yang lain untuk Lusi yang selalu membantu di meja resepsionis; Dan ke Widia dari hotel spa, yang menjadi lebih seperti teman bagi saya. Disebutkan cepat lainnya untuk Agustin dari spa dan seorang pemuda yang cantik di bar biliar yang menghabiskan sore mengobrol dengan kami tentang musik dan topik menarik lainnya (maaf, saya tidak mendapatkan namanya). Tanpa ragu, staf di sini adalah Assest Terbaik Hotel, selalu mengingat nama Anda dan tampak bahagia, termasuk mereka yang bekerja di shift sarapan. Pada catatan itu, setelah 10 hari, pilihan sarapan cukup mirip setiap hari dan menjadi agak membosankan. Kami paling kecewa bahwa Bacon tidak tersedia sesuai permintaan dan ketika dipesan hanya sedikit potongan yang diselimuti disampaikan ke meja Anda. Peninjau lain telah menyebutkan tidak adanya sereal, yang akan menjadi perubahan yang disambut baik, mis. muesli dengan yogurt. Pada satu kesempatan, putaran smoothie buah ditawarkan, yang merupakan suguhan yang bagus. Ruangan itu sempurna dan jauh lebih besar dari yang kita bayangkan. Kami memesan ruang studio, di lantai dua, yang dapat Anda akses dengan tangga atau angkat. Kamar termasuk kamar mandi besar dengan setidaknya ceruk pancuran ukuran ganda, meskipun tidak ada ruang rak atau penyimpanan untuk menampung perlengkapan mandi, sehingga area baskom selalu ramai. Kami juga memiliki balkon yang menghadap ke kolam renang, yang merupakan pemandangan yang jauh lebih bagus daripada kamar yang menghadap ke arah yang berlawanan dan berguna pada malam hari kami menderita pemadaman kecil. Saya cukup terkesan dengan kamar untuk harga yang kami bayar dan akan tinggal di sini lagi karena alasan itu saja. Namun, dengan dua pendukung udara di ruangan itu, pendinginannya agak biasa -biasa saja. Foto -foto kolam renang cukup menipu dan itu tidak sedekat yang saya perkirakan. Spa hotel bersifat pribadi dan ambient dan harganya masuk akal, dengan tamu Regulaly menawarkan diskon. Staf, yang saya sebutkan sebelumnya menyenangkan dan sangat baik dalam pekerjaan mereka - saya pasti akan merekomendasikan menggunakan spa in -house. Hotel ini juga menawarkan kegiatan tamu, seperti tarian Bali, origami handuk, pelajaran bahasa, kunjungan kuil, dll. Sayangnya kami tidak punya waktu untuk menyesuaikan ini, tetapi saya pikir ini adalah tambahan yang bagus. Seperti biasa, layanan binatu tersedia melalui hotel, tetapi saya merasa agak mahal dan pakaian saya tidak sebagus yang mereka miliki di masa lalu. Wi-Fi sudah tersedia dari ruangan dan meskipun saya memiliki masalah yang terhubung pada hari pertama, ini dengan cepat diselesaikan dengan panggilan ke anggota staf TI yang duduk bersama saya dan laptop saya untuk memperbaiki koneksi. Komentar paling negatif yang saya miliki tentang hotel adalah daerah sekitarnya. Meskipun saya tahu lokasi itu di luar peregangan utama, saya tidak menyadari betapa sedikitnya yang dapat diakses di daerah tersebut. Sayangnya, saya juga setuju dengan peninjau baru -baru ini, kami juga menemukan keamanan hotel longgar dan meskipun mereka pernah hadir, saya tidak akan mengatakan rajin. Tampaknya siapa pun bisa melenggang tanpa ditantang dan ada sejumlah cara untuk memasuki tempat dengan berjalan kaki. Sedangkan untuk pintu masuk kendaraan, saya juga menemukan pelayan booth parkir tidak konsisten, kadang -kadang menagih pengemudi untuk masuk dan di waktu lain hanya melambai. Saat saya menulis ulasan ini dan menambahkan gambar, saya menyadari tidak ada area taman yang bagus untuk hotel, yang akan banyak berkaitan dengan lokasi. Mungkin ini tidak mempengaruhi waktu kita terlalu banyak karena kita tanpa anak dan mengunjungi area indah Ubud untuk memecah tinggal, tetapi ini adalah kerugian serius bagi properti. Secara keseluruhan, kami tinggal di sini menyenangkan, bebas masalah dan sepadan dengan harga yang kami bayar. Saya ingin melihat area ditingkatkan sebelum saya memilih untuk tinggal di sini lagi.

Review:
We have stayed at this hotel several times (maybe 10 at least). We always preferred the location (we live on the ocean a couple hours away so no need for expensive hotels when we come in to shop) because it was central and parking was right in front of the hotel with all night security...we thought! Last Friday we shopped late and had all our food in a cooler so we could leave early in the morning. We parked right in front and retired for the evening. When my husband went to the car in the am our car had been broken into and everything cleaned out. The cooler was filled to the brim and very heavy so it had to have been taken by more than 1 person or someone in a car. It would have taken a couple of trips if only 1 person so supposedly there was more than 1. Oddly my husband was awakened around 2am by some loud drunks wandering home from the bars (Western he believed) and eventually went back to sleep. Security was clearly NOT on the job (sleeping? distracted elsewhere?)! The manager and security team had no idea what could have happened. 

If the Security was doing their job they would have surely noticed the drunks and since it's directly in front of the hotel with all the bright lights should have seen or heard any other disturbance within meters of the entrance. Having lived in Bali for many years we understand there was nothing we could do when they claimed complete and total shock that this could happen. Getting angry would do nothing and the loss of well over $300.00 worth of missing items could have been worse. However we can never trust this place again!

Sad, because the staff who work at the hotel are delightful young kids who love practicing their English and were a pleasure to be around. We will miss them.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami telah tinggal di hotel ini beberapa kali (setidaknya 10). Kami selalu lebih suka lokasi (kami tinggal di laut beberapa jam jauhnya jadi tidak perlu hotel -hotel mahal ketika kami datang untuk berbelanja) karena itu pusat dan parkir tepat di depan hotel dengan keamanan sepanjang malam ... kami pikir! Jumat lalu kami berbelanja terlambat dan memiliki semua makanan kami dalam pendingin sehingga kami bisa pergi pagi -pagi sekali. Kami parkir tepat di depan dan pensiun untuk malam itu. Ketika suami saya pergi ke mobil di pagi hari mobil kami telah dibersihkan dan semuanya dibersihkan. Pendingin itu dipenuhi dengan penuh dan sangat berat sehingga harus diambil oleh lebih dari 1 orang atau seseorang di dalam mobil. Itu akan mengambil beberapa perjalanan jika hanya 1 orang sehingga seharusnya ada lebih dari 1. Anehnya suamiku terbangun sekitar jam 2 pagi oleh beberapa pemabuk yang berkeliaran di bar (Barat yang dia yakini) dan akhirnya kembali tidur. Keamanan jelas tidak bekerja (tidur? Terganggu di tempat lain?)! Manajer dan tim keamanan tidak tahu apa yang bisa terjadi. 

Jika keamanan melakukan pekerjaan mereka, mereka pasti akan memperhatikan para pemabuk dan karena itu langsung di depan hotel dengan semua lampu terang seharusnya melihat atau mendengar gangguan lain dalam meter pintu masuk. Setelah tinggal di Bali selama bertahun -tahun kami memahami tidak ada yang bisa kami lakukan ketika mereka mengklaim kejutan total dan total bahwa ini bisa terjadi. Marah tidak akan melakukan apa pun dan hilangnya barang yang hilang lebih dari $ 300,00 bisa lebih buruk. Namun kita tidak akan pernah bisa mempercayai tempat ini lagi!

Sedih, karena staf yang bekerja di hotel adalah anak -anak muda yang menyenangkan yang suka berlatih bahasa Inggris mereka dan senang berada di sekitar. Kami akan merindukan mereka.

Subjeck: This hotel not good for longer stay
Review:
My husband and i stayed at this hotel for one month.when we check in they gave our room upgrade to studio room.beginning our stay the services was wonderful and staff was friendly after That the services was not satisfy.the roomboy not change the bed cover when They knew That bed cover was so dirty They just reversed the position of the bed cover and given fragrances. 
We ordered roomservices They forget to bring the tar tar sauce for our fish and chip. 
Breakfast is very boring because the menu is always Same everyday. For the people who planning stay longer in bali which i would recommed this hotel is not good for long stay.

We ordered roomservices They forget to bring the tar tar sauce for our fish and chip. 
Breakfast is very boring because the menu is always Same everyday. For the people who planning stay longer in bali which i would recommed this hotel is not good for long stay.

Review_Bahasa:
Suami saya dan saya tinggal di hotel ini selama satu bulan. Ketika kami check -in, mereka memberikan upgrade kamar kami ke ruang studio. Menghentikan kami tinggal, layanannya luar biasa dan staf ramah setelah itu layanan tidak memuaskan. Roomboy tidak mengubah penutup tempat tidur ketika mereka tahu bahwa penutup tempat tidur begitu kotor sehingga mereka baru saja membalikkan posisi penutup tempat tidur dan diberi wangi. 
Kami memesan layanan kamar mereka lupa membawa saus tar tar untuk ikan dan chip kami. 
Sarapan sangat membosankan karena menunya selalu sama setiap hari. Untuk orang -orang yang berencana tinggal lebih lama di Bali yang saya rekomendasikan hotel ini tidak baik untuk tinggal lama.
Review_Clean:
Suami saya dan saya tinggal di hotel ini selama satu bulan. Ketika kami check -in, mereka memberikan upgrade kamar kami ke ruang studio. Menghentikan kami tinggal, layanannya luar biasa dan staf ramah setelah itu layanan tidak memuaskan. Roomboy tidak mengubah penutup tempat tidur ketika mereka tahu bahwa penutup tempat tidur begitu kotor sehingga mereka baru saja membalikkan posisi penutup tempat tidur dan diberi wangi. 
Kami memesan layanan kamar mereka lupa membawa saus tar tar untuk ikan dan chip kami. 
Sarapan sangat membosankan karena menunya selalu sama setiap hari. Untuk orang -orang yang berencana tinggal lebih lama di Bali yang saya rekomendasikan hotel ini tidak baik untuk tinggal lama.

Review:
dont know about other type of rooms but studio room here was amazing with good bathroom. staff is very good and helping, service excellent, very good hospitality, good location (2 kms from beach). 
easy to hire scooty and car from here 

strongly recommend.

Review: Stayed at Quest Central Park Kuta for 10 nights. All staff were very helpful and cheerful. The hotel itself was very clean. The location was perfect for us, just far enough away from all the noise of Kuta but easy walk. Taxi cost .50 cents(AUD) to Legian road for shopping and dining and about $2.00(AUD) to Kuta square. It was about 15 min walk to beach, however hotel has courtesy bus for free that goes to beach thru day. Large supermarket,Bank,and coffe shop within 2 minutes walk. Overall quite a good Hotel and excellent staff. I would stay again if we go back to Bali.

Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di Quest Central Park Kuta selama 10 malam. Semua staf sangat membantu dan ceria. Hotel itu sendiri sangat bersih. Lokasi sangat cocok untuk kami, cukup jauh dari semua suara Kuta tetapi mudah berjalan. Biaya taksi .50 sen (AUD) ke Legian Road untuk berbelanja dan makan dan sekitar $ 2,00 (AUD) ke Kuta Square. Itu sekitar 15 menit berjalan kaki ke pantai, namun hotel memiliki bus gratis secara gratis yang pergi ke pantai sampai hari. Toko supermarket, bank, dan coffe yang besar dalam waktu 2 menit berjalan kaki. Secara keseluruhan hotel yang cukup bagus dan staf yang sangat baik. Saya akan tinggal lagi jika kita kembali ke Bali.

Review: Kuta Central Park is a lovely little escape from the busy streets of Kuta. Although language differences can be a little difficult at times, the staff are more than accommodating to any and all needs. And since we were travelling with in a group of 15 with two little ones, having such wonderful service and facilities was always appreciated. The location itself is off a main road which is handy because there are always taxis, and the walk to the major shopping streets is an experience you wont forget. The included breakfast was delicious and the dinner menu was varied and cheap. Even better, happy hour lasts for 2 & 1/2 hours in the afternoon by the pool with music. Definitely welcoming after a day exploring!

Review_Bahasa: Kuta Central Park adalah pelarian kecil yang indah dari jalanan Kuta yang sibuk. Meskipun perbedaan bahasa kadang -kadang bisa sedikit sulit, staf lebih dari menampung semua kebutuhan. Dan karena kami bepergian dengan dalam sekelompok 15 dengan dua anak kecil, memiliki layanan dan fasilitas yang luar biasa selalu dihargai. Lokasi itu sendiri berada di luar jalan utama yang berguna karena selalu ada taksi, dan berjalan ke jalan -jalan perbelanjaan utama adalah pengalaman yang tidak akan Anda lupakan. Sarapan yang disertakan sangat lezat dan menu makan malam bervariasi dan murah. Bahkan lebih baik, happy hour berlangsung selama 2 & 1/2 jam di sore hari di tepi kolam renang dengan musik. Pastikan menyambut setelah sehari menjelajahi!

Pastikan menyambut setelah sehari menjelajahi!

Review:
Stayed at the quest for 4 nights. Rooms clean and tidy. Staff are very friendly and go out of their way to assist. Reception arranged room change for us near the pool at no extra charge. Breakfast is ok not that much for westeners but still ok. Only one complaint, did not see any cereals. Were at hotel on valentines day and they put on lovely candle light dinner by the pool. 
Excellent presentation and 5 course dinner for 150,000 Rph each. I would recommend this hotel as it is very moderately priced and excellent value for money. Redevelopement under way in central park but area is clean and quite secure with security gates in and out.

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di pencarian selama 4 malam. Kamar bersih dan rapi. Staf sangat ramah dan berusaha keras untuk membantu. Penerimaan mengatur ganti kamar untuk kami di dekat kolam tanpa biaya tambahan. Sarapan tidak terlalu banyak untuk Westeners tapi tetap baik -baik saja. Hanya satu keluhan, tidak melihat sereal. Berada di hotel pada Hari Kasih Sayang dan mereka memakai makan malam ringan lilin di tepi kolam renang. 
Presentasi yang sangat baik dan 5 makan malam untuk masing -masing 150.000 RPH. Saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini karena harganya sangat murah dan bernilai uang yang sangat baik. Pembangunan kembali yang sedang berlangsung di Central Park tetapi area bersih dan cukup aman dengan gerbang keamanan masuk dan keluar.

Review: Don't stay at this hole. Got to my room after walking through what felt like spring break in Mexico. Peeled back sheets with crap all over....not clean at all. I told them to come and change them. Bathroom was scummy. Included breakfast was actually pretty good. The location is not very good to central Legian St. If you catch a cab, make sure to tell them to run the meter. Don't start the convo with "how much". If you want o grab some snacks/drinks fir your room, there's a racket behind near Ace Hardware ... But like I said,don't stay at this hole!

Review_Bahasa: Jangan tinggal di lubang ini. Sampai ke kamar saya setelah berjalan melalui apa yang terasa seperti liburan musim semi di Meksiko. Kupas kembali lembaran dengan omong kosong .... tidak bersih sama sekali. Saya mengatakan kepada mereka untuk datang dan mengubahnya. Kamar mandi itu crasmy. Termasuk sarapan sebenarnya cukup bagus. Lokasi tidak terlalu bagus untuk Central Legian St. Jika Anda naik taksi, pastikan untuk memberi tahu mereka untuk menjalankan meteran. Jangan memulai obrolan dengan "berapa banyak". Jika Anda ingin o mengambil beberapa makanan ringan/minuman, piringkan kamar Anda, ada raket di belakang dekat Ace Hardware ... tapi seperti yang saya katakan, jangan tinggal di lubang ini!

Review:
Hotel ini merupakan salah satu alternatif pilihan selama berlibur di Bali karena lokasinya sangat strategis, dengan akses yang gampang dan selalu bebas hambatan kemacetan. 
Pelayanan di hotel ini setaraf dengan pelayanan hotel berbintang empat, fasilitas kamar tidur yang nyaman memberikan motivasi tersendiri untuk menikmati liburan anda setelah seharian bepergian.
Review_English:
This hotel is one alternative choice during a vacation in Bali because its location is very strategic, with easy access and always free of congestion. 
Services at this hotel are equal with four -star hotel services, comfortable bedroom facilities provide their own motivation to enjoy your vacation after a day of traveling.
Review_Summary:

Services at this hotel are equal with four -star hotel services, comfortable bedroom facilities provide their own motivation to enjoy your vacation after a day of traveling.

Layanan di hotel ini sama dengan layanan hotel bintang empat, fasilitas kamar tidur yang nyaman memberikan motivasi mereka sendiri untuk menikmati liburan Anda setelah seharian bepergian.

Review:
staying here for one night. Friendly staffs served us very well when we checked in. The room's big & clean. There's free wifi in the room, so it's very convenient for us to finish our work & send email to our head office. Breakfast was good for 3 star hotel standard, however it's a bit crowded. 
Recommended for a family with young children, because the room's spacious & it's easy to find cafe & restaurant around.

Tinggal di sini selama satu malam. Staf yang ramah melayani kami dengan sangat baik ketika kami check -in. Kamar besar & bersih. Ada wifi gratis di kamar, jadi sangat nyaman bagi kami untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan kami & mengirim email ke kantor pusat kami. Sarapan baik untuk standar hotel bintang 3, namun agak ramai. 
Direkomendasikan untuk keluarga dengan anak kecil, karena kamarnya luas & mudah untuk menemukan kafe & restoran di sekitar.

Review:
Pelayanan yang baik yang saya dapatkan di hotel ini. Lokasi di tengah kota yang dekat dengan lokasi kerja saya, sehingga memudahkan saya. 
Kamar hotel yang luas, diluar ekpektasi saya. 
Staff hotel yang sangat ramah dan untuk sarapan pagi banyak macamnya yang dapat dinikmati dengan area yang luas, tanpa harus kuatir kekurangan tempat duduk.
Review_English:
The good service that I got at this hotel. The location in the middle of the city is close to my work location, making it easier for me. 
Spacious hotel rooms, outside of my expectations. 
Hotel staff are very friendly and for breakfast many kinds can be enjoyed with a large area, without having to worry about lack of seating.

Spacious hotel rooms, outside of my expectations. 
Hotel staff are very friendly and for breakfast many kinds can be enjoyed with a large area, without having to worry about lack of seating.

Layanan bagus yang saya dapatkan di hotel ini. Lokasi di tengah kota dekat dengan lokasi kerja saya, membuatnya lebih mudah bagi saya. 
Kamar hotel yang luas, di luar harapan saya. 
Staf hotel sangat ramah dan untuk sarapan banyak jenis dapat dinikmati dengan area yang luas, tanpa harus khawatir tentang kurangnya tempat duduk.

Review: Jetstar put a lot of us in here when they postponed our flight. Room was comfortable, spacious & clean. Hotel put on a "scratch" meal at, I assume short notice for a large number of unexpected guests at 10pm that was adequate given the circumstances. Buffet breakfast was good. Wi fi included in tariff. Only quibble is that the "free" water was limited to two very small glass bottles. I think it's a little too far if you want to spend a lot of time on the beach.

Wi fi termasuk dalam tarif. Hanya berdalih adalah bahwa air "bebas" terbatas pada dua botol kaca yang sangat kecil. Saya pikir itu agak terlalu jauh jika Anda ingin menghabiskan banyak waktu di pantai.

Review: It is good if you just intend to stay in Bali for transit or if you have a car for the trip. Alot of Indonesians stay here. The hotel room is very clean, although smallish as we stayed in the standard room and the staffs are friendly. I don't really like the design of the pool. I would not recommend for families with young children to stay here as I don't think they would enjoy it.

Review: Stayed at this hotel for 7 nights and was really impressed! when we first got there our rooms weren't quite ready, so they happily upgraded us to a bigger room and two king beds instead of two single beds. The staff were amazing and so friendly (especially the bar staff) good location, more closer to legian than anything. would defiantly stay there again. aircon worked fine.. We just left a key in the key holder whenever we left to keep the electricity on and took another key to get into our rooms. Food was pretty good as well!

We just left a key in the key holder whenever we left to keep the electricity on and took another key to get into our rooms. Food was pretty good as well!
Review_Bahasa: Tinggal di hotel ini selama 7 malam dan sangat terkesan! Ketika kami pertama kali sampai di sana kamar kami tidak cukup siap, jadi mereka dengan senang hati meningkatkan kami ke kamar yang lebih besar dan dua tempat tidur king, bukan dua tempat tidur tunggal. Stafnya luar biasa dan sangat ramah (terutama staf bar) lokasi yang baik, lebih dekat dengan Legian daripada apa pun. akan menantang tetap di sana lagi. Aircon bekerja dengan baik .. kami baru saja meninggalkan kunci di pemegang kunci setiap kali kami pergi untuk menjaga listrik dan mengambil kunci lain untuk masuk ke kamar kami. Makanan juga cukup enak!

Makanan juga cukup enak!

Review: Hotel yang masih tergolong baru, desain minimalist, breakfast lumayan, ukuran kamar juga cukup luas, kolam renang dan area bermain anak jg bagus.. Hanya saja lokasinya jauh dari pantai. Hotel yang cukup bagus di kelasnya.
Review_English: Hotels that are still relatively new, minimalist designs, decent breakfast, room size is also quite spacious, swimming pool and children's play areas are also good ... it's just that the location is far from the beach. A pretty good hotel in its class.

Review:
First time to Bali and stayed for 3 nights. This hotel exceeded our expectations, probably because it was newly built, the whole place has a vibrant feel. The room was very spacious and comfortable, with all amenities you'll need, and 2 air conditioners in the room functioned well. The pool is rather small but you can't fault it for its price. The breakfast was great, (really doubt previous reviews complaining about the lack of variety for the price paid) there's a mixture of local indonesian food and western (pancakes, waffles, crepes made on the spot, omelettes/poached eggs made upon order). 

Location wise, it's right smack in Kuta. A 10 min taxi ride (less than $2usd) will get you to where the clubs are. The hotel provides a free shuttle bus service to Legian beach and to Discovery Mall if you book in advance. The shuttle service is reliable and punctual. There are eating places and convenience stores just across the hotel. 

Front desk staff and shuttle bus driver were extremely friendly, polite and helpful. We had a very pleasant stay. Overall very value for money, will definitely come back again

Review_Bahasa:
Pertama kali ke Bali dan tinggal selama 3 malam. Hotel ini melebihi harapan kami, mungkin karena baru dibangun, seluruh tempat memiliki nuansa yang semarak. Ruangan itu sangat luas dan nyaman, dengan semua fasilitas yang Anda butuhkan, dan 2 AC di ruangan berfungsi dengan baik. Kolam renang agak kecil tetapi Anda tidak bisa menyalahkan harganya. Sarapannya luar biasa, (benar -benar ragu ulasan sebelumnya mengeluh tentang kurangnya variasi untuk harga yang dibayarkan) Ada campuran makanan lokal Indonesia dan barat (pancake, wafel, crepes yang dibuat di tempat, telur dadar/telur rebus yang dibuat sesuai pesanan). 

Lokasi bijaksana, itu tepat di Kuta. Naik taksi 10 menit (kurang dari $ 2USD) akan membawa Anda ke tempat klub berada. Hotel ini menyediakan layanan bus antar -jemput gratis ke Legian Beach dan untuk Discovery Mall jika Anda memesan terlebih dahulu. Layanan antar -jemput dapat diandalkan dan tepat waktu. Ada tempat makan dan toko serba ada di seberang hotel. 

Staf meja depan dan sopir bus antar -jemput sangat ramah, sopan dan membantu. Kami memiliki tinggal yang sangat menyenangkan. Secara keseluruhan nilai uang, pasti akan kembali lagi

Review:
Our return flight from Bali was cancelled and Jetstar arranged an extra night stay (fully paid for) at the Quest Hotel. 

When we checked into our room, the air conditioning was not working. However, to their credit, it was repaired immediately on our request. 

We also found the meals average, and they were not "replenished or restocked" often enough. The variety was also lacking a little and was more focussed on local food for breakfast, with very little "Western" type food. (Our kids were that keen on noodles and rice for breakfast)! 

The swimming pool is rather small and the setting is not really one conducive to a relaxing holiday. It is more suited to a short stay, and probably not ideal for families with young children. 

However, the rooms were comfortable and the location is fairly central for those looking for a more budget type accommodation.
