Review_Bahasa:
Penerbangan kembali kami dari Bali dibatalkan dan Jetstar mengatur menginap malam tambahan (dibayar penuh) di Quest Hotel. 

Ketika kami check -in ke kamar kami, AC tidak berfungsi. Namun, untuk kredit mereka, itu segera diperbaiki berdasarkan permintaan kami. 

Kami juga menemukan rata -rata makanan, dan mereka tidak "diisi ulang atau diisi ulang" cukup sering. Varietasnya juga kurang sedikit dan lebih fokus pada makanan lokal untuk sarapan, dengan makanan tipe "barat" yang sangat sedikit. (Anak -anak kami sangat tertarik pada mie dan nasi untuk sarapan)! 

Kolam renang agak kecil dan pengaturannya tidak benar -benar kondusif untuk liburan yang santai. Ini lebih cocok untuk kunjungan singkat, dan mungkin tidak ideal untuk keluarga dengan anak kecil. 

Namun, kamar -kamarnya nyaman dan lokasinya cukup sentral bagi mereka yang mencari akomodasi jenis anggaran yang lebih.

Review:
Stayed here one night only, the rooms were spacious but with 2 aircons it was still too warm. I was on the top floor and I have a few animals running along the roof most of the night so terrible sleep. Hotel is a rabbit warren with rooms everywhere, found it was noisy with doors banging and people talking.. 
Breakfast and dinner were buffet and not very interesting or tasty. Breakfast is very indonesian and very small western menu. 
Pool area very small and would hate to have room right in front as there is no privacy. 
Its a distance to the hustle and bustle of Kuta so the atmosphere is not really there as you can't just go for a walk to find a bar or restaurant

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di sini hanya satu malam, kamar -kamarnya luas tetapi dengan 2 aircon masih terlalu hangat. Saya berada di lantai paling atas dan saya memiliki beberapa hewan yang berlari di sepanjang atap hampir sepanjang malam sehingga tidur yang mengerikan. Hotel adalah kelinci Warren dengan kamar di mana -mana, ternyata berisik dengan pintu menggedor dan orang -orang berbicara .. 
Sarapan dan makan malam adalah prasmanan dan tidak terlalu menarik atau enak. Sarapan sangat Indonesia dan menu barat yang sangat kecil. 
Area kolam sangat kecil dan akan benci memiliki kamar tepat di depan karena tidak ada privasi. 
Jaraknya ke keramaian dan kesibukan Kuta sehingga suasananya tidak benar -benar ada karena Anda tidak bisa hanya berjalan -jalan untuk menemukan bar atau restoran

Review: This Hotel was so bright and beautiful. Bit of a walk to kuta, but take advantage of the isolation - it is very quiet. The staff were excellent and catered for all our extra needs. Thanks to Dewi, JeJe and Deasy. The rooms are very clean and spacious. Pool clean and friendly pool staff. The massages were excellent. Thanks to all who made our holiday very comfortable. Denise and Brian Perth.

Denise and Brian Perth.

Denise and Brian Perth.

Terima kasih kepada Dewi, Jeje dan Deasy. Kamar sangat bersih dan luas. Staf kolam renang yang bersih dan ramah. Pijatnya sangat baik. Terima kasih untuk semua yang membuat liburan kami sangat nyaman. Denise dan Brian Perth.

Subjeck: Good place but quite far from anywhere
Review:
This hotel located in Kuta Central Park and quite far from anywhere. Maybe it takes about 15 minutes to Legian. So make sure if you stayed in this hotel you've rented a car or scooter. 

Love my staying at this hotel. Staffs were nice. I stayed in superior room and this room was spacious. Large bathroom as well. Also on the second day i stayed in deluxe room, the room has the same size like the standard one but it's include the balcony. The swimming pool is too small and the depth is only 1.2 m. 

So if you want to stay in this hotel: 
1. Superior or deluxe room are spacious. But in deluxe room you have extra balcony 
2. You can stay in standard room which next to the swimming pool 
3. Make sure you rent a car or scooter to take you anywhere. The hotel provides shuttle in certain time. 
4. If this is your first trip to Bali, this place is not recommended. Too far from the beach (like i mention above it takes around 15 minutes)

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini yang terletak di Kuta Central Park dan cukup jauh dari mana saja. Mungkin butuh sekitar 15 menit untuk Legian. Jadi pastikan jika Anda tinggal di hotel ini, Anda telah menyewa mobil atau skuter. 

Cintai saya menginap di hotel ini. Staf bagus. Saya tinggal di kamar superior dan ruangan ini luas. Kamar mandi besar juga. Juga pada hari kedua saya tinggal di ruang mewah, ruangan memiliki ukuran yang sama seperti yang standar tetapi termasuk balkon. Kolam renang terlalu kecil dan kedalamannya hanya 1,2 m. 

Jadi jika Anda ingin tinggal di hotel ini: 
1. Kamar superior atau mewah luas. Tapi di kamar mewah Anda memiliki balkon tambahan 
2. Anda dapat tinggal di kamar standar yang di sebelah kolam renang 
3. Pastikan Anda menyewa mobil atau skuter untuk membawa Anda ke mana pun. Hotel menyediakan pesawat ulang -alik dalam waktu tertentu. 
4. Jika ini adalah perjalanan pertama Anda ke Bali, tempat ini tidak disarankan. Terlalu jauh dari pantai (seperti yang saya sebutkan di atas membutuhkan waktu sekitar 15 menit)

Review:
This hotel is new and fresh. Its is in the Kuta Central complex. You would need to catch a taxi to poppies lane 2 which will cost 10000 ($1 Aus or less) 

Breakfast was plentiful. meal are great. 

the only negative is the pool closes at 7pm but thats because there are rooms on ground floor..... but really thats being picky.

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini baru dan segar. Ini ada di kompleks pusat Kuta. Anda perlu naik taksi ke Poppies Lane 2 yang harganya 100.000 (AUS $ 1 atau kurang) 

Sarapan berlimpah. Makanan sangat enak. 

Satu -satunya negatif adalah kolam ditutup pada jam 7 malam tapi itu karena ada kamar di lantai dasar ..... tapi benar -benar pilih -pilih.

Subjeck: May not for first-timer to Bali
Review:
I was staying in this hotel for 3 nights, and i got free upgrade to junior suit. The room is spacious and clean, and the breakfast is good. 
if you would like to go to Kuta town, it may take you 15-20min walking distance. If you are first time to Bali, and you want to experience the vibrant of the city, this may not your primary choice. 
This hotel does offer shuttle service. Please book at least 1 or 2 day in advance. I missed that as the front dest told us that their 7 seated car is full. 
This hotel is located nearby to Giant hypermarket and also convenient store, less than 10mins walking distance. The convenience store operate until late night. 
If you do not mind the distance to Kuta, you may consider this hotel.

Saya tinggal di hotel ini selama 3 malam, dan saya mendapat upgrade gratis ke jas junior. Kamarnya luas dan bersih, dan sarapannya enak. 
Jika Anda ingin pergi ke kota Kuta, mungkin membawa Anda 15-20 menit berjalan kaki. Jika Anda pertama kali ke Bali, dan Anda ingin mengalami kota yang bersemangat, ini mungkin bukan pilihan utama Anda. 
Hotel ini memang menawarkan layanan antar -jemput. Silakan pesan setidaknya 1 atau 2 hari sebelumnya. Saya melewatkan itu karena Dest Dest memberi tahu kami bahwa mobil mereka yang berumur 7 tahun penuh. 
Hotel ini terletak di dekatnya untuk hypermarket raksasa dan juga toko yang nyaman, kurang dari 10 menit berjalan kaki. Toko serba ada beroperasi hingga larut malam. 
Jika Anda tidak keberatan dengan jarak ke Kuta, Anda dapat mempertimbangkan hotel ini.

Review: we love the hotel so much.very nice and best stay oin kuta. just rent a bike to explore kuta as well.just idr 50k only/per day. tripadvisor really help us because 4d 3n in bali , we just take ols information from tripadvisor and its really impressed.thanx a lot for all reviews.

TripAdvisor sangat membantu kami karena 4d 3n di Bali, kami hanya mengambil informasi OLS dari TripAdvisor dan itu benar -benar terkesan. Itu banyak untuk semua ulasan.

Review: Everything was nice. We rent a bike so we didn't have to walk to beach which is quite far. Breakfast was also nice, not spicy ) clean rooms, safe deposit locker. Nice pool. But no view from windows which are on the streets

Review_Bahasa: Semuanya bagus. Kami menyewa sepeda sehingga kami tidak perlu berjalan ke pantai yang cukup jauh. Sarapan juga bagus, tidak pedas) Kamar bersih, loker deposit yang aman. Kolam yang bagus. Tapi tidak ada pemandangan dari jendela yang ada di jalanan

Review:
We are a young couple who stayed here for 2 weeks. 
Recommendations: rooms sevice was amazing - delicious food we ordered at all times during night, 
The decor is gorgeous and very comfortable large king size beds! 
So glad we organised transport from the Airport with the hotel - they had a big sign with our name on it and the car was clean and airconditioned. 
Very quiet area - if you want peace and no people to meet this is the place. 

Things we didnt like: Breakfast- even though this is included we didnt eat here much because the food was not very european - no cerals or bacon. 
The air con in the room didnt face the bed so it still got a bit warm during some nights. 
The pool bar has no chairs and the drinks are expensive but the pool staff were amusing :) 
The pictures look quite deceiving online I thought the Hotel would be much bigger and that the pool would have been bigger. I wanted to spend a lot of time at the hotle but the pool didnt have much sun. 
Lots of mosiquitos coming from bathroom so had to wear insect repellant to bed every night as we got eaten alive the first 2 nights. 
Would recommend hiring a scooter - as the location is a bit far to walk from kuta beach but we hired a scooter the whole time so scootered everywhere and it was only $50 AUD for 10 days. 

Would'nt stay here again but still enjoyed our stay considering. 
Make sure if you are visiting bali for a special location mention this to the staff as they organised cake and rose petals for our honeymoon.

Review_Bahasa:
Kami adalah pasangan muda yang tinggal di sini selama 2 minggu. 
Rekomendasi: Kamar Sevice luar biasa - makanan lezat yang kami pesan setiap saat pada malam hari, 
Dekorasi itu indah dan sangat nyaman tempat tidur ukuran king besar! 
Sangat senang kami mengatur transportasi dari bandara dengan hotel - mereka memiliki tanda besar dengan nama kami di atasnya dan mobilnya bersih dan ber -AC. 
Area yang sangat tenang - jika Anda ingin kedamaian dan tidak ada orang untuk bertemu ini adalah tempatnya. 

Hal -hal yang tidak kami sukai: sarapan - meskipun ini termasuk kami tidak banyak makan di sini karena makanannya tidak terlalu Eropa - tidak ada ceral atau bacon. 
AC con di kamar tidak menghadap tempat tidur sehingga masih agak hangat selama beberapa malam. 
Bar biliar tidak memiliki kursi dan minumannya mahal tetapi staf kolam itu lucu :) 
Gambar -gambarnya terlihat cukup menipu secara online, saya pikir hotel akan jauh lebih besar dan kolam renang akan lebih besar. Saya ingin menghabiskan banyak waktu di hotle tetapi kolam tidak memiliki banyak sinar matahari. 
Banyak mosiquitos yang datang dari kamar mandi sehingga harus memakai penolak serangga di tempat tidur setiap malam saat kami dimakan hidup -hidup pada 2 malam pertama. 
Akan merekomendasikan untuk menyewa skuter - karena lokasi agak jauh untuk berjalan dari Pantai Kuta tetapi kami menyewa skuter sepanjang waktu sehingga berlari di mana -mana dan itu hanya $ 50 AUD selama 10 hari. 

Tidak akan tinggal di sini lagi tetapi masih menikmati kami tinggal mempertimbangkan. 
Pastikan jika Anda mengunjungi Bali untuk lokasi khusus menyebutkan ini kepada staf karena mereka mengatur kue dan kelopak mawar untuk bulan madu kami.

Subjeck: What a great hotel with wonderful staff
Review: This hotel is fantastic and we cannot say enough about the staff. We chose this hotel from tripadvisor and we were not disappointed. We booked a studio room for $50au per night including breakfast on the internet so we were not sure what this hotel was like, but we were really impressed. The hotel also caters for lunch and dinner in the Lotus Cafe. Our room was great and the breakfast was really nice - if you want anything aussie, just ask, they have everything even Vegemite! This hotel has a handle on progress and what the traveller wants, even to the point of inviting us personally to an afternoon tea with the hotel manager and food and beverage manager, discussing our experience at the hotel and how they can improve anywhere in the hotel. We found this refreshing and very personal. The hotel offers a cooking class for a small fee and they even tailored the class to what we wanted to learn to cook. Also we attended a Monday night BBQ that is now going to become a regular event which was great. They had some traditional dancers that were fantastic. Not to many dances that it becomes boring and the last dance the dancers collect some of the guests at the BBQ and got them on stage to teach them some of the moves...great fun. We could not fault this hotel - yes it is not right in Kuta, but we found this nice and quiet but in saying that it is only a 10min walk to Legian Street (the main street for shopping). We will certainly stay again and looking forward to it.

Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini fantastis dan kami tidak bisa mengatakan cukup tentang staf. Kami memilih hotel ini dari TripAdvisor dan kami tidak kecewa. Kami memesan ruang studio seharga $ 50au per malam termasuk sarapan di internet jadi kami tidak yakin seperti apa hotel ini, tetapi kami benar -benar terkesan. Hotel ini juga melayani makan siang dan makan malam di Lotus Cafe. Kamar kami luar biasa dan sarapannya sangat bagus - jika Anda menginginkan sesuatu yang orang Australia, tanyakan saja, mereka memiliki segalanya bahkan Vegemite! Hotel ini memiliki pegangan tentang kemajuan dan apa yang diinginkan pelancong, bahkan sampai mengundang kami secara pribadi untuk teh sore dengan manajer hotel dan manajer makanan dan minuman, mendiskusikan pengalaman kami di hotel dan bagaimana mereka dapat meningkatkan di mana saja di hotel. Kami menemukan ini menyegarkan dan sangat pribadi. Hotel ini menawarkan kelas memasak dengan sedikit biaya dan mereka bahkan menyesuaikan kelas dengan apa yang ingin kami pelajari untuk memasak. Kami juga menghadiri BBQ Senin malam yang sekarang akan menjadi acara reguler yang hebat. Mereka memiliki beberapa penari tradisional yang fantastis. Tidak untuk banyak tarian yang menjadi membosankan dan tarian terakhir para penari mengumpulkan beberapa tamu di BBQ dan membuat mereka di atas panggung untuk mengajari mereka beberapa gerakan ... sangat menyenangkan. Kami tidak bisa menyalahkan hotel ini - ya itu tidak tepat di Kuta, tetapi kami menemukan ini bagus dan tenang tetapi dengan mengatakan bahwa hanya 10 menit berjalan kaki ke Legian Street (jalan utama untuk berbelanja). Kami pasti akan tinggal lagi dan menantikannya.

Subjeck: Wonderful staff, hotel surrounding buildings not nice to see
Review:
Cannot fault the staff at hotel, service from start to finish was amazing. 
Unfortunately our room had the afternoon sun and the air conditioning wasn't located in a place that was beneficial and struggled to cool the room. ( air con was not pointed at the bed) 
The biggest let down for us was not so much the location but the surroundings of the hotel. 
Sadly it looks like a deserted ghost town. Every single shop has closed down. There is no going for a walk just around your hotel.. There is nothing!! Whilst a taxi only costs $1.50 Aus to get to these places it just wasn't the same for me.. 
There was rarely anyone at the pool bar for even happy hour. Whist it is called a pool bar, their are no seats in the pool to swim up to. It's a bar by the pool.. 
It wasn't a hotel " you hung out at" so if you enjoy the experience of meeting people this place isn't for you.. 
Loved the purple decor around the hotel. 
The best thing about the hotel is its staff.. Nothing was ever too much trouble, always very friendly 
For the price I paid the hotel was great. Would I stay again, no.. But will be back in Bali again soon to discover somewhere new..

Review_Bahasa:
Tidak dapat menyalahkan staf di hotel, layanan dari awal hingga akhir sungguh luar biasa. 
Sayangnya kamar kami memiliki matahari sore dan AC tidak terletak di tempat yang bermanfaat dan berjuang untuk mendinginkan ruangan. (Air con tidak menunjuk ke tempat tidur) 
Kekurangan terbesar bagi kami bukanlah lokasi tetapi lingkungan hotel. 
Sayangnya itu terlihat seperti kota hantu yang sepi. Setiap toko telah ditutup. Tidak ada jalan -jalan di sekitar hotel Anda .. tidak ada apa -apa !! Sementara taksi hanya berharga $ 1,50 untuk sampai ke tempat -tempat ini, itu tidak sama untuk saya .. 
Jarang ada orang di bar biliar untuk bahkan happy hour. Whist itu disebut bar biliar, mereka tidak ada kursi di kolam renang untuk berenang. Ini bar di tepi kolam renang .. 
Itu bukan hotel "Anda nongkrong" jadi jika Anda menikmati pengalaman bertemu orang -orang tempat ini bukan untuk Anda .. 
Menyukai dekorasi ungu di sekitar hotel. 
Hal terbaik tentang hotel adalah stafnya .. tidak ada yang terlalu banyak masalah, selalu sangat ramah 
Untuk harga yang saya bayar hotel itu bagus. Apakah saya akan tinggal lagi, tidak .. tetapi akan kembali ke Bali lagi segera untuk menemukan tempat yang baru ..

Subjeck: woww fantastic this place so wonderfull
Review: Quest hotel in Bali was fantastic. It was our first time staying there and would recommend this hotel to anyone. We stayed in a studio room and only payed $63 AUST a night for a studio room includes breakfast. Our room was clean very large,tea and coffee making facilities,bar fridge,balcony with views,phone,air con,room safe,queen size bed,tv with heaps of chanels...

Kamar kami bersih sangat besar, fasilitas pembuatan teh dan kopi, kulkas bar, balkon dengan pemandangan, telepon, con udara, ruang aman kamar, tempat tidur queen, TV dengan tumpukan chanels ...

Subjeck: Nothing Good or Bad to say
Review: The hotel hallway is very long from the lift. So pray that you wont get the last room on the floor which i got it. The locations inside of the complex then you don't have any good view. The bathroom is filled with mosquitoes. Breakfast is average with various choices. Free wifi just made the room perfect.

The locations inside of the complex then you don't have any good view. The bathroom is filled with mosquitoes. Breakfast is average with various choices. Free wifi just made the room perfect.
Review_Bahasa: Lorong hotel sangat panjang dari lift. Jadi doakan agar Anda tidak akan mendapatkan kamar terakhir di lantai yang saya dapatkan. Lokasi di dalam kompleks maka Anda tidak memiliki tampilan yang bagus. Kamar mandi dipenuhi nyamuk. Sarapan rata -rata dengan berbagai pilihan. Wifi gratis baru saja membuat ruangan sempurna.

Subjeck: quest hotel kuta central park great hotel
Review:
Quest hotel in Bali was fantastic. 
It was our first time staying there and would recommend this hotel to anyone. 
We stayed in a studio room and only payed $63 AUST a night for a studio room includes breakfast. 
Our room was clean very large,tea and coffee making facilities,bar fridge,balcony with views,phone,air con,room safe,queen size bed,tv with heaps of chanels to choose from. 
The hotel has a very nice swimming pool,free internet service,breakfast each morning was great with alot to choose from.Great massage service at a very reasonable price all the staff are very friendly.The hotel also offers a free shuttle bus service to the shopping area of kuta and a taxi only costs 50c aust one way to the night life,restaurants and shopping.My husband and i really enjoyed our stay with quest hotel and we will be back again soon and we have recomended it to our friends.The only one thing i could fault was they need softer pillows.

Review_Bahasa:
Quest Hotel di Bali sangat fantastis. 
Ini adalah pertama kalinya kami tinggal di sana dan akan merekomendasikan hotel ini kepada siapa pun. 
Kami tinggal di ruang studio dan hanya membayar $ 63 Aust per malam untuk ruang studio termasuk sarapan. 
Kamar kami bersih sangat besar, fasilitas pembuatan teh dan kopi, kulkas bar, balkon dengan pemandangan, telepon, con udara, ruang aman kamar, tempat tidur queen, TV dengan tumpukan chanel untuk dipilih. 
Hotel ini memiliki kolam renang yang sangat bagus, layanan internet gratis, sarapan setiap pagi sangat bagus dengan banyak untuk dipilih. Layanan pijat besar dengan harga yang sangat wajar semua staf sangat ramah. Hotel ini juga menawarkan satu jalan bus antar -jemput ke area perbelanjaan Kuta dan saya benar -benar menikmati hotel kami dengan satu hotel dan kami benar -benar akan menaikkan hotel, kami akan mendapatkan hotel, kami benar -benar menikmati hotel, kami benar -benar menikmati hotel kami. Hal yang saya bisa salah adalah mereka membutuhkan bantal yang lebih lembut.

Subjeck: Not bad hotel but terrible service
Review:
The hotel is in a new square, and a big supermarket (GIant) is around the corner which is handy. 
The place is new and thus in goood condiiton. Rooms are quite big and the bathroom is fine, but the furnishings look like they came from a sale at Ikea. Bed was okay, a bit soft for me. 

The breakfast was okay but realistically, a bit of a disappointment with limited choices, awful coffee (stewed to death) and ssomewhat haphazard service. 

Pool is rather smal is you want to swim, and as it is cusp shaped, it is hard to do laps - constantly changing direction. 

Now, two event sof bad service threw me. 
Firstly, one morning, the male cleaner knocked on the door when I was on the toilet. The door was not locked and I telled out to him to not come in. Yet he opened the door and came in anyway leading me to yell at him. 

The last night a bizarre thing happened. Asleep at 2.15 am, night staff banged on my door. I jumped out of bed assuming it was an emergency or crisis of some sort, pulled on shorts, and opened it. The jerk handed me a form letter saying what time checkout was. 
Yeah thanks. I left at 7am to get to the airport. 
Well what sort of service do you call that?? 
I would like his address next time when he's off duty and I'll bang on his door. 

The location itself is an isssue as the surroundng area is a bit ugly and there are few things nearby. It is some way to the beach of shops (other than the surrounding mall) and getting back/forward to Kuta was not easy as the shuttle was full every time I aske

Pool is rather smal is you want to swim, and as it is cusp shaped, it is hard to do laps - constantly changing direction.
Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini berada di alun -alun baru, dan supermarket besar (raksasa) ada di sudut yang berguna. 
Tempat ini baru dan dengan demikian di Goood Condiiton. Kamar cukup besar dan kamar mandinya baik -baik saja, tetapi perabotannya terlihat seperti berasal dari penjualan di IKEA. Tempat tidur baik -baik saja, agak lembut untukku. 

Sarapannya baik -baik saja tetapi secara realistis, sedikit kekecewaan dengan pilihan terbatas, kopi yang mengerikan (direbus sampai mati) dan layanan ssomewhat serampangan. 

Kolam renang agak kecil adalah Anda ingin berenang, dan karena berbentuk puncak, sulit untuk melakukan putaran - arah yang terus berubah. 

Sekarang, dua acara SOF Bad Service melemparkan saya. 
Pertama, suatu pagi, pembersih pria mengetuk pintu ketika saya berada di toilet. Pintu itu tidak terkunci dan aku memberitahunya untuk tidak masuk. Namun dia membuka pintu dan tetap datang menuntunku untuk berteriak padanya. 

Malam terakhir hal aneh terjadi. Tidur jam 2.15 pagi, staf malam menggedor pintu saya. Saya melompat keluar dari tempat tidur dengan asumsi itu adalah semacam keadaan darurat atau krisis, menarik celana pendek, dan membukanya. Jerk memberi saya surat formulir yang mengatakan jam berapa checkout itu. 
Ya terima kasih. Saya pergi jam 7 pagi untuk sampai ke bandara. 
Nah, layanan apa yang Anda sebut itu ?? 
Saya ingin alamatnya lain kali ketika dia tidak bertugas dan saya akan menggedor pintunya. 

Lokasi itu sendiri merupakan issue karena area surround agak jelek dan ada beberapa hal di dekatnya. Ini adalah cara ke pantai toko -toko (selain mal di sekitarnya) dan kembali/maju ke Kuta tidak mudah karena pesawat ulang -alik penuh setiap kali saya aske

Review_Bahasa: Saya tinggal untuk liburan bulan madu .. pelayanan yang baik dan barang -barang yang sangat rendah hati .. barang -barang mereka juga membantu mengatur kamar saya untuk dekorasi bulan madu .. hanya sekitar 15 menit ke Pantai Kuta .. jika Anda tidak suka lingkungan yang ramai maka Anda harus tinggal di sini ...

Review:
The day we arrived we were picked up from the airport. The driver was very nice giving us a run down on things we could do and places we could go. The hotel was just 20mins drive from the the airport. The welcome drink was nice. Registration and check-in was very quick. 

The room which was showed to us was very nice and spacious. My 17mth daughter thoroughly enjoyed the space more than us. There were definitely mosquitoes. Requested hotel to spray to prevent mosquitoes. Nevertheless my daughter still had mosquito bites. 

The toilet was very clean and spacious. The rooms that we stayed had a shower, no bath tub. The only thing we complained about was the A/C. It wasn't cooling the room at all. We had requested for a change of the room. Since we arrived at night it was difficult for them the change the room. We endured the night and we were upgraded from deluxe to executive room the next day. We stayed there for 4 days and 3 nights. Extended one more night over there. So in total stayed there for 5 days and 4 nights. 

Breakfast was decent. Although it was called western breakfast there was limited selection of fruits. Other than that there were more of local dishes than anything else. 

The free wireless internet access was also very helpful in communicating with my family and friends back at home. 

Swimming pool was nice. There was a kids pool as well and an adults pool. Towels were nice and clean. The kids play ground was also very clean and safe for kids. The politeness of the staff and their nature to help us in anyway made our stay very enjoyable. There quite a lot of 24hr stores nearby. This was very helpful to buy snacks and water. 

The hotel provided, upon request, a baby bath-tub and a baby-cot at no charge.

The hotel provided, upon request, a baby bath-tub and a baby-cot at no charge.
Review_Summary: The hotel provided, upon request, a baby bath-tub and a baby-cot at no charge. Free wireless internet access was also very helpful in communicating with my family and friends back at home. There was a kids pool as well and an adults pool.
Review_Bahasa:
Hari kami tiba, kami dijemput dari bandara. Pengemudi itu sangat baik memberi kami berlari ke bawah pada hal -hal yang bisa kami lakukan dan tempat yang bisa kami kunjungi. Hotel ini hanya berjarak 20 menit berkendara dari bandara. Minuman selamat datangnya enak. Pendaftaran dan check-in sangat cepat. 

Ruangan yang ditunjukkan kepada kami sangat bagus dan luas. Anak perempuan saya yang ke -17 benar -benar menikmati ruang lebih dari kami. Pasti ada nyamuk. Meminta hotel untuk menyemprotkan untuk mencegah nyamuk. Namun putri saya masih memiliki gigitan nyamuk. 

Toiletnya sangat bersih dan luas. Kamar -kamar tempat kami tinggal mandi, tidak ada bak mandi. Satu -satunya hal yang kami keluhkan adalah a/c. Sama sekali tidak mendinginkan ruangan. Kami telah meminta ganti ruangan. Karena kami tiba di malam hari, sulit bagi mereka perubahan ruangan. Kami mengalami malam dan kami ditingkatkan dari Deluxe ke Ruang Eksekutif pada hari berikutnya. Kami tinggal di sana selama 4 hari dan 3 malam. Diperpanjang satu malam lagi di sana. Jadi total tinggal di sana selama 5 hari dan 4 malam. 

Sarapan itu layak. Meskipun disebut sarapan barat, ada pilihan buah yang terbatas. Selain itu ada lebih banyak hidangan lokal daripada yang lainnya. 

Akses internet nirkabel gratis juga sangat membantu dalam berkomunikasi dengan keluarga dan teman -teman saya di rumah. 

Kolam renang bagus. Ada kolam renang anak -anak juga dan kolam renang orang dewasa. Handuk bagus dan bersih. Anak -anak bermain juga sangat bersih dan aman untuk anak -anak. Kesopanan staf dan sifat mereka untuk membantu kami membuat masa tinggal kami sangat menyenangkan. Ada cukup banyak toko 24 jam di dekatnya. Ini sangat membantu untuk membeli makanan ringan dan air. 

Hotel menyediakan, atas permintaan, kamar mandi bayi dan tongkat bayi tanpa biaya.

Review: Picked this hotel solely for the purple theme and loved it. People were helpful and friendly. Our room was quiet and private. The view from our room wasn't the best but then we didn't spend much time there other than sleeping. Food was yummy and the in house spa service was relaxing. Would recommend to all.

Pemandangan dari kamar kami bukan yang terbaik tetapi kemudian kami tidak menghabiskan banyak waktu di sana selain tidur. Makanannya enak dan layanan spa di rumah santai. Akan merekomendasikan untuk semua.

Review:
It's a really good hotel considering the location that's quite near the beach,,easy food access (you just basically need to walk for only 10 minutes till you get to the main road)...all the varieties of foods would spice your tongue:D 
I'd recommend this hotel to my frinds & family should ever they visit Bali..tq:)

Ini adalah hotel yang sangat bagus mengingat lokasi yang cukup dekat dengan pantai ,, akses makanan mudah (Anda pada dasarnya hanya perlu berjalan hanya 10 menit sampai Anda sampai di jalan utama) ... semua varietas makanan akan membumbui lidah Anda: D 
Saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini kepada Frinds & Family saya seharusnya mereka mengunjungi Bali..tq :)

Subjeck: Helpful staff but unpleasant surroundings (unoccupied shop houses)
Review: Being a first timer in Bali we were assisted throughout our stay by the helpful staffs of the hotel (Gede from transportation & Trisna from front desk). But we were taken aback by the surroundings of the hotel (unoccupied shop houses) which make it unpleasant to go out especialy at night.

But we were taken aback by the surroundings of the hotel (unoccupied shop houses) which make it unpleasant to go out especialy at night.

But we were taken aback by the surroundings of the hotel (unoccupied shop houses) which make it unpleasant to go out especialy at night.
Review_Bahasa: Menjadi pengatur waktu pertama di Bali, kami dibantu selama kami menginap oleh staf hotel yang membantu (Gede dari Transportasi & Trisna dari Front Desk). Tapi kami terkejut oleh lingkungan hotel (rumah -rumah toko yang tidak dihuni) yang membuatnya tidak menyenangkan untuk keluar terutama di malam hari.

Tapi kami terkejut oleh lingkungan hotel rumah -rumah toko yang tidak dihuni yang membuatnya tidak menyenangkan untuk keluar terutama di malam hari.

Subjeck: Beautiful hotel, bit far from everything
Review: We booked this online but they didnt have the booking form ready and they wanted a creditcard photocopy which made us feel rather uncomfortable. We got a welcome drink which was a nice touch. They booked us into smoking room and it stank! We went for some lunch and when we came back they upgraded us to a huge suite room. The breakfast was a huge selection of everything. The pool was large but lost sun early which was a pity. It was a 20-30 minute walk to the main centre but a taxi would cost very little. Be aware of getting taxis outside because they rip you off because they see you are staying somewhere expensive. We booked ours online and it was on sale and very cheap. look out for offers, well worth it. Free wifi here, also internet and the staff were all very friendly.
Review_English: We booked this online but they didnt have the booking form ready and they wanted a creditcard photocopy which made us feel rather uncomfortable. We got a welcome drink which was a nice touch. They booked us into smoking room and it stank! We went for some lunch and when we came back they upgraded us to a huge suite room. The breakfast was a huge selection of everything. The pool was large but lost sun early which was a pity. It was a 20-30 minute walk to the main centre but a taxi would cost very little. Be aware of getting taxis outside because they rip you off because they see you are staying somewhere expensive. We booked ours online and it was on sale and very cheap. look out for offers, well worth it. Free wifi here, also internet and the staff were all very friendly.

Kami mendapat minuman selamat datang yang merupakan sentuhan yang bagus. Mereka memesan kami ke ruang merokok dan itu Stank! Kami pergi makan siang dan ketika kami kembali, mereka meningkatkan kami ke ruang suite besar. Sarapan adalah banyak pilihan dari segalanya. Kolam itu besar tapi hilang matahari lebih awal yang sangat disayangkan. Itu adalah 20-30 menit berjalan kaki ke pusat utama tetapi taksi akan sangat mahal. Waspadai mendapatkan taksi di luar karena mereka merobek Anda karena mereka melihat Anda tinggal di tempat yang mahal. Kami memesan kami secara online dan itu dijual dan sangat murah. Carilah penawaran, sangat berharga. WiFi gratis di sini, juga internet dan staf semuanya sangat ramah.

Subjeck: Great place to stay in Kuta yet out of the hustle and bustle
Review:
We just spent 12 days here - our first trip to Bali 

we got a room right beside the pool - awesome 

all the staff were very welcoming, friendly, knowledgeable and there was nothing they couldnt or wouldnt do for us 

the food options were great - even for fussy aussie kids that wont eat rice etc, bring on the fish and chips and chicken and chips 

breakfast buffet was awesome - so much variety, and all you have to do is ask for it and they will get it for you, PORK BACON for real aussie style bacon!!! 

We have suggested they start a kids club to attract more families, they have 2 pools and a smallish playgound - yet hey - who wants to spend too much time at the hotel anyway 

we walked to the supermarket about 3 mins away 
we walked to Bali Bakery about 4 mins away crossing at the traffic lights 
we walked to Legian beach and shopping precinct - Legian Place the main shopping street is about 6 mins walk 

the shuttle bus will take you to Discovery mall - just walk straight across the road to WATERBOM PARK 

the shuttle bus will take you to Legian Beach - just walk back to the shopping markets and shops 

they have a tour desk on site 

the kids loved it here - it is out of the way, no-one outside the front door hassling you to buy things of any kind 

great security 

we had a private driver come to collect us and just prearranged his entry into the central park secure gated parking area 

Good quality very comfortable beds 

WE WILL STAY HERE AGAIN

we got a room right beside the pool - awesome 

all the staff were very welcoming, friendly, knowledgeable and there was nothing they couldnt or wouldnt do for us

breakfast buffet was awesome - so much variety, and all you have to do is ask for it and they will get it for you, PORK BACON for real aussie style bacon!!!

Good quality very comfortable beds 

WE WILL STAY HERE AGAIN
Review_Summary: Bali is a small island island off the coast of Bali. The island is popular with backpackers and holidaymakers. Bali is also a popular holiday destination for Australians. The hotel is located near the beach and is a short walk from the beach.
Review_Bahasa:
Kami hanya menghabiskan 12 hari di sini - perjalanan pertama kami ke Bali 

Kami punya kamar tepat di samping kolam renang - luar biasa 

Semua staf sangat ramah, ramah, berpengetahuan luas dan tidak ada yang tidak bisa atau tidak akan mereka lakukan untuk kami 

Pilihan makanannya bagus - bahkan untuk anak -anak Australia yang rewel yang tidak akan makan nasi dll, bawa ikan dan keripik dan ayam dan keripik 

Sarapan prasmanan luar biasa - begitu banyak variasi, dan yang harus Anda lakukan adalah meminta dan mereka akan mendapatkannya untuk Anda, daging babi untuk bacon gaya Aussie asli !!! 

Kami telah menyarankan mereka memulai klub anak -anak untuk menarik lebih banyak keluarga, mereka memiliki 2 kolam renang dan playgound yang lebih kecil - namun hei - yang ingin menghabiskan terlalu banyak waktu di hotel 

Kami berjalan ke supermarket sekitar 3 menit jauhnya 
Kami berjalan ke Bali Bakery sekitar 4 menit jauhnya menyeberang di lampu lalu lintas 
Kami berjalan ke pantai legian dan kantor perbelanjaan - tempat legian jalan perbelanjaan utama berjarak sekitar 6 menit berjalan kaki 

Bus antar -jemput akan membawa Anda ke Discovery Mall - cukup berjalan lurus di seberang jalan menuju Waterbom Park 

Bus antar -jemput akan membawa Anda ke pantai legian - cukup berjalan kembali ke pasar perbelanjaan dan toko -toko 

Mereka memiliki meja tur di lokasi 

Anak -anak menyukainya di sini - tidak ada jalannya, tidak ada orang di luar pintu depan yang mengganggu Anda untuk membeli barang -barang apa pun 

keamanan yang luar biasa 

Kami memiliki sopir pribadi yang datang untuk menjemput kami dan hanya mengimbangi masuknya ke area parkir yang terjaga keamanannya ke Central Park 

Kualitas bagus tempat tidur yang sangat nyaman 

Kami akan tinggal di sini lagi

Subjeck: A bit too far from the beach for us
Review:
Great staff very friendly, not many other Australians staying here. Good breakfast and nice pool, but too far from the beach for us, although a taxi was very cheap only $1-2aus.My husband and I walked a lot of the time, but it's a 25 minute walk to the beach. We only paid less than $50aus per night, but not even close to our wonderful guesthouse in Seminyak for just over $100aus per night, perhaps if we hadn't been spoilt there first! 
Lots and lots of shops around the place shut down, but handy supermarket nearby. Cannot fault the staff, they were great!

Review_Bahasa:
Staf hebat sangat ramah, tidak banyak orang Australia lain yang tinggal di sini. Sarapan yang enak dan kolam renang yang bagus, tetapi terlalu jauh dari pantai untuk kami, meskipun taksi sangat murah hanya $ 1-2AUS. Suami saya dan saya berjalan banyak waktu, tetapi berjalan 25 menit berjalan kaki ke pantai. Kami hanya membayar kurang dari $ 50aus per malam, tetapi bahkan tidak dekat dengan wisma kami yang indah di Seminyak dengan harga lebih dari $ 100aus per malam, mungkin jika kami tidak dimanjakan di sana terlebih dahulu! 
Banyak dan banyak toko di sekitar tempat ditutup, tetapi supermarket yang berguna di dekatnya. Tidak bisa menyalahkan staf, mereka hebat!

Review: Went to stay in this hotel in October 2011 with my friends. Love the service and the breakfast was nice. lots of varieties. "7-11" is just across the road..it was a quiet location and a walking distance to a supermarket and Gloria Jean's Coffee cafe behind the hotel. The room i got was big and spacious. For shopping, its quite far if you want to go to the main kuta that have lots of markets to shop.

Subjeck: 4 étoiles pour l'hôtel, pas pour le service
Review:
Nous avons séjourné 5 nuits dans le Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park. L'hôtel est récent et les chambres sont agréables, propres, les salles de bains également. 
Vous pourrez vous reposer loin de l'agitation de Kuta au bord de la piscine, et moyennant 15.000 IDR vous rendre à la plage de Kuta Beach. D'ailleurs il vaut mieux prendre un taxi, puisque le shuttle gratuit mis à disposition par l'hôtel est vite complet. 
Sur les points à améliorer : le petit déjeuner n'est pas inoubliable. Les couloirs sont très mal insonorisés, et le personnel vient toquer aux portes dès 7h30 pour le ménage (pensez à mettre votre "do not disturb"). Plus globalement le personnel très serviable au demeurant, ne comprend pas toujours les souhaits des clients. Ce sont des petits détails mais qui peuvent parfois agacer. Mais cela ne gâchera pas votre séjour. Le rapport qualité prix pour Kuta est correct et le Quest vous satisfera plus que d'autres hôtel de même catégorie à Kuta.
Review_English:
We stayed 5 nights in the Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park. The hotel is recent and the rooms are pleasant, clean, the bathrooms too. 
You can rest away from the bustle of Kuta by the pool, and for 15,000 IDR going to Kuta Beach beach. Besides, it is better to take a taxi, since the free Shuttle made available by the hotel is quickly full. 
On points to improve: breakfast is not unforgettable. The corridors are very poorly soundproofed, and the staff come to knock on the doors from 7:30 am for cleaning (remember to put your "do not disturb"). More generally the very helpful staff, moreover, do not always understand the wishes of customers. These are small details but which can sometimes annoy. But that won't spoil your stay. The value for money for Kuta is correct and the Quest will satisfy you more than other hotels of the same category in Kuta.
Review_Summary:
We stayed 5 nights in the Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park. The hotel is recent and the rooms are pleasant, clean, the bathrooms too. 
You can rest away from the bustle of Kuta by the pool, and for 15,000 IDR going to Kuta Beach beach. Besides, it is better to take a taxi, since the free Shuttle made available by the hotel is quickly full. 
On points to improve: breakfast is not unforgettable. The corridors are very poorly soundproofed, and the staff come to knock on the doors from 7:30 am for cleaning (remember to put your "do not disturb"). More generally the very helpful staff, moreover, do not always understand the wishes of customers. These are small details but which can sometimes annoy. But that won't spoil your stay. The value for money for Kuta is correct and the Quest will satisfy you more than other hotels of the same category in Kuta.
Review_Bahasa:
Kami tinggal 5 malam di Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park. Hotel ini baru -baru ini dan kamarnya menyenangkan, bersih, kamar mandi juga. 
Anda dapat beristirahat dari kesibukan Kuta di tepi kolam renang, dan untuk 15.000 IDR pergi ke Pantai Pantai Kuta. Selain itu, lebih baik naik taksi, karena antar -jemput gratis yang disediakan oleh hotel dengan cepat penuh. 
Poin untuk ditingkatkan: Sarapan tidak terlupakan. Koridornya sangat kedap suara, dan staf datang untuk mengetuk pintu dari jam 7:30 pagi untuk dibersihkan (ingat untuk menempatkan "jangan ganggu" Anda). Lebih umum staf yang sangat membantu, apalagi, tidak selalu memahami keinginan pelanggan. Ini adalah detail kecil tetapi terkadang bisa mengganggu. Tapi itu tidak akan merusak masa tinggalmu. Nilai untuk uang untuk KUTA benar dan pencarian akan memuaskan Anda lebih dari hotel lain dari kategori yang sama di KUTA.

Review:
We were there for 3 days, booked it on booking.com where we saw pictures of very nice rooms! BUT: when we came, they gave us room with one window that was shut with blinds. Since we arrived in the night we did not try to open the window, but tomorrow morning when we tried, it turned out that behind that window was somekind of staircase or something like that - totaly closed and in the dark. 
It turns out that there are dozen rooms like this, and no any warning neither on booking or anywhere else! Because of that, you can smell mold in the room. It's not question of price, but of something like living in a cellar. 
This ruined our first impression, especially because restoran space is very nice and friendly. After all we wouldn't come back here never again!

Review_Bahasa:
Kami berada di sana selama 3 hari, memesannya di Booking.com di mana kami melihat foto -foto kamar yang sangat bagus! Tapi: Ketika kami datang, mereka memberi kami ruang dengan satu jendela yang ditutup dengan tirai. Karena kami tiba di malam hari, kami tidak mencoba membuka jendela, tetapi besok pagi ketika kami mencoba, ternyata di balik jendela itu adalah beberapa tangga atau semacamnya - Totaly ditutup dan dalam kegelapan. 
Ternyata ada selusin kamar seperti ini, dan tidak ada peringatan tentang pemesanan atau di mana pun! Karena itu, Anda bisa mencium aroma jamur di dalam ruangan. Ini bukan pertanyaan tentang harga, tetapi sesuatu seperti tinggal di ruang bawah tanah. 
Ini merusak kesan pertama kami, terutama karena ruang restorasi sangat bagus dan ramah. Bagaimanapun, kami tidak akan kembali ke sini tidak pernah lagi!

Review:
Me and my partner stayed here for three nights, 11th September - 14th September for our honey room. 

We booked a standard room, when we arrived on check in, they upgraded us for free into a superior room along with a cake and a lovely note. 

Its in a great location, only $2-$3 to kuta markets, legion beach. 

Staff were quite friendly except for the bar man who asked my husband for a tip! 
And the pool doesn't get much sun. 

I would most definitely stay here again.

And the pool doesn't get much sun. 

I would most definitely stay here again.
Review_Bahasa:
Saya dan pasangan saya tinggal di sini selama tiga malam, 11 September - 14 September untuk Kamar Madu kami. 

Kami memesan kamar standar, ketika kami tiba di check -in, mereka meningkatkan kami secara gratis ke kamar superior bersama dengan kue dan catatan yang indah. 

Ini di lokasi yang bagus, hanya $ 2- $ 3 untuk pasar Kuta, Legion Beach. 

Staf cukup ramah kecuali untuk pria bar yang meminta tip saya untuk tip! 
Dan kolam renang tidak banyak berjemur. 

Saya pasti akan tinggal di sini lagi.

Review: This has got to be one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. When we arrived we were warmly greeted, our room upgraded as the hotel was quiet, our bags swiftly taken to the room, and quickly checked in. Our room was large and well equipped. Large, comfy bed, a safe, tea/coffee facilities, free bottled water, free WiFi for the entire visit which was real fast, flat screen tv with a good variety of channels. The hotel was so clean. The staff even cleaned the stones around the pool by hand. The pool was lovely. All the staff were always very helpful and polite and were always smiling and willing to chat. The restaurant and bar were good and very reasonably priced. I would definitely recommend this hotel and will certainly book again when back in Bali!

Review_Bahasa: Ini harus menjadi salah satu hotel terbaik yang pernah saya tinggali. Ketika kami tiba, kami disambut dengan hangat, kamar kami ditingkatkan saat hotel tenang, tas kami dengan cepat dibawa ke kamar, dan dengan cepat check in. Kamar kami besar dan dilengkapi dengan baik. Tempat tidur besar, nyaman, fasilitas teh/kopi yang aman, air botolan gratis, wifi gratis untuk seluruh kunjungan yang benar -benar cepat, TV layar datar dengan berbagai saluran yang baik. Hotel ini sangat bersih. Staf bahkan membersihkan batu -batu di sekitar kolam renang dengan tangan. Kolam itu indah. Semua staf selalu sangat membantu dan sopan dan selalu tersenyum dan mau mengobrol. Restoran dan barnya bagus dan sangat terjangkau. Saya pasti akan merekomendasikan hotel ini dan pasti akan memesan lagi ketika kembali ke Bali!

Review:
I arrived at the hotel at about 9pm local time, and I didn't expect the staff were so friendly. Breakfast is good too. Hotel Location is near to Giant Supermarket. and you can purchase all the things you want with a very good price. 

I will come back again.

Review_Bahasa:
Saya tiba di hotel sekitar jam 9 malam waktu setempat, dan saya tidak berharap stafnya sangat ramah. Sarapan juga enak. Lokasi hotel dekat dengan supermarket raksasa. Dan Anda dapat membeli semua barang yang Anda inginkan dengan harga yang sangat bagus. 

Saya akan kembali lagi.

Review: Me and my partner stayed here for 2 nights, its a great hotel with stylish rooms and a great pool. Its one of the better hotels around, very clean, breakfast was a lovely buffet and the staff were so friendly. If your looking for a place to stay near to kuta but dont want the noise of the centre, this is great. Its quiet and close to a local supermarket in central park. Bedrooms are huge and very classy. A great stay. only issue is its a bit of a walk to the centre (about 15 mins) on a very busy road but if you want a taxi theres always lots of people asking you!

Review_Bahasa: Saya dan pasangan saya tinggal di sini selama 2 malam, ini adalah hotel yang bagus dengan kamar -kamar yang penuh gaya dan kolam renang yang bagus. Ini salah satu hotel yang lebih baik di sekitar, sangat bersih, sarapan adalah prasmanan yang indah dan stafnya sangat ramah. Jika Anda mencari tempat untuk tinggal di dekat Kuta tetapi tidak ingin suara pusat, ini bagus. Tenang dan dekat dengan supermarket lokal di Central Park. Kamar tidur sangat besar dan sangat berkelas. Sedang menginap. Satu -satunya masalah adalah sedikit berjalan ke tengah (sekitar 15 menit) di jalan yang sangat sibuk tetapi jika Anda ingin taksi selalu ada banyak orang yang bertanya kepada Anda!

Review: We booked thru a travel agent but did not know what to expect. When we arrived there was a mix up about high season rates however this was sorted straight away . The next morning the manager came to see us we explained the situation he apologised prefusly and assured us that there wold be no repocusions on the staff (our main concern ) our room was a realy nice ground floor as requested .Breakfast had lots of choice alot of Asian type food but then again most of the geust were Asian. Eggs cooked as you asked for them PERFECT every morning .the staff greeted you every time you saw them addressed us by our (prefered) names after the initial intro .We were invited to a games afternoon to celebrate independance day we even took part in some of the activites this broke down lots of barriers between staff management and us .after that we where treated like stars the staff reminding us of the fun we all had .All in all a great stay we will DEFINATLY return and recomend this family freindly hotel to all our friends that visit Bali

Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan melalui agen perjalanan tetapi tidak tahu apa yang diharapkan. Ketika kami tiba, ada campuran tentang tingkat musim yang tinggi namun ini segera disortir. Pagi berikutnya manajer datang menemui kami, kami menjelaskan situasi yang ia minta maaf secara lebih disukai dan meyakinkan kami bahwa tidak ada repokusi pada staf (perhatian utama kami) kamar kami adalah lantai dasar yang sangat bagus seperti yang diminta. Breakfast memiliki banyak pilihan makanan tipe Asia tetapi kemudian sebagian besar Geust adalah orang Asia. Telur yang dimasak saat Anda meminta mereka sempurna setiap pagi. Staf menyambut Anda setiap kali Anda melihat mereka berbicara dengan kami dengan nama -nama (lebih disukai) kami setelah intro awal. Kami diundang ke suatu pertandingan sore untuk merayakan Hari Kemerdekaan, kami bahkan mengambil bagian dalam beberapa kegiatan ini, kami akan tetap tinggal di antara mereka semua yang mengingatkan kami pada semua hal yang mengingatkan kami. hotel freindly untuk semua teman kami yang mengunjungi Bali

Review:
Stayed at Quest through an online travel deal online and I had no regrets. The staff warmly greeted us at the airport and checked us in promptly, which was great considering that we landed in Bali quite late into the night. Every morning, we were greeted with smiles from friendly staff and they were helpful in providing us with directions and recommendations. 

The standard room was clean and spacious, since it was only the two of us, and it was lovely as it overlooked the pool. Wi-fi was free too in the rooms and you can use computers at the lobby too. Food-wise, it's pretty standard but satisfying. 

The hotel may not be the most accessible one (it's about 40 mins walk to Kuta square or Kuta beach on foot/strolling) but there are nearby stores, from hypermarkets to local eateries and pharmacy). And you can simply let the staff know if you need a shuttle bus to the big malls if you'd like.

Review_Bahasa:
Tetap di Quest melalui transaksi perjalanan online dan saya tidak menyesal. Staf dengan hangat menyambut kami di bandara dan memeriksa kami segera, yang sangat bagus mengingat kami mendarat di Bali hampir larut malam. Setiap pagi, kami disambut dengan senyum dari staf yang ramah dan mereka membantu memberi kami arahan dan rekomendasi. 

Kamar standar bersih dan luas, karena hanya kami berdua, dan itu indah karena mengabaikan kolam renang. Wi-Fi juga gratis di kamar dan Anda dapat menggunakan komputer di lobi juga. Dari segi makanan, ini cukup standar tetapi memuaskan. 

Hotel ini mungkin bukan yang paling mudah diakses (sekitar 40 menit berjalan kaki ke Kuta Square atau Pantai Kuta dengan berjalan kaki/berjalan -jalan) tetapi ada toko -toko terdekat, dari hypermarket ke restoran dan apotek lokal). Dan Anda dapat memberi tahu staf jika Anda memerlukan bus antar -jemput ke mal besar jika Anda mau.

Review:
The Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park was a great place to stay. It's close enough to walk to the beach (15 minutes), but far enough away that you aren't surrounded by the wild party animals that roam the beach. Along the way, there are plenty of pleasant shops with relaxed owners. If you aren't feeling up for the stroll, you can take a taxi or a shuttle bus as well. 

The staff were very kind and attentive-- I was alone the first night, but the wait staff in the restaurant made me feel very welcome. After noticing me swatting away mosquitoes (I hadn't bought repellent at this point), one of the staff offered me some mosquito repellent and even offered to run down to the convenience store and buy a bottle for me! 

The rooms were spacious and clean, the TVs were nice (I had to catch up on the Olympics!!), and the pool is cool and relaxing. The breakfast spread was quite impressive as well. I was able to relax and unwind easily during my stay. Thanks!

Review_Bahasa:
Quest Hotel Kuta Central Park adalah tempat yang tepat untuk menginap. Cukup dekat untuk berjalan ke pantai (15 menit), tetapi cukup jauh sehingga Anda tidak dikelilingi oleh hewan pesta liar yang berkeliaran di pantai. Sepanjang jalan, ada banyak toko yang menyenangkan dengan pemilik santai. Jika Anda tidak ingin berjalan -jalan, Anda dapat naik taksi atau bus antar -jemput juga. 

Stafnya sangat baik dan penuh perhatian- Saya sendirian pada malam pertama, tetapi staf menunggu di restoran membuat saya merasa sangat disambut. Setelah memperhatikan saya menampar nyamuk (saya belum membeli penolak pada saat ini), salah satu staf menawari saya penolak nyamuk dan bahkan menawarkan untuk berlari ke toko serba ada dan membeli botol untuk saya! 

Kamar -kamarnya luas dan bersih, TV bagus (saya harus mengejar Olimpiade !!), dan kolam renangnya keren dan santai. Penyebaran sarapan juga cukup mengesankan. Saya bisa bersantai dan bersantai dengan mudah selama saya tinggal. Terima kasih!

Review: We booked this with out really knowing a lot about the property. We landed at 9.00pm and were going to Ubud the next morning, so just wanted somewhere cheap. Well this exceeded our expectations big time. Room we had was a studio and it was about $50AUD. Room was huge, shower and bathroom clean and spacious. Breakfast was amazing. Free shuttle bus into Kuta if you needed it. This is highly recommended at the price.

Bus antar -jemput gratis ke Kuta jika Anda membutuhkannya. Ini sangat disarankan dengan harga.

Review:
This was a last minute booking and we were not disappointed :) Check in was fast and efficient - staff very attentive and full of smiles :) Room was exactly as the web site - spotlessly clean - amenities galore and overlooking the pool :) We booked direct with the hotel and received an additional 10% discount - the price of our room was fantastic complete with breakfast :) Hotel is in a quiet location but only a short taxi ride (grab a taxi out the front on main road) to either Legian or Kuta - approx 5000rp :) Our every need was catered for @ breakfast - food good quality - Asian & European cuisine:) We tried out all the facilities - room service - fast & efficient :) Spa - relaxing & luxurious :) Pool - mornings are better for the sun :) Dinner in restaurant - very affordable :) Courtesy bus to beach & shopping centres - on time all the time :) Great cocktails @ the Pool bar :) Loved the "purple" theme around the hotel :) Free WIFI :) 
Thank you to management and staff for a very pleasant stay - we will be back :) 
Nici and Elaine :) :)
Review_English:
This was a last minute booking and we were not disappointed :) Check in was fast and efficient - staff very attentive and full of smiles :) Room was exactly as the web site - spotlessly clean - amenities galore and overlooking the pool :) We booked direct with the hotel and received an additional 10% discount - the price of our room was fantastic complete with breakfast :) Hotel is in a quiet location but only a short taxi ride (grab a taxi out the front on main road) to either Legian or Kuta - approx 5000rp :) Our every need was catered for @ breakfast - food good quality - Asian & European cuisine:) We tried out all the facilities - room service - fast & efficient :) Spa - relaxing & luxurious :) Pool - mornings are better for the sun :) Dinner in restaurant - very affordable :) Courtesy bus to beach & shopping centres - on time all the time :) Great cocktails @ the Pool bar :) Loved the "purple" theme around the hotel :) Free WIFI :) 
Thank you to management and staff for a very pleasant stay - we will be back :) 
Nici and Elaine :) :)

Nici and Elaine :) :)

Review: Saya stay di Quest 2 hari dan seblumnya 1 hari hanya untuk transit di bali. Kesan pertama sekali adalah hospitality dari para petugas hotel. Dengan senang hati mereka melayani permintaan kita. Untuk kebersihan dan peralatan kamar standard seperti hotel yang lain, hanya dalam hal keluasan, saya stay di Deluxe dan Studio, spacenya sangat luas dan sangat leluasa. Untuk lokasi juga cukup strategis, tempat makan lumayan banyak, bisa jalan kaki ke legian dan kalau lebih jauh bisa dengan shuttle. Hanya kalu ke Bali tujuannya adalah dekat pantai, maka hotel Quest bukan pilihannya. Dibandingkan dengan harga yang harus kita bayarkan, dengan semua kerahamah, besarnya kamar, stay di hotel quest ini menurut saya sangat recommended. Saya akan stay di hotel Quest ini lagi apabila kembali ke Bali.
Review_English: I stayed in quest for 2 days and before 1 day just for transit in Bali. The first impression is the hospitality of hotel staff. They are happy to serve our requests. For the cleanliness and equipment of standard rooms like other hotels, only in terms of breadth, I stay in Deluxe and studio, the space is very broad and very free. For the location is also quite strategic, a place to eat is quite a lot, can walk to Legian and if further can be shuttle. Only if you go to Bali, the goal is near the beach, then the Quest Hotel is not the choice. Compared to the price we have to pay, with all the conformity, the size of the room, stay at this Quest Hotel in my opinion is very recommended. I will stay at this Quest Hotel again when I return to Bali.

Untuk kebersihan dan peralatan kamar standar seperti hotel lain, hanya dalam hal luasnya, saya tinggal di mewah dan studio, ruangnya sangat luas dan sangat gratis. Karena lokasi juga cukup strategis, tempat makan cukup banyak, dapat berjalan ke Legian dan jika lebih jauh bisa menjadi pesawat ulang -alik. Hanya jika Anda pergi ke Bali, tujuannya berada di dekat pantai, maka Quest Hotel bukanlah pilihan. Dibandingkan dengan harga yang harus kami bayar, dengan semua kesesuaian, ukuran ruangan, tetap di hotel Quest ini menurut saya sangat disarankan. Saya akan menginap di hotel pencarian ini lagi ketika saya kembali ke Bali.

Review:
My friends and I stayed here for one night in two superior rooms. 
The staff in the front are friendly. 
The room is large and great. 
The bed is very comfortable. 
The breakfast is several and good taste. 
There is welcome drink, free wifi and shuttle bus service. 
We got 25% discount coupon for massage and spa but we have no time to try. 
The location is very quiet and out of the way at night. It is near Krisna Oleh Oleh on Sunset road about 1 km and Kuta beach about 2-3 km. 
However, it is hard to walk at night because it is dark and lone. 
The price of taxi meter from hotel to "Beach Walk" is about 13,000 - 25,000 rp.(up to traffic)

Review_Bahasa:
Teman -teman saya dan saya tinggal di sini selama satu malam di dua kamar superior. 
Staf di depan ramah. 
Kamarnya besar dan bagus. 
Tempat tidurnya sangat nyaman. 
Sarapan adalah beberapa dan rasa enak. 
Ada minuman selamat datang, WiFi gratis dan layanan bus antar -jemput. 
Kami mendapat kupon diskon 25% untuk pijat dan spa tetapi kami tidak punya waktu untuk mencoba. 
Lokasi sangat tenang dan keluar dari jalan di malam hari. Itu dekat Krisna Oleh Oleh di Sunset Road sekitar 1 km dan pantai Kuta sekitar 2-3 km. 
Namun, sulit untuk berjalan di malam hari karena gelap dan sendirian. 
Harga meter taksi dari hotel ke "Beach Walk" adalah sekitar 13.000 - 25.000 rp. (Hingga lalu lintas)

Subjeck: Spanking new hotel with good location and fantastic service
Review:
Was staying there for only 2 nights at first for a business trip, but extended to become 5 nights at the end. The service from the front office staff is consistenly great. But perhaps they should have more iron and ironing board but it`s understandable from the hotel class. 

Breakfast is great. Overall I have no complaints from the price that I paid, it`s worth every penny. 

Bravo to Quest hotel Kuta Square staff ! keep up the good work.

Bravo to Quest hotel Kuta Square staff ! keep up the good work.

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di sana hanya selama 2 malam pada awalnya untuk perjalanan bisnis, tetapi diperpanjang menjadi 5 malam pada akhirnya. Layanan dari staf kantor depan konsisten hebat. Tapi mungkin mereka harus memiliki lebih banyak besi dan papan setrika tetapi dapat dimengerti dari kelas hotel. 

Sarapan itu enak. Secara keseluruhan saya tidak memiliki keluhan dari harga yang saya bayar, itu bernilai setiap sen. 

Bravo to Quest Hotel Kuta Square Staff! Pertahankan kerja bagus.

Subjeck: Great value with a lot of facility
Review: Its very different experience then our imagine if you saw it in the first time. Its place in the office building but when you step in side you can feel a different experience. The room is quite large with ac,the shower bathroom, refrigerator, welcome drink,phone, free wifi, and tv cable. Its has swimming pool,playground for kids, and spa. Its a good price for a bunch of facilities!

Review_Bahasa: Pengalaman yang sangat berbeda dari yang kami bayangkan jika Anda melihatnya untuk pertama kalinya. Tempatnya di gedung kantor tetapi ketika Anda melangkah di samping Anda dapat merasakan pengalaman yang berbeda. Kamar ini cukup besar dengan AC, kamar mandi kamar mandi, kulkas, minuman selamat datang, telepon, wifi gratis, dan kabel TV. Ini memiliki kolam renang, taman bermain untuk anak -anak, dan spa. Harga yang bagus untuk banyak fasilitas!

Review: This hotel is the best I've been to in Indonesia! the location is not in the beach front but it doesn't matter at all the center is just in a 10-15 minutes walking distance! The Hotel is clean, has an amazing staff who is always smiling and extremely helpful! there's a small but nice pool inside the hotel area where you can cool of before or after beach bathing! What we experienced with the staff here is actually worth sharing! My cousin got robbed on the street during night time by to guys on a motorbike and they helped us with all the paperwork at the immigration office, police station and at the embassy which took us one whole day without expecting anything from us! I just love this place and if I'm ever coming back to Bali this will be my first choice of place to go!

Review_Bahasa: Hotel ini adalah yang terbaik yang pernah saya kunjungi di Indonesia! Lokasi tidak ada di depan pantai tetapi tidak masalah sama sekali tengah hanya dalam jarak 10-15 menit berjalan kaki! Hotel ini bersih, memiliki staf yang luar biasa yang selalu tersenyum dan sangat membantu! Ada kolam renang kecil tapi bagus di dalam area hotel di mana Anda bisa mendinginkan sebelum atau sesudah mandi pantai! Apa yang kami alami dengan staf di sini sebenarnya layak dibagikan! Sepupu saya dirampok di jalan pada malam hari oleh orang -orang dengan sepeda motor dan mereka membantu kami dengan semua dokumen di kantor imigrasi, kantor polisi dan di kedutaan yang membawa kami satu hari penuh tanpa mengharapkan apa pun dari kami! Saya suka tempat ini dan jika saya pernah kembali ke Bali, ini akan menjadi pilihan pertama saya!

Saya suka tempat ini dan jika saya pernah kembali ke Bali, ini akan menjadi pilihan pertama saya!

Subjeck: Had a Pleasant stay, but you won't choose this if you are a beach bum
Review:
First of all, you wont choose this hotel if you like to be in the thick of the action at Kuta, Legian or wherever. That said, this hotel itself is situated near a supermarket (Giant) and some eateries (DEFINITELY try Bali Bakery nearby). 

Moreover, the hotel offers free shuttle service (limited pax though) to the shopping areas and to the beach. 

The service staff were friendly and enthusiastic, and the hotel comes with free wifi and a small but decent pool. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Quest Hotel.

The service staff were friendly and enthusiastic, and the hotel comes with free wifi and a small but decent pool. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Quest Hotel.

Selain itu, hotel ini menawarkan layanan antar -jemput gratis (Pax terbatas) ke area perbelanjaan dan ke pantai. 

Staf layanan ramah dan antusias, dan hotel ini dilengkapi dengan wifi gratis dan kolam renang kecil namun layak. Saya benar -benar menikmati masa menginap saya di Quest Hotel.

Review: Great and friendly as well as helpful staff. The Setting is great with Pool etc. Rooms are lovely. I was a little disappointed on it not being 100% clean ( dark hair in bathroom and I have clone Hair!) and it was a little loud plus I had mosquitos all night long even though I had never opened the window.. other than that great!:) even fantastic for families! Location is not too bad, its about a 20min walk to main strip in Kuta or 5 min taxi ride(except for evenings)

Review_Bahasa: Staf yang hebat dan ramah serta membantu. Pengaturannya bagus dengan kolam renang dll. Kamar indah. Saya sedikit kecewa tidak 100% bersih (rambut hitam di kamar mandi dan saya memiliki rambut klon!) Dan itu sedikit keras ditambah saya memiliki nyamuk sepanjang malam meskipun saya belum pernah membuka jendela .. selain itu hebat! :) bahkan fantastis untuk keluarga! Lokasi tidak terlalu buruk, sekitar 20 menit berjalan kaki ke strip utama di Kuta atau naik taksi 5 menit (kecuali untuk malam hari)

Lokasi tidak terlalu buruk, sekitar 20 menit berjalan kaki ke strip utama di Kuta atau naik taksi 5 menit kecuali untuk malam hari

Review: We booked a superior room direct on their site and we got a very large, clean, modern room with LCD TV with many English channels, couch, coffee table, safe, etc. Swimming pool was great and had loungers placed around the sides to sunbath. Breakfast was included in price and was excellent with plenty of asian and western choices. Many shops within the Kuta Central Park complex were vacated, a few Spas around and Gloria jeans for a coffee. We found the location very central and it was only a 10 minute walk to Legian Street, also to Brascos and Carrefours Mall on sunset parade. No more than 25 minutes walk to Kuta Square. Definitely would stay again if we ever visit Kuta again. Very friendly staff with all the signs of a very well run hotel and very clean!

Review_Bahasa: Kami memesan kamar superior langsung di situs mereka dan kami mendapat kamar yang sangat besar, bersih, modern dengan LCD TV dengan banyak saluran bahasa Inggris, sofa, meja kopi, aman, dll. Kolam renang sangat bagus dan memiliki kursi -kursi panjang di sekitar sisi untuk berjemur. Sarapan termasuk dalam harga dan sangat baik dengan banyak pilihan Asia dan Barat. Banyak toko di dalam kompleks Kuta Central Park dikosongkan, beberapa spa di sekitar dan jeans Gloria untuk minum kopi. Kami menemukan lokasi sangat sentral dan hanya 10 menit berjalan kaki ke Legian Street, juga ke Brascos dan Carrefours Mall di Sunset Parade. Tidak lebih dari 25 menit berjalan kaki ke Kuta Square. Pasti akan tinggal lagi jika kita pernah mengunjungi Kuta lagi. Staf yang sangat ramah dengan semua tanda hotel yang sangat baik dan sangat bersih!

Pasti akan tinggal lagi jika kita pernah mengunjungi Kuta lagi. Staf yang sangat ramah dengan semua tanda hotel yang sangat baik dan sangat bersih!

Subjeck: 服务相当到位，总体99分，只可惜不是海边
Review:
所有的服务生都面带微笑，爸爸说热情得让你不好意思不打招呼，头都点酸了~ 
服务很好、卫生很好，只可惜不是海边。。 
不过在kuta商业区，也是个不错的选择，就近也有库塔海滩哦~ 
房间有一个国内的三插的电源口，国内游客基本不用自带；房间内有冰箱、保险箱。 
大厅有吧台、游泳池、免费上网、租车服务等。
Review_English:
All the waiters smiled, and Dad said that you were so enthusiastic that you were embarrassed to say hello, and your head was sore~
The service is very good and the hygiene is very bad, but it's not by the sea. . 
However, it is also a good choice in the kuta commercial area, and there is also Kuta Beach nearby~
The room has a domestic three-plug power port, which is basically not necessary for domestic tourists; there is a refrigerator and a safe in the room. 
The lobby has a bar, swimming pool, free Internet access, car rental services, etc.

The service is very good and the hygiene is very bad, but it's not by the sea. . 
However, it is also a good choice in the kuta commercial area, and there is also Kuta Beach nearby~
The room has a domestic three-plug power port, which is basically not necessary for domestic tourists; there is a refrigerator and a safe in the room. 
The lobby has a bar, swimming pool, free Internet access, car rental services, etc.
Review_Bahasa:
Semua pelayan tersenyum, dan Ayah berkata bahwa kamu sangat antusias sehingga kamu malu untuk menyapa, dan kepalamu sakit ~
Layanannya sangat bagus dan kebersihannya sangat buruk, tetapi tidak di laut. . 
Namun, ini juga merupakan pilihan yang baik di area komersial Kuta, dan ada juga Kuta Beach di dekatnya ~
Ruangan ini memiliki pelabuhan daya tiga-plug domestik, yang pada dasarnya tidak diperlukan untuk wisatawan domestik; Ada lemari es dan brankas di ruangan itu. 
Lobi memiliki bar, kolam renang, akses internet gratis, layanan penyewaan mobil, dll.

Subjeck: Nice room but a little bit far
Review: We stay in a standard room in Dec 2011. Everything in this hotel are all fine. The wireless is good, service also quite acceptable but just that the location is a little bit too far from the busy town. But if you want to have a easy access to town by taxi without being disturb by the busy streets, this is the place you may like to stay in. Price is also very reasonable. Rooms are also clean and the staffs are friendly too. The only thing that might not be so acceptable is their breakfast. To me their breakfast really not very good, and also very little things. I prefer the food outside.. :)

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal di kamar standar pada Desember 2011. Segala sesuatu di hotel ini semuanya baik -baik saja. Nirkabelnya bagus, layanan juga cukup dapat diterima tetapi hanya bahwa lokasinya sedikit terlalu jauh dari kota yang sibuk. Tetapi jika Anda ingin memiliki akses mudah ke kota dengan taksi tanpa terganggu oleh jalanan yang sibuk, ini adalah tempat yang mungkin Anda inginkan. Harga juga sangat masuk akal. Kamar juga bersih dan stafnya juga ramah. Satu -satunya hal yang mungkin tidak begitu bisa diterima adalah sarapan mereka. Bagi saya sarapan mereka benar -benar tidak terlalu baik, dan juga hal -hal yang sangat kecil. Saya lebih suka makanan di luar .. :)

Review:
Stayed in a deluxe double room last weekend. The room was large, clean and comfortable. The hotel also provided nice clean towels and complimentary drinking water! Deck chairs by the pool also made it a perfect alternative to lounging at the beach! Service staff were mostly pleasant and helpful. 

To get to the beach, the staff will suggest that you take a taxi or their in-house shuttle bus. However, my boyfriend and I found that the beach was rather within walking distance! It took about 20mins to get there. Along the way you will pass by the main Kuta area where there are many shops and restaurants, making the walk enjoyable and not tiring at all. 

The prices for car rental and day tours at the front desk were overpriced, one would be better off taking a deal from the leaflets found at the airport. Also, don't bother getting the hotel to call a taxi for you, just walk right out to the main road where cabs are aplenty and get one yourself! 

Good stay overall, I wouldn't mind coming back!

Review_Bahasa:
Tinggal di kamar ganda mewah akhir pekan lalu. Ruangan itu besar, bersih dan nyaman. Hotel ini juga menyediakan handuk bersih yang bagus dan air minum gratis! Kursi dek di tepi kolam renang juga menjadikannya alternatif yang sempurna untuk bersantai di pantai! Staf layanan sebagian besar menyenangkan dan bermanfaat. 

Untuk sampai ke pantai, staf akan menyarankan agar Anda naik taksi atau bus antar-jemput in-house mereka. Namun, pacar saya dan saya menemukan bahwa pantai itu agak berjalan kaki! Butuh sekitar 20 menit untuk sampai ke sana. Sepanjang jalan Anda akan melewati daerah Kuta utama di mana ada banyak toko dan restoran, membuat jalan -jalan menyenangkan dan tidak melelahkan sama sekali. 

Harga untuk penyewaan mobil dan tur harian di meja depan terlalu mahal, orang akan lebih baik mengambil kesepakatan dari selebaran yang ditemukan di bandara. Juga, jangan repot -repot mendapatkan hotel untuk menghubungi taksi untuk Anda, berjalan saja ke jalan utama di mana taksi banyak dan dapatkan sendiri! 

Tetap secara keseluruhan, saya tidak akan keberatan kembali!

Subjeck: away from the hustle and bustle but not too far......
Review: We stayed her with our kids aged 7 & 9 in a 2 bedroom suite. Very nice and kleen and the staff were very helpful. There is a small pool and restaurant but not a place you would want to hang around all day (like a resort). There is a few chain stores around the corner and a cafe or two but taxi's are cheap and easy so go for a drive.There was a great supermarket and chinese restaurant only a few minutes walk away and you can get a Bluebird taxi (the trusted brand) right beside the restaurant. To get into down town kuta was about AU$1.50 and we even went to waterbom park, got stuck in traffic jam for 45 minutes and still only cost us AU$3! Even thought we only stayed first night/last night it was a good base to go shopping from!

Review_Bahasa: Kami tinggal bersama anak -anak kami berusia 7 & 9 di suite 2 kamar tidur. Sangat bagus dan Kleen dan stafnya sangat membantu. Ada kolam renang dan restoran kecil tetapi bukan tempat yang ingin Anda kenal sepanjang hari (seperti resor). Ada beberapa toko berantai di sekitar sudut dan satu atau dua kafe tetapi taksi murah dan mudah jadi pergi berkendara. Ada supermarket yang bagus dan restoran Cina hanya beberapa menit berjalan kaki dan Anda bisa mendapatkan taksi Bluebird (merek tepercaya) tepat di samping restoran. Untuk masuk ke kota di bawah, Kuta adalah sekitar AU $ 1,50 dan kami bahkan pergi ke Waterbom Park, terjebak dalam kemacetan lalu lintas selama 45 menit dan masih biaya kami AU $ 3! Bahkan mengira kami hanya tinggal malam pertama/tadi malam itu adalah basis yang bagus untuk berbelanja!

Subjeck: Cosy rooms, but in a rather inconvenient location..
Review: The triple room we stayed in was very big and cosy.. Only setback is that the hotel is located in a rather inconvenient location. There are only 2 daily shuttle buses to the beach and Discovery Shopping Mall. Thus we had to take a cab out most of the time..

Review:
This hotel was a great place to stay at. 
its only a year or two old very clean, the staff were very helpful and friendly and willing to help you out with anything. 
Its about 10 minutes drive from main strip in kuta which was good to be away from the hustle and bustle. 
will definitley be staying there next time we go to bali :)

Review_Bahasa:
Hotel ini adalah tempat yang tepat untuk menginap. 
Hanya satu atau dua tahun yang sangat bersih, stafnya sangat membantu dan ramah dan bersedia membantu Anda dengan apa pun. 
Sekitar 10 menit berkendara dari strip utama di Kuta yang baik untuk jauh dari keramaian dan kesibukan. 
Will Definitley akan tinggal di sana lain kali kita pergi ke Bali :)

Review:
As a wedding party we booked several rooms for an initial 3 days, but were so happy with The Quest we extended for 8 days. My daughter had stayed there before. Quiet staff, lots of attentive, friendly staff, every request promptly attended to. I even had a fridge replace at 11pm on my night of arrival when I found drinks leaking. Everything new and spotlessly clean and well maintained. At $50 a night including a lovely breakfast, great value for money. 
It's in a strange location, enclosed in a commercial complex which has the advantage of being very quiet and safe. $1.50 - $2 will get you a taxi to Kuta or Seminyak. On return to hotel you must tell the driver it is in Kuta Central Park as many aren't familiar with the hotel. Don't ask hotel to call a taxi as taxi charges surcharge, just walk out onto the main road and hail one. 
The quest is a welcome haven after a busy day out in the rat race.

Review_Bahasa:
Sebagai pesta pernikahan, kami memesan beberapa kamar selama 3 hari awal, tetapi sangat senang dengan pencarian yang kami lalui selama 8 hari. Putri saya telah tinggal di sana sebelumnya. Staf yang tenang, banyak staf yang penuh perhatian dan ramah, setiap permintaan segera hadir. Saya bahkan mengganti lemari es pukul 11 ​​malam pada malam saya kedatangan ketika saya menemukan minuman bocor. Semuanya baru dan bersih dan terawat dengan baik. Dengan harga $ 50 per malam termasuk sarapan yang indah, nilai uang yang bagus. 
Itu di lokasi yang aneh, tertutup di kompleks komersial yang memiliki keuntungan menjadi sangat tenang dan aman. $ 1,50 - $ 2 akan membawa Anda taksi ke Kuta atau Seminyak. Sekembalinya ke hotel, Anda harus memberi tahu pengemudi itu di Kuta Central Park karena banyak yang tidak terbiasa dengan hotel. Jangan meminta hotel untuk memanggil taksi sebagai biaya tambahan biaya, berjalan saja ke jalan utama dan memuji satu. 
Quest ini adalah tempat yang menyenangkan setelah hari yang sibuk di lomba tikus.
